med do zhes bstan pa yin ti/ shin tu yun rade du gnas pa nasangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas pa yin bar 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
dba' na chab/sa pa yang ma yin/ ma chags pa yang ma yin/ rtobar len pa'i chos la gnas pa dang ma yin te ) rtag pa dang/ shor zug pa dang/ brtan pa dang/ bde ba dang//
'jigs pa med pa dang/ nga rgyal med pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs ba med pa dang/ bdag dang sems can dang/ srog dang gang zag nyid yin te/ sngan chen snying po de bas na rtag
dang/ ther zug pa dang/ brtan pa'o zhes nga snya'o/ sngagachen snying po ngas nyan thos kyi theg par dge slong dag yongs su gzung bar bya ba gang yin pa de yongs su gzung bar gyis shig
yongs su gzung bar bya ba rtag pa dang/ ther zug pa dang/ brtan pa dang/ bdag blang bar bya ba blad par gyis shig lta bar rten du gyur pa rtag pa dang/ ther zug pa dang/
brten pa de la rten cig ces bstan te gsal ba'i donami mngon bar byas nas/ gsal bar ngas khastan de 'jig rten gyi khong du ma chud de/ sems can bsod nams chud du dga'/
b+bar ba la zad par sems shing/ de bzhin gshegs pa yod bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes la
'jug ste/ srog chags phye ma leb mar me'inang du lhung ba ba zhanAno// 'di lta ste dper na/ tshong pa'i bu thams cad dpyadakyadus tshigs su gzhig du 'dus nas
du bu chen po'i nang du khrus byedal/ de'inang du gcig gis nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba bor nas/ nor bu rin po ched 'ig zi brjid kyamathus kyang/ rdzong khu'i
chu'i phung po dang/ rus pa dang/ gsegam dang/ gyogodang/ rdo yod pa gang ban ba de dag thams cad rnam par mdzes par 'gyur to/ der zla ba dang/ nyima'i 'od kyang lhan n lhang den
mi 'dug go/ denas skye bo mang pos nor budabatsal ba'i phyir skyob dag gis rko bar byed de/ de'i nang nas ci yang rung ba zhig glas nas/ nor buded do snyam du semasate/ yid rab tu
dga' bar byed do// de nas sems can de dag rdzing khu'i 'gram du 'khod nasaso ser rlom sems su gyur na/ 'di jisnyam du sems bdag cag gis mard do snyam du sems par 'gyur
denas sems can de dag thams cad kyis nor bu rin po ches med kyang/ kye ma nor buran po ches dadazhes nor bumed pa'i 'du shes 'jug cing rtogs par byed dam/ de 'inang na khang
lamakhas shing yid gzhungs pa gcig gis nor bu ni po che de btsal te red do/ de bzhin du mdo dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ldem po ngag gi tshig ma shes pa'i nyan thos dang rang sangs
rgyas thams cad kyis ni khams cad mi rtag pa dang/ stong pa'i 'du shes ngang/ sems can med pa sgom par byed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtag pa nyid ma thob pas/ sems canaThamA
cad 'khor labawan du 'khor gyi/ tang ngo 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyakhu tshesanadabazhin gshegs pa'i ldem podraganor bu bzhin du rnyed bar 'gyur ro// smanachen snyi
po de bsan/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi shin tu lhag pa yang dag par mthong bar 'dod pasan/ ting nge 'dzin bad la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la/ rtag pa dang/ bdag
dang sems can du 'du shes bskyed par bya zhing thar ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o bam po bcu ste za ma'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang tang
nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub semasadapa'an shing gi grab mdang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shing yodazhagrib ma 'byung la/ grib ma medan lamadu zhugs te/
nga la bar gyur pa'i sems can der 'dug pa rnams dbugs phyin par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du deb zhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dod pa'i sems can rnams kyang skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sems
can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par blta ba'i sems can de dag ni skyabs su 'gro bar tsam yang med do zhes skya'o// gang dag de ltar yang dag/
par mthong ba de dag ni bstan pa 'di la 'phro bar mi byed do// gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i 'du shes su lta ba'i sems can de dag ni myang n du bya ba yin nozhes yang dang yang du nga
tsha smago dunas de'i tshonub phyogs nas gser gyi bod chen po zhig snang bar gyur te/gser gyi 'od chen po dus kyang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams
zla cad nor bu rin po chame'i 'od snang ba chen pos snang bar byas te/ de'i skabs su stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamasan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od gcig tum
gtogs par de las gzhan pa zla ba dang 'am rnams kyi 'od dang/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi 'od dang/ klu dang gnod sbyin dang/ nam mkha' lding rnams /
klu kyi 'od thams cad mog mog por gyur te/ rtsig pa dang shing dang/ tshal gyi nang dang/ lhun podang/ lhun po tshan pa dang/ de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi bar mtshams de dag thams cad 'od
des snang bar byas so// sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can gang dag gi lus la 'od des phog pa de dag thams cad kyang sdug bsngal rtsa zhilabar gyur to/ bcom ldan 'das dang/
'khor dkyil 'khor chen po'i nang du yab pad bkra zhing blta na sdug la kha dog bzang zhing yid du 'ong ba mdabam bye rgya stong phrag du ma dang ldan pa steng rin po cha'i dra ba/ dri bsung dang/
ldan zhing 'jam la ) ka tsa lin da'i gos ltar regan bde ba/ bkra zhing bltan sdug pa dag gis kun tu khebs pa ) bye ba phrag drug cu sa gzhi brtol te mngon brar mkhyen par gyur to/ pad+ma/
de dgare re las dri ngan 'byung ba gang yinabs kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dris khyab par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'a'ajig rten gyi khams 'da'i lha
dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ mi rnams kyi sos gang yin bde dag thams cad kyang/ pad+ma'i dri des khyab par gyur to/ lha dang mi rnams dang lha ma yin dang/ nam khag
ljang dang/ klu dang da gnod sbyin dang/ dri za rnams dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lta'aphye chen po gang dag gasnar pad+ma'adrid song bde dag thams cad kyang chos kyi dga' ba dang/ chos
nyan pa'i rgyu dang ldan par gyur te/ bdag nyid nyon mongs pa dang bral snyam du shesaso// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo sprin chen snying pos chos kyi
'od bkod po de mthong bas khrol mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar phyogs bcur 'od gda' ba 'di dang/ pad+ma'i bkod pa byung ba 'di
su'i snga ltas lags// de nas lham dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis sbyin chen snying po la 'di skadaces skyasas// 'phags pa sbag chen snying po ci'i phyi
pha bcom ldan 'das 'dasu'i snga ltas lags shes s+sa/ mtshanamamed pa'i chos rmi lam lta bu yin yang 'dra bar byed dam/khyod la da dung yang phyin ci log yod pa 'dra'o// s+sasapa/ lhatsho
legs legaso// de de bzhin te lhamo khyod legasago/de de bzhinati/lcame khyod legs so// kho bon rmi lam lta bu'i yul dag la mtshan mar ltakha 'dzin pa'i 'du shes/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu bar
byed de// sbas pa/ 'phags kha snganechen snang bo su 'don kyi phyir mtshan mar ltakha'adzan pa'i 'du shes skyakhar byed/ smras pa// sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir/
sbas pa )gang bdag gi lta ba bsal mi nus padis/ gzhan gyi lta ba sel bar 'gyur ba de na gnas mod do// bcom ldan 'dos kyis bka' stsalapa ) pan chen snying po de ni lha mos rje
skad smras pa bzhin te/ ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yin padon/ mtshan ma med pa'i 'du shes yang dag par mthong ba yin no/ de gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das 'dalaganas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo mtshan ma mchas pa'i 'dushes yang dag ba'akhaltakhar 'tshol bas// ji ltar yang
dug par blta bar bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ sbyan chen sAng po ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub semasadapa'asems dpa' chen po ni/ stong ga sum gyi stong chen po'i 'dreg
rten gyi khams su bdag nyid rnam pa dumar ston kha'i byed do// gsol kha/ bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
'jig rten gyi khams su bdag nyid rnam pa du mar rjeltar ston par bgyad// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbrani chen snyad pa'adi lta ste dper na/ snum
mkhan nam/ sgyur mkhan gyi slob mnan tan du sbyang sal/ mkhas pas rolamo'i nang du bdag nyid ror gyur par ston par byed )bud med kyis lus rnam pa sna tshogs su
yang ston par byed gcan zan gyis zin pa dang/ lus zhu ba dang/ lus ma snang ba dang/ tshig pa dang/ bcad pa dang/ gtub pa'i rnam pas/ pha rol tu 'dred pa lta
bur gsung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshul du bdag nyid ston pa dag kyang mthong na/ der rgyus shes pa'i chos 'jigs par ma bya/ mya ngan du mi bya bar/ de la rig sngags kyi
rang bzhin du bltakhar bya'o// de bzhin du ting nge 'dzan 'de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rtagi kha nyid kyi lam lanan tan du sbyangs pas/ sems can rnams
[/]// nges bar bsgral ba'i phyir/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir/ bdag nyid rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshul du ston par byed de/ ting nge 'dzin
'ad la gnas pa'i byang chub semasadapa 'badag nyidarnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshul du ston par mthong na/ brtan pa'i rgyus shos shing mkhas khus skag par ma bya/ kun tu skrag par mi bya/
dadang b.ram bya/ 'jigs pas mkhya/ mya nganAdum bya bar do lasems can rtag par nyid kyi rang bzhin du blta bar bya'o snga nachen snying po gzhan yang tang de 'dzin 'dal gan
pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'jig rten gyi dang 'thun par 'jug pa'i bya ba rnam pa grangasamed dpag tu medal/ bgrang ba las 'das pa
'as pa rnam pa sna tshogs su bdag nyid ston to// 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag sum bdag tu yang gong ma ban du sbyar ro// de lta bu'i tshul khrims du byab brag brgyun bslebar byaste/ gong ma khas
rgyu du sbyar ro// gsaMlakha/ bcom ldan 'das teng nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'atshan bas/ stong gsumagya stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'jig rten
dang 'thun par 'jug par bya ba'i rnams gras bkachis/ dakhag tum mchis ba rnam pasAtshogs su bdag nyid ji ltar ston par bgyud/ bka'astsal pa/ tengang 'dzan 'dal gnasakha'i
byang chub sems dpas 'dzam bu'i gling la lar/ bdag nyid mang la nas skye ba lta bu r ston te/ sems can rnams kyis khu btsas bar shes kyang// 'khrig pa la brtenAnas byung ba dang/
ma yin zhing bu'i rang bzhin dang 'du shes 'jug pa yang med do/ 'dzamabu 'i gling 'alaran gtsug phud bregs kha'i las lta bu r ston te/ semasacan rnams kyis mna'ar byung
kha ra shes kyang/ de la mngon par 'byung ba'i 'du shes 'jug pa yang med do// 'dzam bu'aglangal lar nagatsug phud bregs pa'i las lta bu r ston te/ sems can rnams kyis gtsug
bud 'dugakha'i lasabyed par shes kyang/ de la de'i 'du shes 'jug pa yang med do/ 'dzam bu'i gling la lar namakhan lnga'i khyi mdu'agro ba ltakhur ston te/ bslab par bya
ba'i yig slob bur sems can rnams kyis shes kyang/ bskal pa du mar bsub pa'i khyi bshanatu tshor phyin par byas ng/ bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya stong dum nasabazo'i bya ba than
cad kyang mthar phyin to// 'dzam bu'i gling la lar nama' seng gdang/ ngang pa'i skabs su 'gro ba lta bu r ston te/ sems can rnams kyis mi'i seng ge dang ngang pa'i stabs su 'grob
shes kyang/ bskal pa bye ba khrag dug la sogs pa nas/ ngang pa'i stabs kyi 'du shes de yang sangs so// 'dzam bu'i gling la la ni budang chung ma yang ston par byed de/ sems
rtsa @#/ can rnams kyis 'dod pa la longs su spyod par shes kyang/ de yang rtag tu chos 'dod pa la longs su spyod kyi 1 nyon mongs pa dang/ 'dod kha la gnasakham len no/
'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni/ bung ba dang/ gci ba lta bu r ston par byed de/ sems can rnams kyis cashang ba dang/ gsab byed par shes kyang bskal pa bye baphragagrangs med pa
tshe nas bshang ba dang/ gci ba'i 'du shes kyang rnam par byas te/ 'du shes de yang 'jug pa med do// 'dzam bu'aglingal la ranas shing spyod pa lta bu r stonate/ so 'cha'abar
sems can rnams kyis shes kyang/ bskal pa byeb grangasamed panas/ nyon mongs pa'i sobang rnamakhar spangs te/ kha yang ud pa'a'adod ldagano// 'dzam bu'agling la lar
ni gdugs dang/ lham 'chang kha lta bu r ston to/ gdugs dang lham 'chang bar sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bsal labye ba dumanas nyen mongs pa'i gdugasadang/ lham gyi 'du shes de
yang rnam par sbyangs ti[ã ]lus dag cing rtag tu chos kyi bde ba dang/ ting nge 'dzan gyi gdugs 'chang zhing/ na po che'i gdugs dumadang/ pad+ma'i lhamathams cad rten par byed do//
'dzam bu 'agling la lar ni khrus byed pa lta bu r ston te/ khrus byed par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang/ bskal pa byeb phrag dumanas khrus kyi 'du shosade rnam par sbyangs te[:]mdongum
nas byung ba'achus rtag tu khrus byed cing semasacan thams cad kyi mu stegs su gyur pa yang yin no// 'dzam bu'i gling la lar zhind kyi rang bzhin lta bu r ston tesman la ston par sems
canarnamos kyis shes kyang/ bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas nyon mongs pa thams cod dang bral zhing/ nad rnams bsal ba ste/ sems can nad kyis thebs pa rnams dang/ 'dodachag
kyi rang bzhin dag las kyang gso bar byed de// 'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni grang ba dang tshab la sten pa lta bu r ston te/ grang ba dang rgya bal sten par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang//
bskal ba bye ba phrag du ma lasogs pa nas/ grang ba dang tsho ba'i 'jigs pa yang rnam par sangs so// 'dzam bu'i glangal lar nibakresapa dang skom pas srid cung zhen ba dang ldan
par ston te/ bkres shing skom pas gdungs par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang/ bskal ba bye ba phrag du mnas/ bkres pa dang skom pa'i 'du shes kyis 'jigs pa'i klung gi
rgyun las kyang rgalanas/ rtag tu bkres pa dang/ skom pas srid par gyur pa'i 'byung po thams cad kyi kha zas su gyur cig ces zer ra// 'dzam bu'i gling la laran sbyin pa'i
pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa la rtson ba lta bu r ston te/ kye ma sbyin pa la rtsom po'i sems can yin par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang/ bskal pa bye ba phrag du mnas kyang/ pha rol
tu phyin pa dum rtag tu spyad pas/ pharel tu phyin pa bcu po rnams lasems can rnams sdud pa'i rgyur gyur to/ 'dzam bu'i gleng la lar na 'khor las sbyar ba'i rgyal
srid kyi tshul ston te'akhor las sbyar ba'i rgyal por sems can rnams kyis shes kyang/ de 'khor las sgyur ba'i rgyal po phrol gyi spyod pa ya mospyod de rtag tu phyir mi ldog po'i sa
kyi'akhor lo skor ba'i rgyal po byedang/ sems can thams cad kyang byed du 'jug go/ 'dzam bu'i gling lar nadi ltabu'i rgyul sadi phun sum tshogs pa shin tu rgya che babadrag kyang rtsa
bzhin du bor nas/ rab tu byung ba'i gzugs dang/ mtshan ma ston khar byed de/ la laran rab tu byung ba lta bu / la lar na rab tu ma byung ba lta khur sems can rnams kyis shes
so// 'dzam bu'i gling lo lar na ya mtshan can shAms cad kyi rab tu byung ba lta khur/ lta ba nganapa rab tu 'byung ba la rab tu byung bdasems can rnams kyis shes kyang ya mtshan
can thams cad dang 'thunabar rab tu byung ba yang ma yin te/ de dag nges por bsgral ba'i phyir rab tu 'byung ngo// 'amabu'i gling la 'aran du bzhin ga shogs pa bab tu 'byung ba rtsom
ba lta bu r ston to/ de bzhin gshegs pab tu 'byung bas rab tu byung bar sems can rnams kyis shos kyang/ bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rab tu 'byung ba'i bya
ba yang mthar phyin par byas so// 'dzam bu'i gling la laran sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gsum yang dag par 'dzin pa lta bu r ston te/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan can yo byad bsdus pa bzhi
bar sems can rnamasakyis shes kyang/ bskal pa bye ba phrag dumanas sbyangs pa'i yon tan rdzogasashing rtag tu mnyamakhar bzhag pa yong yin no// 'dzam bu'i gling la lor na
byung chub kyi snying por rdza btung ba la 'dug pa lta bu r ston te/ byang chub kyi skad lo la 'dug par/ sems can rnams kyis shes kyang/ rtag tu byang chub kyi mthar phyin par byas pa yang
yin no// 'dzam bu'i glangal lar na bsam gtan dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms khar 'jug kha la goms par zhugs pa lta bu r ston ti/ bsam gtan dang )ting nge 'dzin dang/
snyoms par 'jug pa la soms par zhugs khar sems can rnams kyis shes kyang/ rtag tu snyoms par 'jug pa'i spyod kha du ma la spyad pa yang yin no/ 'dzam bu'i gling la la ni
yan log dgupa'amado 'chad lta bu r ston te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yan lag dgu ba'i mdo gsungs pa'achad par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang/ rtag tu mdedu ma la sogs
galang 'tshad do// 'dzam bu'i gling la lar na bslabapa'igazha' tshad nges par byed pa ltakhur ston te/ bslab pa'igazhi'i tshad nges par 'cha'akharabyed par sems can rnams kyis shes
kyang chos kyi phung bo brgyad khri bzhastong gamado dag kyang rtag tu byed cing bslab pa'i gzhi dum dag kyang rtag tu 'cha'akhar byed do// 'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni byang chub/
kyashing drung du bdud 'dul ba lta bu r stonati/ bdud kyi steng mkhar byas par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang/ bdud kyi 'du shes gcig kyang mi 'byung ste/ nyon mongs pa'ibadud dang/
tsha phung po'i bdud lasogs la bdud byeb phragadum dag kyang rtag tu zad par byed do// 'dzam bu'i gling la laranargyun tu zhugs pa'i 'brasabu la sogs pa 'bras bu bzhi sgrubapa lta bu ston te
'bras bu bzhi thob par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang/ 'bras bu bzhi'i 'du shes kyang mi 'byung ste/ 'bras bu'ongs ba dub dag la lang spyod cing/ phyir ma 'ong ba yang yin la ) sems can
rnams nges par bsgral ba'i phyir/ rtag tu sred ba'i yan lag rnams su yang 'ong// 'dzam bu'aglang la lar na yon gnas lta bu r ston te/ 'jig rtenan don gnas yin par sems can
rnams kyang shes kyang 1 yon gnas kyis nga rgyal la yang mi spyod da ) nam sems canaThams cad bla na med kha mang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yon gnas sugyur bde 'tsha/ bdag yin/
gnas kyi 'du shes la 'jug go snyams ) mgos kha'i spyad pa laspyod do// 'dzam bu'i gling la 'don dag 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa lta bu r stonate/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed par sems cananag
[/ ]kyis shes kyang sngon gyi bskal ba bye ba phrag grangs med pa nas/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen sngan chad kyang ma byus te/ dge 'dun la sman par sgrub par byed pa leno// 'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni
bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyis reg pa'i rdul gung du 'dor bar byed pa lta bu r ston te/ kye ma ngur smag ma'achang ngami zadaba'i lasaMbyed bzhog lanapar sems can rnams kyis shes kyang
ngur smig tsam 'chad kha yang ma yin te/ sems can thams cad la ban pa dang/ bde ba ston pa yang yanano// de lasegs pa gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabasakyi drung du chos
mnyan pa thosan/ kye ma dag sbyong go'u ta mni brda thad ka'abasha stagazer re zhes 'phya bltabur ston te/ kye ma g.yengs pa'i shes rab rtul ba'i dag slong zhig yin par sems can rnams
kyis shes kyang/ bskal pa bya baphrag dum nas ) de bzhin gshegs pa la phan pa dang bde ba byed pa yang yin no// 'dzam bu'i gling la lar na de bzhin gshegs pa la zas dug
gcan 'bul zhing bslab pa'i gzhidang/ bam pa'i 'gral ba byed pa lta bu r ston tre/ bam pacan du sems can rnams kyis shes kyang sems can thamasacad kyi tshul khrims
kyi sdom pa skyed par byed pa yang yin no// 'dzam bu'i gling la lar na/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam kyi mdzad bamang poston pa lta bu r ston te/ yang dag par ston pa po yin bar sems
[7/]@#// can rnams kyis shes kyang/ yang dag par ston pa po yang ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyan byed pa yin no// 'dzam bu'i gling la khur ni nyan thos
dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad lta khur bdag nyid ston te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad lanabar/ sems can rnams kyis shesas// 'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni
yongasasumya ngan las 'da' ba lta bu r bdag nyid ston te/ yongs sumya ngan las 'das par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang/ sngan tshad gtan du yongs sumya ngan las 'das pas
nanams kyang yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das so/ lan cig yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa lang ma yin te/ lanamang du yang yongs sumya ngan las
'dus bas longs su mya ngan las 'da'o// lan grangs bye ba phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas/ longs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed de/ lan bye ba phrag mi'i
cig stong du 'dod chags las yongs su mya ngan 'das pas yongs sumya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyural/ 'dod chags la brten te yongs sumya ngan las 'da'ab yang ma yin no// lan bye

ba brag nyi khracig stong du zhe sdang las yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o// lan bye ba phrag nyi khri cig stong du gti mug las yongs su mya ngan las 'dakaM/ 'an byeb phrag nyi khra cag stong du chamanyam ba
las yongs sumya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed de/ rnam pa bzhi po 'di lta bu s yongs sumya ngan las 'das pa chen por yongs sungan las 'da' bar 'gyur
la 'dod chags dang/ zhesngang drang/ gti mug dang chamanyam pa la yang mi rten to// de ltar yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bzhi po de dag gis// bskal pa bye ba phrag du mnas=
ba mthar phyin te 'dul ba'i dbang gis yongs sumya ngan las 'da' ba lta bu r ston te/ ma dge ba'i phyogs ji snyed par yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang de snyed de/ rtag tu skad
cig dang/ klung cig dang/ yud tsam gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o// du bas na nam bamang po dag gis yongs su myungan las 'da' ba khyed la/ gtan tu yongs su mya ngan
las 'da' ba'iming yang med pa'i phyir 'ongs su mya ngan las 'da'o// 'dzam bu'i gling lar na bdud kyi las byed par bdag nyid stonAte/ bdud sdig can yin par sems can rnams
kyis shes kyang/ bdud kyi las kyang mi byed do// 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug gi 'jigs pa la sogs pa/ mi dge ba'i phyogs ji snyed ba'i bdud kyi las rtag tu byed
la/ shin tu gcod par byed pa'i bdud kyi lasal rten ba yang ma yin no// byang gi sgram snyan la lar bdag nyid mdal nas skye ba ltakhur ston te/ sems can rnams kyis khu btsas
par shes kyang/ 'khrig pa la brten nas byung ba yang m yin zhing/ bu'i rang bzhin yang ma yin no// byung gi sgram snyan la lar ni mngon bar 'byung ba yang stonate/
sems can rnams kyis mngon bar 'byung bar shes kyang/ de la mngon par 'byung ba'i 'du shes 'jug pa yang med do// byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni gtsug phud bregs pa'i las lta bu r
tsha ston te/ sems can rnams kyis gtsug phud 'dreg pa'i las byedapar shes kyang de la de'i 'du shes 'jug pa yang med do// byang ga skam snyan la lar ni mkhan po'i khul du 'gro ba lta bu r
ston te/ bslab par bya ba'i yig slob par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang ) bskal pa du mar bslab pa'i bya ba shin tu tshar phyin par byas shing/ bskalam bye ba phrag brgya stong du mnas bzo'i
byababrams cad kyang mthar phyin to// byang gisgra mi snyan la laran mi'i seng ge dang ( ngang pa'i stabs su 'gro blta bu r ston te/ sems can rnams kyis mi'i seng ge dang ngang pa'i stabs su 'gro
bar shes kyang/ bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma la sogasapanas/ ngang pa'i stabs kyi 'du shes de yang sbyangs so// byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni budang chung ma yang ston par byed de/ sems can rnamA
kyis 'dod pa la yongs su spyod par shes kyang/ de yang rtag tu chos 'dod pa la longs su spyod kyi/ nyon mongs pa dang 'dod pa la gnas pa la gnas pa ma yin no// byang gi sgram snyan la laranabashang
ba dang gci ba blta khur ston khar byed de/ sems can rnams kyis bshang ba dang/ gca ba byedapar shes kyang/ bskal pa bye ba phrag grungasamed panas bshangab dang/ gcuba'i 'du
shes kyang rnam par sbyangs te/ 'dushes de la 'jug med do// byung ga sgrom snyan la lar na so shing dpa lta bu r ston te/ so shi'acha'akhar sems can rnams kyis shes kyang/
bskal pakhye ba grangs med pa nas/ nyon mongs pa 'aso shing rnam par sbyangs te ) khe yang ud pa la'adri dang ldan no/ byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar na gdugs dang lham 'chang ba lta bu r ston te/
gdugs dang/ lham 'chang bar sems can rnams kyis shes kyang/ bskal pabyab du mnas nyonamos pa'i gdugs dang/ lham gyi 'du shes kyang rnam par spangs te/ lus dag cing rtag
tu chos kyi bde bdang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi gdugs 'chang zhing/ na po che'i gdugs dang/ pad+ma'i lham thams cad ston par byed do// byang gi sgra mi snyan la larani khrus byed ba lta bu r ston
khrus byed par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang/ bskal pabye ba phrag du ma nas lus kyi 'du shes de rnam par spangs// mdo du ma nas byung ba'i chus rtag du khrus byed cing/ sems can tham
cad kyis mu stegs sugyur pa yang 5no// byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni nad kyi rang bzhin lta bu r ston te ) smanal ston par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang )bskal pabye ba phragadumanas/
[p]// nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral zhingand rnams bsalabaste/ sems can nad kyis thebs pa rnams dang/ 'dod chags kyarang bzhin dag las kyang gso bar byed do//
po byang gi sgram snyan la lar ni grang ba dang/ tsha b.lasten pa ltakhur ston te/ grang ba dang tshab la sten par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang/ bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma la sogs panas/ grang
bdang tsha ba'i 'jigs pa yang rnam par sbyangs sa// byang gi sgyu ma snyan la lar na bkres pa dang skom pa'i sred cing zhen pa dang ldan par ston to/ bkres shing skom pas gdungs par semA
can rnams kyis shes kyang/ bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas bkres pa dang skom pa'i 'dushesakyi 'jigs pa'i klung gi rgyun las kyang rgal nas/ rtag tubakres pa dang skom pas sred par

gyur pa 'i 'byung po thams cad kyi kha zas su gyur cigaces zer ro// byang gi sgra ma snyan la lar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la rtsom kha lta bu r ston te/ kyam sbyin ba la brtson pa'i
soms can yin bar sems can rnamasakyis shes kyang/ bskal babyekhaphrag dums kyang pha rol tu phyin pa du ma rtag tu spyad pas pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po rnams lasems can rnams sdudapal/
rgyur gyur to/ byang ga skamasnyan la laran 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyi tshulaston te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal bor sems can rnams kyis shes kyang/ de'akhor los
skyar kha pal gyi skud pa dang mi snyan de/ rtag tu phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor laskor ba'i rgyal po byed cing/ sems can thams cad kyang byed du 'jug go/ byung gi sgra masnyan la/
lor nadi lta bu'i rgyal srid phun sum tshogs pa shin tu rgya che bdag kyang rtswa bzhin du bor nas/ rab tu byung ba'i gzugs dang/ mtshanam ston par byed de/ la lar ni rab tu byung ba lta bu r
la laran rab tu ma byung ba lta bu r sems can rnams kyis shes so// byang gi sgram snyan la laran ya mtshan can thams cad kyi rab tu byung ba ltakhur lta ba don kha rab tu 'byung ba la rab tu
byung ba sems can rnams kyis shes kyang/ ya mtshan can thams cad dang 'thunakhara'ab tu byung ba yang ma yin te/ de dag nges par sgral ba'i phyir rab tu 'byung dro/ byadagi sgra
snyanal laranade bzhin gshegs pa'i rab tu 'byung bar rtsom ba lta bu r rten te de bzhin gshegs pa'i rab tu 'byung bas rab tubyung bar sems can rnams kyis shes kyang/ bskal
labyib phrag du mnas dbazhin gshegs pa'i ba tu byung ba'i bya ba mang mthar phyin par byas so/ dbyang gi sgramasnyanaM la laran sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gsum yang dag par 'go blta
bur ston te/ sbyongs pa'i yon tan can yo byad bsnyungs pa yin bar sems can rnams kyis shes kyang/ bskal pakhyabaphrag dum nas sbyangs pa'i yon tan rdzogs shing rtag tu mnyam par
bzhag pa yang yin no// byang gi sgra misnyan la lar ni/ byang chub kyi snying bor rtswa btang ba lta bu r ston te/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par semasacan rnams kyis shes
kyang/ rtag tu byang chub kyi bya ba mthar phyin par byas pa yin no// byang gi sgra ma snyan la lar ni/ bsam gtan dang/ tingang 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par
'a zhugs pa lta bu r ston te/ bsam gtan dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang ) rtag tu snyoms par 'jug
pa'i spyod pa du ma laspyod pa yang yin no// byang gi sgra ma snyan la larani yan lag dgu'i mdo 'chad pa lta bu r ston te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yan lag dgu'amado gsungs pa 'chad
par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang/ rtag tu mdo du ma la sogs pa yang 'chad do byang ga sgramasnyan la lar na bslab pa'i gzhatshad med pa nges par byedapa lta bu r ston te/ bslab
pa'i gzhi tshad med pa nges par 'cha' bar byed par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang/ chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gimado dag kyang rtag tu byed cing ) bslab pa'i gzhi du ma dag kyang
rtag tu 'cha' bar byed do// byang ga sgram snyan la lar ni byang chub kyi shing drung du bdud 'dul ba ltakhur ston te/ bdud kyi sde pham par byas par sems can rnams kyi shes kyang/ bdud kyi
'du shes gcig kyang ma 'byung ste/ nyon mongs ba'i bdud dang/ phung po'i bdud la sogs pa bdud bye ba du ma dag kyang rtag tu za bar byed do//byang gi sgramasnyan la la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
khul sogs pa 'bras bukhazhi slob ba lta bu r ston te/ 'bras bu bzhi khrob par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang/ 'bras bu bzhi'i 'du shes kyang ma 'byung ste/'bras bu'i bya bdu ma dog la yang/
spyod cing/ byar mi 'ong ba yang m yin la/ sems can rnams nges par bsgral ba'i phyir/ rtag tu srid pa'i yan lag rnams su yang 'ong ngo// byang gi sgra mi snyan la laran yon gnas lta
bur ston te/ 'jig rten na yon gnas yin bar sems can rnams kyis shes kyang/ yon gnas kyi nga rgyal yang mi spyod de/ nam sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu yon gnas su gyur pa de'i tshe) bdag yon gnas kyi 'du shes la 'jug go snyam nas ma gos pa'i spyad pa la spyod do// byung gi sgram snyan la lar na dge 'dun gyadabyen byed pa lta bu r
ston te/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang/ sngon gyi bskal ba grangs med pa nasaM/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen sngon chad kyang ma byas te/ drag 'dun la phan pa sgrub
par spyod pa yin no// byang gi sgra ma snyan la lar na ) de bzhin gshegasapa'i zhabs kyis reg pa'i rdul gud du 'dor bar byed pa lta bu r ston te/ kye ma ngur smig tsam 'chang zhing mo
rgyuny+tsa/ bzad pa'i las byed pa zhig yin par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang/ ngur smagatsam 'chang ba langam lan te/ sems canathams cad la phan pa dung )
bde bstan pa lung yin no// da lasogs pa gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs drung du chos nyan pa thos nas/ kyam dge sbyong go'u taman brda sprod dka' bsha stag zer ro zhes 'phyi
ba lta bu r ston te/ kye ma g.yes kha shesarab tshul ba' dag slong zhig lan bar sems can rnams kyis shes kyang/ bskal ba bye ba phrag dum nas[ï¼]de bzhin gshegs pasems can la phan
lho padang khad pa byed pa yang yin no// byang gi sgram snyan la lar ni de bzhin gshegs pa la zas dug can 'bul nang khaslab pa'i gzhidang ) bram pa'i 'gal ba byed pa lta bu r ston te/ phamakha
can du sems can rnams kyis shes kyang/ sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi sdom paskyed par byed pa yang yin no// byang ga sgrumasnyan lalar na/ debazhan gshegs pa rnams kyi
mdzad pa mang po ston pa lta bu r ston te/ yang dag par ston pa po len par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang/ yang dag par ston pa po yang ma man te/ de bzhin gshegs kha'i rgyan byed kha
mnano// byang gi sgra masnyan la larani/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad lta bu r bdag nyidasten te/ nyan thes dang/ nga sangs rgyas thams cad yin par sems can rnams
kyis shes so// byang gasgra ma snyan lalar na yongs sumya ngan las 'da' ba lta bu r bdag nyid ston te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' khar semasasacan rnams kyis shes kyang/ sngon chad
gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pasan nams kyang longs su mya ngan lasam 'dasaso/ lan cag longs sumya ngan las 'das pas )yongs sumya ngan las 'das pa yang yin te/
lanamang du yongasasumya las 'das khas lasumya ngan las 'da'o// lan grangs bye ba phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas/ yongs sumya ngan las 'da' bar byed de na
bye ba phrag nyi khracag stong du 'dod chags las longs su mya ngan las 'das pas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyural ) 'dod chags la brten te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das
'da' ba yang ma yin no// lan bye ba phrag te khra cig stong du zhe sdang las yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o// lan bye ba phrag nyi khri chig stong du gti mug las yongs su mya ngan las 'dago/ lan
bya baphrag nyi khricig stong du cha mnyam pa las longs su mya ngan las 'das pas do yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed de/ rnam pa bzhi po 'di lta bu s yongs sumya ngan las 'das kha chen/
bor longs su mya ngan las 'da' khar 'gyur la/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug dang/ cha mnyamang la lang la rten to// de ltar lengs su mya ngan las 'das pachen po/
khazhi po dag gis/ bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas/ bya ba mthar phyin to// 'dul ba'i dbang gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba lta bu r ston to/ mi dge ba'i thog
ka ji snyed yod par yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang de snyed de/ rtag tu skad cig dang/ thad cag dang yud tsam gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o// de bas na rnam pa mang po dag
gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed la/ gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i ming yang med pa'i phyir/ yosasumya ngan las mi 'da'o// byang gi sgami snyanal lar ni/ bdud
wI kyi las byed par bdag nyid ston te/ bdud sdig can yin bar semasacan rnams kyis shes kyang/ bdud kyi las kyang med do// 'dod chags dang/ zhesnang dang/ gti mug gis
'jigs pa lasogs ba ma dag ba'i phyogs risnyed pa de snyed kyi bdud kyi las rtag tu byed la/ shin tu gcod par byed pa'i bdud kyi las la rten pa yang ma yin no/ 'dzam bu'i glang dang
byang gi sgra mi snyan du ji lta ba de bzhAn du gleng thams cad du yang sbyar bar bya// rgyal chen bzhal la dag tu 'am/ de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor
ba'i nang du/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin lta bu r bdag nyid ston te/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgyabyin yin par sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyisashisaso// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi
la yang de bzhin du sbyar ro// srid pa thams cad la yang srid pa thams cad kyi tshul dumangal du skye ba rnam bar ston te/ sradi la thams cad kyisems can rnams 'du rang gi gzugs dang 'dra bar/
sems so// de bzhin du srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis kyi rang bzhin thams cad du yang bdag nyid ston cing/ sems can thams cad kyang khams kyi 'du shes la 'jug bar byed la//
sems can gyi khams la yang mi gnas shing/ tshes kyidabyings yin la/ rtag tu chos kyi gtamakhyad bar yang sems can rnams kyis shes so// sbyin chen snying po de bas na/ zab tsho
brtan pa'i chu'i rgya mtsho'i dus tshod kyi dang de 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lan 'jug pa'i gnas kyi gzhi gcig tu chad pa medra de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
yul gyi rgyu ba la rgyu bar mi byed do// 'jig rten dang 'khrun bar 'jug pa'i bya ba du ma dang/ sems can thams cad nges par bsgral ba'i phyirin rgyu ba yang mi byed de/ rtag tu nges
rten thams cad dang 'thun par 'jug rung/ gang dang gang du gdul bar bya ba rnams snang ba de dang der lang/ bdag nyid ston te/ de bas na mtshanam med pa'i 'du shes la spyod pa zhes

bya'o// gang gis mtshan mo'i daa bo ngan pa'i 'du shes mthong ba des ni yang dag par mthong ngo zhesangaskya'o//lhamo dri ma med pa 'od 'di mtshan ma med pa'i ye shes ston pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegA
ba mas cad kyang ting nge 'dzin bde la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la 'di ston bar mdzad do// de nas spyan chen snying pos gsolal ) kyi mkhacig
ldan 'das lhamodram med pa'i 'od 'di ni na zhumakhas te/ phra ba shes pa dang ldan zhang mtshan mar mchis pa'i ye shes kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyabab la sgomabar 'gyad de/ shin tu legs
par yang dag par mthong ba lags so// de nas de 'a tshe/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad mkhyen ba dang ldan pas 'dzum pa mdzad nas/ 'od 'phrob ston po dang/ ser
ts+tshA podang/ dmar po dang da dkar bo dang/ leb rgan dang/ shel dang/ dngul gyi kha dog canabcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgonas byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khamasam 'a yas mumed par 'od
zhi kyis khyab par gyur nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la thug pa'i bar du song ste/ slar yang leganas khacom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi gtsug tu
ma snang bar gyur to// de'atshos rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ ldog rab tu ldeg par gyurato// rigs kya budaper na/ byang gisgramasnyan gyaglang rtag tu shin tu brgyan cang/ kho ra
khor luganasamadzes par byas pa de bzhin du/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di legs par brgyan par mthong ngo/ denas byang chub sems dpa' sems/
mdub ba chen po sAn chen snying po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bza nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag batshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
to/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pan donAm mchis par 'dzum bam mdzadun/ 'dzumakhramadzad pa'irgyu gang lags ) rkyen gang lags/ ci'i slad du'od zer rnams byung bar gyug
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'din stama'i tsho nub phyogs nas ) byang chub sems dpa' mar gyur pa'i 'od chen po byung ba mthong nas/ khyod kyi yid la ngo mtshar du gyur ti) bcom ldan
'das 'di su'i snga ltas lags shes zer ba de nyid kyi don dang/ sems can khrums cad la phanaba'akhyer/ nga 'dzum pa mdzad do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub srems dpa'am
mchogade mchishig par bka' stsal du gsol/ bka' stsal pa/ byang chub semasadapa' 'dri'i nubaphyogs legasan/ de bzhinagashegs pa dgrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
'od dpag med ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams bde bcan zhes bya ba dand ltar 'tsho zhing gzhes te/ chos kyang ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des btang
te bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'jig rten gyi khams mamadzodan ) da ltar 'dzam bu'i gling khamibasod nams chung rnams la phan pa dang bde ba dang/ yid bde ba skyed bar khyaba'i phyir/
[n/ ]gu/ skrun chen po zhes bya bsangs rgyas thamasacad kyis tshul gyis chos chen po ston gyis/ song la ting nge 'dzan 'ad yang zung shices gsungs so// panachen snying po zhes
khyod kyis 'di rang bzhin gyi lus mthong ngam/ gsolal/ bcom ldan 'das 'di'i rang bzhin gyi lusukyi ngo bo la dpag tshadas la phrag dgu dang dgu 'bumamachis te/ lus che zhing snang ba
chen por gad 'o ba lags n/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ma byang chub sems dpa' lus chab 'di 'amingan ci zhes bgyi/ gal te tha mal pa'i lus tshwa 'dra b.lags n ) bsgyurakha'i lus ni
zhwa 'dra bar 'gyur/ ji ltar sems can thams cad la snyan pa'i slad dumachis pa/ sems can sbram sacan la sman pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad dugasol/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od mtha' yas shes bya ba thabasalamakhas kha 'don/ lha mo drim med pa'i 'od 'di lung bstan pa yongs su gzung ba dang/ sems can thams
cad yi rang bar bya ba dang/ sems can khams cad la phan pa dang bde ba bya ba dang/ nges par bsgral ba dang/ ting nge 'dzin bad lamachod pa bya ba'i phyir 'ongs so// gsol la/ lhamo dri ma
med pa 'i 'od gang du bud med kyi lus las ldog par 'gyur ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan du gsol/ bka' stsal pa/ spranechen snying po bud med kyi lus las gang
du ldog par 'gyur zhesade ltaram lta zhig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji lta bu lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'drin bud medum yin te/ lham dri mamed pa'i 'od 'di na bskal pa bye/
baphrug grangs mod pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i bya babyed pa yin te/ sems can 'dul ba'idabang gis bud med kyi lus 'dzin pas na 'din thabs kyi lus yin par blta'o// ting
nga 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bon ga du thabs thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyir/ sems kyi smon lam gyis smon par byed de/ 'dod bzhin du bud med
kyi lus kyi 'du shes la 'jug go/ de ltar bud med kyi lus bsgrub pa'i bsam ba 'jug kyang/ 'dod pa'i sems kyis gos par mi 'gyur zhing 'dus par yang ma 'gyur ro// gsol
pa sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du/ lha mo dri ma medi pa'i 'od 'dra bstan pa/ rigs dang grong dang bcas par chog bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dir bshad du
gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od 'di ni nga thabs kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/ le bdun brgya lon ban lho phyogs
kyi rgyud du/ yul 'khor mun can zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ yul 'khor chen po de na/ chu klung nag po bzang zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de'i lho phyogs kyi 'gram na/ grong
[/]@#// khyer dbal lon cananges pa zhes bya bar khams kyi rgyal po spyod ces bya ba'i rigs su 'byung bar 'gyur te/ khams kyi rgyal po de'i rigasu rabs gsumalen/
ban rgyal po dpal 'khel zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po de'i bu mi snying du sdug cing byams la yid du 'ong ba drang ) gnang ba dang ) mchog tu mdzes shing gzugs bzang
ba la rags kyi spyod pa'i tshul phunasum tshogs pa )skyong ba'i rang bzhin can du skye bar 'gyur ta de'i tshe de'i dusan/ bumo de ji tsam du skyes pa de tsam du/ bdag nyid kyi rgyal po'i pho brang/
'khor 'phel bar byed de/ rgyal po'i 'khrang 'khor du 'byon cing rgyas par 'gyur ro// de bzhan du mun pa can gyi yul 'khor yang de'i tshe/ 'byor cing rgyas par 'gyur te/ skye bomang bos kyang
gang bar 'gyur ro// 'bru rnams kyi lo tog kyang shin tu phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ma rnams kyang bdenapa khar 'gyuro/ nad med pa dang/ 'jigs pa med pa dang/ bde bar
yang 'gyur ro// de nas bu mo'i phargyal po dpal 'khel gyis bdag nyid kyi bsod nams kyi grong khyer dngo/ yul 'khor 'byor cing rgyas la yul ma rnams shin tu legs par 'khor
bdang 'bru shin tu sna tshogs par mthong nas/ bdag nyid kyi bu mo mang lo tog 'byor ma zhes yon tan dang skrun pa yang 'dogs so// de nas rnams kyis rgyal po dpal 'phel
bu0b.rang gi bsod nams zad pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// de nas grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ yul gyi mi thams cad 'dus te/ gzhon nu rgyal po nus pa 'ga' yang med/
kyis/ lham le tog 'byor ma 'di nyid rgyal por dbang bskur la/ rgyal po'i pho brang du de 'dra ba'i gzhon nu 'ga' zhagimang khyer tsam du bzhag ste/ de ltar byas na legs so snyam mo/
de nas lha mo de dung rgyal po gzhon nu de rgyal po byed du bcug ste/ po 'ud te mo 'ud tu bzhin du snyad btagasunas/ bdag nyid kyi yul dubadag nyid kyis bud medakyigazugs/
kyis rgyal srid chen po longs su spyad de/ mu stegs can dran pa'i rtse mngon par 'dul bar byed tsang/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sa bzhi thamasacad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi mngonamAn
can du byas nas/ bkur ster khyod/ bla mar byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod par byed de/ ni bon thams cad kyi gdugasachen podang 3 na po che thams cad kyi ba dan rnams dang/ na

po che thams cad kyi rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan rnams dang/ skyes thams cad kyis bsgos pa'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang/ spos dang/ me tog thams cad dang/ rdzab rnga ha dang/ khar rnga dang rdza rnga dang pi
wang dad glang bu dang/ la snyan brgya phrag khams cad kyis mchod pa byas nas ) 'dzamabu'i glang mas cad bskor te ) dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan ba dang/ yon tan dang ldan pa/
rnams la chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ mal stan dang/ naba'i gso sman dang ) yo byad rnams dad ldan bar byas te/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i spyad pa sodacing/
rtagatu bslab pa'i gzhi lnga bzung nas/ dbul po la sogs pa khyimakol gyi sems can thams cud gang dang gang la ci dang cis don du 'gyur bde ngang dal de dang de byin nas/ 'dushes bcu'i
bsdur bsdus te/ spyod par byed cing sems canabyeb phrag mang po dag rims bzhin du brtul tesams can de dag ga dag kha'i rtsa ba yongs su snyan par shes nas/ sngan chen po'i mdo 'di
u0f8bsigs po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs ba/ mtshungs pa med pa'i mdo rin po che'i dam pa'i chos bstan pa 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir/ mi'i thabs kyis kyang mtshungs
pa med pa'i sgra sgrogs par byed cing/ mtshungs pa med pa'i glegs bamakhris pa'i da/ sangs rgyas kyis gang dang gang du byin gyisabarlabs pa'i gnas rnams su 'jog par byed de/ de ltar mtshu
pa med pa'i sa bon bskyed nas/ de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// de'i tsha lham le tog 'byor ma shes rab chenaMm thabs mkhasapa/ zab mo shes pa dang ldan ba'i lhames )bud
med kyi lus las ldog par 'gyur ro// sprin chen snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lhamo 'di sems can thams cad kyi dad pa bskyed pa'i slad du ma'aphrul chen po bgyis nas yongs
[s/]su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram// bka' stsal pa/ snga chenasnyad pa ci lha che 'di cho 'phrul chen pobyed mi nus shes su 'am/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/
sngon chenasnying bo lha mo 'di tsho 'phrul chen po ston mi nus so zhes de skad ma zer cig/ 'on kyang 'dul ba'i dbang gis ni 'dod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na lha mo 'di la
sogs pa dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur nas/ lo ngas su mya ngan las 'du 'brar mi 'gyur ba'i sems can de gang yang medate/ da ni gnas med do// sbyin chen
snyang pod bsan/ ma 'ongs pa'i sems can bsod nams chung ngu thams cad kyi dad pa bskyod pa'i phyir mdo 'di byang chub sems dpa' rnams lung bstan par byed do zhes nga skya'o// sngon chen snying/
po da'i tshalhamo 'di bud med kyi lus las bzlog nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyisangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde banAdu skye ba len par 'gyur// 'jig rten gyi
khams der bde ba nyams su myong nas/ rims kyis sangs rgyas 'gyur ro// gsel pa/ bcom ldan 'dasabs la mkhas pa dang ldan ba'i lha mo 'di yunaji srid cig na sang sa rgyas su/
'gyur/ 'di'i ming yang jiskad ces bgyi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das de 'jig rten gyi khams na ci 'dra bar 'gyur/ bka' stsal pa/ lhamo 'ad bskal pa grangs med pa phrag lnga brgya bas
pan stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir/ thanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon bar 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs
bdagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan b/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dulaba'i kha le sbyaral/ bla na med pa/lhadang mi
rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gtsang shang bden pa'i mtshams 'phel bar mdzad pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khamasamamajed 'od rang 'jig rten gyi khams gtsang
ma sbyong ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// bskal ba ni gtsang zhing bden pa'i mtshams shes bya khar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams gtsang ma skyong bde 'byon par 'gyur/ rgyas par 'gyur/ bad pa
dang nyams dga' ba dang/ la legs pa dang/ skye bo dang/ mamang pos gang bar 'gyuraro// 'byor cing rgyas par gyur pa de'i: 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir grong khyer gtsangam bsrung ldan/
zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ grong khyer gtsang ma gsung ldan dus kyi ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dpe med pa'i grong khyer der ra ba dang/ yang tog dang/
blabatsogs dang/ 'obs dpo med pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dag cing nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa'i chu klung nag po bzang zhes bya ba na de'i tshe/ gtsang ma bzang po zhes bya bar 'gyur
te 'gram pha rol tshu rol dpe med pa'i shing ljon pa'i kun dga' ra ba nyams dga' ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/// 'jig rten gyi khams gtsang ma sbyong ba de yang 'di lta ste/
dper nA/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang/ yongs su spyod pa bshAn te/ ri dang/ rdo dang/ bong ba dang/ gyo me dang gseg ma la sogs pa midapar 'gyur zhing/ mu steg
can gyi ming yang med 'gyur ro// nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ming yang mi grag par 'gyur ro// skyes pa dang/ bud med dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dag 'dun
yang 'byang bar 'gyura'o// de na nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas shes pa'i gtam gyi ming yang med de/ theg pa chen po'i mdo'i gdam rgyas par ston par 'gyur ro// bdud dang
phyir rgol ba bcom pa'i sems can rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dag cing bzod pa chen po'i red pa thob pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ sa gzhayang nor bu rin po che thams cad
grub par 'gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i chubo'i gser gyi me tog dang/ pad+ma thams cad kyis spras par 'gyur ro/ de bzhin gshegs pa de yang tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro//
de bzhin du mi rnams kyi tsho yang tshad med par 'gyur ro// de khazhin gshegs pa ngan grong khyare gtsang ma bsung ldan du bzhugs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de'i smon lam gyi
'byad/ khyud par gyisan/ ma 'ongs pa'i sems can gyi tshogs mang bo dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de tsamtshan thos pa tsam gyis// rang gi lus las shi 'phos ma
klog tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams gtsang ma skyod ba der grong khyer gtsang ma gsung ldan du skye bar 'gyur zhes nga skya'o// nganasod bzhi yang de dag gi spyod yul gyis ram 'gyur ro// sbyin
chen snying po de bas na nga ni bcom ldan 'das de'i 'jig rten gyi khams gtsang ma sbyong bad/ bskal pa gtsang zhing bden pa'i mtshams shes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa gtsang zhing bden
ba'imatshams 'phel b.ramadzad pa zhes bya ba'i yon tan bzung ba smra'o// des 'khor chen po'i nang nas/ lhadangama'atshogs tshad med pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa na//
po'i las byas te/ gar byas/ grublangasas/ bcom ldan 'das de 'byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lasems bskyed do// 'dun ma 'ongs pa'i sems can bye ba sAdAdug lung ston pa/
sngan chen po'amado// tshig par brgyad par sbyar ba'i le'u 'bum pa las lung bstanaba'i rgyud yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsalas/ sngonachen snying po lasogs ba/
lha dang klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto ba bye chen podang ) mi dang mi ma yin kha rnams yi rang ste ) bcom ldan
'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa chen po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/// rgya gar gyi mkhan po su renadra bo d+hi dang )zhu
chen gyi le tsha ba khan ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa// @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ang gu lamA lA yanAm mahA yan sutA/ bod skad du/ 'phags
bsor mo'i phreng ba la lan ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gsogan/ bam/
ldan 'das mnyan du yod pan/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshalamagon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ denas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang/
nyan thos dang/ rad sangs rgyas shastag mang po dang/ 'khor ba'i drang rgyu/ lhadang klu dang ) gnod sbyin dang/ namakha'aldang dang ma 'am cidang/ lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs mang po
dang 3 shazadang/ 'byung po'itshogs dang/ lha'i bumodang/ lham yan gyi dbang po dang ) nyim dang/ lham yinadang/ srin po dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ bdud la sogs pa lasem
cakhamasacad nges par sgrol ba shin tu rgyas pachen po'i mdosdachen bo mtshon cha thogs pa zhes bya ba ston te/ thog mar yang dag ba/ bar du yang dgo ba/ thamar yang dag ba/ don bzang
po// tsheg 'khrubazang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs surdzogs pa ) yongasasu dag pa/ yongasasudakar ba/ tshangs par spyad pa yang dag par rab tu ston to//

gang gi tshimade sde chen po mtshon cha thogs pa mthar phyin khrar gyur pa de 'tshe/ de'i dusanamanyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen bonas/ byang phyogs logs su rgyang ma'ong ba zhagan ) bram ze'i bu 'jig
rten thams cad kyis bldan sdug pa zhes byakha/ ri sdang zhes bya ba'i grong khyer nas skyes pa// shin tudabul po// bram ze mo bzang mo zhes bya ba'ibu phos por ba lebacu gnyis len kha/ gzug
tshu nga mdog dang/ stobs dang/ khadog dang/ dba' la phun sum tshogs pa/ shan tu ldan sdug kha ) tshig 'jam kha zhig dud/ slob dponanod khubazang po// rig byed bzhi'i pha rol tu
song ba/ ha la ha se zhes bya ba'i grong na gnas pa de'i drungan/ bram ze'i khu 'jig rten thams cad kyis bstan sdug pa zhes bya ba shinatuyid gzhungs shing blam la mchod pa byed pa/ khang po/
rgyu grulab/ brtul zhugs dang )mi 'gyur ba la sbyod pad/ srid srung gi rig byedasleb po// de'i slob dpon nor bu bzang po de rgyal pos bsanas ) mnyan du yod par 'gro ban rang gi slob
bram ze'i bu 'jig rten thams cad kyis bltan sdug pa ) mi srung du bcug ste ) mnyan du yod par song ngo// denas de'i mkhanapo'i chung ma gzhon nu gzugs bzang zhing
phun sumatshogs pa des ) bram ze'i bu 'jig rten thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa mthong ba dang/ sems chagasanas rab tu ma bzod par gyur pa dang ) gos dang rgyan rnams kyang lhod ci
'phyang ste/ 'dod chags kyis non nas/ mgyogs bamagyogs par bram ze'i khyo 'u 'jig rten thams cad kyis bltan sdug pa'i gsanas bzung ste/ 'dod pa la gzhol zhing bsod nams ma
yin pa skyed do/ de sa bram ze'i bu 'jig rten thams cad kyis bltan stagu ba de rang bzhin gyis bla ma la gus pa dbang posbu babacub khazhug dang/ ma 'gyur ba la spyod pa sems can gyi mchog
des mkhan po'i chungam la 'di skad du bla ma'i btsun mo byedan gdag ga mdang 'das/daltar ma mdzad cig ces smras so// de gtong ba ltami byed nas gos gcag bor te ngo tsha nas gos gcig
dang gud du song )de nas mkhan po'i chung mas 'jig rten nyams cad kyis bstan sdugakhra'i sems la rnam par brtags nas/ mig mchi mas gang zhing 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis non nas
rnam par sems par gyur te/ de nas de sdug bsngal zhing 'di snyamasems so// 'jig rten thams cad kyis bldan sdug pabade ba'i bar chadabyed pa de shi'ang sus/ bud med gang gis khyer
yang ma gyur par thal bar gyur cig snyam ste ) lus kun rang gi sen mos dral nasan zhang mi bde ste lus mi sdug par bcos nas ) bud med des ga yo sbyar te/ khyim gnyis kyi bar
gdung ma la gyen du bcings nas btags so// de nas de'i tshe slob dponanor bu bzang po rgyal pos mchod nas slar rang gi khyim du 'os padang/ des mkhong ngo// mthong
nas de'i thag ba bcad de/ e ma'o zhes skad drug tu byung nas rang gi chung ma la 'di skad ces smras so// bzang mo 'di ci sus khyeda'adi lta bu r byas bzams smas ba/ khyod kyi slob ma
'jig rten thams cad kyis bstan sdug bas nan gyis kho mo nyal po byas nas 'diltar byas so// de nas slob dpon nor bu bzang pos 'jig rten thams cad kyis blta na sdugapa de'i mthu chen po shes
zla te dathog ma btsas ma thag tu rgyal rigs khrims cad kyi mtshon rnams shubs nas khyung ste/ mnga' ste'u kha ma bzhin du thams cad du lhung nas/ de'atsho rgyal rags zams cad skrag cing rab tu
'jigs par gyur te/ 'jig rten tham cad kyis bstan sdug pa sems can gyi mchogade'i mthu chen po de ltabu shesanas ) dal cung zad bsob tsam zhig nus te/ 'jig rtenaThams cad kyis blta
[Ã ]na sdug pa de la 'di skad ces smras so// bdag nyid ngan pa bla ma'i chung mam rung par byed pa khyod nyes pa chen po byas la/ bram zer mi 'gyur gyis/ mi stong sod cig dang/ des byung bar/
'gyur ro// de skad ces rang gi slob ma bram ze'i bu 'jig rten thams cad kyisakhaltan sdug pa la bsgo ba dang/ bram ze'i bu 'jig rten thams cad kyis blta na sdug ba de rang bzhin gyis/
bla ma la gus pas rang gi slob dpon la 'di skad ces smras so/ skye mkhan po bdag la 'os pa ma lags so// yang slob dpon gyis glas pa/ ji bdag nyid ngan pa khyod mtho ris su
'gro 'am/ bram zer 'gyur ba mi 'dod dam/ yang slob mas smras pa ) legs so legasaso// mkhan po de ltar bgyi'o zhes smras te/ mi stong bsad do 'ongs nas/ rang gi slob dponal/
gus par sa babyas padang/ slob dpon gyis demathonganas/ gtum po 'di darung ma shibalta zhes ngo mtshar du gyur to// 'ond na she bar bya'o snyam nas/ de skad ma zer bar bsad pa re ba'i sor
mo rnams lo shig/ ma stong sod lasor mo rnams 'phreng bar byas te 'ongs dang gdodrakhram zer 'gyur ro zhes zer nas de'i phyir sor mo'i phreng ba zhes bya'o// yang sor mo'i phreng ba des legasas smras

nas ma nyid stong du cig gi ma tshad par basad do// de'i tshe sor mo'i phreng ba'amazas kyis mchog dang dngar sna bzhi thogs nas/ bdag gi bu 'di ltar gyur pa lta zhugan nyon mongs grung do snyam ste 'ongs
ba dang/ sor mo'i phreng bas rang gi ma 'ongs pa mthong nas ) bdag gi ma mtho ris su 'gro bar bya'o snyam ste )ral gri thogs nas 'ongs so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis
yul dang dus mkhyenanas mnyan yod nas gnag pa'i dgongs su 'dom bzhi bcus ma tshang ba'i bar na/ shing a sho ka'i drungan thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes thams cad dang ldan pa de dad pa'i rgyal bo bzhi
chu// du mdunan bzhugs par gyur to// de nas sor mo'i phreng bsabcom ldan 'das mthong nas/ 'onadag sbyong go'utam gsad de snyam ste/ ral gri thogasanas mgyogs
pa mgyogs par 'ongs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de shes thams cad dang ldan bas bdag nyid gshegs pa lta bu r bstan pa dang/ sor mo'i phreng bas ma la mdun gyis bltas te/
yo gnyis kyi bar du tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag skyasas// bzhugs shigadagasbyong khyod bzhugs shag zas gtsang sras po bzhugs sugasol// bdag nasor mo'i bri bste/ norama'i/
'awaM shogam khadagastsol cig/ bzhugs shig dag sbyong khyod bzhugs shig/ chos gos btabs pa bzhugs su gsol// bdag sor mo'i phreng ba ste// sor mo'ishogamakhadag stsol cig/
bzhugs shig dug sbyong khyod bzhugs shig/ mkhas pa'i gtso'i bzhugs su gsol// bdag na sor mo'i phreng ba ste// sor mo'i sho gamabadag stsol cig/ bzhugs shagadage sbyong khyod bzhugs
shig/ ltud bzedathogs bzhugs su gsol// bdag nasar mo'i phreng ba ste/ sor mo'i shegam bdagastsol cig/ bzhugs shig dag sbyong khyodabazhugs shage/ seng ge'i rtsalam 'bazhugs s
gsol// bdag ni ser mo'i phreng ba ste// sor mo'i shogam bdag stsolacig/ bzhugs shig dag slong khyod bzhugs shig/ stag ga rtsalamang 'bazhugs su gsol/ bdaganasor me'i phreng ba ste// so'i
mo'agogam bdag stsol cig/ bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig/ bang stabs legs bzhud bzhugs su gsol// bdag ni sor mo'i phreng kha ste// sor mo'i shogamakhadag stsol cig/ bzhug
shig dge sbyong byed bzhugs shig/ lhayigung po'i stabs mdzes bzhugs// bdag nasor mo'i khang mas phreng ba ste// sor mo'ishogam bdagastsol cig/ bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig
gnyertse mchog gzi brtson pa bzhugs// bdag nasor mo'i phreng ba ste// sor mo'i sho gam khadag stsol cig/ bzhugs shagi dag sbyong khyed bzhugs shig/ blab nya zhalaspyan bzangs bzhugs// bganasor
mo'i phreng ba ste// sor ma'ishogam badragastsol cig/ bzhugs shig dag sbyongakhyod bzhugs shig/ gser gyi ri 'drakhazhugs su gsol// badraganaser me'i phreng ba ste// sor mo'isho gam bdagal cig/
bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig/ pad+momadab stong spyan bzhugs shog/ bdag nisor mo'i phreng ba ste// sor mo'i shogam bdag stsol cig/ bzhugs shig dag sbyong khyod bzhugs shig/ shangs
kyishugs drang bzhugs su gsol// bdagan sor mo'i phreng ba ste// sor mo'i sho khram bdag stsol cig/ bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shagi ku mu da 'dratshems mchog bzhugs// bdag
ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste// sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig/ bzhugs shig dag sbyong byed bzhugs shig/ gsung mchog lngags mang la bzhugs su gsol// bdaganasor mo'i phreng ba
ste sor me'ishe mabadag stsol cig/ bzhugs shig dge sbyong byed bzhugs shig/ mdzod spyi'i sgrig le'i mchog mnga'abazhugs// bdaganasor mo'i phreng ba ste// sor me'i
sho gamabadagasol cig/ bzhugs shig dag sbyong khyod bzhugs shig/ dbu skamathen snyam mchog mnga' bzhugs// bdeganaser ma'aphreng ba ste// sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig/ bzhugs
a shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig/ snyan drang phyag rang mchog mnga' bzhugs// bdag na sor mo'i phreng ba ste// sor mo'i she gam bdagastsol cig/ bzhugs ga dag sbyong byed bzhugs/
phyag mchog glang po'i sna 'dra bzhugs// bdag na sor mo'i phreng bste// sor mo'i shogam bdag stsol cig/ bzhugs shig drag sbyong khyod bzhugs shig/ gsang ba sbubs su sasapa
bzhugs// bdaganaser me'i phreng ba ste// sor mo'i shogam bdag stsol cig/ bzhugs shig dag sbyong byed bzhugs shig/ pus mo bzang po mnga' babazhugs// bdagan sor
mo'i phreng ba ste// sor mo'i shekam bdag stsol cig/ bzhugs shig dag slob khyod bzhugs shig zangs kyi sen momadog mnga' bzhugs// bdaganaseramo'i phreng ba ste// sor
mo 'i she gam bdagastsol cig/ bzhugs shig dgaspyod khyod bzhugs shig/ 'gro ba mchog gis sngos byugs bzhugs bang gnasoramo'i phreng ba ste// sor ma'ishegam bdag stsol cig/
ba zhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig/ ka la ping ka'i sgra dbyangs bzhugs// bdag ni ser mo'i phreng ba ste// sor mo'i gam bdagastsol cig/ bzhugs shig dag sbyong byed bzhugs shig/
khubyugasgra dbyangs snyan sgrogs bzhugs// bdag na sorama'i phreng ba ste// sor mo'ishogam bdag stsol cig/ bzhugs shigadag sbyong byed bzhugs shig/ nyi 'od bye ba'argya 'das bzhugs//
bdagon sor mo'i phreng ba ste// sor mo'i shogam bdag stsolacig/ bzhugs shig dag sbyong byed bzhugs shig/ dus rab bstabs la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdagan sor mo'i phreng ba ste/
sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsolacig/ bzhugs shig ngag sbyong khyod bzhugs shig/ de ltar dul 'gros rab 'gyogs bzhugs// bdag na ser mo'i phreng ba ste/ sor mo'isho gam bdag/
stsol cig/ bzhugs shig dag sbyongakhyod bzhugs shig/ stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' bzhugs sugasol// bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste// sor mo'i sho gam bdagastsol cig/ bzhug
shig dag sbyong khyod bzhugs shig/ bden zhing mchog mnga' bzhugs sugasol// bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste// sor mo'asho gam bdag stsol cig/ bzhugs shig drag sbyong byed/
bzhugs shig/ phan mdzad lam brgyad ston pa bzhugs// bdag/naser mo'i phreng ba ste// sor mo'i go gam bdagastsol cig/ bzhugs shig dag sbyong khyod bzhugs shig mtshan mchog
sum cu gnyisamanga' bzhugs// bdag nasor mo'i phreng ba ste// sor mo'i shogam bdag stsol cig/ bzhugs shig dge slong khyod bzhugs shig/ dpe bzang bas/
cumanga' ba bzhugs// bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste// sor ma'i sho ga'abadag stsol cig/ bzhugs shig dwag sbyong khyod bzhugs shig na tshung mchog la 'dod sangs bzhugs/
bdag na sor mo'i phreng ba ste// sar ma'i sho gam bdag stsol cig/ bzhugs shagi dag sbyong khyod bzhugs shig/ ji srid bdag ma khros par bzhugs// bdag nisar me'i phreng ba ste//
sor me'i sho gam bdag stsolacig )bzhugs shig dag sbyong khyed na bzhugs su gsol// lha monadabang dang srin po rgyags bcas bcom// bdag gis 'di 'dra'i ngo mtshar yod ma mthong//
na tu 'grogs pa'i shugs ldan khyed su zhig/ ral grimabatob bar du dge sbyong bzhugs// bdag gi ming yang khyod kyisam gsan tam// bdag na sor mo'i phreng ba ste// sor me'i shogam
bdag stsol cig/ bzhugs shig dag sbyong khyed na bzhugs su gsol// bdag ming gis thos pa tsam gyis 'gum 'gyur na/ mngon sum bdagamathong gson bar gyur pa na// shin tu mthu ldan/
sems can dag lta galams// bzhugs shagadag sbyong khrod na bzhugs su gsol// bdag nyid mngon sum du namamos gyur kyang// rta ya bang ltar na tu mgyogs bzhud pa/ lha 'am kru'
[/]khyed sumyur du gsungs// bzhugs shig dag sbyang khyod bzhugs shig/ da ni bdagakya'amathu dang mi ldan gyur// bstan pa khyadan slebs par ma nus so// bdag na sor me'i phreng ba ste//
ser mo'i shogam bdag stsol cig/ bzhugs shig dag sbyong byed bzhugs shig/ dag sbyong brtul zhugs khrims 'dzinan 1 sho gam gnas 'a sam 'da'ashig/ bdagan sogamo'i phreng bste//song ma'i/
shogam bdag stsol cig/ nas bcom ldan 'das ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du gom babadun gshigs te// seng ge'i ltabs kun tu gzigs nas sor mo'i phreng ba la tshigs subacad pa
'di dgagasungs so// yang dag nyid kyi mtha' la gnas te// de yang sor phreng khyod kyis ma rig go/ ngan yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/ shigam sbyin gyis ches khu zhim pa 'byung/
'dugashegasor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dugasheg/ tshul khrims brtul shugs yon tan rdzogasal 'dug/ ngani yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te// khyod lamatshon rnon shogam sbyin par bya// mabyas
yang dag mtha' la gnas te// de yang ser phreng khyod kyis ma rig go/ ngan yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te// shegam spyan gyis chos khu zhim po nyung// gdug shig ser me'i phreng ba khyod 'dug

nyu@#// de yang sor phreng khyod kyisam rig go/ ngan la dug rdzogs pa 'i sangs rgyas te// shogam spyan gyis chos khu sham po 'byung// 'dug shig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug/ de yang sar phreng khyad kyis mar
shig tshul khrims khartul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug/ nayang dag rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas te// khyod lamatshon rnon sho gam smana'ar bya// 'dusamabyas kyimab+ha' la gnas
ta de yang sor phreng khyod kyis ma reg go nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te// sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zham bo 'thung// 'dugashag sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug shag/ tshul khri/
so brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug/ nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te// khyod la mtshon rnonasho gam spyan par bya// rga ba med pa'i mkhra' lang gnas te// de yang sor phreng khyodakyisam

rig pa'i ye shes skyabs sumyur du shog/ tshur shog slob dpon ngan 'gro'i dbang song bas// chos ma yin pa'i phung po ches su sems// de nas bdag nyid khong du chudapa
'gyur gro/ kun kyang chad paso rab 'jigs brang// thams cad la ni srog phangs te/ bdag nyid kho nadaper byas la// mi bsad gsod du mi gzhug go/ pha rol ji lta de bzhin bdag/
bdag nyid ji ltade gzhin bzhan// bdag rang nyid ni dper byas la// mi bsad gsod dug gzhugago/ sran po'i byad gzugs de ltar ma byed cig yan lag lus la shin tu khrag chags
shing bsad pa'i mtshon cha rnon bo khrag byags pa// khyod kyi phrag la zlog pa mi mdzes so// sor mo'i phreng ba mgo las myur du be// kye ma bram ze'i bu'i las 'di 'dra zhing// chos
'dod bram ze'i bu yang 'di 'dra na// srin po ma'ong pa lta ga ci 'dra ge/ phyugs rnams la yang ma ni mchog yin na// kye ma brtse med sdig grogs dbang song mi// shin tu rnoba'i mtshon cha gdangs bcom
ste rang gi ma yi drung du nye bar 'ong// gang la sor mo'i phreng ba khyod lta bu // sdig byed ma yinanganag can zan len// srin po 'inang nan tu sdig can te// lhamananang
na 'ong marungs las byed pa// sor phreng khyod shin tucher bkra shis/ sdig pa sems pa ma lasasangs pa ste// man 'jig rten dag na dka' mchog byed// nyon mongs desan zla bcu rumanabasreg/
'a de nas phyisan btsas par gyur nas kyang// bshang gcimang reg nyon mongs myos pas gsol// ltos shig sor phreng khyod kyi gtso min// mig ni khrag gi mchi mas rab tu gang// bud med bu la byan
bshang sdug pa yis// mngar gyi bum pa brag la thogs te 'ongs// rganamo nyon mongs rlung gis sku yang bshig/ gos ngan ralapo rlung gis bskyod cing 'brul// lus la rdul gros nang pa ser ka byung//
rganamo nyon mongs sdug bsngal chen po myong// lus skams yun rjes rlung dang lhags pas nyen// sdug bsngal mang pos shinatugadungs par gyur// budamedadren rnam par snying mos te//
bsam yas sdug bsngal ldan dkyihud 'bod// des sir me'i phreng ba'imasad khazhin gshegs pa dang// bdag gi bu ser mo'i phreng ba gnyis phan tshun lanang du yang
khan gyisabargya yod cher rtsod pa las bdag gas bu pham ste// lag cha bor bar mthong nas// sdug pa'i sdug bsngal chen pos reb ste// bcom ldan 'das latshigs su bcad pa 'ad dag/
ba00 gsol to// bcom ldan rin chen gter ster ba// bdag gis nyon mongs myong pas med// bdag gis mig tu gyur pas klog dmag gi rtul rnams bdag gis bsal// bdag gi bun mi khrag/
gas kyam lus dang zas lareg/ kun tu 'khyag 'ang mtshon nom thogs// 'grob mang po'i phung po gsod// bdag gi bu yang mgu bya zhing// sangs rgyas phyag khyu'ang ji ltar bya// khyod
kyi bu ngan 'di 'dra zhes// 'gromangs tshig rtsub mnyanam nus/ de la segasaparnam pa dum skye'o/ denas bcom ldan 'dasakyis sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
sor mo'i phreng ba khyod kyigatso men shing drung na 'dug ste// de lta bu shin tudaka' ba byed pa'i bu med 'ad la khyod ral thogs ste// bdag gi ma mah+phe ris su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// snyam nas bsad
par 'dod pan// ser me'i phreng bachos ma yin pa'i phung po lachos sunor to// 'di lta stedaperan// sesakadabyar zla ra ba'i dus la smagargyu ba la chu yan snyam nas// rigs rnams kun tu
'khyam pa de bzhin du// sor mo'i phreng ba khyod kyang slob dpon ngan pa'i man ngag gis mos par gyur te// chos ma yin pa la chos susems dpa' sems cananimanar med pa zhes bya ba'am zad
kha chen por 'gro'o// sor mo'i phreng ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyabs su myur dusang shig song shig/ zhugs shig/ sor mo'i phreng ba khyod ma 'jigs shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig
khamed bu'i 'byung gnas te// sangs rgyas nasems can thams cad la sgrag can zin dang mtshungs par gzigs pan// na ba rnams gsol/ skyabs med pa rnams
kyi skyabs so// sangs rgyas ni dbye gnas na bzhugs pa/ dartsa lag med pa rnams kyi rtsalag go/ sangs rgyus ni dbul ba rnams kyi mi zad pa'i gtor ro// sangs rgyas ni lam stor ba rnams la
lam bzang po ston pa'o// sangs rgyas nu 'jigs pas gzir ba rnams kyi skyabasasu gyur pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa na gru zhig pa rnams kyi gruragyurapa'o/ mtshon rnon po gyur du 'o larab tu 'byung
ba dang// bsnyen par rdzogs par longashig/ so la bla ma'i rkang pa la gtugs te gzod pa gsol cig/ rgan mo nyon mongs pa lar btu 'byung bar byed cig ces gsolab sgrib lasrid pam bzod
pa las sems can rnams sgrol cig dang// phyogs gam bzang po rab tu 'byung ba dang// bsnyen par rdzogs pa sbyanano// sor mo'i phreng ba khyod yun ring por lam ngan par 'khyams shing nga la bar
gyur gyis chos kyi re'i chu 'thung shig/ sor mo'i phreng ba khyod kyang sho gam len pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa yang she gam len pa yin te// sor mo'i phreng ba de bzhin gshegs ba'i sems can thamA
cad kyi shogam len pa lam bsel gyi rgyal po yin te// semasacan thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral zhing lam bsel rtag tu'o gam len to/ gdanasaser mo'i phreng ba/

bad bzhin du sor mo'i phreng kha yang mtshon shin tu rno ba de ber nas ngu yang nges btab ste ) mchig stong du gcigagis ma tshangs pa'i sor mo phreng bsregs pa yang rang galus las phud sa
kyi hud ces zer te/ dper nam zhag nyalam las rang garkang pa la smralagyis zin ma thog tumyur du sadunas/ lag pa bskumasaba'as latu shan dumakhazad pa'isprul bzung nas 'dor bde
bzhinadu/ ser mo'i phreng ba yang rang gi mgolasasor mo'i phreng bamyur du boralo// jiltarab dag nyid gdon dang bral bar gyur par shesanas/ ngo tsha bde bzhin dudunas sor mo'i phreng bas kyang ga
nyid mngon par rig nas/ me tog rtsa lag 'tshozhes bya ba'i kha dog ltar khrag gis lus thams cad yog/ sngon chen po ltar mig mchi mas gang nas/ ba tu ngu zhing bdag la rdeg ste/ ji ltar sbrul

gyis zinanas myos pa'i mi sbrul ltar lto 'phye zhir 'gro bde bzhin du soramo'i phreng ba la nga tshod shang sum cu rtsa dgukhor khor yug gi sa la lto 'phye zhir song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabasamagongolaM
bzhag ste/ tshag 'di skad ces smras s// kye ma sangs rgyasakhyams pa'i mchog mnga' zhing// skyes 'dul la sbyar bdag gi slad gshegs pas// gti mug chos kyi rlabs
chen mi shes chu// rgya mtsho che las bdag deng dus par bsgral// kyemasang sa rgyas thugs rje mchog mnga' zhing// skyes 'dul kha sgyur bdag gi spyod gshegs pas//
shing rtsa 'bras bu lo ma mang ba yi// dgon pa las ni deng bdag nges bar bsgral// kyemasangs rgyas dga' ba mchog mnga' zhing// skyes 'dul kha sbyar bodag gi slad gshegs pas// lta ba
sna tshogs ri mor bras pa yi// stag ga lag nas bdag deng nges par bsgral// kum sangs rgyas btang snyoms mchog mnga' yang dag gzigs// skyes 'odul kha sgyur bdag gi sud gshegs las//
'o dod 'bod dang char 'bod mnar med pa'i// sems can dmyal chen gtong nas deng bdag bsgral/ 'di ni skyabs med pa la skyabs lags te/ dartsa lag med pa rnams kyi rtsa lag go/ bdag gis
yang tsha ba'i las bgyis na// bdagan 'di 'drar gyur la skyabasamadzad gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sor mo'i phreng ba la slar bka' stsal pa/ sor mo'i phreng ba khyed las la
myur du song ste// bla ma'i rkang pa la/ gas la bzed par gasol cig/ bzod par gsol nas rab tu 'byung ba dang// bsnyen par rdzogs pa stsol cig ces gsolakhaklob cig )
de nas sor mo'i phreng ba bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung nas langs nas rang ga ma ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ rang gi ma la lan mang du bskor ba byas te// chu srin
