lags te// kye ma bdagagisami bzad bgyis// bdag gisasdig phung mang po red/ ma khyed bdag gi rten lags te// sangs rgyas shin tuskyabs su gda'// khyod kyi zhabs ni mgo
bzhag ste// rab byung bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol/ de nas mas rang gi bu la tshigs su bcad pas phyir smras pa// nga san bu khyod btang zin gyis// rab 'byung 'jig
rten pha rol spyod// bdag kyang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la// de bzhin rab tu 'byung bar gsol/ kye ma bcom ldan bsam mkhyabe// drab zhin gshegs pa dpemed de// sangs rgyas bdagag
ngu sgrol ba// 'jig rten kun la thugs kyang brtse// mgon po khyed kyi gzugs rnams dang/ yon tan dpe yang 'gro lamed// bdag gis cung zad brjod nus te// de bzhin gshegs pa lhal/
lha// danas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyan mo la tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad gsungs so// khyod kyi bu nang mdun du// rab tu 'byung bar gnang ban legasas budamed nyon mongs ma
rgyunayachad par bde bar shog/ khyodazhirab tu byung ba yi// dus las shin tu yol zin gyi// dge bsnyen ma yatshes rnams kyis// gan tshabadago nyid dbugs phyung shig skad cig tsam du 'dar stod de/
chu/ rgya la bo gsal rgya la ji sridan// 'di dag dunimathong 'gyur ba// de tsam du yang bde bar 'dug/ kabam poganyis pa/ dang sa
lha'i bu dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang/ lha'i bu mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas bskor cing mdun du bdar te// snang ba chen pos mnyan du yod pa'i yul thams cad snang bar
'tsha byas nas// de bzhin gshegs pa dang// sor mo'i phreng ba gnyisame ltar 'khrab pa dang// cang shes ltar 'thab pa mthong sterab tu dga' nas// bcom ldan 'das dang// sor mo'i
glu phreng ba gnyis la tshigs su bcad pa 'daskad smras so// kye ma ma 'dul la sbyar// sangs rgyas las bzang pomadzes// kye ma 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyis// sor ma'i
phreng ba rab tu bcul/ rtag tu ma'i khrag gis lus byugs te// lhaman dbang po lhadangasrin po dang// gnod sbyin stobs dang ldan pa snulachen dang// kludang sharba lto 'phye ma 'am ci// stobA
ldan tshul chenanam mkha' lding dag dang// sems can gtum po stebs ldan gzhan dag kyang// sor phreng mang byes nyal bzhan mig btsums 'dug/ de 'dra gtumapa'i lasakhyudasor phreng ste//
mi yi rgyal po tsam gyis ga la gsod// den btsasam thag tu de yi tshe// lha dang lha ma yin pa kun skragan// ma yi rgyal po tsam lta ci zhig smos// ming gi go chamatshon kun rdol cing snad// da ltar
drag cing stobs ldan rtsal che ba/ dkyim de bzhin gshegs kyis brtulab legs// mthu dang rtsal kyang bsam gyis ma khyabamanga'// sangs rgyas bsam gyisam khyab sangs rgyasan/ ul dang/
ye shes spyod yul bsam mi khyab// sor mo'i phreng ba de rang mdzes par snang// shan tu gzugs bzang btso ma'i gser ltar gyur// nyi ma zer shar ba dag ltar bur mdzes/// sor phreng byad
sdug tshul khrims kha/nas pamadzes// tshul khrims bral kha'i man yong mamadzes// kye ma bdagadeng khyim chos mang thob snyam// sor mo'i phreng bachos gos sul bar bgyi// sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das bdag la thugs bcu bzhes// sor mo'i phreng la dag sbyong tshul 'dra sul// slong ba kun gyirgyal po chen po la// de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gzigs su gsol/
de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis// sor mo'i phreng ba la'ad skad ces smras so/ skyes budam pa'i lha 'a gosamchog 'di khyed kyi chos gos gyis shig/ denas sor mo'i/

phreng bas lha'i dbang bo brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// sbrang ma lta bu khyed su zhig/ brgya byinam dad pa'i sbyin pa de nga len tam// brgya byin khyod 'dod pa'i bong bu ste// khyod kyis da rung
chu klung mang po ma rgal te// rang bzhin gyis gcer bus gzhan la ji ltar gos sbyin// khyedan rang bzhan gyis gcir bu na/ de chos gosakyi phyir ja ltar rin thang med pa'ags g.yon la sbyan )
dper na rgyal po'i khyad stong thub bdag nyid lus thams cad thog mar 'gyelan/ ba lang rgan po 'dam du song ba bzhin// ma rgal ba nyidadu 'gyel bas// rgol po gnyan/
gyis gyad stong thub la/ ji ltar brgal bar bya ) de bzhin du ngas kyang khyod kyi rin thang med pa'i gos gyen na/ brgya byin migastong can nyon mongs pa'i bdud bye ba dang/ rang bzhin gyi bdud lasogs
pa dang/ ji ltar 'gyed/ a ni bdudu mtha' yas pa dang 'bab cing nyon meng sabamang po rbad par bya ste/ dge sbyong gi chos de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags pa'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcugasum

laspyad par bya'i/ khyod kyi mal chand ltar gnas par mi bya'o// brgya byin chag stong can khyed na lha rnams kyi dbang phyug ma yin te ) khyod ni dmus long du gyur pa dang khyad par med do// brgya byin khyed
kyis gtum po'i las kyi sdig pa ci 'dra ba'i bye brag mi shes so// ser mo'i phreng ba gtum po yan bar sbrang ma lta bu khyod kyis ji ltar shes// kye ma brgyatsun gyis gsal bar gtum po'i las mi
shesaso// bstan pa'i tshul shesan/ rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa'i thog mar rin byung med pa' chos gyon na/ drag sbyong ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur ) brgya byin khyod narab tu 'byung ba'i bdenub tsam
yang ma shes te/ kye mabargya byin khyedan bstan pa las phyi rol tu gyur ba'o// 'di lta ste/ nor bu dang/ mu tig dang/ brtudang/ gsar dang ) nor bu zlumadzes lasogs kha'i rin po
ches gang pa'i bumakha brgyad khri dang/ su le sbram dang/ rin po che'i bum pa gzhan yang dpag tu med pa spangs te// mchil ma'i sprul ba bzhin du rin thang med pa'i gos bor te gang/
dgesbyong gi chos la nges par byung ba de bzhan gshegs pa'i sras su gnas brtan 'od srung chen po gnas mal nags khrod du 'cha' zhing sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gsum gyis bsdams te/
lus kyis brtul zhugs spyod pa yang ci'i phyir rin thang med pa'i gos ma gyon/ ci'i phyir khang pa'i gnas mal stangs shing ) gnas brtan 'od srung chen po bdud rtsi lta bu'i kha zas sna tshogs dang/
sha'i ro'ikha zas stangs te/ sha med par brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa la yang dag par spyod// khyim nas khyim du rgyu zhing lkugs bam yin bar lkugs por 'du shes par/ mdun dang/ rgyab dang gla
nas med ces zur ram/ gshin lang bde bar gyur cig ces brtan par phyir 'byung ngo/ u0f38ro darus zer na yang gnas brtan chags par mi 'gyur te/ bdebrar gyur cig ces brtan phyir 'byung
la/ bum pa re res kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dag sbyong rnamosanAm 'tsho'i bar du bza' bodang/ bca' ba dang/ bldag par gyur na/ ca'i phyir de lta'u'i las spyod kyi phung po chen por dge 'dun gyi no
dum bzhag ste/ bdag gir bya ba spangs te btang nas yi dgas dang ) dbul po dang/ bkren pa dang/ slong ba la sogs pa'i gtar zad mi shes par byas pa lta bu ni brgya byin dag sbyong gi chos
te til tsam gyi bag sogs ba de yang dag skyong gi chos ma yin no// bran dang bran mo drang 1 nor rnams mang po dang/ zhing gi dngos po dang/ de bzhin du lta ba dang/
'tshong bden dag sbyong gi chosang 'thun pa ma yin te/ de dag ni khyim nas gnas pa rnams kyi nor lta bu yin no// sngar smos pad nor de dag len pa gang yin pa dang ) rung ba ma yin pa'i

'a nor sbyin par byed pa ga la na ba de dag ni thun por mtshungs te/ 'brasamarung bar byedapa'i zhing gi nge dang 'dra ba skyon chags pa'i ya mtshan can de dag da chad pas gcang bar bya'o// gang ngas bsad/
nas sor mo'i phreng bar byas pa de dag khrims cad kyang bstan pa la sun 'byin pa sha stag ste/ dge bsnyen nam ) drag bsnyen ma 'am ) drag sbyong ngam/ dge sbyong ma cig kyang
med do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis// sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces smras so// chosan bsadapamed pa'i mtshan nyidad/ de bzhin gshegs po yang sras gcig
pa sgra gcan 'dzin bzhin du sems can thams cad la gzigs na jiltar skyon chags pa'i ya mtshan can rnams kyi yan lag gcod par bka'asolakhar 'gyur// de nas ser

mo'i phreng bas brgya byin lha'i dbang po la 'di skad ces smras so// bsad pa dang/ ma gsad pa'i bye brag brgya byin khyed kyis ga la shes/ sgyu ma byed pa'i sgyu ma ji ltar nying pas ma shes pa de bzhin du
byang chub sems dpa' snyam yang brgya byin bstan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhing pa lta bu s ga la shes/ mgagad pa dang/ bsad pa la yang rnam pa gnyis med de/ byang chub sems dpa'i gsod
ba dang/ nyan shos kyi gsod pa ste/ rnam pa de gnyis kyang sbyang bu lta bu khyod kyis ga la shes byang chub sems dpa' yul dang ) khyed kyi yul gyi khyad par ninam mkha' la sbrang bu'i 'bur
stabs bzhan no// 'di lta ste/ dag sbyong 'dres zan pa la dag sbyong rnams 'gog pa la zhugs nas// skye bo mang pas ci'i phyir 'gog pa la zhugs shes dris na ) brgya byin khyong la dris ta/ de'i
tshade ltar 'gag pa'i bzlog pa de mchog yin nam 3 bskro ba'i tsho gal te 'gog pa des hiMnasu la sdig par 'gyur ta) gal ta gsod pa'i sems sbyang san )su la yang sdig par mi 'gyur ro//
du bzhin du skyon chags pa'i ya mtshan can rnams chad pas bcad pa las gal te/ shi na su la'ang sdig par mi 'gyur gyi )bsod nams kyi phung po mang du skyeng// de ltar bsong pa dang/
mi gsod pa'i bragan shes par dka' ste/ da na byang chub semasadapa' rnams la gsod pa'i chos sum 'gyur ro/ dper na sman pas nad pa lca'i drung du btsags bus btabastakhrag byung
b.las )da'i 'og tu de gal te shinaci sman pa la sdig tu 'gyur ram ) sman pani ma mang po la phan par byed pas sman pau0f8bsngagadu ma 'gyur ta) gsod pa'i sems ni ma gtogs se
de bzhin du skyon chags pa'i ya mtshan can rnams chad pas khacad pa las gal te shi na su la'ang sdig par mi 'gyur gyi/ bsod nams kyi phung po mang du 'phel te/
gsod pa'i sems ni ma gtogs so// dperan slob dpon mthong mthog tu byis pa shin bu'i slob dpon la sdug par 'gyur ram/ da bzhin du khong nas dpa' ba'i gze kharjid mash+tsang nas/
mthong ba tsam gyis skyon chags pa'i ya mtshan canashin/ ci zlog pa la sdug par gyur ram/ zlag pa la sdig par mi 'gyur gyi/ bsodAnamasamang du 'phelate/ gsod pa'i sems ni ma gtog
so// de'i phyir brgya byin khyod sdigapa'i las dang/ bsod nams lAkyakhyi khra mo shesaso// ngag sbyong dang/ dag sbyong ma yin ba'i bye brag ma shes kyis/ dmapa'i chos la sdang ba'i ya mtshan
can rnams ni chad pas bcad de/ gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la sogs pa nya khros chen po brgyad cu dang/ sa la gro zhin skyes dang thug med la sogs pa de dag thams cad kyang nor gyi bum pa a
pozer nas/ yo khyadabasnyungs shing chog shes pasadamalo'itshes la gnas pa dag ci rin thang med pa'i gos gyen ma/ dge sbyong gi lus magokhrigs shing rgyags pa thams cad bcom pamagonamed pa

bzhin du/ lag na lhung bzed thogs pa gos la sogs pa yang kha gabasgyur cing/ kha dog ngan bar byas pa'i dge slong de dag la khagamed par lta cirung/ rtag tu grang ba dang/ tsho ba dang bru ba dang/ skom/

nga sa nyen cing re dwags bzhin du rtag par rkang lag rdul gyis reg kyang tshul khrims las cung zad 'das pa'i dri ma yang mi byed pa 'i sgong bzhin du tshul khrims srung ba de dag la 'du 'dzin drang skyab
la dag 'bras ci zhig/ sa glangamachab bcudapa bzhin du 'jigs shing gzugs mi sdug padedug lan thang med pa'i gos gyon pas/ ci zhig byas ) lan gnyis su de skad cesam zer cig/ brgya
byin khyon bstan pa'i phyi rol pa yin// mu stegs rnamasasubram ze'i dam tshig la gdol bami chud pa de bzhin du khyod kyang phyi rol kyagal ba yan gyis sbyang bukhyod cang mas shag/ de
nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pos snang ba chen po phyung nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de bzhin gshegasapa dang/ sor me'i phreng ba la lha'i mchod pachen po
byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang sor mo'i phreng ba la tshig 'di skad ces smras so// kye ma bdag gis g.yul chen rab mthong ste/ seng ge gnyisanadrag tu 'thab pa wazhan// kum sangs rgyas
ma 'dul b.lesgyur// de bzhin gshags pas sor phreng dgakhar btul// sbrel gyisasmanapamathong nas shin tu skra'abyin cing// ma 'jigs kha drangs 'byin pa zhi bar myur btul ltar// de bzhin
'jig rtan gsum gyi sman pa mthong nas ni// sor phreng gtum rab las bgyid shin tu dul bar gyur// khams gsum sman pa khyod la phyag 'tshal la// gyad mchogargyalaMpo khyed laphyag 'tshalalo//
tu// de bzhin gshegs pa thabs kyis mang ba ba// bsam pas stobs 'chang khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// chos nyid la rang sor phreng bzhag pa na// de tshe lha khyod shinaturnam
par mdzes// deltar shin tumadzes pad pe ni rnyed)/ daphyir de bzhin gshegs pa dpem mchis// sor phreng tshulakhrims de gnas shin tu mdzes// dul zhing byung la 'jigs pa ma mchi
'a shing gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis kyang gsar 'dra ste// 'dzam bu 'chubo gser 'bar mdog ltar mdzes// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gsol bdag la thugs brtse bas// bdag gi 'phrul
gos de bzhin gshegs pas deng bzhus te// sor mo'i phreng ba'i lha ya chosagos bgyi khar gsol// de yi 'bras busabadagakyang byang chub mchogathob shog sor phreng chos gos bdagags
bgosanas// tshangs pa'i spyod pa sems brtan rdzogs par shog/ bcom ldan 'das lasor mo 'phreng kha yang// tshangs par spyod pa phun sum tshogs par srungs/ 'di nasas
mo'i phreng bas tshangs pa mamadzad kyi bdag po la slar 'di skad ces smras so// phra ma can cal col smra ba khyedasu zhig/ sor mo'i phreng bas bdag gi gos bgos nas// sor mo'i phreng ba
tshul khrims dang/ brtul zhugs srungs shig/ sor mo'i phreng ba yun ring du tshul khrims srungs shes ches nga lakhangs shing smakho/ tshangs pa ngan pa/ tshangs pa ma yin khar tshangs pa'i/
gzugs su 'dir 'ongasan tshangs pa tshangs pa zhes bya ba'i don ci/ 'jig rten na tshangs pa'i las gang yin/ sa sbrang bu lta bu lan gos blangs te bgos la tshul khrims dang brtul/
zhugs yun ring por srung ngam/ ngan su'i khol po yang ma yinate) ngazhi su'i dad bral yang mi 'jug go/ nga lasu'i bu lon rang mchags te/ ngasan sngon semasacan dbul po rnams nor

byin no// dper nadapyado zlar bal 'phyang mo nyug pa'i thag pa'i btags te rang du song yang sar gyar du rang gi gnas su 'khor ba de bzhin du/ tshangs pasbrang bu lta bu khyod kyang dpyid zla rab la dpyad
thag btags pa ltar tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bde ba myong nas/ phyir ltung ba'i chos can du ltung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i don yon tan gyi 'thadapami shes par gang sdig pa
dang sdig pa ma yin par rtog pa khyod 'drab sbrang khu lta bu de dag srid pa dag na/ mi mkhas shing ldan pa 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi nangan kun tu 'khyam mo// kye ma tshangs pa sdig pa dang/ sdug
bam yin pa nges par shes nas/ sor mo'i phreng bas gtum pa'i las byas so zhes smosashag tshangs pa ngan pa sbrang ma lta bu khyodam shes kyis byang chub sems dang 'i spyod pa laslobs shig
denas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pos sor mo'i phreng ba la slar 'di skadaces smras so// sor mo'i phreng ba mi nyis stong du gcig gis ma tshang babasadadi/ mi bzad pabyas
panaman sum du da rur lang snang ngo// khyod kyi drag shul gyi las ni bya rog dung khra yang byed minusate 1 'di lta bu drag shul gyi las ma yenAn/ drag shul gyi las ji lta bu yin
te rngagalate 'di lta bu bdud ma yinanA/ srin po mi bzad pa yang jilta zhig yod de/ sor mo'i phreng ba bag yod par gyis la khyod kyis las byas pa rnams jinas byang bar 'gyur bde ltar btson
par gyis shig/ kye ma sangs rgyasan thugs rje can te/ sor mo'i phreng ba la sogs pa gtum po'i las byed kha rnams nges par sgrol ba'o// de nas ser mo'i phreng bas tshangs pa
mimajed kyi bdag po lasur 'di skad ces smras so// tshangs pa khyed srin bu brame bzhin du mchong zhing 'khyam du gar 'gro// sdug bdang/ masdig pa ma shes pa'i sems can rnams ngan 'gror

'gro'o// blun po la la zhig nags kyi nang du song nas mtshan mo mun pa'i nang na/ shing gi rtsa ba'i steng na srin bu me khyer gyi phung pomakhreng ba dang/ nganapad skrag nas grong dang tshong dus su 'ongs te//
'brog tshig go zhes zer ba dang/ 'gro ba mang por dod ba dang/ mtshan mo mun nag gi nang na sbyin bume khyer ba mthong nas/ 'dimam yin no zhes mthar kyis slar log stetong bde bzhin du/ tshangs

kha ngan pa khyod kyang sor mo'i phreng ba blun po'i zhes ston cing bdag nyid dang/ skya bomang po yang shin tu bsus te/ phyis smrama'i phung bo de sbrang bu lta bu s kyang shes/ sems can mang pos kyang shes
bar 'gyur ro// blo gros 'chal ba khrun bol la zhig nags khrod du song nas shing mya ngan med pa'i nags me tog rgyas pamathong ba dang// me yin pasnyam dubasams te/ skag nas grong dang tshong dus

su song ste ) 'gro ba mang po yang de bzhin du phyin pa dang/ rim gyisame dang/ shing mya ngan med pa'i bye brag shes pa de bzhin du sbyang bu lta bu khyod kyis sdig pa dang/ sngag pa ma yin par ms kyis shes
par 'gyur ro// de nas phyis skye bo mang pos kyang sgyu ma'i phung po lta bu 'di shes par 'gyur gyis ) tshangs pa ngan pa khyod lan gnyis sude skad ma zer cig/ de ltar brdzun smra ba ma
slob par khyedalta bu blo zhan pa sbrang bu rnams rnams na cang ma phror bar 'dug ga de nas 'jig rten skyong ba bzhis snang ba chen po pang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa deng sang
mo'i phreng ba la mchod pachen po byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang sor mo'i 'phreng ba la 'di skad ces smras so// kye ma skyes bu stag gi thab tshemchog/ don dam rgal zhing lan ldan shin
tu mdzes// kye ma ston pas 'dul kha lo sgyur// de phyir mtha' las stobs 'dzin sangs rgyas lags// zhebs mchog pad+mo lta bu r mnyen zhing 'jam// rdul gyis mi rigapa la phyag 'tshal te/ )lan
mas skabs mchis de bzhin gshegs pa la// gsol ba bdag gis lhung bzed sor 'phreng gsol// sor mo'i 'phreng kha deng mdzes te/ nam mkha' la na zla ltar mdzes// ser 'phreng tshul khrims
'a@#// yon tan dang// brtul zhugs gzi brjid rdzogs pamadzes// de nas sor mo'i 'phreng bas 'jig rten stong bza' la slar smras pa/sprul lta bu 'jig rten skyong ba phram

khyod su dag cig/ 'jig rten skyong ba 'jig rten skyong ba snyam ste/ nga rgyal gyis khengs pas bdag gi lha'i lhung bzed sbyin no zhes nga la 'drad cing yi dgas ltar 'dzungs pa dag yud tsam gzhan gyi tshong
labapa dag ltas shig/ gyemo'i snod ni su la yang mdagodan/ 'jig rten gyi mgon po snyam du sems pas bdag gi lta ba phyisang lasbyin nam/ gang 'jig rtenan ma rungs pa'i mtshan can rnams bal
bar byed pan 'jig rten skyong gzhes grags te/ chos yang dag par bskyang bar bya'i/ 'jig rten bskyang bar mi bya'o/ de yang dpen/ la las khubyug ga sgra thos sam/ kha dog phun sum tshogs pa

mthong ba dang/ danas yud tsaman bya rog skad 'byin pamathong nas khu byug khu byug ces nor de bzhin du khyod kyang chos su sems shig/ chos ma yin bsrung ngo// nags khrodan 'dug pa'i bya rog skad 'byin

[% ]pa mthong nas/ khu byugasnyam du sems pa bzhin du 'jig rten skyong khang khazhis chos skyongs la 'jig rten ma skyong shig/ 'jig rtenaskyong ba skya bo ma shes pa sbyang bu lta bu khyed bzhes zung thub
par gyis la chung masmra shog/ denas bdud sdig can sor mo'i phreng ba'i thad du 'ongs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa cher byas nas/ sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces
smras so// sor mo'i 'phreng ba myur du rab tu byung// nga yi tsho dus kreng zhugs khaslus pani// sor mo'i 'phreng bang na mi dga' ste// sems can dmyol pa gting nas khyod rgal to//
de nas sor mo'i 'phreng bas bdud sdig can lo slar 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can khyi rkun sprang bu lta bu phar song// khyad tsashinatu spyobs par smra 'am// bdud sdig can khyod dang myur du byung
ste song shig/ ji srid du khyi ltar bcing ba lngas bcings te/ rkang pa g.yon pas ma brdabs pa da 'i bar du ni bdud khyod rab tu rtsen to/ 'gro dang tshong 'dus dang/ lung pa'i sgo thams cad kyang
ngas stong par byas te/ dper nam mkha' ldangar rab kyi steng du 'dug nas/ rgya mtsho dpag tshad kyi bar mang po na/ klu sbug mthongan len pa de bzhin du sems can dmyal ba pa thams cad la yang nam
mkha' lding ltar rnam par grazhing thar pa'i khu bas ngomasas// rtag tu bdud sdig can khyed kyimago bcad de byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu'i grung po rnams rol to// bdud khyi rkun lta bu khyod//
cang ma zerab r chosakhadud rtsi'i tshig nyon la yud tsam gyi bar du sdod de/ chos blos nas rang gi grong khyer dusang shig dang/ tshong dus dang grong khyer rnams shes par 'gyur ro/
nas lha'i bu dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ ser mo'i 'phreng ba la lha'i mchod pa chen po byas nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsal do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabag
mchog bdag gi mgos khagatugs te ) dablomchog dang 'dra ba'i bsngags brjod bstod par bgyi// bde gshegs pad+mo 'dab 'dra spyan mnga' 'dab stong ldan// zhabs mchog
'jam pa badra'adab ma stong chen 'dra// nubs ni bad+mo dmar skya 'dra nga rdul mi chags)zhabs mchog ud pal 'dang 'dra phyag many+dzal natu 'jam/ uta'adab ma mchog gi zhal na dribada'
tsha ste'ajig rten dag na ut+pal 'dabam bzhin du bsal// bde gshegs kun tu bltas sdug ut+pal 'dabamchog bzhin// dbu sku 'jam zhing snyam lasu mthing ka ltar// dbu ska utul

mthing ka dri mchog bsilab 'dra// ut+palamathing ka snum ba'i mdog 'dra yod du 'od/dbu skra nyag ma phra zhing lcang la 'phreng ba mnga'// khyod kyi tshims mchog ku mu dA dang zla ba 'dra// ku mu dA dang

ba zla ba pad+ma'i snying po ltar// chudang nya lcibs dag gi skyonagyise yang mi gos// tshems ni ku mud zlab lta bu r dris mod/ nyes pas mi gos tshems mchog ku mud kha dog 'dra/ tshems kyang nyon mongs
[% ]bsal cing thabs mchog tshems mang 'ab/ khut+tArika bzhin du dri med gsal ba'i blo// pur ka bzhin dusems mchog dag kha ste/ sems ni puN+Da ri ka lta bu r ma gos pa// 'dod khri thapa'i
nyis spangasasangs rgyas partari// sangs rgyas brlod kar bo lta bu'i blogrosamanga'// pad+mo'i drung na utuladri mchog mdzes pa ltar// sangs rgyas te mdzes ut+pal gnyis ltar sor 'phreng mdzes//
00ser 'phreng dang mdzes utulaganyis ba ltar// sa'aphred de mdzes 'di ltar sdig can bdud kyang ni// gos dkar gyen pas thog mar btsul cig pham byas te// lan dang ya lan ngag gis
de bzhinagshegs dang rol// 'di na 'jig rten du yang mgon por gyur du 'gyur/ ma ral gri phyar nas bde gshegs dkrongs bsams nas// ser mo'i 'phreng ba 'dir 'dasam yang
gsad par sems// deng nas sa'i skye bo skalapa yod pa 'dra// bdan bar sla ba'i tshig ni gzhan du yong ma 'gyur// khyod kyis sdug byas ci nas lus 'das byang 'gyur ba// de ltar sor 'phel
khyod kyis rtsoms shing nan tan gyis// kum dpa' bo khyod kyis gtum pa'i las byas na// de ring chos kyi rjepor gyur na 'dag dga'o/ de nas sor mo'i 'phreng bas lha'i budabang
phyug chen po laslar 'di skad ces smras so// stabasamasdug pa'i gtum po khyedasu zhig/ khyod ni dbang phyug snyam ste/ khyed na ming gi dbang phyug ra nagyi/ dbang phyug jilta ba bzhin ma yin
ni so so'i skye bo 'am/gralatsemakha gang yin pa ji ltar shes ba myur du smosAshag/ dbang phyug khyod sha za ltaramache ba rnand rung yang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa ma thob bam )'di lta
ste skyes bu mdze tshabs chen pos btab nas ) mdze ra btu nang bstan no/ 'jig rten rnams 'di snyam du semasaso// gang bdag nyid kun ng zhi bar ma nus pa des gzhan gyind ji ltar gsosnyam
mo/ de bzhin du gtum posbrang bu lta bu khyed kyang bdag rtogs pas bdag gi khams kyang darung ma shes te/ gtum po mdze tshabs chen pos btab pa lta bu s sor mo'i
'phreng ba so so'i skye bo 'am/ ngagra bcom pa zhes pha rol gyi sems shes par gal 'gyur/ sbrang bu lta bu khyodacang mazer cig/ khyod nisa'i dbang phyug chu dbang skur ba dang sa'adabang phyug
tsha gi rgyal tshab tu 'os pa ma yan gyis dmus long lta bu khyod yudatsam sdod cig/ de nas dri bzhan gshegs pa shing gang la brten te/ bzhugs pa'i shing de'i lha mas sor mo'i 'phreng
ba ba la tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so// dpa' bo sar ma'i 'phreng ba myur bar du// khyod ni ngur smig rgyal mtshan gyon cig dang/ bde gshegs thabs cig klog mar bsod snyomA
gsol// dpa' bo 'bras khu dam pa klob khrar bgyis// da nas sor mo'i 'phreng bas lha mo la tshigs sukhacad pas smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa bshos mi gsol/
nyan thos rnams kyang de bzhin na// khyod kyi sbyin pa su la sbyin// myur smos bzangamo yangs pa'i mig/ nga yi the tsom la gor mchod// de nas lha mo langs pa'i mig gis slar sor mo'i
'phreng ba la tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ sangs rgyas rtag tu bshosaM gsol to// nyan thos rnams kyang de bzhin na// brtan pa rab tu 'byung 'dod la// brdzun du smakhami cha'o// brdzun gyi
[d, ]tshig ni rnam spongs shig/ ga po kha'i bsam pa sdig can yin// chos gcig las 'das pa yi// skye bo brdzun gyi tshig sla ba// 'jig rten pa re labatang ba ngag ma byad pa ni ci yang/
med// de nas sor mo'i 'phreng bas lha me dal 'di skad ces smras so// bud med khyed ci zhig 'khyam/ de khyod kyang dman pa'i rigs su skyes kyis// sbyang bu lta bu sangs/
rgyas kyis smad pa'i bud med kyi dngos po'i bdag nyid la shin tu rtogs shig 'jig rten na brdzun du sla ba gang// 'jig rtenan bdun ba 'dzin pa gang// 'jig rten na zang zang la
chags pa gang/ 'jig rten na zhing shi ba gang yin// sbrang ma lta bu s ma shes so// sems can gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bdag nyid chen pa mi shes pa'i sems can
de dag ni brdzun dusmra ba'o// sems can gang zang zing la chags pas de bzhin gshegs pa la yang zang zangags skur pa'i sems can de dag ni brdzun du sa ba ste/ de dag la rab tu 'byung ba
yang medun/ bsnyen par rdzogs par lta ga la 'gyur/ sems can gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ldem pa'i dag shes pas sems can de dag ni brdzun du slakha ste/ de dag larab tu 'byung ba 'ang med/
na bsnyen par rdzogs par lha gal 'gyur/ ngan chos gcig las kyang mi 'da'o//lhamo khyed kyis chos thams cad la'angs kyas de khazhin gshegs po lha'i lha lang dag par rdzogs bsangs
@#/ lamyur du bzod pa gsol cig/ de nas ser mo'i 'phreng ba la lcamos slar 'di skad ces smras so/ bud med kyi dngos po ragis dma' ba zhes zer ba
la ldem po dag tu smra/ sIr mo'i 'phreng ba bud med dam skyes pa len bar ji ltar shes/ sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyed myur du smyos shig/ khyod sha za'i dngos po da rung ma zhi'o// de nas sor mo'i
'phreng bas lha mo de lasar 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po 'a mal du khyi song nas ) ra mo byed pa'i sems can gyis/ mi gtsang bar byas la de bzhan du lha mo khyed kyang thabs kyi chos kyis rje bas
bud med kyi dngas por bsgyur te/ 'dod pa'i yul lasems shing rim byed do// de bas lha mo khyod bud med kyi dngos po skyengs la skyes pa dang/ bud med cas bya bar ba du sdod par sgoms shig/
rab tu stong pa la goms na skyes pa'i dngos bo myur du thob bo// danas de 'tshe shA ri'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du
namamakha' las 'ongs ste bcom ldan 'dasaMg la bdor phyin pa dang// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gtsug tu 'duganas// sor mo'i 'phreng laM
'ang skad ces smras so// rags kyi bu legs se legs so// khyod kyis 'thun zhang rjes su dgongs pa'i bsod nams byas pa shes par gyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang thobs
(ga cig tu dang la tshang pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams ltar bcug ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun daga' ra bar 'dong ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu phyanas
'jig rten skye bo'i phung po mang po ltar nam mkha' las zla ba dri mamed pa dang/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar chas te 'dong ngo// denas ser me'i 'phreng bas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal
gyi bu chen po la slar tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ rdzu 'phrul ldan ba gang yin 'jig rtenan// rdzu 'phrul rtsa ba las ni ci zhig skye// rdzu 'phrul ldan thob 'gyur ba myur sgos la// khyod kyis nga
yi the tshom myur du sel// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ ser me'aphreng ba la tshigs subacad pas slar snyasang ) gol tu 'jig rten dganaspyanakhodag rnams // rtag tu lham/
yang rab tu sbyin par byed/ gal te dag slong tshul khrims rdzogs pa la// lham gyi rnam pan tu 'phul ba ste// rnam pa gnyis po de dag gas// rdzu 'phrul 'dod pa rdzu 'phrul 'thob// ser
phreng de ltar shes par gyis// rdzu 'phrul 'dod na de ltar spyod// de nas tshe dang ldan pamo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la sor mo'i 'phreng bas slar 'ad skad ces smras so// kye ma btsun pa mo'u 'gal

gyi bu sbrang bu'i spyad pa skyed de// rdzu 'phrul kun gyi gzung ba mi shes so// sbrang bu yang nam mkha' la 'gros sbrang bu'i rdzu 'phrulargya stobs ldan khyed cangam zer cig/ bdag grolanas grol bar bya'o
snyam ste/ phan pa'i sems des ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa myur du 'grub bo// dam pa'i chos phan par ston pa nyam thag pa'i mi/ de'i mdun du bdagagasasrog brer na des rdzu 'phrul
dang ldan pa 'grub bo/ sems canabye ba mang po bsgral ba las lhag pa rgyal byed tshilan rdzu 'phrul ga la yod kyis nga mi 'gro'o// de ltar theg pa chen podapag tu med pas na/ de bzhin gshegasang ba
dpag tu med do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu la sor mo'i 'phreng bas tshigs su bcad pas 'di skad ces smras so/ 'jig rten dag na shes rab che ba gang// ji lta bu n
blo gros skye bar 'gyur/ ye shes chen po myur bar yang// myur du smos te nga la the tshom gcod// de nas tsho dang ldan pa shA ra'i bus ) sor mo'i 'phreng ba la tshigs su bcad pas
slar smas pa/ tshul khrims lnga rnams rab tu bsrungs pasan// blo mtshog shes rab chen po thob par 'gyur// lus 'di bor nas rang gi blor bcas te// gang dang gang du 'dod pa der skyes te//
de dang der ni shes rab chen por 'gyur// phyogs su snyan pa rnams grags sor mo'i 'phreng// dpa' chen blo ldan du ldan shes par gyis// de nas sor mo'i 'phreng bas tshe
dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu la sar 'di skad ces smras so// de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'o zhes bstan pa mi 'chi ba'i tshig 'di las shes rab chen po skyeste/ de ltar ston pa shes rab dang ldan
bu bad na sangs rgyas yin te/ kye ma btsun pa shes rab chen po shA ra'i bu ni sbyang bu'i sud pa seng de sngang bu lta bu r 'gro pa khyed ni shes rab dang ldan pam shes so// sbyang bu lta bu'i shes
rab can khyod cang ma zer cug btsun pan sbyang bu lta bu'i shesarab canano// de nas de'i tshe kun dga' boder 'ongs nas ) bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs lamago bos phyag 'tshal
te 3sor mo'i 'phreng ba la 'di skad ces smras so// legs so legs so// sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyed kyis 'khrun cing rjes su dgongs pa'i bsed nams byas pa nga dga' 'o// sor mo'i 'phreng kha
myur du gsung rab yan lagadagu pa lhag shag da nas gnas brtan kun dga' bo 'basor mo'i 'phreng bas slar 'di skad ces smras so// khyod mang du thos pa'i mchog tu du bzhan
gshigs pas gsungasan/ btsun pa kun dga' bo khyed ladri yisasmos shig/ 'jigartenan mang du thos pa gang/ ji ltar na ming dubros pa 'byung/ btsun pa kun dga' bo dras de skad dris pa
myur du sbos shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ sor mo'i 'phreng ba las 'di skad ces snyasase/ mdo sde yan lag dgu pa klog dang/ gzhan la langaser snyamed par rab tu ston
padi las mang du thos shing bsamagyis khyab pa'i gzungs phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ro/// de nas sor mo'i 'phreng bas gnas brtan kun dga' bolasar 'di skad ces
bka @#// skyas so// 'jig rtenan de bzhin gshegs pa ni ther zug g.yung drungange zhes bstan pa ston pa de ni 'jig rten na mang du thos pa yin te/ mang du thos pa de ltabur shes/

ka par gyis shig/ kye ma btsun pa kun dga' bo ni spyang khu'i spyad pa spyod de/ mang duthos ba'i byung ba'i sgo ma shes so// sbyang bu la yang mang du thos pa yod kyis sbrang bu lta bu'i mang du byis pa
khyed cang ma zer cig/ de nas gnas brtan sgra gcan zini bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyinanas/ ser mo'i 'phreng bal 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu lag
so legs so// khyod kyis 'thun zhing rjes su dgongs pa'i bsod nams byas ba nga dga' 'o// sor mo'i 'phreng ba myur du gus par bslab pa zung shig/ de nas sor mo'i 'phreng
bas sgragacan 'dzin la slar sbas pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan 'dzinakhyod bslab pa la dga' zhing gus pa'i mchog tu do bzhin gshegs pas gsungasan )'jig rten na bslabapa la gus pa
gang yan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gras ngangs pa myur du smos la nga 'i tha tsam chod cig/ da nas gnas brtan sgra gcan 'dzin gyis sor mo'i'aphreng bal tshigs su bcad pA
smras pa ) sangs rgyas gsung rnams shin tu gus paro gzung// de nas bslabalagus shing tshul khrims ldan// khong dpa' dbangagyur khong dpa'i mchog 'dzin pa// sor mo'i 'phreng
ba de ltar shes par gyis// sor mo'i 'phreng bas sgragacan 'dzin la slar 'du skad ces smras so// 'jig rtenAn de bzhin gshegs pa ni mchog tu rtagapa'o zhes
gus pas bstan pa ni gus pa'i mchog ces bya ste ) btsun pa sgra gcan 'dzin ston pa de na 'jig rten ni bslab pa la gus pa'i mchog tu shes par gyis shag )kyi btsun pa sgra
gcan 'dzanan sbrang bu'i spyad pa spyod de/ sbyang bu lta bu r khyod bslab pa la gus par mi shes so// sbyang bu la yang gus pa yod kyis sbyang bu lta bu khyod chung ma zer cig/
gnas brtanam 'gags pa bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der songaste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te de sor ma'i 'phreng ba 'di skad ces smras so// legs/
legs so// sor mo'i 'phrengakha khyed kyis 'thun zhing rjes su dgos ba'i bsod nams byas pa nga dga' 'o// sor mo'i 'phreng ba dar pom thogs par lha'i mig can du gyis shig/
nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la ser me'i 'phreng bas sAr 'ang skad ces smras so// btsun pa ma 'gags pa khyed de bzhin gshegs pas 1 lha'i mig can gyis mchog tu gsungs na )'jig rtenan lha'i
mig can gang/ lha'i mig ji ltar skye/ myur du smos la nga'i the tsom chod cig/ de nas ser me'i 'phreng ba latshadang ldan pam 'gags pas sar tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so//
marames rtag tu mig thob 'gyur// yang na gzhan la nan tan du// chos bshad pas kyang shes par bya// gzugs can nang na gzugs mchog can// de ltar ser 'phreng pas/
par gyis// denas sor mo'i 'phreng bas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa 'di skad ces smras so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rab du nan tan dum 'chab cing// sems can thams cad la panA
bstan pa stenan/ des lha'i mig thob par 'gyur te/ de ni 'jig rten lha'imag canano/ dkyimakhatsun kha ma 'gags la khyed nasbyang khu'i skad baspyod de/ lha'amag skyed pa mi
shesaso// sbrang bu yang rang gi yulamathang gos sbrang bu lta bu khyod cung ma zer cig/ de nas gnas brtan dug sbyong ga khel po bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mag ces phyag 'tshal
nas/ soma'i 'phreng ba la 'di skad ces smras so// legs so legs so// sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyed kyis bskrun zhing rjesasu dgongs pa'i bsod nams byas pang dga' bo// sor mo'i
tshu phred ba dan bzod bal mang du bsgom par bya'o// donasaser me'i 'phreng bas gnas brtan dge sbyong gi khol pol 'di skad ces smras so/ 'jig rten dag na bzod pa rdzogs
pa su/ bzod pa 'dod pasaji ltar bzod par 'gyur// ji lta bu ranabazed par 'gyur ba yang// myur du skyes lang la the tsom med/ des gas khartan dag sbyong ga khol nges
sor mo'i 'phreng ba lasar smasal/ dge sbyong bzod par 'dod pa yis// ste'u dang tsan dan drab r bya// de nas bzod pa thob par 'gyur// de ni 'jig rten rdul ba'od yin// ser 'phreng de ltar
shes par gyis// danas sor mo'i 'phreng bsaganas brtanadag sbyong gi khol pol 'di skad ces sus so// 'jig rtenanade bzhin gshegs pa'i sang por ba tu ston pa la mimakhas/
pa log par ltaba'amedug zhe sdang zhing bstan ban bdagamed pa'o// zhes bdag nyid de ltar 'gaste de dag gatshagi lagoms par mibyedacing/ mtshungs pa med do snyamanas rang gi srog kyang
btang ste/ de bzhan gshags pa'i snying po rab tu ston pa de ni bzod pa'i dam pa ste 'jig rtenaphan par ston pa'o// 'jig rtenan khabod pa ngul bzhi ba 'jigs pamed pa'o// kye ma gnas
brtan dag sbyong gi khel po khyed ni sbrang bu'i spyad pasngod de/ bzod pa bskyed pam shesas// sbrang bu yang bkres pa dang/ skom pa bzod kyis sbrang bu lta bu khyodacang mazer cig/
bam po gsumapa// de nas gang po byams ma 'bus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs lagogos phyag 'tshal nas/ sor me'i 'phreng bal 'daskad ces smras
so// legs so legs so// ser me'i 'phreng ba khyod kyis 'thun pa dang rjes su dgongs pa'i bsod nams byas par yang dga' 'od/ sor mo'i 'phreng ba sems can thams cad lage
bu @#/ par bstan pa'i chos kyi gtam ston cig/ de nas sor mo'i 'phreng bas gang bo byamasama'i bu la sa 'di skad ces smras so// gang po byed sangs rgyas kyis
ka chos skya ba'i mchog tu gsungasan/ btsun pa 'jig rtenan chos skya ba gang yin/ ji ltar na dge slong don shes pa yin/ btsun pa chos skya ba'amchog gis shod cig/ sor de nas sor mo'i
tsha 'phreng bas gang po byams ma'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas kun dang nyan thos kyis// gang de kun tu ma brnyes pa// chos de mngon par sangs rgyas nas// srog chagasarnamA
la bstan par bya// de skad gsungs pa'i den bad// gang pos smras pa/ 'das pa'isangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang chos thams cad la sems can gyi dbyengs dang/ bdag
drang srog dang/ gang zag dang/ shing las skyes pa dang/ shadabu shin tu nan tan du btsal kyang ma brnyed nas/ bdag med pan sangs rgyus kyi tshig go snyam ste 'dras so// da ltar
gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyisakyang )chos thams cad lasems canagyidabyangs dang/ srog dang/ gang zag dang/ shed las skyes pa dang/ shid bu shin du nan tan du
btsal kyang mi b.red do// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang chos thams cad la sems canagyi dbyangs dang/ srog dang/ gang zag dang/ shed las skyes pa
dang/ shed bu dag nan tan tu byas te btsal kyang b.red par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du nyan thosadang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang dus gsum du chos thams cad la srog
dung gang zag dang/ shad can dang ) bshed bu dang/ sems can gyi khams dang ) bdag nan tan du btsal kyang ma red mi red red par mi 'gyur te/ de ltar srog dang/ gang zag dang/
shed can dang de shed bu dang/ sems can drang ) bdag gi dbyings med par ston to// de ltar bdag med par ston 3 de ltar stong par ston te/ de lta bu'i chos kyi gtam stonAto// sor mo'i
'phreng bas gang po byams ma'i bul sar 'di skad ces smras so// kye ma btsunab gang po khyod ni spang khu'i spyad pa spyod nga chos kyi gtam ston ma shes so// sbrang bu yang bri zi zhes sgra 'byin
shes kyis/ sbyang bu ltar byon pa khyed cang ma zer cig )gang po de bzhinagshegs pa'i ldem ngo 'i ngag mi shes pas bdag med pa la ches su sems pa na gti mug ga chos kyi mar me'i nang du
bye ma leb ltar ltung ngo/ de gang te sangs rgyas kyi ma brnyes shes bya ba ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po med pa
ma b.res nas 'das so// da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang sems can thams cad la bdag gi khams med pa mi bas so// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom/
ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang sems can thams cad lasems can gyi khams med pa brnyas par mi 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyus dang/ nyan thos rnams kyis kyang dus
gsum dusems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po med pa ma brnyes me bas bcad par mi 'gyur te/ tshigs su bcad pa de'i don ni 'di'o// yang sangs rgyas kun gyis
gang ma b.ros shes bya ba ni/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang chos thams cad la nan tan tu btsal kyang 'jig rten pa'i bdag tre bo tsam dang/ mi tshe 'bru dang//
'bras drang/ yungs 'bru dang )til gyi ril bu tsam dmar po drang/ sngon po dang/ ser po drang/ dkar po dang/ byung du dang/ rang po dang ) shan tu rang molasogasapasAng khan
'bar zhing 'dug ces byung dang ) ltaba'i drung dang/ mgo dang ) mig dang/ rnab la mar me'i snying po dmar po snyam gyi rkyen kyis 'bar ba lta bu 'dug go zhes bya ba la sogs te/ rtog ba la
I ba mang po na ji ltar 'jig rten pa rnams bdag la sgom pa/ gang da dgag rtag pa brtan pa ther zug ste/ bdag de ni 'di 'dra'o zhes bya bsangs rgyas thams cad dang nyan thos thag
cad kyis mkhas nas mngon par sangs rgyasanas/ srog chags rnams la bshad do zhes bya ste/tshigs su bcad pa de'i donan 'di yin gyis/ gang pon phyin ci log tu rnam par brtag
za pas na don ma yin no// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gang ma brnyes zhes bya ba de ni/ 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po byas
ba ma b.risanas 'dus te/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khams mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pomatha' ras pas brgyan pa sems can thams cad la yod de/ daltar gyis ngas rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying pokhyas panan tan du btsal kyang ma b.ras te/ sems can thams cad lam byas pa'i sangs rgyas kyabs sems can ldams
cad lamany+dza'i yas pa'amtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa yod do// dus gsum du nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas sbyang ma lta bu rnams de bzhan gshegs pa'i snang ba yodaces grag ste/
mig gisan blta ma nus so zhes 'dri ba de la byed pa'i rgyu ni bstan to// 'di lta ste/ sgragacan 'dzin dpalagyis bsab pa dang/ tshul khrims ltar byed bas/ srog chags
canagyi tshul shin tu nan tan du lta ste/ srog chags yin nam ma yin/ 'on te rdul 'dra ba zhig ste/ thams cad ma yin no snyam pa las ram gyis brtagasan/ srog chagasaphramo yin par
mthong ba de bzhin du/ sa bcu thob pa'i byang chub semasadaba' stag rnams kyis rang gi lus la bdag gi byings yod par bdag nyid kyis kyang mthong ste/ 'di 'dra ba delta bu mtha' yas pa'i[/]
dbyengs su mthong ngo// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la 'jug pa shin tu dka' ba byed pa yin te/ gang dag kun tu 'bar ba dang/ rab tu 'bar ba lta bu'i 'jib
ka rten du rang gi srog kyang btang ste/ ston par 'gyur ba ni rab tu dka' ba byed paphan par ston pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' stag de dag lang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston gyi
gzhan la ma snyen to//siAcan de dag ni bdag nyid de bzhin gshegasapal nano// dperana'aphrul gyi ma ga dang ldan pa'i nangan ma 'gagosapa bzhinate ) ma 'gags pa dang lhan cig
tu byis pa sha'i mig canaseng nas namamakha' la byaseng ba'i rjes la lasan/ byas pa sha'i mgacanakyis cinamam ba'ikhya'i rjes mthong ngam/ gnas brtan ma 'gags pasan gsal bar

yinate/ btsun pa gang po 'jig rtenaThams cad kyis spangs pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi las sngar bshad pa rnams shin tu yang ba yin te/ gal te ma'i skye gnasasu skyepa bloban rang

gnade bzhin gshegs pa 'i snying po rna ba la reg pa tsam gyis mnyes par byed cing bsod nams kyi las shin tu byed do// ma 'ongs pa na rang sems can gang de bzhin gsheg
