gyur pas/ de las nga la 'us chu bo sani d+hu rgya mtshor 'bab ba lta bu'i skur gyur to// nga tsho dbas grongs med par gang+gA'i klu da ga byi ma mang po snyad du mdo sde 'chad ba na/ da ngazhin gshegs pa'i
sAng po ston pa la 'jigs pa 'am/ skrag pa'i sems ma bskyed pas/ de las du ma lus bstan pa'i skur gyur to// nga tsharabs grangs med pa gang+ga'i klung gi ma mang po stod du dad pa
ltar dkar ba'i khang pa mang thog nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ba srid dang/ bde ba mad po sadas te/ rnalags khrod du zhugs pas/ de las nga ya'i lus gnas lta bu b skur gyur to//
ba nyu// nga tshe rabs grangs med pa gapa'i klung gi bye ma mad pa snyed du/ lhod pa rnams kyi spyod pa rtag tu gdol pa ltar nad du smadas te/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa dam pa rnams dang/
gnas gcig na 'khod pa'i tsho chubod gang tsam yang byedas dran la dran te/ de'i phyir de las ngas 'gyod pa med pa 'i sku thob go ngas tshor bas grungasamed pagarlabaklung gabya ma mang po
snyad du nyon mongs pa'i khur yod bar byas bas de las nga yi lus rab tu sbyangs ba dang/ gsal ba'i spunagyur to// das tshe rabs grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gi ma mang bo ster du
rgyal po ra bud per byas te/ khyim na gnas pa'i nyis pa sdadas pas de las da la khus ma tshil ba'i skur gyur to// dus tshe rabs grangs med pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma mang po nyid du 'dod/
chags dad/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug smadas shing nyon mdas pa'i shud po zad bar byas pas/ de las nga yalus nad med pa dang/ 'jigs pa med pa dang/ nga rgyal med pa'i skur
gyur to// ngas tshe rabs grangs med ba gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma mang po snyad du/ sems can lhag mang bo rnams la bud med dang rtsa ba'i nyon mongs pa skye na/ sbyal gdug pa'i dug lta bu r sman
bas de las nga yi lus 'geg pa'i skur gyur to// ngas tsho rabs grangs med pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma mang po sId du/ de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas/ byis pa'i
srod pa lta bu ba dag nyid lud bstan pa des nas/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan byas te/ mdo sde la smod pa rnams theg pa chen po bshad pas/ de las nga la lus gnas med pa'i skur gyur to/
ngas tshe rabs grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung ga byin ma da bo snyad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa snyid po nyes nas/ bsal pabye ba mang por sems can rnams kyi nyen mongs pa gzhig par byas nas/
sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar yid ches pa'i phyir/ sems can bye ba kun gyi skyabs su 'gyur bar sbyad par brtsams te/ de'i 'bras bus nga ya lus skyabs kyi skur gyur to// ngas tshe rabs grangs
med par gdab klung ga byi ma mad pa snyed du/ byang chub sems dpa' bzed par smra ba'i drad sred du gyur pa 'a tshi/ tshad med pa bzhi la bsgoms pas/ de'i 'bras bus nga ya lus da rung ya nga sems
can thams cad kyi skyabs kyi skur gyur to// theg pa chen po theg pa gcig pa bla na med pa'i ye shes chags ba med pa'i yo shes 'od chen po sems can thams cad kyi dpung gnyen gyi ye shes ngas
bstan pas/ sdig pa grangs med par byas pa yad theg pa chen po thes nas 'byang bar 'gyur te/de'i phyir nga yi lus ni dbudaganyen gyi skur gyur to// ngas tshe rabs grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gi
bye ma mang po snyad du dbyangs dang/ bde ba'i dbyings sems can thams cad kyi dbyings kyi dri ma med pa'i snying po gnod pa med bar ba tu bsngags so// rab tu bsngags pa'i 'bras bu des nga ya
bya@#// lus gnod pa med pa'i skur gyur to// ngas tshe rabs grangs med pa gang+ga'i klung ga phye ma mang po sAd du/ sems can lta na phyi pa mad po rnams gnas med pa'i than pa'i/
ga' phang la bkod pas/ de las nga yi lus go skabs med cing gtso bo'i skur gyur to// sa tshar bas grangs med pa gang+ga'i klung gi phyi ma mang bo snyed du/ sems can skyes pa dang/ bud med
ts+tshA mang bo rnams pha ma dang/ srad ma lta bu r 'du shes pa'i sems la bkod pas/ nga lus thams cad du pha bzhin du bla ma'i skur gyur to// ngas tshe rabs grangs med pa ga drub klung gi ma mang
bo snyed du/ mu ge chen po'i bskal pa bar ma la bdag gzhan gyi las byed rnam pa mad po byas pas/ de las nga yi lus thams cad du sgom pa med cing dad pa 'a lha'i skur gyur to// ngas tshe rabs

grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung ga bye ma mang bo snyed du sems can bye ba rnam pa med pa gsod par 'dod cing skya ba/ tshe rabs mang por stsad pas de las nga yi lus phung bo thams cad dang bral ba'i skur
[% ]gyur to// sa rabs mad bar thabs dam pa'i sku chos kyi sku sman pa mchog gis brtan pa'i sku mtha' las pa stan pa ltar dge ba'i rnam par sbel ba de las/ nga yi sku 'du byed zhi ba'i
skur gyur to// ngas tshe rabs grangs med pa gang+ga'i klung gi byinamad pa sId du/ sems can bye ba mang bo rnams bsgral cing/ dag nyon mdos pa rnams zad par byas te/ bdag nyid kyi dbyir
0skyaru ra'i 'bru bzhin du bstan pas de las nga yi lus tshes ma yin pa bcad pa'i skur gyur to// sa tshe rabs grangs med pa gang+ga'i klung ga bye ma mang po snyad du/ sems can bye ba mang po thamA
cad la khams bzhi po ni sbrul gdug pa'i dug bzhin du te/ rtag tu snod stong ba bzhin du stong ngo zhes rab tu snyad pas/ de las nga yi lus thos pa bsgyu 'dra bar skyes pas/ sha dang rgyus pa med
pa'i skur gyur to// ngas tshe rabs grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung ga byi ma mang bo snyad du/ srid pa'i sems can bye ba mang pa thams cad nyon mongs pa bye ba las 'dod chags dang bral ba/ 'gog
pa mya ngan las bzla bar yongs su mya ngan las bzlas so// yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pas/ de las da ya lus mya ngan las 'das pas yo ba bde ba'i skur gyur to// sor mo'i 'phreng
ba bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba mad par 'di nyid na 'dug bzhin du ngan thams cad na ba gnas te/ mya ngan las 'das pagad lan ba de ni thar pa'o// thar pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gsheg
pa nyid do// de nas sor mo'i 'phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma'o sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni dka' ba mdzad pa lta/ sems can thams cad la rjes
su thugs brtsi bgo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sor mo ba 'phred ba de bzhin gshegs pa mang shan tu dka' ba mdzad pa yin te/ nam ma 'ongs pa ba dus na dam pa'i chos/
da/ brgyad bcu'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde de bzhin gshegs pa'i sing po ston pa de ni/ sems can thams car la phan par stan bde
shin tu bya dka' ba byed pa'o// sems canagad dag de'i phyogs 'dzin pa de dag kyad shin tu bya dka' ba byed par bstan to// sems can gang rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sIr po thos/
sa de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa'i sems can de dag kyang shin tu bya dka' ba byed pa'o/sor mo'i 'phror bas gsol pa/ shin tu dka' ba bgyid pa de ji lta bu lags/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po na khur chen po ba zhi khyer te/ khur bzhi gang zhe na/ chu'i phud bo chen po'i khur dang/ 1ri'i khur dang/ 'phyi rol gyi rtswa
da pa 3 shing gel pa dang/ shing ga khur dang/ sems can thams cad khur du khyer ba ste//de ltar na sa ni khur chen po bzha khyer bgo/ sor mo ba 'phred bsagasol pa/ lce'o/bcom
glu ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ san khur chen po khyer ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs gzhan lhag bar khud che ba yod de// gsol pa// bcom ldan
'das skyes bu dam pa de gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ nam dam pa'i chos brgyad bcu'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ sems can thams cad la phan par ston pa 'i byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po stonan/ khu ba zha khyer bar 'gyur to// bzhi gang zhe na/ skyon chags pa'i ya mtshan can rnams gsod doshos
rab tu rgyu sbyod de// 'jigs pa khyad du bsad nas// rang gi srog kyang btang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying bo ston pa de ni ra' bud po bas ches rtsa ba'i khur dad pa'o// de dag la sogs
pa skyon chags pa'i ya mtshan can mad po rjes su ston pa la khro ba dang// 'dod chen po'i tshig thos nas de dag la bzod pa na chu'i phung po bas lhag pa' gi khur te de na gnyis pa'o// rgyal bo dang/
blon po dang/ dmag dpon dang 3 dbang phyug rnams chos nyan pa dang/ chos kyigatamamanyan ba ma rnyed pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyad brgyas par ston cing/ gang de'i phyogs 'dzan pa
dpad phyug dang/ dmag dpon dang/ blon po chos ma thos pa de dag la yang 'chi ba'i chos ston cing bgro ba nganab 'tshal ba'apo can dang/ 'on pa dang/ long ba thos pa ma rnyid pa la chos rnamA
ston pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi khur las rtsa ba'i de khur gsum pa 'go/ kla klo'i yul gnas par dka' ba mal stan red par dka' zhing kha zas dan la/ gos ngan pa/ ma la cha ngan/
ba dang/ mu ge dang/ 'phrug pa mang po dad/ 'gro ba rnams rtsod pa dang/ nyon mongs dang/ bud med la pag med pa tsam gyis yul la sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa 'a bzed par byed pa la/
[p]/ sogs ste/ sdug bsngal soms cad kyis de ga tsad grod dang/ ri brags kyi grong dang/ lud pa'i nad dang/ tshod dus dang/ rtsed mo'i sa dang/ bu ram shing dad/ 'bras//
zug po tshe dang/ sA lu dang/ gro dang/ nas dad/ ka ra sa dang/ bya ra dza dang ! bram ze'i gnas na 'dug pa ma rnyed pa'i gnas la dam pa'i chos ston pa de ni/ rtswa dang/ shi de ba la ba nad
klu shing dang/ rdobs lcag ba khur lci ba'i khur chen po bzhi bgo khur chen bo de bzhi gang ston pa de ni/ khur chen po byer ba'i byang chub sems dpa' man te/ dom pa ba tshos lo brgyad cu'i
bar du gnas par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/rang gi srog kyang bon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rab tu ston pa dang/ gang de'i phyogs 'dzin pa'i 'gro ba de dag kyang shin tu dka' ba byed pa go/
'gro ba gang rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po thos nas yid ches pa de dag kyang shin tu dka' ba byed pa'o// gzhan yang sog mo 'byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa ni dka' ba byed pa ma
yin gyi/mad dang tu dka' ba byed pa yod de bston to// 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig tshodapag tu med par gyur to/ lo bye ba tshad med pa nyid du skra'i rtse mo tsam gyis rgya
mtsho'i sku phyogs te 'dug nas/ par lo bye ba dpag tu med pa 'das shing/ skra'i rtse mos rgya mtsho'i chu thugs te/ de lta bu s rgya mtsho thams cad phyags te ba lang ga rjes kyi chu tsam du
byas na/ de dka' ba byed pa yin nam/ 'on ta ma yin/ gsol kha/ de ni shin tu dka' ba byed pa'i mthar phyin pa ste/ dka' ba bgyid pa'o zhes mchi ma nus so// bka' stsal pa/ den/
dka' ba byed pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhan/ gzhan yang shin tu dka' ba byed pa yod do// de gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ nam dam pa'i chos la brgyud bcu'i bar du gnas par 'gyur
pa de'i tshe/ gang bdagag srog kyang btang nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyade ston pa de ni/ shin tu dka' ba byed pa 'byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o// ga zhan yar sonamo'i
'phred ba de ba zhan gshegs pa na dka' ba byed pa ma yin te/ shin tu dka' ba byed pa gzhan la da yod do// 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig gis ni ba ra'i rgyal po dang sa
dang rgya mtsho chen por bcar te/ bdag gi phul ba la thogs nas lo bye ba'i bar du 'dug na skyes bu de 'dra/ stobs dang ldan pa yin nam/ 'on te ma lan/ de shin tu dka' ba byed ba
ci 'dra ba/ gsol la/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul te/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi tshul ma lags so/ khaka' stsal pa// de ni stobs dang ldan pa 'ad ma yin/
raka' ba byed pa ma yin te/ rgya mtsho'i chu thams cad rdul phra mo'i rtse mob chashas kyis/ lo bye ba dang/ bskal pa mad por phyags te/ ba lang gi rjes kyi tshul tsam du byed nus sha'i/
bya// sa dad la rab dad/ chubo dang/ rgya mtshor bcas te bskal ba mang bor khur khyer nus kyang/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ nam dam pa'i chos la brgyud bcu'i bar duganas
par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ skye bo phal pas kyang dam pa'i chos ston ma nus ) de bzhin gshegs pa de snyade bo yod 'chad ma nus pa de'i tshe/byang chub sems da pa ba ma'i glang pos mas canathams
cad la phan par ston ba rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyade mdo ston cing/ dam pa'i chos 'dzin par 'gyur te/ de yan tu dka kha ba byed par bstan to// gzhan yang sor mo'i 'phreng ba stod
lha gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams me'i phung bo rab tu 'bar ba la/ khyor ba'i chus zhi bar nus sam ! gsol pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du zhe na//
rgya mtsho'i chab kyis kyang tshe de zhi bar mi nus te/ khyor ba'i chab kyis ni khyimar ba tu 'bar nga la yid zhi bar ma nusan/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i lta ga la nus/ bka' skul pa/
sor mo'i 'phred ba de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i phyogs bri/ ngang tshul ngan pa'i phyogs 'phel ba de dus na/ nam dam pa chos la brgyad bcu'i bar du gnas
bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ rang gi srog kyang btad/ bran po dad/ bran mo dad ba lang dang/ ma he la sogs pa na'o ngan pa rnam pa mang
'a0po yang byin nas dam pa'i chos 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyade po ston pa'i skyes bu dam pa de gang yin/ gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyid mkhyen to// nyan thos dang/
rang sangs rgyas kyis mi ga go/ de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi tshos rnam par dag pa yang bshad dka' na/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnam par dag pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sAd po/

bstan pa lta ci smos/ de ltar skyes bu dam pa de stong gsum gyi steng chen po ba mi'i bud bo rab tu 'bar ba khyor ba'i chus zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du der mchi zhing/ shin tu dka' ba bgyid pa de ni skyes
bu de ma lags kyi ! de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la gas pa snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// ngas kyang tshab te skad smras so//
skyes bu de shin tu dka' ba byed pan/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bskal pa bye ba snyed du yon tan bshad kyang de'i mtha' ma rnyed do// gzhan yang nags kyi bu 'di lta ste/ rgya mtsho chen

po'i chu'i phung por chu bo thams cad 'bab pa ma mthong bde bzhin du skyes bu de ni blo'i nang du 'jig rten thams ca da kyi blo de'i nang dupa zhugs par mi snang ngo// gzhan yad dgos kyi bu rgya mtsho
chen pon sems can gyi rothams cad mthar 'byin pa bzhin du/ skyes bu dam pa de yang mag zur la nga mi lta/ khyim la chags pa yang med/ chos dang ma ldan pa rnams dad ya da rags
'dres la gdamed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la spyod pa byed pa rnams kyad daste/ skyes bu dam pa de lta bu ni shin tu dka' ba byed pa'o// gang de'i thog
'dzin cing nyan pa de dag kyang/ nga'i nyan thos shin tu dka' ba byed pa yin no// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid du dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
ga ser lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu mtshan nyid brgyad dang ldan na/ byang chub semasarab la sems rab ba chen po gser yin no// brgyad gang zhe na/
cha chos la sems pa dang/ 1rtog cing gzhig pa dang/ 'alenacing 'dzin ba dang/ 3tha mal gyi zhu che ba dang/ 2rang gi slob da pon la byas pa gzo ba dang/ lta ba thams cad dar ma mthun pa dang/
[â]mtshan thams cad la khyad du gsod cing 'dul ba la mkhas pa dang/ mi rung ba thams cad sbyong ba dang/ 8'dod pa med pa'i sems bdi lta ste/ rmi lam na khu ba ma 'byung zhing/ tshul khrim
la gus par byed ba'i mtshan nyid de dag dad ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' gser yin no// yang mtshan nyid brgyad dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' gser yin te/ brgyud gang zhe na/
theg pa chen po ston pa dang/ 1de bzhin gshegs pa'i sAng po gsal bar ston cing gtong ba dang ldan pa dang/ bzang zang la ma brkam pa dang/ !byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga'
[482) ]ba dang/ gtang snyoms su ldan pa dang/ bsems can thams cad la bu gcig bzhin du blta ba dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa dang [â]sdig pa ba grogs po yongs su spang
ba dang/ tsarnyed pa dang/ bkur sti la chog shes pa ste/ dmtshan nyid brgyad po de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa ba gser yin no// yang mtshan nyid brgyad dang ldan n/ byang chub/
sems dpa' gser yin te/ brgyad gang zhen/ phan pa dang/ na ba dang/ 'jam bgosma ba dga' ba dang/ nyon mongs pa chung ba dang/ rnabazod pa dang ldan pa dar/ 2mdo sde'i
mtha' thams car nyan pa la bzod pa dang/ pha mag ga nyid b+hAl ba dar/ snyom las med de ltar zhing bag yodapa dang/ bslab pa la mos pa ste/ dmtshan nyid brgyad pa de dag dang ldan
na byang chub sems dpa' gser yin no// yang mtshan nyid brgyad dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' gser yin te/ brgyad gang zhe nA/ bden ba dang ba/ tsar ba dang/ 1gtsar sbra
byed pa dang/ 'amakhas pa dar 3 bod dang ldan zhing gzugs bzadab dang/ 3bud med dang 'grogs ba spyod ba dang/ bganyen gyi khyim nas rang du lta ba dang/ gtso ba de dang/ bdes sdug
pa de dag spyod thams cad la 'jig pa dar/ tsathos ma thag tu lus kyi spu langs par 'gyur ba dang/ 0srog chags thams cad la byams shing snyad brtse ba ste// mtshan nyid brgyud bod
ma'@#/ gdag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' gser yin no// yang mtshan nyid brgyad dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' gser yin te/ brgya dgar zhen/ bdud kyis
ga bshad pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'i bye brag shes pa dang/ mdo sde shes pa la bkur ste byed ba dang/ 2'dul ba dang 'dul ba ma yin pa'i bye brag ma'achab pa dang/ 'de
h+phe bzhin gshegs pas dgongs te gsungs pa la mkhas pa yin/ [â]de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa shes 'jig rten gyi phyir 'brang bar bya ba shes de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa nyid du
shis pa sdig pa dang/ sdig pa med pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba la mkhas pa/ yul dang/ dus dad 3 4yo shes dang/ bdag gi nus pa dang/ rab tu shis pa ste/ rnamtshan/
nyid brgyad po de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa'i gsar yin no// mtshan nyid bzhi bcu po de dag dang ldan te/ lus dran pa'i chos dang ldan pa de gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
klu gser zhes bya'o// gang la yon tan bzhi bcu yod de/ phyed dam phyed kyi yad phyed yod pa de ni/ theg pa chen la yang dag par bzhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dang/ gas kyi bu mor mag par bya ste/
byang chub sems dpar brtsi ba ni ma rtogs so// de bsan byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa na/ shan tudaka' ba byed pa'o// de la yon tan gyi mchog gang zhe na/ galen pa'i 'du shes/
ba0 medacing/ rmi lam na yang khu ba mi 'byung ba de ni/ rgyu dang bcas pa'i mir rig par bya ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad kyi yon tan gyi mchog go/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sor
mo' 'phreng ba la bdiskad ces smos so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bshad pa de'i don) gal te sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs
pa'i snyid po yodan/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas sugyur te/ sems can thams cad kyis srog gcod pa dang/ rdzun du sma ba dang/ chang btung ba dang/ 'khrig pa dang/ ma byin par
len pa dang/ mi dge ba'i las kyi lam thams cad byar rung ngam/ gal te sangs rgyas kyi dbyaras sems can thams cad la yod na/ gang gi tshe bsgral zhing rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ) gal te
sangs rgyas kyi dbyes yod na thams cad kyis kyang mtshams med pa dang/ 'dod chen po'i las bya bar 'gyur ro// gal te sems can thams cad la bdag ga dbyings yod na/ bdag nyid sgrol
bar 'gyur te/ las kyi rnam par smin pa la bdag ga dbyings med pas na/ de'i phyir 'jib rten dar/ bdag la dbyings med de/ thams cad la bdag med pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod de/ nyon mongs pa bye bas g.yogs nas/ bum pa'i nang gnad me bzhin du bdug go/
gzhan mar 'jam dpal ba dul sbyong byed ba'i bu tsag/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs de bzhin gshegs pa dgrwa brtson pa na da dbag par rtogs pa'i sa das rgyas kyis de
nas lo bdunan/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal kho tshos dad ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// nga yang zhag bdun na yodas su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes lud bstan nas/'dul sbyod byed pa'i da
rab tu dga' ba skyes nas/ bdag ni thams cad mkhyen pas 'a khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal bor lung bstan te/ gdon mi za bar 'gyur snyam nas dge ba rtes te/ rang gin la smras pa/ ma nya dang/
sha dang/ 'o ma dad/ til gyi ladu dad/ zho dad/ deb dang/ khu ba dang/ 'bru sa pa dag stsol cig/ stobs chen por bya'o zhes thams cad bsres te zes nas ( dus ma yin pa tsam gyis
shi nas bdag nyid sha ba/ bdag nyid kyis nyams par byas nas/ rtsi bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdzun gsung dam/ de sta thams cad mkhyen pa ba yan/ 'on tam gang de
la 'khor los sgyur ba'i dge ba de rtsa ba dang/ bsod nams rnam par smin pa med dam/ gsol pa// de sngon las ngan pa bgyis pas gum mo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/
'jam dpal de skad ces ma zer cig/ de ni dus ma yin pa'i tsham bab pa ste/ snon las rin pa byas pa ma yin no// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lung ston pa na/ des ston
0 las byas pa'i ma mkhyen par lung bstan de skan de ni sngon las ngan pa byas pas sha ba ma yin gyi/ bdag nyid kyis nyos te bdag gis ba/sad do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du/ skyes pa'am/
bud med kyang rung ste/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyid po bdag la yodapas/ de nyid sgrol bar 'gyur gyis/ sdig pa bya'osnyam ste/ sdig pa byas na de ci bdag gdabyings sgrol bar
'gyur ram/sngar bshad pa bzhin te/ 'dul sbyong byed pa'i bu ltar dbyes yod kyang ma sgrol lo// de ci'i phyir zhen/ de nyid bag med pa mad ba dag bag med pa'i phyi chos kyi dbyings kyi mi sgrol
lo ci sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyidabyings med dam/ sangs rgyas kyi na ras ni rgyal thabs kyi rnam pa sman pa bzhin sems can thams cad la yod do// sangs rgyas brdzun
gsung ba yin nam ) sangs rgyas nibardzun gsung ba ma yin te/ sems can brdzun smra ba rnams bag med par myos shing/ bstan pa thos nas kyad/ de dag rang gi nyes pas sangs/
rgyas thob par mi 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ sems can thams cad la ston bgyis pa'i las ma mchisashos bgyi 'am/ bka' stsal la/ mdo sde las yod ces 'khyud med kyi/ thos
pa tsam gyis grangs med pa 'i yang grangs med par byas ba'i las rnams zad par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyi dazhen/ de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa bye bgrangs med pa mang bo nas/ 'jig
rten gyi phyir dam bcas te/ bdag grol nas sems can thams cad dgrol go/ bdag brgalanasasemasawan h+phams cad bsgol lo zhes/ de ltar dam bcas
pa ba dge ba'i rtsa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma'i 'od kyigawa brjid kyis las byas pa ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang bad ltaste dper na/ 'jam dpal sbyin dang/
khug rnadang/ ba mo'adra ma dang/ nyes pa rnams ni tsam du nyi ma ma shar ba de tsam du 'jig rten la sgrib kyi/ nyi ma shar ma thag tuse golagatog sa ba sud kyis khrid par 'gyur ro// de bzhi

[ã ]du sdug pa'i phud pa grangs med par byas pa yang mdo sde 'di'i nyi ma ma sharang de tsam du sems can thams cad 'khor ba bye bar kun tu bakhor gyi/ mdo sde 'di'i nyi ma shar mkhrag tu sdig pa ba phud
po grangs med pa byas pa yang se gol gtogs pa'i srid kyis zad par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyad las 'phyis pa 'am/ bstang ba 'am/ kha gcus pa 'am//
gzhanagyi phyir 'brang ba'am/ 'di las phyi rol la gyur pa 'am/ phas pham pa 'am/ mtshams med pa byas pa gyur pa/ grangs med par sdig pa byas pa de yod thangacig tsam gyis
zad par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang de ba zhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i mtshan de thos pa tsam gyis kyang sems ma skyes pa lad byang chub sems dpa' 'gyur ro// de bsan
de bzhin gshegs pa de'i smon lam gyi bye brag gis bdag dang/ 'jig rten gyi phyir bdag grol nas grol// 'khor ba bye ba na ga nyid kyis leg pa bsams can rnams dam pa'i chos phye/
bsasadapar byas te/ 'jam dpal de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos pas/ byang chub sems dar na 'gyur te/ bdag gnyis kyis nyon mongs pa bye ba bcad pa ba phyir 'das pan
bya'o// de las nga yi lus 'dzin pa 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal ngas bshad pas ) ngas ni glu danagyi zug rngu gcad pa 'a lam bstan te/ da ba zhin gshegs pa ston pa lan gyis/ da khyed
kyis nan tan gyis shig ces rasalam pastan to// lam bstan pa rnam pa gnyis te/ rnam pa gnyis gang zhen/ nyan thos kyi sgrig pa'i lan dang/ [â]byang chub sems dpa' 'am go/ bde
la nyan thos kyi theg pa'i lam zhes bya ba 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i lam zhes bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po/
yod do// de yi dbyings su ngas ma g.yo ba thob pa ltar/ bde bar gshegs pas dag dongs pa'i tshul gyis nyon mongs pa bye ba gcad par bya'o// gal te ma bcad na nges par 'khor ba'i
'khor lor yongs su 'dun to zhes mya ngan gyi zug rngu gcad pa' la ba ngas bstan to// mya ngan ces bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i don to// gzug rngu 'byin pa zhes bya ba nad bzhin gshegs pa'i
[p]/ tshig bla dgas so// bdag gis nyon mongs pa bye ba gzhom pa ni sman pa ltar bskyag pa dang/ bkru pa dang/ brtol ba'i don byed pa ste/ khyed kyadarang bzhin gyis da la//
bsnyen bkur gyis shig dad/ sa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bshad dozhes bya ba ni don to// da khyed kyis nan tan gyis shag ces bya ba de na dgongs te gsungs pa'i don to// de bzhin
g.yashigs ban ston pa ba zhes bya ba yang skye ba bad tshod cig chod cig/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni u dum bA ra mi tog bzhin no// dad pa phun sum tshogs pa gser gyi ma bu ba zhan no/
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mnyes par byed pan du sbal zharab gnya' shing ga bu gar 'jug pa bzhin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyid po
mdo sde 'di don med par ma byed cig// tshe dang 'tsho ba'i 'bras bu yod par gyis shig/ bdag nyid srid pa thams cad dad/ nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad las sgrol cig/ de bas na de bzhin
gshegs pa ni ston pa ste/ bsod nams la g.yol ba byed kyang sdig pa la yid ma dga'// sa nyan thos kyi theg pa las bstan te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyid pon shan tu rid pa'i dka'o//
'jig rtenan dpe med de de lta bu r shin tu rnyed dka'o// 'jig rten na dpe med kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa snying po la myur du ltasos te de ltar gyis shig pa'i don to// sdig pas ma dga' ba/
zhes bshad pa de'i donatsa/ de 'i don bshad par byago/ sems narang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa ste/ dge slong rnams ma rig ba'i grogs po ston gyi/ nyes bas dri ma lnga la sogs pa dris
mang bos mdun du byas shing bskor to// dri ma lnga la sogs pa gang zhen/ ba dod pa dang/ [â]sred pa dang/ 'ganodasems mang ba dang/ snonug pa dang/ gnyid dang gsum ste/ ra sa dod pa dang/
como de ldan sems sun 'byin bko// dris lnga la sogs te ma mang bo rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya'o// sems can bzhin gyisarnam par dag pa'i dbang du brtson par bya'o

'dis pa rangs par zhes bya ba ni ji tsam dumado sde spyod bag mgyur ba dang/ jitsan du 'dod chen po'am gyur pa de tsam du bdag nyid bsgral ba'i phyir brtson par gyis shig/ tshig de'i donani 'di yin te/
sems bzhin du nyon mongs pa glo bur gyi dri ma bye ba rtsa ba nas brko ba ni/ris pa'angs bar zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don to/mi gtsodakyi sngon du 'gro/ da ga/yid kyi rang bzhin te gnoragatudang ba mig
byed pa dang ni smra bas de dag bde dang ldan pa 'gyur// grib ma bzhin du rjes su 'go/ nyan thos kyi thog b.las yid ces bya ba bstan pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyad bo zhes bya ba'i don
te/ yari rang bzhin gyis dag pa zhes bya ba de gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'o// de nichos thams cad kyi gtso bo ste/ chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
sad po'i nad bzhin no// yang yid rab tu dad pas byed pa zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa bye ba thams cad bcad de/ bdag gi dbyidas bstan nas gad rab tu dar ba ni
de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyid po nyid do// de nas phyis smra ba dang/ byed pas zhes bya ba ni sangs rgya sa thob nas gang skya bdar/ gang byed pa de thams cad 'jig rten na ba tu spel ba ste/
de'i tshe ji ltams grab ma mthong ba bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyid po mthong ngo// de bas na grib ma bzhin du rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ste/ tshigs su bcad pa de'i donani 'di'o//
zla yid ni chos kyi sngon du 'gro// yid la gtso yid kyi rang bzhin te ) yid ni rab tu 'khrugs pa yis// snus pa dad ni byas pa dag/ de ni bsdug bsngal ldan par 'gyur/ shing rta rab tu
drangs ba bzhin// tshigs su gcad pa de'i don ni nyon mongs pa bye ba'i don to// yidi khyadar ba tu 'khrugs zhesabya ba ni nyon mongs pa bye bas g.yogs pas 'khrugs shes bya'o// sems gang
gyur pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyen medas pa bye ba nang du zhugs pa'i don to// de nas skya ba dang byed pa thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phyir 'gro ste/ shing rtar ba du drangs pa zhes bya
ba ni ji ltar 'khor lob lag rjes su 'gro ba de bzhin du/ sdig pa'i bud bos 'khor ba'i thang la sa nasacan dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su sems can rnams rab tu 'khyam mo//
[z]/ de bas na bsod nams la g.yol bar byed kyang/ sdig pa la yid mi dga' ba zhes bya bar grub bo// gzhan yang 'jam dpal ba mi 'o ma la mar yod par rtogs pas ma rnams sbub la/
ci'i phyir chu la mi rnams srub ce na/ rdzas med pa'i phyir te/ de bzhin du 'jam dpal de bzhin bshegs pa risAd po yod pa de'i phyir/ mi rnams tshul khrims srung zhing tshadas par snyad ba
sbyod do// gzhan yang 'jam dpal la gsan 'dod pa rtog pa dang ldan pa brag la rol/ ci'i phyir shing lamaNi// rdob gser gyi dpyidas yod ba la no'i// shang ba/sar nad pa la/
mi kogo/ de bzhin du 'jam dpal dbyings yod pa la rtog pa'i mi rnams bdag/sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro snyam ste/ tshul khrims srung zhing tshadas khar sdod do// gzhan mad 'jam dbal
dbyings medanani/ tshas par spyod ba don med par 'gyur ro// lo bar chu la bsubs kyang snyam sa 'khyud pa de bzhin du/ gal te bdag gi dbyes med na/bdag la chags pas tshadas la
dang/ tshul khrims spyod pa rnams don med par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis gsal la/ tshangs par spyod pa tshangs par spyod bzhes bgyi ba de'i don ci lags/ ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
pas 'dod pa'on tan la rol ba spangs ) sor mo'i 'brer bas kyang gsol kha/lha dang ma mad bo nges pas des ltung ba'i chos sumkhyen nas 'dapa'i 'du shes spangs so// bam
[pp]// ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sor mo'i 'brer ba de skad ces ma zer cig// sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa skyed pa yod pas/ sems can
ka thams cad chos kyi sbyin yin no// bud med thams cad ni sring mo lan no// sor mo'i 'phreng bas gsol pa/ rgyal bo zas gtsang ma dang lha mo sgyum la lcam dral na/ ji ltar yab lus
ts+tso du gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ni 'jig rten gzhan bsgral ba'i phyir sgyu mkhyabs bstan to// 'di lta ste/ rgyal po'i gyod gnyis skugs stor btsugs te/ das
bcas bas gcig la gcig brdeg cing sa btsal ba'i tshul gyis skugs stobs 'phrog par ston pas/ rgyal po dang/ 'khor thams cad dga' bar byed na/ 'gro ba rnams kyis de'i bye brag
mi shes so// de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis thabs byas te/ yab yum dang/ bdag nyid skyes bu brtan por ston te/ denas phyis 'gro ba mang po lad srid pa'i rgya
[$ ]mtshom bzad pa las sgral na/ sems can rnams kyis de'i bye brag ma shes so// 'di lta ste/ rdzol ma la 'dus ra ba nang du skyes bu gar mkhan gar byed cing gar dang gtan gyi tshi/
su skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ ma ning du bgyur te/ 'gro ba mang po myur du mgu bar byed pa de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyad bdag gis lus la gar mkhan chen po lta
bur lus bstan te/ sems can bye ba mang po sgrol ba 1 sems can rnams kyis skyes bu'i thabs su mi shes so// 'di lta sterol mo la 'dus pa'i dbus su sgyu ma byed pas//
bdag nyid rnam pa mang po gcod cing rtse bas 'gro ba mang po dga' bar byas pa yang bsnad pa 'am thog pa yad med do// de bzhin du skya ma byed pa ltar bdag nyid sems can mang po la phan
par bya ba'i phyir/ bdag nyid sgyu ma sprul pa bstan to// mad 'jam dbal de bzhin gshegs pa na thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes thams cad ldan pas/ 'jig rten kun la legs pa/
rab tu gzigs nas/ thog ma med pa tshun chad 'khor bar 'pho zhing 'khyam pa na/ mar ma gyur pa med sring mor ma gyur pa med de/ ma tshang chung mar gyur/ bran yang phar gyur/ pha yad
bran du gyur te/ tshe rabs bye ba mang ngor 'tsho ba'i 'a jig rten nag mkhan bzhin bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshangs par sbyod pa mdzad do/
bam po bdun pa ste tha ma'o////gzhan yang 'jam dpalarang ga dbyengs dang lhan cig du 'dod chen po'i rgyud mo byas pa gang chud zad bdeb rags bzung ste/ sna ba
bzhin du 'gyur ro// bdaganyid mnang du skyes pa na/ bde ba de dang/ sdug bsngalagyi phung bo 'byung ngo// bud medal lang de bzhin gshegs ba'i snying po yod de/ skyes pa yang de
bzhin no/ bdag nyid kyis bzung nas sna ba bzhin du ca da bar 'gyur ran/ de'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi dbyings na dbyas gacig go/ tshangs par spyod/
ba brtsams te/ bag nyid gzhag pa ma 'gyur ba'i gan du de bzhin gshegs pa phyin to// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas dge bsnyen pha dang/
dge bsnyen ma thams cad tshangs par spyod pa la rab tu ma bkod ci'i slad du dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma dang/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma rnams ni ka ba bzhi pa'i khang pa lta bu s dam
zla pa'i chos kyi rgyur dpe bstanan/ sdig pa chen po yang rab tu 'byung bar gda' ste ci'i slad du dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyanam dag de ltar lhag par tu dga' bar gyur/ ci'i slad du yang dge
bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma rnams kyis 'dul ba'i chos bcas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de ni 'du shes gzhan te/ 'jig rtanagyi'adu shes kyi mang du
[& ]btags so// de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad sangs rgyus kyaganas la bkod kyang/ sgra gcan zin gyi tshul du 'dzan bar ma'agyur ro// sangasargyus kyi 'du shes
dang/ 'jig rten gyi 'du shes kyang tha dad te/ dri ba 'di ni ma tra ba zhes bya'o// 'jam dpal sems can thams cad kyi dbyedas lan pasan/ srogagacod pa spangs pa na sangs rgyas so//
rigs kyi bu ji ltar bdag gsod pa ltar/ 'jig rten na srog gcod la yang de bzhin te/ bdag nyid kyi dbyings ba jomo ba 'o// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das pa'i sud du sgra gcan
'dzin bzhin du mtshungs par gzags la/ bdag nyid kyi dbyings 'char ba skyon chags pa la mtshan can rnams chad pas gcod cing bsad par pa stan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkab stsakha pa/ rigs
kyi bu de skad ces ma zer cig/ de bzhinagashegs pa na sgra gcan 'a dzan dang mtshungs par gzigs so// 'di lta ste/ 'jam dpa la skyes bu chos 'dod pa zhig bdag nyid dus gnyis su za ba las/
la la zhig gis bstan te/ thas lanag par gyur na/ srin bu'i rigs brgyad cu gsod par 'gyur ro// ji ste de ltar gyur na/ de dag la srog ga son ba dag par ma 'gyur ro// gzhan yang 'jam dpal
shin tu bde ba 'dod pa'i bde ba de las phyir phyogs pa'i 'phags pa 'dod pa 'jom pa ni bdag gsod pa'o// gal te 'phags pa rnams de ltar gyur na/ pog gsod ba'i sdig par 'gyur go/ gal
ta' dod pa'i sems skyes tsade gzhan gyi dud du gnas te/ bdag 'dod pasems skyesan/ ji ltar bya zhes ma zer cig/ de ltas ngo tsha ba skye bar 'gyur// nga yi lus gcig yod kyad nud med kyang
rung/ dpa' bo ltar 'dug bas bdag gsod pa na/ bdag ga khams 'jom par 'gyur ram/ de ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bsod nams kyi phud po 'o// de bzhin du 'jam dpal
nyu// 'phags pa yang 'di ltar bdag gsod de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa'i dug gi phyir te/ gzhan gsod par ni mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyasakyi chos kyi tshig ni skyon
ka chags pa'i ya mtshan can dam pa'i chos 'jig pa rnams ba dag gi nyon mongs pa ma ba zad pa ltar/ de dag med par byed cing tshul ma yin par gnod pa'ang byed du 'jug ste/ de dag ni bdag la mchod
blo yin no// ji ltar bdag sdug pas 'dod pa dang/ bde ba dang/ zas dang/ srog 'dor ba de bzhin du bdag sprodas bar bdod pas// skyon chags pa'i ya mtshan can rnams chad pas gcod pa de ni/
da pazhin ga shegs bab snyad der dge pa yin no// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ tsade bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i slad du/ sangs rgyas rnams sha mgasol lam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ 'o jam dpal shin tu de bzhin te/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i khor bar ba khor ba'i tshe rabs de bdag la sems can thams cad mar ma gyur pa dang/ sring mor ma gyur pa gang yang
med do// khyir gyur pa yad phan gyur te/ 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten na bro mkhan bzhin no// de bas bdag ga ngesha dang/ gzhan gyi sha pad sha gcig pa yin pas/ sas rgyas rnams sha ma u0f7a/
gsol laso/ gzhan yang 'jam dbal sems can thams cad kyi dbyings na chos kyi dbyings te/ dbyangs gcig tu gyur pa'i risha za bar gyur pas/ sadas rgyas rnams sha ma gsol 'go
'jam dpal gyis gsol pa// sbrang rtsi dad/ dung dang lham dad/ dam gyi srin bu la sogs pa rang gi dbyings kyi sha ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal de/
skad ma zer gi/ sangs rgyas ni 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi lus spangs pa yin te/ sangs rgyas ni zang zing med paAnan/ chags ba'i rdzas ca la yabasten pa de ni gnas ma yin te/ zang zing
la sten pa na thabs kyi chos nyidado// 'di rdzas cab nas gcig tu 'ongs pa la ba snyan par byed de/ rdzas gang nas 'byung ba de dang der bsnyen par ma bya ba// gsad pab lag ma yin par gcig nas
gcig tu 'ongs pa ni bsnyon du rung ngo// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ tshod dus gcig na lham mkhan gyi ko ba las lham drubs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas la phulan/ gcig nas gcig tu 'chis pa de ba zhes sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ gal te ma ho da ngos bzhin du gumanas/ ma ha bdag po gdol pa las/ ko ba
blangs te/ lham mkhan stsal nas lham du drubs te/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa la stsal na/ de gcig nas gcig tu mchis pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ma de
chos bzhin du shi bar gyur la/ ma te bdag pos lham 'drub du bcug nas/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa la byinan blad par bya 'am/ 'on te ma blangs na dge slong dang 'thun nam/ snying rje med pa yin
00 @#// te tshul khrims ra la bar mi 'gyur ba ma yin no// 'jam dbal gyis gsol kha/ rmo bko ba yang bgyin ma rung ngo// chu mgatsang bas btsos pa'i zas kyang ma byung ngo//
de ltar lags na dge slong dag la de lta bu gda'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de ni 'jig rten gyi 'du shes zhes bya ste// gal te dge bsnyen mo dan ni zas dang skom chu gtsang ba
dang sbyor gcig/ gang na dge bsnyen yod par rmo bko ma bya'o// gang na dag bsnyen med pa der sangs rgyas kyis kyang ji ltar bya/ thad la yang srog chags yod/ chu'i nang na yod srog chags yod/
nam mkha' la yod srog chags yod de// gal te de ltar rnam par dag pa grub pa rnams la sdig par 'gyur doram/ rnam par dag pa grub pa de dag ji ltar rgyu/ de na 'jig rten na ma dri ba zhes
bya ba'i dri ba 'o// 'jam dbal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang ring zhag tshud chad badrag nyi sha za ba la mi gnas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/
rgyu gang 'jig rten pa la sangs rgyas kyi tshig dang 'thun pa yod pa de gad thams cad du thams cad sangs rgyas kyi tshig tu dag par bya// 'jam dpal 'jig rten ba rnams kyang thar pa rjed do//
de dag la thar pa medakyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la thar pa yod do// de dag la yang rab tu 'khyud ba yod de/ de dag ga ra da tu 'byung ba ma yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la
[/]ni rab tu 'byung ba yod do// 'jig rten pa la la dag la ni bdag nyid za ba'o zhes brjod de/ de yang bdag nyid kyi sha la ma za ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la ni bdag nyid kyi sha la za bar/
nges so// 'jam dpal 'jig rten du ya mtshan can thamasacad 'byung ba/ mdo sde 'delas bstan pa nyan 'dod dam/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpa la sngon 'das pa'i dus na byung ba grangs med pa'i bskal pas kyang ches grangs med pa/ bskal pa yangs pa bas ches 'das pa/ dpag tu med pa bas
kyang chos dpag tu med pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ke san ta bzad po zhes bya ba 'pho rten du glod 'di'i byud ste/ de'i tshon mtshan can med cad ya mtshan can gyi med pad med/
do sems can theg pa chen po pa'agyur te/ sems can rnams shin tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir lo sad du ba zhugs nas
yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bstan pa yud lamadu duganas nas/ dam pa'i chos nub par gyur pa'i tshe/ dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa bri ba'i
dus na chos ma yin pa'i phyogs 'phel ba'i tshi/ dge slongosangs rgyas kyi blo gros zhes bya ba zhig dgon pa na gnas te/ dge slongodi lasems canadage ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa gcig gis
[gT ]/na thadamed pa'i gos byin nas/ dge slong des rjes su gzung ba'i phyir blangs te/ ashin 'dar ba'i drung nas phar bstan te song ba dang/ e shan 'od 'a mig
ka gos de mthong nas sems bzlog ste/ nub gomun khung na dge slong de'i thad du song ste/ gos de phrogs nas ri khrod du khrid de gcir bun khyud nas/ shade'alag pa gyen du dam par
blobacings te song ngo// de'inub mo mun khudan ma tog thu ba'i bram ze skyen pa thogs to/ 'brog dgon par 'das nas naganasate/ tsam pa ka zhig gi drung na stag 'dug pas skrag ste/
stag des bsad 'a sdug pa dang/ ci thad du bros te bdag nyid rab tum dag zhing song song na/ dge sbyong gcer bur bcings pa mthong nas ) kyi ma dge spyod dgon pa pa/ ! dus snyig can 'di
'ongasan/ na smig rgyal mtshanagyis nigyur par mi 'gyur ba lta zhig snyamaste/ lag pa bskyed nas gcer bur byung la// dka' thub spyod par bya'osnyam nas/ lam 'di nges par thar pa'i
rgya lam du legs par grub pa yin nam/ zhes dam pa'i chos zhig pa'i phyir bdag gi gos ngan pa bor te/ skya btogs nas mgo rag gtso bu ba 'i dge sbyong du gyur te/ de las dge sbyong gcer bu
pabyung ngo// dge slong de bdag nyid ba cings pa khrol nas/ shing shun khrangs tes ser pos rgyugs nas/ thad la 'gro ba bram ze zhig gis mthong nas/ sngar bshad pa bzhin du mthong ba dang/
'din dur smig gyon pa'i dge sbyongaste/ na ga bar la btsag gis byugs te songan/ kha ba'i lam ni 'di yin pa snyam ste/'di dge bar 'grub bam/ sezhes de kun tu pagyur te/ de las
chur ba dug kun tu brgyu ba byung ngo// dge slong phyem red chur zhugs te/ rang gi klad pa'i rma chus bkrus nas/ sgra 'jam pos klad pa'i rma g.yogs te/ sbyal bsad ba'i ras ba lang rdzis bon

ba gyon te/ khrus byed pa de skyes bu shed bu ba gzhan zhigegags mthong ste/ snga ma ltar dge slong de nyon mongs ba mthong nas/ dge sbyong 'di na dur smrig gyon te/ rgyal mtshan dur smrig gis ni thar par
na 'gyur ba snyan du bsams nas/ ra la pa ra da bar byas te/ rtswa gas gon nas dus gsum du khrus byed pa'i dka'athung spyod pa yid la bzung nas// de dge ba yin nam zhes 'ad nyid thar pa bi
gam ste/ ga zhan ma yin nozhes dka' thub can du gyur te/ de tshun chad ya mtshan can dka' thub byed pa byung ngo// dge slong de tshur zhugs te rma mang po thams cad la rnag gas yog sta/ rang gi lus
rdul gyis gang zhing sbrangam 'du zhing/ dge spyod de sku 'jam pos g.yogs pa mthong nas/ mur 'dug spyod pa dang/ phyugs bdag la rnams de ltar byur ngo// dge slong de ba lad galci ba yod//
ma'i me bus te/ bsro ba skyes bu nyon mongs pa gzhan zhig gas mthong nas/ ba lang galci ba'i ro la bu can thog ma de nas byung ngo// dge slong de rma la sdug bsngal reg par shes nas/
dpa' bo ltar bdug pa/ skyes bu nyon mongs pa gzhan zhig gis snga ma bzhin du mthong ste/ dur smig gyon pa natsan bar ma gyur ro snyam nas/ legs par 'gro 'am snyam/
ka ste mi lo ba'i sa ra 'gro ba thar pa yin snyam du bsams nas ) mgayo ba'i sa mya ngan du 'gro bar gyur to// de ltar ya mtshan can dgu bcu rtsa drug gi lta bar gyur pa rnams kyang so so nas de lhag

zlobate dge slong de ci dang ci lta bamathong nas// log pa'i lta bas gzhan dang gzhan du brtags so// 'di lta ste dper na)phan tshun du ni dgas su mthong nas la dgas gsar snyam du bsamA te/gcig la gcig
gsod pa de bzhin du ya mtshan can dgu bcu rtsa drug kyang de ltar byung ngo// dper na dbyar zla ra ba la dugs rnams smig rgyu ba la yin snyam du bsams te/ mchi bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du dam pa'i chos/
nub par 'gyur bab dusan/ dge slong gi gzhi las gzhan du 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal de ltar 'jig rten pa ba tshul khrims dang/ spyod pa dang/ bya ba'i mchob ga thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi sprul
pa'o// dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus na/ de lta bu rgyudan chos nub par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du bdag gi de kho nan ba 'dra de 'dra'o// zhes log par lta ba bzhin du/
'di lta ste/ thar pa dang/ bdag dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa khong ldem po dag ma shes pas/ bdag med pasangs rgyas kyi tshig go zhes ur 'dug byung ba ltar rnam par rtog go/ rjes su
dbag pas tshugs pa'i 'jig rten pa la yang g ti ga ga chos kyi dbang du song ngo// 'jig rten las 'das pa la yang ldem po dag tu bshad pa'ang shes pas/ shes pa nyams te de'i phyir phyogs
gnyis spangs te/ bdag tu rtogs pa'i chos kyi de kho na nyid dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang dge 'dunagyi de bzhin gnyid ni de bzhinagashegs pa'i thig pa dbu ma'i lam du bstan to//
dbu ma'i lam zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po'i bla dgas so// sor mo'i 'phred bas sbas ba/ dbu ma'i lam ma shes pas/ sems can rnams dbu ma gzhan du rtagag/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sor mo'i de phreng bas mdo sde 'di bshad pa thos nas/ sems can mang du mdo sde 'di la yid ches par 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i dusan sems can mang du mdo
sde 'di la smod par 'gyur ro// sor mo'i 'phrod pas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das phyogasagad du mdo sde la skyed pa ji snyed 'byung ba dang/ 'dod chen ba ji skad 'byung ba bshad du gsol/
phyogs gang dus nas can thams cad la phan par 'gyur ba ston pa yang de bzhin gshegs pos bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma 'ongs pa'i dusan yu lagyis
dbus 'dir mdo sde la smod pa'i sems can bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'byung ngo// 'dod chen babye ba phrag bdun 'byung ngo// shar phyogs su mdo sdel smod bstodaphrag dgu bcurtsa
u// brgyad bskyung ngo// 'dod chen pa bye ba phrag bdun babyung ngo// lho phyogs sumado sde la spyod pa stod phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'byung ngo// 'dod chen pa bye ba phrag drug cu/

'byung ngo// nub phyogs su mdo sde lasnyed pa bye ba brgya phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu 'byung ngo// byang phyogs su mdos la smod pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'byung ngo// 'dod chen pa bye ba phrag bzhi
bcu 'byung ngo/ kha che ba'i yul du yad nga'i bstan pa glegs bam lhag ma'i mdzod dang gtor ma skyor ro// b+ha ru ka tsam yang nga'i glegs bam lhag ma'i mdzod du bsgyu 'o// ri b+han d+hu la yang
de bzhin no// kha che yul gyi dge slong rnams sgrubs pa 'i don mi shes nas/ theg pa chen po thams cad la smod pa 'byung ste/ nga la bskur pa de ji lta bya zhes pa yang ngo tsha ba skye'o/ lho phyogs/
pa'i rgyud tu theg pa chen po ston par 'gyur te/ nan tan snying por byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyad pa spyod ba/ dngos po chen po brgyad dang bral ba ! de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang//
ther zug dang/ zhi ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bstan pa'o zhes ston par 'gyur ro// nga yi nyan thos dge slong dang ) dge slong ma dang dge snyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma rnams
nan tan snying por byed par 'gyur ro// nga yi bstan pa khur du thogs par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ kyes bcom ldan 'das lho phyogs su bcom ldan bdas kyi bstan pa/
0 gnas par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ bam dpal de bzhin te/ lho phyogs pa'i rgyud du nga la bstan pa la du ma zhig gnas par 'gyur ro// khyod lta bu shin tu dka'/
ba byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang gi srog btang nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa ther zug dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsung drung ngo zhes
sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston par 'gyur te/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rgyal srid chen po
mi bzhed cing khur chen po thogs te/ stong gsum pa rnams bsgral lo zhes bskal pa bye ba mang por bskal pa de bzhin du/ nga yi nyan thos thams cad kyang bskal pa bye ba mang par nga'i dam ba'i/
chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus na nam dam pa'i chos brgyad cu'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ba'i tshe/ dam ba'i chos kyi khur khyer bar 'dod do/[7]5/da 'jam dpal khyod lta bu ni dam pa'i chos la
brgyad cu'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ba'i tshe/ dam pa'i chos kyis khugachen po khyer te/ bdag gis dam pa'i chos phrag la bkur ro snyam nas/ 'dzam bu gling dang/ gling phran thams cad kyi
sems can rnams la ) de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying bo rtag pa ther zug zhi ba ) g.yu'adud yin nozhes rang gi srog kyang btang ste/ rab tu bstan par bya'o// sems can rnams yod
ca @#// ches kya rung mchis kyad rung [7 ]pa'i lus bsad dam/ dum bur byas kyang rung/ gdod bdag gi lus rtag pa'i skur 'gyur te/ khur khyer ba rab tu dka' ba byed pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' rnams lho phyogasakyi rgyud nas 'gyur ngo// nga'i nyan thos de lta bu dar/ khyod la sogs pa sems can bye ba mad po yod de/ de'i phyir lho phyogargyud gyi rab tu bsngags so//
nga'i chos thamaden ston par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag ga mthu dang )gzi brjid kyis 'dzam bu gling gi skye bo ma lus par 'dzes pa dang/ 'jigs pa dang/ nga rgyal gyi rgyus
nan tan du byed par 'gyur ro// 'a da lta sa dper na/ rgyal po dag rgyal po gzhan gyis khrims byas pa thos nas// bdag nyid kyang skye dgu spyod pa de bzhin du/ kha che'i yul gyi 'khor dang/
yul khyu du ka tsa ba rnams kyang ngo tsha ba dang/ nga rgyal bskyed nas theg pa chen pos 'jigs shing skrag pas gsangs te bston par 'gyur gyi/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyid po ston par mi
'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dparan// ga bur gyi phung po'i nang du me bcug na/ srog ma'i phung po'i dbus tshag pa'i lhag ma lus te[7 ]mtha' 'khor ma tshig pa de bzhin du//
'jam dang la dang por nga skyes pa'i sa na nan tan lhur byed pa zhig ste tshig pa las lho phyogs kyi rgyud du lhag ma lus te/ mtha' 'khor na gnas pas der byang chub sems dpa' skyes nas
dam pa'i chos 'byin par 'gyur ba de rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang bar grags pa yin no// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa 'i g.yog mang po dang bcas te/
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ma da dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lha'i mchod pa chen po byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
tod ngabcom ldan 'das bdag gis mdosde 'di bsrung zhing rjes su gtad par bgyi'o// sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pas mdo sde 'di'i mde
bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kobu sha ka mdo sde 'di'i ming sor mo'i 'phreng ba la phan pa zhes bya bar bzung shig// ko'u shaka mdo sde 'di ni 'jig rten na shin
tu rnyed bar dka' ste/ u dum bA ra'i me tog bzhazhin/ de nas dbang po'i bu thu bo mngon du bo zhes bya ba sdug padag 'kha yid du 'ong ba des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'a mang pos
phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltarar dag gi pha nomA lha ma yin dad 'thab pa'i tsha/ kha la sbyar babasam 'dzin pa zhes bgyi ba la lha rnams 'phel la
dang/ lha ma yin bas par 'gyur bde ltar shing rta drongs shigaces bgyi ba dang/ lha gzhan du ma dgongs shig/ bdag ni snga 'du sa ste/ khyod ni smad kyis so// grub kyang rung ma grubakyang
bya/ gdung ste bdag gi srog kyang bor gzhan dang mdza' ba yang sbas nas/ go cha chen po bgos pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kyad ma mchis pa'i dus na//
dam pa'i chos brgyad cu'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ bdagakyad byang chub sems dpa'agad de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa nyid dang/ thar zug nyid dang/ g.yung drung nyid du de bzhin
gshegs pa'i snying po ston pa las de slad kyis snyam du sems skyes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyid pa bstan par bya ba'i bstan ba'i sems can mang por ma ba dug gas/ dan mi bstan to/
snyam ste de'i thabs byas ba thos nas// bdag kyang skyes bubasam 'dzin ces bgyi ba de 'brab r chos kyi shing rta sbyar te/cis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyod po rtag pa nyid dang/ the'akhrug
pa nyid dad/ g.yud drud nyid dang/ zhi ba nyid du 'jig rten du rgyas par 'gyur ba de ltar bdag gi srog kyang btang ste/ bdag gi dge slad ga tshulagyis bstan cing bskal pa thams cad du/ rnam
par dag par bgyis par gyur ca'i// de nas dbang po khumang po dang/ bud med dang/ bu mo dang [7 ]lha gzhan dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom
ldan 'das bdag cag/kyad srob kyad btang ste/ dge slong gatshul dang/ dge slong ma'i tshul dang/ dge bsnyen gyi tshul dang/ dgakhasnyen ma'i tshulagyis skyes bu dam pa de'i g.yog 'tshal
lango bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal// legs se legs so// rigs kyi bu dam pa 'i chos 'dod pa khyed thams cad de bzhin gyis shig// ngas kyag pa dam pa'i chos 'dod/
pa de dag bsrud par bya'o// de dag gi thad du da rtag tu bag cir gnas so// khyed rnams cis kyang kha la sbyar ba dang/ nga'i bsam shes shing brtan par gyesal denas khyed thamasacan
kyis rtag pa'i gnas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas yin no zhes ston pa/ des lul mdzod bzhin gyi rgyal po gsalargya la gyis/ blon po dang/ dmag dpon la sgo ba/ dpung
gi tshigs kyi yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig dong la/ mi'i thugs sun po ba gnyis stod du gcig gis mtshadang bsad de/ sor mo'i ra phreng ba byas nas/ khrag gis bskus shade stobs
dad rtsal chen po rab tu 'khyam zhing grong khyer 'di nas/ gnag pa'i dgangos pa zhi bcu tsam na 'dug cing/ bdag gi lad der bsad de/ mnyis stod du tshadabar bya 'osnyam nasaM/ de nang tu
ga'o zhes khrag gis ma rus pa sdig can gtum po 'dibasadan gdod bdagacig grung dang grong khyer dang/ ri khrod kyi grong dang/ lud pa 'ganas na dmag mams cad rang gi khyim nas//
'byung go/ de bas na bya khras bya go dang/ bya bran skrag pa bzhin du bdag cag gi skye bo thams cad dar/ shid thun dang/ tsa rnga ba dang/ yul gzhan gyi mi dang/ skye 'gron pa'i rnamA
[r/gy]// kyang de rim de tsam gyis mi rgyud zhing ma smra bar gyur cing 'dug gis myur du sbyin b khre ste/ mul mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal la na lag bzhi pa'i dadu da
ka ga tshogs dang lhan cig tu chas te/ srin po ma rungs pa gtum po sar mo 'i 'phreng ba bsad par byon gyis/ bkrags pa thams cad kyayal gru dang/ gzhu dang/ rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang/
sgro mdung thung dang/ phub la ga na thogs te mtshon cha dang/ lag cha thams cad rnon por byas te/ legs par chos la shog shig/ gang gis sun gom nudas pa sor mo'i 'phrod pa bsad dam/
mtshon gyis btab bam bgad gzhon pa dag skyas sam/ gang dag smras kyang g.yul las phyir mi ldog na/ ba glang bdod na yang ba glang gi mchog sbyin no// rta 'dod na yang rta bzhon pa sbyin
no/ gsar 'dod na yang gser dang/ gser gyi dong tshe dang/ zho nam sa ya sbyin no// dngul 'dod na yang dngul sa ya sbyin no// rdo rje dang/ nor bu dang/ dung dang/ man shel dang/
bya rgyu dang/ ni po che sna bdun yasnyed sbyin no// gos 'dod pa la yang lha'i gos dang/ dar dang ras phran ko tam pa dang/ yul 'badakA'i sa dad/ u'am du ba dang/ ba nu gtso dang/
bi'ang dra dang/ lho phyogos pa dang/ sang kang ka dang/ ku ru ban tshar 'gas bam rnam pa mang po sbyin no// zhing dor dang/ grong dar/ ma dang/ bud med 'dod pa'ang thams cad kyis rtog
sbyin no zhes bsgrags so// de nas sar me la 'phreng ba'i ming tsam gyis zham 'ing ba lagatog pa sgrig ste/ gcig kyang phyir ma byung ngo// btsun mo'i 'khor dang/ zhagand ba yar gyi dang/
'dra bar gzhan gyi dbang du gyur bas/ 'tsho ba 'chi ba 'khrug par gyur te/ rang rang gi lag chags nas (baglang ba dang/ rta pa dang/ dpud bu chung ba rnams rab tu brgyan te/ rgyal po ga la
der 'ongs so// de nas btsun mo yid kyi hud 'bod cing/ sdig can de'i gan du ma bzhud cig/ skye ba thams cad dang/ gzhan gyi yul 'khor rnams nam mchis khyad ma mdo la/ lha lachung
zad nodas pa byud nga re/ de nas mo 'debs pa dang/ le rtse ba dang/ bdun na bden pa dang/ ga ba dang/ ltas 'debs pa rnams la/ sar mo'i 'phreng ba de ring sod dam ma sod dris na//
mo 'debs pa dang/ la rtsab mas kyi de 'ad sor mo'i 'phreng ba thal bar 'gyur ro zhes smras so// de nas rgya la pe de dag gi tshig la ladam ches nas/ bcom ldan 'das la ba der lan
lag bzhi bo da dung ga tshogs kyi danag dang lhan cig tu song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan bdes kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ rgyal po'i snying 'jigs shing skrag pasagadong dang
rapral brdul te phyogs ga cig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thams cad dang ldan pas/ yul mdzod 'a dzan gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces
[j]bya/ bka' stsal to// rgyal bo chen po khyod kyi gdod dang dpral ba rab tujul na tsag/ rgyal pos gsol pa/ lag pa 'di rkang pa 'di lags na/ bcom ldan 'das
ka sor mo'i 'phreng ba zhes bgyi ba sun bom stod dgu brgya bkum nas/ sor mo'i 'phreng ba brgyus te 'phreng ba thogs// bdag dad 'thab ces sdod cing mchis so// bdag la 'du ba thamA
rgyu cad kyi skad bcad do// shing ashoka' drud na gcig po mchis pa/ bya rog dar khra 'khor ba de'i ming tsam gyis skrag te/ bdag gis gsol pa de lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis/
mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal bo gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po tsa 'thab mo byed par 'dod dem/ rgyal bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal snga nas tshad ma
lags so// bcom ldan bas kyis bka' stsal pa// rgyal bo chen po dbang 'gro 'am/ rgyal pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan bdas gshegs so zhes bka' stsal pa ni/ sems can
mang bo la skal ba mches pa lta ste/ da nasar mo'i 'phreng ba de yad gum lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal bo chen bo ga gal te sor mo'i ba phreng ba 'di'i 'das na
ji ltar bya/ de nas yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs sAd rab tu dngang skrag nas/ rgyal bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid shes pas snying dga' ste/ ma 'jigs nas
[4 ]/ rgyal bos gsol pa/ sor mo'i 'phreng ba gal te 'dir mchis nagayi lus par 'gyur lags grang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal la bka' stsal
pa 3 rgyal po chen po sor mo'i 'phreng 'di'i dpal la ltos// de nas mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/ sor mo'i 'phreng ba la rade zhig tu mag ma 'dzugs par bltas na/
sor mo'i 'phred ba'i mig dmar la bdag nyid che'i gzugs mthong nas/ mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal pogasal rgyal shin tu 'jigs shing skrag ta/ basbu'ang langs nas la dgas 'dul ba ltar
go cha rnams zhig cing mtshon thams cad shubs nas phyud ste/ mda' stebultar thams cad du ltung ba yad/ byi la ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sadag khri'i drung du mchis so// de
bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan zin bzhin du snyoms par gzigs la skyabs su mchi'o// de nas yan lagabazhi pa'i dbudag tshogs thams cad sgra de thos na/ glang bo dang/ rta dang/
ba glang dang [7 ]rkang thang pa'i dmag de rnams sdegyes pa bzhin du nyams te/ la la na rgyal/ lal na 'gyel/ la la ni'achi la thug par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod
'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal bo chen po tshigs su bcad pa 'di nyon cig dang/ gnod pa med par 'gyur gyis ma skyagashag/ gang zhig snga na bag med pa/ bag/
tsa/ u// yod par ni phyis 'gyunan/ sbyin las byud ba'i zla ba bzhin/ 'jig rtan 'di na snang bar byed//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo thams cad dbugs dbyud
ba'i phyir/ 'jigs pa med pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od gzer btang ste/ sems can gang 'od gzer des reg pa'i sems can de dag nyams cad bde bar gyur to/ mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal
smyo bo gsal rgyal gyi btsun mo'i 'khor dad/ bu dang/ grongagi skye bo sems can khams cad de bzhin gshegs pas/ sor mo'i 'phreng ba btul 'phosnyam ste thams cad der lhags so// de
nas rgyal bo gsal rgya la gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das ni 'dul zhing kha le sgyur ba/ lha dang mar bcas pa rnams ston pas//
snyeg pa'i chos can 'di lta bu la dam pa'i chos la bzhag pasan/ kyis bcom ldan 'das ni 'jig rten thams cad la phan par mdzad pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
rgyu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtan pas sngar bag med pa lta bu r bstan la/ phyis bdag gi che ba nyid kyang ston pas/ de 'jig rten na sprin las grol ba'i zla ba lta bu r
mdzes danagyur te/ sems can bye ba mang bo bsgral nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid kyang ston to// rgyal po chen paser mo'i 'phredab na stagacen ma yin te/ thabs 'chang
ba'i byang chub sems dpa'asams dang ba chen po zhes bya'o// rgyal po chen pos gsol pa/ mkhan po'i mchis brad dang lhan cig tu las ngan pa sbyod cade/ mkhan po'i dmod pa'i
chos kyi 'dor gyun/ ci'i slad du sdug par 'gyur/ btsem ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sor mo'i 'phreng ba mkhan po'i chung ma dang lhan cag tu las ngan pa sprod pa ma yin
gyi mkhan po'o chudams gzugs mthong nas/ soms gyur te/ sdig pa rab tu byed pa ltar mkhan po'i chos kyis rtse bar thams cad rtog par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po de'i phyir
byang chub sems dang 'a na 'dilta ste dper na/ glang po che brdeg pa na bong bus ma bzod do// de bzhin du rgyal po chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa ma'i mchog grubapo chos dgongs te/
gsudas pa'i/ gsad ba'i sa phog pa 'ad nyan thos dad/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma bzod do// de ltan/ de bzhin gshags bas dgongs te/ gsungs pa'i
gsadabs phog pa bad de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bzod do// rgyal bo chen pos sa rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lha phyogs legs sugang+gA'i klung drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi sad/
rgyas kyi zhing bdas pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams na po tsho thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
[9 ]gapa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad mthong na dga' ba mngon par 'phags pa brtson pa chen po zhes bya bad ltar bzhugs pa 'tsho zhing gzhes te/ den nyan thos dang/
rad sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mod/ theg pa cig las theg pa gzhan gyi mad yod med/ rga ba dang ! na ba dang/ smrag bsngal yang mod/ pad ma bde ba la dmad/ rab shubade bathams cad
sbyo dang ldan te/ sems can de dag tshe dpag tu med/ sems can de dag thams cad kyi gzi brjid dang/ kha dog tshad mod de/ 'grobade dgag dpe dang/ rgyu ba dang/ byed pa med pa dang/
'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa lta bu dang med de ) de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad mthong na/
dga' ba mngon par 'phags pa brtson pa chen pa de la/ rgyal po chen po thal mo sbyar la rjes su yi rad bgyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni sor mo'i 'phreng pa 'di nyid yin te/
de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi che bde 'braste 2 sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bsam gyis ma khyab po// de nas lha dang/ ma dang/ lham yan du bcas pa rnams dang/ nyan thos dang/ bya tshul/
sems dpa' rnams dang/ mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal dang/ yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs dang bcas pas mo 'debs pa dang/ lo rtsa ba rnams la kye ma brdzun smra ba
khyed da yi drung na ma gnas shig ces brgyadacing smad nas bsnyad do// de nas lha dang/ mdang/ lha ma yan du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang/ nyanathos dang/ dad sangs
rgyas kyad/ mdzod 'dzan gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal dang/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ tshod dus dang/ lud pa'i ba rnams dang/ ri khrod pa dang/ mnyan du yod pa'i yul na gnas
ba'i sems can thams cad de bzhinagashegs pa'i mthus lhags te/ sor mo'i 'phred ba'i rkad pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dgagasol
to/ mtha' yas sku mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// thabs kyi sku mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sor 'breng khyod kyi zhabs la mgos gtugs nas/ khyod kyi 'jam pa'i
zhabs la bzod par gsol ! de bzhin gshegs pa sor 'phreng mtshan 'dzin pa/ bram ze'i gzugs kyis bdag cag don phyir gshegs// sangs rgyas sku mdog dpal
'bar deng 'dir gshegs/ dpal ldan gazi brjid mthumanga' khazed par gsol// tshig gis mngon du gsung ba mtha' yas sku// khyed ni yang dad pa da byid mdango la[7]yang
dgag sangs rgyas skyabs med skyabs su gyur// gnyen med rnams kyi gnyen du gyur pa khyod// sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'das pa nyis mdzes to// 'di ni chos spyod shin tu ngo mtshar
rmad/ me las partoskye ba ngo mtshar bzhin// 'jig rten sangs rgyas gnyis ston mchog de 'dra// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal bo//
gsal rgyal la bka' stsal pa/ ltos rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byad phyogs lags su gang+gA'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyatsa ma snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
'das pa na )'jabag rten gyi khams rtag par r btu dga' ba sku ga cing mos pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshogasaM pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mos
pa rab tu dga' ba'i sAd po nor bu rin po che rnags pa'i rgyal po de ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de na/ nyan thos dad [7 ]rang sangs rgyas thams cad med/ theg pa gcig/
las theg pa gzhan gyi mad yod med/ rga ba dang na ba dang/ sdug bsnga lab yod med/ bde ba thams cad dang rab tu ldan par gyur ta/ sems can de dag tshe dpag tu med/
rgyu gzi brjid dang/ kha dog dpag tu med/ 'jig rten na dpa dang/ rgyu dang/ byed pa med de/ rtag tu dga' zhing mos pa dang/ dpe med pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mos pa rab tu dga' ba'i snying bo nor bu rin po che brtsegs pa'i rgyal po da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhade gzhes pa de la/ rgyal po chen po thal mo
0 sbyor te rjes su yi rang bar byos shig/ dbazhin gshegs pa de gzhan ma yin gyi/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid yin no// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang/
sor mo'i 'phreng ba gnyis ming gang gis thos sam/ de la rtag tu phyag 'tshal na/ sems can de dag ga khyim nyid du dga' ba can gyi 'jig rten mthong ste ngan 'gro rnam pa
bzhi'i sgo bcad par 'gyur ro// de gnyis kyi mdathos nas/ phyi rol pa rnams dang/ phas pham pa rnams dad/ mtshams med par gyur pas 'phya ba 'am ) bstang ba 'am/
'dran tor ram/ gzhan gyis bzlas sam/ rnyed pa dang/ bsur sti dang/ tshigs bcad kyi phyir mad rung ste/ de dag gas ngan 'gro bzhi'i bcad par 'gyur ro// rab gas
kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis 'di gnyis kyi ming gis bsrudapar byas na/ dgon pa thams cad dang/ 'jig pa'i dus thams cad du yang bcud brda 'gyur ro// phyis
'jigs pa thams cad kyad pa srung ba'agyur/ba pa byung ba thams cad kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro//lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za nama'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dad/ sha zas kyang ma tshugs so//
yad bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod 'dzinagyargyal po gsal rgyal la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kyi tshig ni che ba'i bdag nyid do// byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i che ba'i
[/ ]@#// bdag nyid ni da ltag/ sor mo'i ba phreng ba dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i che ba'i bdag nyid glang po che 'di gnyis la rjes su la dad bar gyig la
ka byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang skyos cig/ sor mo'i 'phreng ba'i ma yang ma brjed par gsos shig/ ngas sor mo'i 'phred b.lag nas/ de'i ma rgan me thar par byas te/
sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyod kyis ma ma gsod cig/ bsad pas mtho ris su mi 'gro'o zhes bya ba dang ) ralagri thogs te 'ongs nas skad cig de nyid la de'i bar du 'dug pa ni chos la
bzhugs pa'i thabs so// de nas sor mo'i 'phreng ba ma ta la bdun tsam gyi nam mkha' la 'dug nas/ tshags su bcad pa 'di zhes smras so// de bzhin gshegs kyi
ma'i sprul pa ni// sams can mad po dag gis ma shes te/ sangs rgyas sgyu ma'i rgyal bo sku che zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa thabs kyi sku mda'o// de skad ces smras nas de
nyid du ma snang bar gyur to// de nas mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyalagyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ni sgyu ma lags sam/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal bo chen po ma 'di na sprul pa yin no// sprul pa'i mas ji ltar smras pa bzhani te/ byang chub sems dpa'i sbyid pa sgyum yang de bzhin no
0 de nas sor mo 'phreng ba'i mkhan po nor bu bzang po zhes bya ba ta la bdun tsam gyinan mkha' la 'dug nas tshig 'di skad ces skyas so// sed ge dang lha 'dre yun na de zhig tumadza'
bor byas kyang/ des seng ge'i nga ro'i sgra 'dzin par mi nus te/ wa 'dra yang thos pa tsam gyis 'che'i// yar wa badre de dom gyi skad du 'byinan ) seng ge'i rgyal po chen po sgra skad 'byin pa
lan na// seng ge mad wa dang dom gyi sgra skad du'ang da ma 'byin gyi[7 ]seng ge'i sgra sgrogs so// de bzhin du wa'adre lta bu bdag gis byang chub san sa dpa' seng ge lta bu 'amakhan/
bo byas te/ yuman nga po zhig tu lhan cig ba khad kyang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sgra skad 'dzin pa lta ga la nus te/ gal te bad thabs ma yin na de'i tsal gyis 'chi bar 'gyur te/
mi dgas lta bu bdag gi glen pa'i tshes la sbyor ba dang/ nyan du gzhug pa lta bu s/ byang chub sems dba' glen bab tshos ma spyod pa ste/ spyod pa yad thams cad la bu ci lta
bu'i byams par spyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa sgyu ma mang bo na sems can byeb dang/ bram ze'i mkhan pos ma rishesakyi/ sangs rgyas nyid kyis sadas rgyas kyi glu ma mkhyen te/
de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas na sgyu ma'i rgyal po'o// mkhan po'i rgyud ma dga' byedams snyas pa// kye ma sems can rnams bram ze'i bu mo 'jo ma'i dku mthed yang )
[@]// sangs rgyas kyi che ba yin par ma shes so// ji ltar tsanatsa rgyu ma yin pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyiskya ma sprul pa'o// de bas na mdzod/
'dzin rgyal po gsal rgyal la bdag gis bsnyed do// gdol pas khyed la bstan par ma nus na/ rgyal bo sems can mang po dad 'gro ba'i dpal dang/ byin gyis rgyal por
'gyur na/ mdun du 'dug pa ltatsa smos/ daltar mis ma'i dud du bsten par mi nus na/ lha dang ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bsten par bya ba dang/ de bzhin
lha gshegs pa'i bsgyur par lta ga la nus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro byed pa'i lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang
sha za dang/ lha ma lani tshad med pa dang/ nam mkha' lding gis de la gnod par byed do// gal te 'di lta bu'i sems can 'byud na/ bcom ldan 'das kyad sdig pa byed pa
rnam pa mang po ston te/ ma 'ongs pa'i sems can 'di lta bu'i sdig ma rungs pa byed pa 'byung ba dag la yang de bzhin gshegs ba ni sangs rgyas kyis sgyu ma chen po'i thabs kyi
sku ston to zhes zer nas mi snang bar gyur to// denas lad rgyal bo shin tu ngo mtshar dugyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dis tsam lags sam
[4 ]dbcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po mkhan po dang/ mkhan po'i chung ma dad ) de'i ma skya ma gsum gyis smras pa bzhinate ) da ya sbya na ni bsam
gyis mi khyab pas na/ rnam pa de gsum du sprul pa yin te/ sems can bye ba mad po bsgral ba'i phyir/ sor mo'i 'phred pa de ltar byon pa yin no// rgyal pos gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dgung bdun nas sbyin pa chen po stsal nas/ de bzhin gshags pas sor mo' 'phreng balho phyogs legs kyi sbyin gnas su gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
bka' stsal// rgyal po chen po re bzhin du gyur cig// de nas lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yan du bcas pa'i ba jig rten gyi mgrin la/ ca tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag lcas so// skya ma'i rgyal bo khyod la
phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' chenathabs kyi sku// thabs kyi mtshan nyid rab tu 'un sum tshogs// thabs kyi mchog dam pa'i chosaM rnams rab tu ston
thabs kyi dbyes rnams su yang 'jog par mdzad// thabs kyi stsal pa dag ni yongs su ston// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yadamatha' yas te// blo gros mtha' yas grag
zhib 'a ngan thagayas so// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mtha' yas te/ bde gshegs mtha' yas stobs chen ston mdzad pa// gsang ba mtha' yas mtha' yas dgongs
[sj]bya@#/ khog ston/ 'jig rten ra da tu snang mdzad mtha' yas te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bod zer mtha' yas pa/ yon tan mtha' med grangs la shan tu :
'das// de bzhin gshegs nimAtshungs med dpagatumed// chags med ye shes nam mkha' lta bu r ston// de bzhin gshags bskrun nam mkha' bzhin// 'jam dpal
gzhon gyur phan byad zha ba byed// nor 'phred slad du bde gshegs gshegs pa ni/ gshags dang mgashegs shes kyang brjod ma nus// bdagashegasasgra gcanazanAltar
snyoms par gzigs/ de skad ces gsol pa dang ) bcom ldan 'das dgyes so// lha dang/ ma dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang/ nyan thos de dag
dang ! byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de dag thams cad kyang sor mo'i ba phred ba'i byang chub sems dba'i spyod pa dang/ de'i sangs rgyas
kyi zhing du skye ba dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang/ de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bdad/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
sems bskyed de yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon bor bstod do//[7]shin tu rgyas pa'i lung theg pa chen po'i mdo las/ ma tog u dum/
bar ltar rab tu rnyed dka' ba/ 'phags pa sor mo ba 'phred pa la phan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/// rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya pra b+ha dad//
zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba khan b+he d+har ma shI la dang/ rgya'i lo ts+tsha ba banad+he tong A tsar+ya la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA ya stangashad pa 'bartanA ma mahAyAn sUtra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i mi bu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//
bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dadabyang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcagen/ bcom ldan 'das
sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nangan/ shing yongs 'du'i drur na/ ar mo ni ga lta bu'i rdo lebs la bzhugs te/ sku bskrun pa'i yum la thugs brtse ba'i phyir/ dge slong brgyad stod
gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang/ dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ rdzu 'phrul tshab/ dbang che bar grags pa// mthu chen ngag stag dang/ byang chub sems dbab bdunakhri nyis stod
thams cad kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas/ man par shes pa bzod pa thob pa/ sbobs pa gas pa med pa/ phal cher 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas
[r ]/[7]'dus pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu/ dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor khum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing/
ka mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to// de nas de'i tshe lha'i bu zla ba zhes bya ba dang/ zla mchog ces bya ba gnyis ba bor de nyid kyi nang du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ de nas lha'i bu zla
ba stan las langs ste/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas//
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhub lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag la skabs phyin/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu zla ba la 'di skad ces bka'
stsal to// zla ba khyod su'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar ba dod/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu zla bas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gang bdag bdag la sman/
dang sems can gzhan la sman slad zhugs// sems can kun la snying rje snyad brtsi legs par bskyed nas ni// byang chub rdul bral bdud rtsa'atshal 'di don du sgrub brgya pa// shAkya
#//seng ge bdag ni de dag don du zhu bzhu// gang dag ma zhum sems kyis bskal pa bye bar spyod bgyid cing// sdug bsngal spyodas la 'gro ba thams cad kyang na grol bar bgyid// gang
dag sems can kun la sems snyoms sbyor ba snyom par bgyid// bdag nam 'dren de dag don du rgyal zhu ba lags// gang dag sangs rgyas mchen mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis rtag
rnams kyis// sa sngal rdul dang bral ba bsod nams zhing chen mthong gyur nas// yon tan rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho rnams de dag bdod bgyid pa// gza brjid chen po de dag don du/
bdag gi zhu ba lags// gang dag rtag tu sabu khyu mchog ye shes ma gtogs par// gzhan du blo gros ma skyed gzhan du sems par ma bgyid dang// ngag dag nyan thos la gang rgyal
dag tu blo gros ma skyed pa// rtsol ba brtan ba dre dag don du bdag nizhu ba lags// gang dag rnyed dang ma rnyed grags dang ma grags mnyam par sems// smad dang bsngags dang bde dang
sdug bsngal dgagasabaskyod 'gyur// 'jig rten chos rnamasazilagyis mnan to gnas shing bskyod ma mchis// 'jigs dang bral ba de dag don du bdag ni zhu ba lags// gang dag/
bdag phangs mtshungs 'drar gzhan dag la yang phangs bar 'dzin// srid ba gsuman tha dad 'byed pa ma mchis sbyor ba mnyam// gang dag byams par semasangashang tshul 'chos ba ba
bya// skyon mamachis// skye bo de dag rnams kyi don du bdag ni zhu ba lags// gang dag rtag tu sbyin dang tshul khrims dag cadi spyod rnams spyod// bdag nyid spong bar/
bgyid kyis tshul khrims phud po gtod ma bgyid// gang dag rtag tu lus dang ngag dang yid rnams legs par bsdams// bdagagi dri med de dag don du rgyal 'a zhu ba lags// gang dag
bzod pa snazhing legs par bsdams pa'i shes dang ldan// sdug bsngal dang ni bsad dang bcings dang brdeg pa rnams kyad bzod// kun gyis dkrugs kyang khro ba dang kha bskyon
par mi bgyid pa// nges par bgyis pa de dag don du bdag ni zhu ba lags// gang dag mthu dang brtson 'grus stobs gnas dam pa ba don dang ldan// 'jig rten donagyi slad du rgyu zhi'i
bdag gi phyir ma lags// dkar po spyod pa rnams kyis mi ngoms rgya mtsho chab dad 'dra// yon tanargya mtsho de dag don du rgyal la zhu ba lags// gang dag rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs
shas cher 'jug pa// gang dag nyon mongasasna tshogs pham bgyis 'phags pa'i ye shes ldan// gang dag bsam gtan mngon shes rnam rtenardzu 'phrul rkang par ldan//
bsam gtan gnas pa de dag donadu bdag ni zhu ba lags// gang dag shes rab pha rol son cad ye shes mtha' yas ldan// rtog dang kun rtog bral zhang sbos pa ma mchis ni
0 bar gyur// gang gis chos 'di dben zhing ya ma brla yang rtogs gyur pa// gang zag chen po de dag don du bdag ni zhu ba lags// gang dag rdzu 'phrul shes la mkhas shing/
shin tu rab zhi spyod// zhing rnams khrag khrig mchil ma zhang du 'dzin pa'ang ma mchis dang// sangs rgyas khrag khrig phyag 'tshalasangs rgyas 'dzan pa bad ma mchis pa// thor
na dga' ba de dag don du rgyal ba zhu ba lags// gang dag nyon mongs bdud dang bral zhing phung po'i bdud bcom dang// gang dag 'chibadag bdud dang bral zhing lha yi bdud bcom dang/
gang dag bdud kun nges bcom nas ni byang chub regagyur ba// kun dang bral bde dag don du bdag ni zhu ba lags// gang dag nags dang tshal du bcas pa'i sa gzhi bskyod nas kyang
byang chub rdul medasangs rgyas ye shes mchog ni'atshabargya dang// gang dag sems gcig la ni shes pa ci mchis 'byung 'gyur pa// rdo rdzolta bu de dag don du bdag ni zhu ba
lags// gang dag ye shes kun mkhas gzi brjid chen po gzabaskyed dang// gang dag rtag tu sangs rgyas gdung phyar chos spyod rab tu bstan// gang dag 'dren pa dang/
'dun mkhas rnams dgyes dgur sbyor// de dag don dusrid gsum dag nabadag ni zhu ba lags// bcom ldan 'das ji ltadan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
mngon bar shes pa chen po dang/ ye shes kyi khyad par dam pa'i pha rol tuson ba rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po bsam gyis ma khyab pa thabs la mkhas bas yodas su bsngo ba shes pa dad ldan ba rnams lags// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' semA
dpa' chen po chos thams cad tshul gcig pa dang/ ro gcig pa dang/ 'jug pa gcig pa dang/ bstan pa gcig pa shes pa rjes su thob pa rnams lags ! bcom ldan 'das ji lta
glu nabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zab mo'i tshul khrims can bag mchis pas spyod pa dang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub man par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
'gyur ba rnams lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu zla ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// zla ba legs so legs so// zla ba khyod kyis
go chachen po bgos pa rnams dang/ 'dren po phal pa tsho sgrol bar 'dod pa rnams dang/ chos kyi sgron me chen po sba bar 'dod pa rnams dang/ chos kyi gru chen pa sgrol bar 'dod pa rnam
dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor bar 'dod pa rnams dang/ chos kyi rdza po che chen po rdung bar 'dod pa rnams dang/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bslong bar 'dod pa rnams dang//
chos kyi rtog chen po gzung bar 'dod pa rnams dad/ shes rab kyi snang ba chen po bya bar 'dod pa rnams dang/ ye shes chen po'i rjes su 'gro bar 'dod pa rnams dang/ ye shes chen po/
yongs su rdzogs par byed 'dod pa de dag dang/ de lta bu r yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar byed pa khyod legs so//
lha'i bu de'i phyir 'gas par rab tunyon la/ tshul bzhin du yid la byas shog dang )ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mdon par shes pa chen po dang/
ye shes kyi khyad par dam pa'i pha rol tuson pa yin pa dang/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i thabs la mkhas pas yodra
su bsngo ba shes pa dang ldan pa yin pa dang/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad tshul gcig pa dang/ ro gcig pa dang/ 'jug pa
gcib pa dad bshad pa gcig pa shes pa rjes su thob pa yin pa dang/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams zab mo'i tshul khrims can bag yod par
spyod pa dang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba yin par ngas khyed la bstan to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal
lo zhes gsol to// lha'i bu zla bas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i
bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na mngon bar shes pa chen po dang/ ye shes kyi khyad par dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa yin te/ bzhi gang
zhen nga lha'i bu 'a dil byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po ni/ chos thams cad shes pa la yad mkhas la 1 tshes thams cad la yang mngon par zhen pa med do/
de na chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par rig pa dang/ shes padang/ thob pa dang/ mngon sum du gyur pa yad yan la ) chos thams cad kyang chos nyid dang 'thun par
sbyor te/ chos kyis dbyings la ma gtogs par chos gzhan ci yang yang dag par ma mthong ngo// lha'i bu de la chos thams cad tshul gcig pa gang zhe na/ sngon gyi mtha' thams
cad ji ltar stong pa de kho na bzhin du/ phyi ma'i mthun yang stong la/ da ltar byung ba gang yin pa de yang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stod ste/ lha'i bu de ltar na dus gsum stong pa nyid la
rnam par mi rtog pa gang yin pa de ni ji lta ba bzhin zhes bya// de la'abyed pa dang/ shes ba dang/ ston pa dang/ 'dog pa dang/ 'grel pa dang/ rnam par 'byed pa dang//
[4 ]gsal bar byed pa dang/ 'chad pa 'di ni ma khas pa zhes bya'o// de la ji ltar chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med ce na/ lha'i bu chos thams cad ni bdag nyid kyi kun
nas slong bas kun nas bslang ba sta/ des chos thams cad dran pa nye bar gzhag pas[7 ]kun nas bslad bar ga nas/ bdag la mngon pa ra zhen pa med do// de bdag la mngon
par zhen pa medabs/ chos gzhan rnams slong bar ma byed do// chos gang yang mi shes shing ma bsungs pas na/ de la mngon par zhen da ra ma nus// de la mngon par
zhen pa med bsan/ tshes rnam par bzhag par yad byed la/ chos gang la yang mngon par zhen par ma 'gyur ro// lha'i bude la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen pos/ chos thams cad nam mkha' dang 'dra bar shes zhe na/ lha'i bu khams gsum pa na sems tsam du zad la/ soms de yang gzugs med du/ bstan du med pa/
thogs pa med pa// rnam par rag par byed pa ma yin pa// sbyam lta bu ste sems de yid semasakyi chos nyid kyis yos su btsal kyang ma pad do// sems gang gis sems
yongs su btsal ba'isims de yang ma rnyed do// de sams mi dmigs pas ) chos thams cad ma dmigs so// chos thams cad ma dmags pas/ chos gang yang mtshan ma
[s/ ]@#// 'am ta rdzas su yang dag par ma mthod ste/ chos thams cad la chags par ma 'gyur ro// chos thams cad yongs su ma grub pa'i phyir nam mkha' dang 'dra bar/
ka shes so// lha'i budaper na/ nam mkha' ma skyes shing yos su ma grub pa'i de bzhin du/ des chos thams cad shes sa// ji ltar nam mkha' zhes bya ba de yang dben pa de
