soms/ glang chen po bzhi pa 'di 'ba' shig tu nga mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi gling gzhan du ma yin no snyam du sems na ) mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis de ltar blta bar mkhya sto
gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/ sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su sman pa bzhin du nga tshos ston to// kha gcig tun mdon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ khacig/
tu ni da dung ma'i mngalan gnas/ kha cig tu ni dga' ldan gyi gnas na 'dug/ khacig tu ni yodas su mya ngan las 'das par ngas yang dag bshes so/
tsha bam po gsum la lha ba mgo/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po stong gsum gyi stod chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid na/ glang chen po bzhi pab 'a jig rten gyi khams
'di nyid kyi shar phyogs su gling chen po bzhi pa ba jig rten gyi khams khri nyis stod ba 'das pa na/ gling chen po bka ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul med ces bya ba zhig yod de/
de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdul bral blo gros shes bya ba da ltar chos ston to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi
khams de na 'khod pa'i sems can de dag ni 'dod chags chung ba dang/ zhe stang chud ba dad/ gti mug chung ba dang/ rgyud bzang ba dang ) legs par bshad kyis byang bar byed pa yin
no ngade na byang chub snyams dpa'i theg pa pa ni nyud bste/ phal cher nyan thos kyi theg pa pa yin na// mo'u 'gal gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs/
ba'i sangs rgyas rdul bral blo gros des/ chos bstan pa re re la nyan thos bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu gdul bar byed de/ da ltar bad rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang/ lan cig/
phyir bong ba zhes bya ba dang/ phyir ma 'o da ba zhes bya ba bstan pa de lta bu'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bzhi rnam par gzhag pa na de na med kyi/ de dag thams cad ni stan gcig la
bya/ 'dug pa sha stag ste/ kha cig ni mdon par shes pa mngon sum du byed cing/ rnam par thar pa brgyud rjes su thob pa dang/ ye shes chen po thob nas/ ta
sha la bdun sud tsam gyis nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas/ rang gi me'i khams kyis rang gi lus mes sreg par byed de/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dgag thal ba'i
bag tsam med de// mo'u 'gal gyi bu de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa de rgyun ma 'chad par chos ston ning/ sems can rnams rnam par grol byed la/ rgyun ma 'chad par nyan thos rnas
yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar byed do// de na sbyin pa yang med/ len pa yod med do// bza' ba dang/ btung ba dang/ gos rnams kyang bsams pa tsam gyi 'byud bar 'gyur te/
dper na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang 'dra/de na sems can rnams mngalan/ gnas pa med de rdzus te skye'o// sa gzhi chen po de sa da gser las grub pa yin no// mo'u
'gal gyi bu der zhin gshegs pa rdzu ba khra la blo gros dga' jig rten gyi khams de nam di dgagatsi'i tshad ni la lnga brgya khrub ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba med do// mo'u 'gal gyi bu bad Na sAmadu
sams/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rdul bral blogros shes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis de ltar ma blta'o///
tsa thade ci'i phyir zhen/ nga nyid 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ ming de skad ces bya bas chos ston to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa ba tsho 'phrul yin te/
de la ni nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'jug par mi nus so// mo'u 'gal gyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bad nyid nas/ lho phyogs su gling
chen po bzhi pa'i 'a jig rten gyi khams brgyad stong pa 'das pa na/ glang chen po bzhi pab 'jig rten gyi khams na chen 'byud zhes bya ba/ na pache sna bzhi 'di ltaste/ gser dang 3 dngul
dang/ shel dang/ rdo'i snying bo las grub pa zhig yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcomo pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa ngas rgyus ban chen phung po zhes bya ba da ltar chos ston te// mabu
'gal gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa de nangashas chera'ang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams las btsam nas chos ston te de na nyan thos theg pa ba dag kyang nyung ngo// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
kha ba dag kyang nyung ngo// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i sems can gang dag lan ba de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de nas shi 'phos nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhanasas rgyas kyi zhing
stong ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag rkyen gas kyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// mo'u 'gal gyi bu bde ji snyam du sems/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na bzhugs pa'i dbazhini/
'ubya// gshegs pan chen phung po zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig snyam du semasan/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis de ltar ma bltago/ de ci'i phyir zhan/ nga nyid 'jig rtenagyi/
[G ]khams den/ ming de skad ces bya bas chos ston to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di la nga sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul yin te/ de lan nyan thos dang rang sangs
sgyu rgyas thams cad kyis 'jug par ma nus so// mo'u 'gal gyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'o jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid nas/ nub phyogs su gleng ba zhi ba la 'jig rten gyi khams/
nyi khri nyis stod bdas pan/ gling bzhi pa 'i 'jig rten gyi khams na chen sna tshogs can zhes bya ba'an po che sna bdun tagasor dang/ dngul dang/ baicha tshu dang/ shel dang/ rdo'i snying po
dang/ mu tig dmar po dang/ stug las grub pa'i ga yod ra// mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams de na rin po che las byas pa'i 'chags dad/ na po tshal byas pa'i
khang pa rdzogs pa dag dang/ rin po che'i stegs bus brgyan pa'i rdzong dag kyang yod do// khaza' ba dang/ bdud bo dar gos kyang bsams pa tsam gyis 'khyud bar 'gyur te/
dper na dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nye bar spyod pa dang/ longs spyod ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rtanagyi khams den 'khod pa'i ma di dag gi nye bar spyod pa dang/ longs spyod kyang de dang
'dra'o// de na bud med kyi ming yang mi grag go don bud med skye ba yod med do// de nasems can de dag 'khrig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa yod med do// sems can de dag/
'dod pa'i rtog pa yang ma byed/ gnod sems kyi rtog pa ya da ma byed/ rnam par 'tshaba'i rtog pa yang ma byad do// de na yang ma da lan gnas ba med do// sems can de dag
rdzus te skye zhing skyil mo krung bcas bzhin du 'khyud go/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu na chen sna tshogs can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung zhes bya ba da ltar chos ston te/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi gzudas kyi rdo rje'i tshig 'a khor gsum
yongs su chad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa ma rtogs par gtam gzhan ma gsung ngo// de nasems can dpag tumed/ grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
pa'i byang chub tu sams bskyed par byed do// sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag gis ma skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob// sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag/
ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to// de na theg pa gnyis po 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi thig pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnam par gzhag pa'ang med de/
bya// byang chub sems dpa' ga zhes ba'i drang bamed cing/ 'khrig pa dang bral ba 'ba' shag gas/ glang chen po bzhi pa 'jig rten gyi khams de yongs su gang ngo//
ka de bzhin gshags 'da'i tsho'i tshad ni lo brgya khrib na stong cub bo/ med dgan bar ma dor 'chi 'pho ba yod desemasacan su dang de nas shi 'bosanas sems can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i
skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ mkhom pa maMs su skye bamed do// byang chub sems dpa' de dag phal cher de nas shi 'phos nas)sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gzhan
dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mngon sumadu 'gyur ro// gling de dag dang/ lhadang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ draza'akhod pa gang dag yin bde dag thams cad n 'di lta
ste thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyisems dang blo gros su blo gros gcig go/ lhadang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dad/ drizade dag sangs rgyus kyi chos la 'bam rtogs par kha gzhan la dga' bamaskyid
do/ lhadang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ mde dag kyang lha 'bab ma/ klu zhes bya ba'amo/ dri za zhes bya ba bam/ mi zhes byakhaming du btagasapatsam yod pa ma gtogs kha lo
dad du dbyar med do/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung 'jig rten gyi khams de na chos ston pa gang
yin bde gzhan zhig yin snyam du semasan mo 'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mebalta'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ nga da 'jig rten gyi khams de na ming 'di/da ces byas chos stonato// mo'u 'gal
gyi bu 'di yang sas rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'khrul pa'i chos 'phrul yin te/ de na nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kun shes par slob ma yin no// mo'u 'gal gyi bu stong gsum
gyistong chen po'i 'jig rten gyis khams 'di nyid nas byang phyogs sugling chen po bzhiba'a'ajig rten gyi khams sum khri drug stong 'das pa na/ glang chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
'jigs med ces bya ba rin poche snaganyis te/ gser dang/ dngul las grub pa zhig yod de/ de na sems can dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa yang med/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'jigs pa yang
med/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa yang med/ ma khom pa'i 'jigs pa yang med/ ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa yang medago de sems can su yang tshul khrims nyams pa'am) ltab
nyams pa 'am/ cho ga nyams pa med do// de gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang/ kun tu rgya rnams gyi ming du gdags ba yang med do// mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'jigs
med de na/ de bzhin gshogs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jigasamod sbyin zhes bya ba da ltar chos ston te/ mo'u 'galagyi bde ba ni gshegs pa de na 'di lta ste/
spyad/ nyan thos su 'gyur ba dang/ rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba drang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur klog pa gsum/
las brtsams nas sems can rnams la chos ston to// mo'u 'galang khu de bzhin gshegs pa de gang ga/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa mtshang rgya khar byaba'iphyir/ byang chub kyi shing
drung du 'gro bar 'dod pan/ byang chub kyi shang drungan 'dug pa de la khadud blo gros bzang po nas bya ba la sogs pa bdud khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis 'ongabar 'gyur ro// de'i di bzhin
gshegs pa byang chub sems dbar gyur ba da dung thams cad mkhyen pa ma thob pas bdung ji snyed yod bde snyed kyi byang chub kyi shing sprul bar byedado// byang chub kyi shing ji snyed kyi byang chub
sems dpa' rang rang gi byang chub kyi shing drung na 'dugs pa dag sprul te dur bdud de dag ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ yang dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de gang yin/ bdag cag gis gang
gi bar chad bya snyamamo// de nas skul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bdud dag la 'di skad ces sas se// grogs po dag chos thams cad n sgyum lta bu yin na 'di la dza ltar khyed
kyisakhar chad tsa/ gzhan yang khyed kun kyis gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'am/ gang yang dag bar 'dzud pa de'i bsod nams ji snyed 'phel bar
[m{]'gyur bar shes sum/ khyed kyis ni de yang mi rtogs so// gal te khyed kyis byang chub sems datsA'i theg pa la zhugs pa'i bar chad byed pa'i bsod nams ma yin pa ji snyed 'phelabar
'gyur bar gsanani 1khyed bar chad byed ba'i phyir/ brtul bar ma byed cig/ de nas bdud rnams kyis smras pa/ gang blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed ba'am
gang gzhan la khong du chud par bgyis te/ yang dag par 'dzan du 'jug pa de bsod nams ji snyed cig bskyed par bgyid/ smras pa/ grogs po dag gang gsasangs rgyas kyi zhing gda' klungag
bye ma snyed rin po ches yongs su bkang ste/ sbyin pa byin pa bas/ gang gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub tu soms bskyedun/ de na de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyod par
'gyur ro// grogs po dag gang gis sangs rgyasakyi zhing gang+ga'i klung gi byamasnyedakyi sems can thams cad la bde ba'i yo byadathams cad kyis bskal pa 'bumagyi bar du bkur sti byas pa dus/
gang gis gzhan la khong du chud bar byas te/ yang dag bar 'dzin du bcug na )dan du bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro// de dag galcas pa/ gang gis blanamed
ba lang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las byang chub sems dpa'i bar chad bgyidan/ de bsod nams ma lags pa ji snyed cig bskyed pa 'gyur/ sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa'anamA
kyis smras pa/ sems can de dag gi mig phyung na/ de bsod nams ma yin pa ji tsam zhig bskyed bar 'gyur/ de dag gis smras pa mang ngo/ smras pa/ blan med pa
du dag par rdzogasa'i byang chub las// byang chub sems dpa'ibarachudabyas pan/debs chos bsod nams ma yin pa mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro// de nas bdud mang ba de dag gdams ngag
'di dag bstan pa dang/ cho 'phrul 'ad lta bu chaklong nas/thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed do// sprul pa'i byang chub semasadapa' de dag thams cad la
yang lca'i mi tog dang/ me tog 'phreng dang/ byugs pa rnams kyis mngon par gtor to// sul snyan brgya stong dag kyang kun tu bkrol to tshig 'di skad du ded dpon chen po khyed myur bar
ban med par yang dgapar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mangon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de'i 'og tu bdag cagakyang byang chub ladagod du gsol zhes kyang 'dzar to// der lhagazhan bdag gA
kyang sgra phyung ste/ kum 'dud 'di dag gis khran med pa yang dag rdzogasakha'i byang chub tu sems skyed pa'i phyir/ 'di rnamasazhingan 'gro'i 'jigs bathams cad las rab tu dgrol// kyi mdabazhin
gshegs pa 'di ni 'jigs pamed par sbyin paste/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa 'di'i mtshanani 'jigs med sbyin 'jigs med sbyin zhes bya'o// zhes 'dzin tomo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di ji snyams du
sems// 'jig rten gyi khams den sems can de dag la chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis de ltar che blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhen//
nganyid 'jig rten gyi khams de na ming 'di skad cesabya bsachos ston to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnamakhar 'phrul pa'i cho'aphrul yin te/ de la nyan b+bes dang/
sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'jug par mi nus so// mo'u 'gal gyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid nas 1 shar dang/ lho'i phyogs mtshams su glang chen po bzhapa'i
'jig rten gyi khams brgyad khri bzhi stong 'das pa na/ gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas sna tshogs can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ donAd bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog sna tshogs can zhes bya ba chos ston to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de yang bkra zhing brtan sdug la/ mig mangs ris su 'dug
cing rin po cha'adra bas khebs la ka tsa lin di ka ltar regan bde ba'i snasngon po khrun du ser bzhi tsam gyi kun tu khyab par 'dug go/ sa chen pod yang rkang pa btogan ni 'bar rgyas bye la/ rkang pa
gzhaganan nims zhes byed do// sa chen po de lag mawil ltar mnyam par 'dug go mo'u 'galagyi bu kun nas sna tshogs can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams den/ grong khyer chen po bzang samatsho/
ces bya ba 'byor cing rgyus la/ bde ba dang ) lalags pa dang ) nyams dga' ba dang/ skye bo dang/ mi mang pos gang ba zhig yod do// grong khyer de'i shar phyogs
nas nub phyogs kyi chur ni dbag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do// lta phyogs nas byang phyogs med du ni dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod do// mo'u 'gal gyi bu grong khyer chen po bzangs mchog de'i
nang na sems can ches mang po dag gi/ yul ang ga dang/ ma ga d+ha dang/ ku ru 'di dag nan dam 'go/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu de ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pame tog sna tshogs nan
grong khyer chen po bzang mchog na gnas shing bzhugs te/ de'i chos bstan pa gcig gis sems can khrag khrig khrag sum cu ni dgra bcom pa nyid du btul te/ khrag khrig phrag sum cu ni phyir
ma 'ong pa'i 'bras bu la btul to// khrag khrig phrag cu ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la btul to// khrag khrig phrag sum cun rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la btul te// khrag khrig/
phrag sum btsun rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu yongs su sman par byas so// de'anyis gyur na blon med ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ gzhan yang sems can dpag

tu med pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par byas so// mo'u 'gal gyi bu gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khamasadan ) sbrang rtsi 'byung zhes bya ba'i shing 'jon pa rtag tu me tog dang ldan pa
dang rtag tu 'bras bu dang ldan pa dag yod de/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dag gi re nid ngan 1 ro brgya dang sbyar ba'i 'bras chen dang 'dra ste/de las skyesapa 'am/ bud med dag gis me tog gcig
gam 'bras bu gcig zos na/ de nyid mtshan bdun gyi bar du des 'tsho bar 'gyur te/ sbyob dang/ mdog kyang nyams par ma 'gyur la ) lus gzi byin dang ]kha dog dang ldan par yang nyams su tshor bar
'gyur ba dang )ze bdog lang par 'gyur ro// zos nas kyang phyis dang/ gci ba med la/ ngar stabs dang snabs kyang med do// 'jig rten gyi khams de na nga rmod pa yang med tshong byed pa yang med/
rtsis byed pa yang med/ las su bya ba yang med) sems cand dug ni me tog dang 'bras bu lnga'o// da na phyug po yang med/ dbul po yang med/ sems can de dag longs spyodamanyamamo// mo'u 'gal
rgyabu debazhan gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa de yang me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i bskyed mos tshal denakhazhugs te/ bcom
ldan 'das de nyan thos kyi dag 'dun dang bcas par bzhugs nas gdugAtshodal 'bab ban/ shuljon pa rnams der 'dud par 'gyur te/ me togadang/ 'bras bu de dag bcom ldan 'dasadag slong
rnams kyi lhung bzed nang du 'khrul bar 'gyur la/ bshos gsol zin par rig nas ) shan ljon pa de dag phyir rangs ti/ sngamakho bzhin du 'dug go/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams de'i
yon tanan de dag yin te/ de bas kyang lhag par yod do// mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'dang snyam du semasu/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can de dag la chos/
ston pa de bzhan zhig yin par khyod som nyi'am/ yid gnyis sam/ the rtsom zan/ khyod kyis de ltar ma blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ nga nyid 'jig rten gyi khams na/ me togasna tshogs can zhes
bya ba'i ming gas chos ston to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul san te/ de la ni nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'jug par
mi nus so// mo'u 'galargya bu stong sum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid nas/ lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshamasu glang chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bdun khri 'das pan//

glang chen po bzhi ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba'i blo gros shes bya ba zhig yodado/ denakhang gcigan yang rgyal po brgyad khri yod do// gling gcigan yang grong khyer brgyad khridang tshod dus
brgyad khris yod do// grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang// yul 'khor dang/ tshong 'dus de dag thams cad na yang mi bye ba phrag 'bum dag gis longs su gang ngo// rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang nga
rang gi rgyal srid kyis chog par 'dzin to// rgyal po dag Thams cad kyang chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po ste/ chos ma yin pa spangs ba sha stag go/ rgyal po de dag thams cad la yang btsun mo bumed

brgyad khri bzhi stong/ brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de/ bud med de dag thams cad kyang yul gyi bzang mo shastag go/ rgyal po'il bulngakhargya lnga brgya yod do// rgyal po'i ro la lang bumo khra ces stong nyis stong
yod// thams cad kyang yul gyi bzang mo sha stag go/ rgyal bo de dag thams cad kyang chad pa med pa dang/ mtshon cha med pa rang rang gi 'og tu gtogs pa 'dul bar byed do// mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'dzig
rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba'i blo gros de na ) de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba chos ston to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu de bzhin
gshegs pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ glang chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der ta la bdun sridatsam gyi nam mkha' la mngon
par 'phags nas ) stsolamo krung bcas te/ skyil krung gcig gis gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyad par byas nas/ 'od gzer dag rab tu 'gyed pa dang/ me tog gi char 'bebs

ba dang ) sa la snyan brgyad stong lo dag dkrolakhazhing/ sa chen po rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod nas/ tshangs pa'i sgra skad lta bu dage ba'i rtsa ba 'bum phrag du mas yang dag par sgrubs pa'i gsung gces
kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa'i thams cad zad par bya ba'i phyir/ rdul med ba mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag par ston to// byang chub sems dpo' rnams bsdu ba'i phyir
chos ston to// des de ltad ltar chos bstan pas gleng bzhi pa'i rgyal po brgyad khri bu dang bcas/ chung ma dang bcas/ bu mo dang bcas pa de dgam gtogs pa'i
skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang/ bumo de dag chos rnams la chos kyimig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ rgyal po de dag bu dang bcas/ chung ma dang bcas/ bumo
dang bcas pas kyang blonamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ thams cad kyi tshig 'thun pa de bzhin gshegs pa larab tu 'byung bar gsol ba 'debs so//
de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas dag slong tshur shog ces gsungs pas rab tu byung ngo// de ltar thams cad rab tu byung nas/ so so'i grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ yul
'khor dang/ tshong 'dus dang ) rgyal po'i pho brang dug tu gnas pa'i longs spyod kyis gnas so/ ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu yang byung// lha rnams kyang de dag la bsnyen bkur byed do//
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i chos bstan pa gnyis pa la nyan thos kyi thig pa pa thams cad ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod do// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams chos rnams
la ni mi skye ba dang 'thun pa'a'a'od pa la 'god do/ chos bstan pa gsum pa lani nyan thos kyi theg pa ba rnamasan phyir ma 'ong kha'i 'bras bu la 'god do// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnamasan
mngon par shes pa lnga thob kho//chos khas pa bzhi ba la nyan thos kyi klog kha ba skams cad ni dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god do// byang chub sems dpakhrig pa ba rnamasazhi chos rnams la mi skye bar bzod
khathob bo// rgyal bo'i btsun mo de dag dang/ sras de dag dang 1 rgyal po'i bu mo de dag ni lus de nyid kyis bud med kyi lus las gyur te/ skyes pa'i lus thob par gyur nas/ de dag thams cad ni de
bzhin gshegs pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'ad ji snyams du sems/ 'jig rten gyi khams den de bzhan gshegs pa chos ston pa

de bzhin zhig yin snyam du semasan/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyi de ltar mi 'alta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid 'jig rtanagyi khams de naming de skad ces bya bas chos ston to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di
yang sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul yin te/ de la ni nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'jug par mi nus so// mo'u 'gal gyi bu stong gsum rgyas stong

chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid nas/ nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams su gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams lnga khri lnga stong 'des pa na ) glang chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams sngos

ldan zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po 'ba' shag yod la/ sngos de srang gcagan 'dzamabu'i gling 'di ri'o// de na shing ljon pa sos kyi ngad kun nas ldang ba zhes bya ba dag kyang yod
de shing gcig la kho ra khor yug dudapag tshad bcur sos kyi ngad ldang// de nas sa chen po las pad+ma shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam la 'dab ma 'bum 'phrag du ma dang/ kha
dog 'khum 'phrag du ma dang ldan pa )'jam shing ka tsa lind ka ltar reg na bde ba/ 'bang dukhru bcu pa tsam dag skyed bye da pad+mara'i 'i dras kyang gleng bzhi pa'i 'dzig rten gyi khams de dri bsung

sgyu zhing zhim par byed do/[â ]/gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na tsan dan gyi khang pa brtsigs pa dang/ tsan dan gyi 'chags pad+ma dang/ me tog gis gang bar 'dug go/ khang pa brtseg
ba pasha stag 'bum phrag du mas 'jig rten gyi khams de khyab par 'dug go/ de na grong dang grong khyer gyi yongs su 'dzin pa med de/ dper na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nye bar spyad
pa dang/ longs spyod ji lta ba bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de na mi de dag gis nyakhar spyad pa dang/ longs spyod kyang de dang 'dra'o// mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams sos ldan na/ de
bzhin gshegs pa spos 'gyed 'od gzer can zhes bya ba da ltar chos ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni nyan thos dang ) rang sangs rgyas kyigatam yongs su spangs pa// byang chub sems
dpa'i gtam 'ba' shig gsung ngo/ )glang chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa'achen po thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul thob pa shastag gis
0/ yongs su gang rje// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos khamasacad la rnam pa 'khrul pa'i rgyal bo zhes bya ba khasam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'jug pa dang ldan
ba/ bzod pa gnyis pa rdzob pa ) mngon par shes ba rnams la mkhas pa/ sobs pas rtogs par khong du chud pa/ sangs rgyas 'bum phrag du ma mang po lasnyen bkur byas pa 'dug ga ste ) mo'u
'gal gyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal por lad bzhin gshegs pa des bskul te/ skabs phye nas chos ston te bcom ldan 'das de 'i spyan sngar stan
las langs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs la lan gsumakhasog 'byas nas/ steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te/ skyal mo krung gas
khor be ra yugatudapag tshadAbacur khyad par byas sa/ spu'i khung po thams cad nas 'od zer dag khagya ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'od kyis khyad par byas nas// me tog kha dog sna tshogs
'bum dang ldan pa/ shing rta'i yang le tsam bdag gsas chen po de dag la me 'greng tsam du bkrams te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lha dang mi'i sil snyan dag gi sgra 'byin to// sAlasnyan

de dag las kyang chos kyi phyag rgya'i brgyad khargya 'byung ngo// chos kyi phyag rgya re re la yang mdo bye ba phrag rgya bcu rtsa bzhi bsdus so// mdor lo la yang tshigs su bcasal bdun khri nyis stong gis
[f ]@#// brjod do// des skye lam krung de las ma langs par sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum brag dgu cu rtsa drug bla na med pa yang rtag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog
ba la bkod de/ thams cad kyang chos rnams ma skye bar bzod pathob par byas so// mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams dod ltabu 'a byang chub semasadapa' dgag yongs su gang ngo// de na
sems can zhar ba 'am/ gleng po'am/ rgyalapo'am ) 'on pa'am ) dbulapo'am/ mdog ngan pa 'ga' yang med de/ sems can de dag thams can skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu
rtsa nyis dang ldan pa 'khyang chub sems dpa' sha stag go/ sems can de dwags chos kyi dga' ba'i dga' ba ma gtogasapar gzhan ci la yang dga' bamed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen pod dag la bsam gtan gyi dga' zas me tog par zas gzhan ci yang med do// da nami khom par ltung yang skye ba yang med do// de nas shi 'phos nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'go
[% ]kham gtogs par zas gzhan du 'gro ba med do// mo'u 'gal gyi khu 'ad jisnyam dusems) 'jig rten gyi khams de na bzhugs pa'i/ de bzhin gshegasapa sbyos 'gyed 'od zer can zhes bya ba de gzhan
gzhig yin snyam du sems na/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyi de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid 'jig rten gyi khamasaden ming de skad ces bya bas/ sems can rnams la chos ston to//
[j]mo'u 'gal gyi bu bde yang sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'khrul ba'i cho 'phrul yin te/ de la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'jug par mi nus so// mo'u 'galakyi bu stong

gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid nas/ byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bzhi khri nyis stong 'das pa na )gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig
rten gyi khams mya ngan gyis 'joms pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de nasems can 'khod pa rnams ni 'dod chags kyi chags ba dang/ zhe sdang gis sdang ba dang/ gti mug gis rmongs pa dang/ brkam pa dang/
b.rung ba dang/ rgod pa dang/ mu cor smra ba dang/ dbang po zhan pa dang/ ser sna can dang/ tshul khrims 'chal pa dang/ gnod sems che ba dang/ le lo can dang/ sems las can dang/
brjed ngas pa dang/ shes bzhin med pa dang/ bdag tu lta ba dang ) sems can dang/ srog dang/ gang zag tu lta ba dang/ shes rab 'chalab dang/ lug ltar lkugs pa dang/ ngo tsha mi
shes pa dang/ khrel mi shes pa dang ) gus pa med pa dang/ sems 'khrugs pa sha stag go/ sems can de dag ni kha dog ngan pa dang )chung par grags pa dang/ byed ngan pa dang/
dka'akhas 'tsho ba dang/ gcig la gcig 'dradapar gnas pa sha stag go/ den zla badrug tu mar me'akhob ste/ lo tog legs par mi snyan to// sachen po de na rtsub padang/ mkhrang ba dang/
tshor ma sna tshogs can dang/ ga yangs dang/ ri brag gis gang// 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can de dag mun 'brumar gyi snyagasam dang dri ma dang 'dra'o// sems
can de dgan gos dang/ chos gos dang/ longs spyod dag gis dbul ba dang/ bkren pa dang/ gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa sha stag go/ 'jig rten gyi khams la rgyal po sdang chag zhes bya bzhig yod/
sems can de dag la rgyul srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed de/ sems can de dag gi nor dang/ 'bru byung ngo cog rgyal po'i mdzod du 'brub par byed do// sems can de dag ni chad pa dang/
brdeb pa 'be'ashag gis gzir ba sha stag go/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu de dag ni 'jig rten gyi khams den tshod 'i sdug bsngal yin no/ gang 'chib de dag kyang shinas phal cher sems can dmyal ba
rnams dang ) dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnamasadang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro// mo'u 'gal gyi bu glang chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na de bzhinagashegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas snang 'kha dang/ snying rje'i sems yid la byed pa zhes bya ba chos ston te/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu de bzhin gshegasaladen tsho 'phrul rnam pa bco brgyad kyi chos
ston to// des lo bdun brgya'i bar du chos bstan kyang sems can gcigs kyang chos mngon par rtogs par ma gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de yang skyo ba med pa'i steng du snying rje chen pos
05 chos kyang ston to// mo'u 'ag lu bu de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa de grong ngam/ grong khyer ram grong rdal du gnas shing bzhugs la/ sems can de dag gis smyos shing brgyad bkag ste/ smad la
gnyung par khyed kyang der sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ snying rje chen pos de dag bzod par mdzad do// mo'u 'gal bu de bzhin gshegs kha des labadun brgya bas kyang lhag
bar sems can kha gcig yongs su smin par mdzad de/ chos bstan pa lan cig la sems can khrag khrig phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhis ni dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo// khrag khrig phrag brgyad bcurtsa

bzhisan phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thobabo// khrag khrig phrag brgya bcu rtsa bzhisan lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo// khrag khrig brgyad bcu rtsa bzhis na rgyun tu bzhugs ba'i 'bras bu 'thob ste/
de dag kyang nyin gcig la rab tu byung bsnyen par rdzogs so// slob pa dang/ mi slob pa de dag thams cad kyang gcig la gcig lung bstan pas/ nyi ma gcig gis yongs su mya las 'das so/
de bzhin gshegs pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' lnga las kyi sgrib pas der skyes te/ sngagabasngal gyi tshor nyams su myong bde dag yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i phyir da dung yang bzhugs//
de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan kha mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das las kyi sgrib pa gang gis na/ byang chub
sems dpa' rnams re shig 'jig rten gyi khams nyon mongs pa'i skye bar 'gyur lags/ bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan
na roshig skye ba ngan pa len par 'gyur go/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i ming gi red bas 'tsho bar byed la/ byung chub sems dpa'i
bslab pa lam slob bda'/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos spong ba yal bar 'dor zhing zlog par ma byed pa dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu gzhan yang khyab
sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gi snyed pa'i bar chad byed cing bsngags ba ma yin pa brjod pa dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu gzhan rang byang chub sems dba' lus kyi las dang/
a/ ngag gas las dang/ yad kyi las ma srungs pa dang ldan pa ste/mo'u 'gal bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan n/ re shig 'gro ba ngan par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// mo'u 'gal gyi
bu 'ding snyam du sems/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa snying brtse ba dang/ snying rdzo'i sems yid la byed pa zhes bya ba de bzhin zhig yin snyam du sen
na mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid 'jig rten gyi khams de na ming de skad ces byas sems can rnams la chos ston to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu
de ltar na ) de bzhani gshigs pan stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/ sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad du/ de wani ston pas ma bstan gyi bar du/
ma par 'phrul pa'acha 'phrul yin taM ) dolan nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'jug par ma nusaso// mo'u 'gal gyi bu
khyed nyan thos rnams kyis 'jug par ma nus so/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas ) glang chen pobazhi ba'i 'jig rtenagyi khams bye ba phragabasgyu red/
de dun de bzhin gshegs ba mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston to// mo'u 'gal kya bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'ad du na/ glang chen po bzhi ba'i
'jig rten gyi khams gang na/ tshangs ba'agazugs kyis chos ston te/ de bzhinagshegs pa rab tu 'byung ba dang/ gos ngur smrig ma ston pa la yod do// de bzhin du brgya byin gyi ga'u/
kyis kyang nga mos ston to// de bzhin du skye ba thams cad kyis kyang chos ston to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad na/ rje lta bu r mos pa'i
sems can rnams la ji ltar mos pa bzhin du nga tshos ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhang tshod med pagazhan dang/ gzhan dag tu yang nga chos ston te/ de ga nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad
kyis 'jug par mi nus so// mo'u 'gal gyi bu dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'kher ram nyima'i dkyil 'khor ni gzhal med khang nas kyang mi yol/ grong dang da
ka grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ yul khor dang/ rgyal po'i thobrang thams cad du yang dag par snang ngo/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa la nga drag par
rdzogs pa 'isangs rgyas ni rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing las kyang ma g.yos la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa dag tu yang dag par snang ste/ sems can ji ltar yongs su smin par
gyur pa rnams la chos stonato// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan khra mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang sum bcu rtsa gsum dag na bzhugs pa
dang 'dzam bu gling dang/ lha'i gnas rnams dang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dan/ gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang/ gzhan dgas
chos ston nang bzhugs pal/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag pa gang lags ) gang la yon phul na mthu che bar 'gyur ba'id bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dgapan 'ad lags so snyam
du/ bdagags ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo'u 'gal
kyi bu de 'i phyir khyod nyid la phyir dri bar byas/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lanablobashig/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di jisnyam du sems sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa laskye ba 'am/ bud/
med gang yin pa de la yang dag pa gang len/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de lan yang dag par na dam mches so// datsa'i slad zhen[ï¼]sbya tshamakhan gyis gsang sngags dang/ rig sngags
stobs kyis bskyed de/ sngal pa stsal bar bag pasan/ de dag la khyad par ma mchis so// bka' stsalapa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu ci gang gi phyir sbrul bde'i bya ba byed dam ) gsal pa//
bcom ldan 'das bgyid lagros/ bkra' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu de bzhin du skyam lta bu'i chos thams cad lan khyad par ram tha dad du dbye ba yod do// mo'u 'gal gyi bu ji ltar sbya ma mkhan/
gyis gsang sngags dang/ rig sngags kyi stobs kyis sprul pa mang po sprulal ) de dag kyang mnyam zhing khyad par med pa de bzhin du )mo'u 'gal gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab dang/
rig pa dang/ ye shes kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du ston par mdzadal/ de dag kyang manyam zhing khyad par med par 'di lta ste ) sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las kyi bya ba byed de/ de la yon/
phul ba gang yin pa de dag gis rnam par smin pa yang mnyamapar 'gyur ro// mo'u 'gal gyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni cung zad kyang thadad du ngabyar med do// mo'u 'gal gyi bud
lta bas na/ yang dag pam lan ba dang/ sgyu ma lta bu r gyur ba'i chos thams cad ni/ chos kyis dbyings su khyad par ram thad du da byer med do// mo'u 'gal gyi bu de bzhin
gshegs pa na bzhedan/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu yang mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de la rang bzhin dang/ chu zheng ldan bgang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad du stsal bar
mdzad do/ de dag kyang rnam pa drug cu ldan pa'i drag gi las kyi chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang/ sems can thams cad kyisems kyi spyod pamakhyen to/de
bzhin gshegs khade dag thams cad kyang ji ltar mos pa'i sems can rnams la mos pa dang/ dbang po ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug pa'i shes pa skyed pa'i phyir chos ston to// de bzhin gsheg
bde dag thams cad kyis chos bstan pas sems can sna tshogs nges par 'byung bar 'gyur to/ de ltar sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs kha de dag thams
cad cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhis chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyang yang dag par ston to// mo'u 'gal khu 'ad ji snyam/
du sems/ de dag la ches khyad par du 'phags pa 'am ) ches gzugs dang ldan pa 'cha ) ches kha dog dang ldan pa 'am/ ches srobs padang ldan pa ma/ chos la shes dang ldan pa 'am//
[pï¼]sa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa 'am/ ches tshog ston pa dang ldan pa 'am ches sems can yongs su dgrol ba dang ldan pa gang yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lan tha dad par
bstan par mnus lags so/ bka' stsal la/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu de lta bsan rnam grangs 'das kyang chos thams cad na myul ba'i ngo bo nyid de/ khyad par yang med/ tha dad du nga byer
yang med pa de ltar na rig par bya'o// mo'u 'gal gyi bu chos thams cad sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes pa gang yin pa de dag na so so'i skye bo rnams la yang tha dad par dbye bar ma 'dod na/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lta ca smos/ de snga'aphyir zhen/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chos thams cad nirang bzhin gyis stong ba/ kun du rtag pa drang/ yongs su brtag pa las byung ba ste/ de dag
la ltar 'dong ba de bzhin du rnam par bsgrub pa yod kyi/ chos kyi dbyingasan skye ba rang med/ 'jig pa yang med do// mo'u 'gal gyi bu chos kyi dbyings de na de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin/
du thugs su chud de/ de thugs su chud pa'i phyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu'i khung bu gcig nas 'dzam bu klung gsemasacan ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi mdun du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag
slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yang dag bar ston la/ de dag kyang gcig gos gcig mi shesaso// mabu 'gal gyi bu 'dzam bu gling lta zhog/ gling chen po bzhi pa'o'ajig rten gyi khams kyi semA
na lha 'kho/ mi 'am/ dol yin pa'i skye ba'i gnas na gnas pa ji snyed pa'i sems na de dag thams cad kyi mdun du de bzhin gshegs bas gru khung pu gcig nas de bzhin/
gshegs la dge slong gi dag 'dang bcas yang dag par ston la/ de dag kyang gcig gis gcig ma shes so// mo'u 'gal gyi bu gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams sems can rnams
lta khazhog gi/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu nan gyis dper byas na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can du bsdu bar bsngag pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par ma
lus thob par gyural/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu sems canamar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyi mdun du/ de bzhin gshegs pas skya'i khung bu gcig nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag slong gdag
'dun dang bcas pa yang dag par mdzad la/ deg kyang gcig gis gcug ma shes so// mo'u 'gal gyi bu steng gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams
cad lta zhog gi/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can du smos pa gang yin pa'i sems can gyi khamasani chas mang gis/ sa'i
khams ni de ltar ma yin no// de bzhin du lho dang/ nub dang/ byang gi phyogs dang/ phyogs tshoms dang ) 'og dang steng gi phyogs bcur kho ra khor yug du/ phyogs re re yang 'jig rten gyi
[p khams ga 'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can du smos pa gang yin pa'i sems can gyi khams ni ches mang gi/ sa'i khams ni de ltar ma yin no// mo'u 'galaspyi bu nan gyis dper byas/
sems can khaM/gas cad kyis snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob bgyur kyang/ mo'u 'gal gyi busems can de dag thams cad la yang de bzhin gshegs pas skya'i khung bu gcig nas re re
bdun du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag slong gi dag 'dun dang bcas par yang dag par ston la/ sems can de dag kyang cig gis cig mi shes so// mo'u 'gal gyi bu phyogs bcur gang+gA'i klung
gi bye ma snyed 'jig rten gyi khams dag na ) sems can 'khod pa rnams lta zhog gi/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni gdon 'di la bzhugs bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi sbyin
sgrub pa med pa dang/ thogs pa mang pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed yod pa rnams gzigs te/ de dag ni ngas kyang sangs rgyas kyi ya shes ma mnyam pas/ bskal pa 'bum du yang
dper blangs pa bgrangs pa'i tshul gyis bstan par sla ba ma yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dgan de ma du dpag du med do// ngas gdan 'ad la bzhugs bzhan du gang gzigs pa dang/
de bzhin gshegs pas dper blang ba bgrangs pa dug gis bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/ sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas dang 'dra bar gyur pas kyang ) shes pa 'am/ gzhal ba'am
brtag par bya ba ma yinan/ nyan thos rnams kyis lta ci smos te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'ba'ashag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag rgya bralag ji snyed yod pa dang/ stong phrag
ji snyed yod pa dang/ 'bum phrag ji snyed yod padang/ bye ba 'bum phragaji snyed yod pa dang/ gtams phrag ji snyed yod pa dang/ dkrigs phrag ji snyed yod pa dang/ mi 'khrugs phrag dza sid
yod pa dang/ grangs med pa brag ji snyed yod pa dang/ dpag tu med pa brag ji snyed yod pa dang/ gang+gA klung gi bye ma snyed brag ji snyed yod pa dang/ stong gsum gyi rdul phrarab kyi rdul longs
su gang ba ji snyad yod pa mkhyen to/ mo'u 'gal bu sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgribs pa med pa dang )thogasapa med pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed mthong pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dug na/ sems
can gang semasacan du bsdu bar bsdus shing smos pa 'asems can gyi khams rnams ni chasam ga/ sa'i khamasan da lta ma yin to// soms can de dag mas cad kyis snga phyi med par ma'i lus
thob par gyur la/ slob nas kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur te 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal bo re re yang de snyed kyi 'khor yod par gyur kyang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'khor los sgyur
ba'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas ba de dag thamasacod la de bzhin gshegs pas sa'i khung bu gciganas rera'i bdun du de bzhin gshegs pasadag slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa long
dag bar ston la ) gcig gis gcig kyang mi shes te/ rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo// deTazhin du spu'i khung bu thams cad nus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge slong gi dge
'dun dang bcas pa yang dag par ston kyang ) de bzhin gshegs ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'khrul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi brgya'i cha 'am/ stong gi cha'am/ 'bum gyi cha 'am/ bya ba khrag
'bum gyi cha 'am/ grangasasam/ cha 'am/ bgrang ba 'am/ dpemaM rgyu tsam yang yang dag par bstan par mi 'gyur te/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu de ltar na/ dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyirdzu 'phrul dang/ ye shes dpag tu medaM ba dang ldan no// mo'u 'gal bu 'ad ji snyam du sems/ sems can 'khor los sgyurakhar gyur pa de dag gi
bsod nams kyaphud po gang gis 'khor las sbyar ba'irgyal srid dang )na po che sna bdun thob pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po mang ngam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'dasam pa lags so// bdA
bar gshegs pa dpag tu ma mchis so// bka'icul kha/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod chos par bya'o// khong du chud kharakhyago/ sems can 'khor los sgyur kharagyur pa de dag thams cad kyi
bsod nams kyi phung po de bas ches mang pa'i bsod nams kyi nga khos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khung bu gcig yongs su 'grub par gyur ro// de nos bcom ldan 'das la dad ldan
[st]/ pamo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skadaces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ston pa 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba dang ) 'di ltar mthu che bar grags pa dang//
ka 'di ltar mthu che bani bdag gis rnyed pa legs b.rarnyed lags so// de lta lags kyis kyang bdag ni rgyu'i rjes su 'gro ba'i chos thams cad la thog pa mamachis ba'i re shas 'di lta bu lasadaman
bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyirdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul 'di thogs/ lagacig sems bskyed ba'i sems can
de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par red lags na/ gang dag mos par bgyid la men shing yod chos nas kyang/ rdzu 'phrul dang/ ye shes 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ blun
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa lta mos kyang ci 'tshal te sems can de dag ni lha dang bcas ba'i 'jig rten na phyag bgyi ba gnas lags so// bka' stsal pa/
mo'u 'gal gyi bu denA dbazhin te khyod je skud zer ba bzhin du/ sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rnams la yid ches pa de dag gis ni rnyed pa legs par red do// de dag
ni leg par ltung ba'i dogs pamed par bya'o// de nas lhado dag dang/ klu de dag dang ) brgya byin de dag dang/ tshangs pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das las sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul/
00//rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di thos nas ) tshig 'thun par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal lo// sems can gang dag gis ye shes 'de
lta bu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir sems bskyed pa la/ skyed par 'gyur ba de dag la yang phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar da ltar na de bzhin gshegs parnam par 'phrul pa de bzhin du de
dag kyang rnam par 'phrul par 'gyur te/ de bas bdag cag gis 'di lasom nyi'am/ yid gnyes sam/ the tsom za bar mi bya'o zhes ched du rjod pached du brjod do// de nas lha dang// klu dang/
gnod sbyin dang/ dri za de dug dang/ brgya byin de dag dang/ tshangs pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba dang/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gus bar bya ba'i phyir sil snyan 'bul
sgrag phyung ngo[â]lhab me tog utul dang/ pad+ma dang/ ku mud dang/ pad+ma dkar po dag gis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas thams cad la mngon par gtor to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan
pa na/ sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i lha khrag khrig phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis sems bskyedade/ tshig 'di skad du ji ltar da ltar na/ de bzhin
gshegs pas sgrogs bde bzhin du bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du bla na med pa'i song ga'i sgra sgrogs par gyur cigaces skyasaso// do nas
bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu zla ba dang/ zla ba mchog gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam
ka grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par bgyid pa dang ) gzhan dag la rgya cher yang drag par ston pa de bsod nams ji tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur lags/
de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu zla ba dang/ zu mchog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
dag nyid kyang 'chang la/ gzhan dag la yang ston pa de na/ dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin no// da rtsa'i phyir zhe na ) lha'i bu 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos
(na/ nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems bskyed par mi 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'ba' shag tu sems skyed par 'gyur ba'i phyiro//

da ci'i phyir zhen/ lha'i bu rgyu chen po la mesal dbang po rnon po/ sngon gyi rgyal paM la lhag par bya ba byas pa rnams ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dga' ba skyed par 'gyur gyi chung du la mos pa rnamA
ni de ltar ma yin no// lha'i bu rnam grangs 'dis na/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang/ klog pa rnams ni ci nas dkon mchog gsum gyi rgyun mi bcod pa'i phyir gnas pa yi
pa de ltar rig par bya'o/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang dkonamchog gsum rgyan me gcad pa'i phyir gnas pa de'i bsngags pa'i mtha' 'am/ bsod nams kyi mkhra' sangs rgyas
'bum sku tshe'i tshad bskal par zhugs pas kyang bstan pa 'am/ bshadapar do dam ) gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bka' stsal ba ) lha'i bu rnam grangs/
'dis kya nga gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa dang/ gzhan dag la ston pa de bsod nams tshad med pa skyed par 'gyur par ma khas pas de ltar rag par bya'o// danas bcom ldan 'das la khyab
chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'da' mang ci lags ) 'di 'ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/
byams pa de'i phyir khyodakyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi le'u zhes bya bar zung shig/ sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul zhes bya khor yang zung shig
bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha'i bu zla ba dang/ zlamchog dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'o chen po byams pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu/
chen po dang/ tshangs pa de dag dang/ brgya byin de dag dang/ lha dang ) ma dang ) lha ma yin dang/ dra zar bcas pa'i 'jig rtan yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
mngon par bstod do/// 'phags pa sum cu rtsa sumapa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/// rgya gar mkhan po/
ka pradzAbaramadang/ zhu chen gyi le tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yamatAshutamanAm mahAyAn sU tra/
bod skad du/ 'phags pa sgra chen po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis blos pa'i
dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yodun/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dgeslong gi dag 'dun mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan
pa kun dga' bo snga drosham thabs dang chos gos bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms lasong ngo// mnyan yodadu bsod snyoms la 'gro ba na/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
bas/ khang pa brtsigs pa chen po phyi nang byugs shing byi dor byas pa/ sgogatan legs par bcug pa/ skar khung bcad pa zhig mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te )gang zhag
gas khang ba rtsegasaba'adi lta bu zhig byas te/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'bul bar byed pa dang gang zhag gas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel
[p ]yungs 'bru tsam mchod rten gyi 'bum pa skya ru ra tsam gyi nang du bcug ste ) srog shing lab tsam btsugs nas/ gdugs rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'dog par byed pa 'am ) de bzhin gshegs ba'i
sku gzugs tshon gang tsam zhig byed na/ de nyig las gang gas bsod nams ches mang du 'phel snyam mo// de nas tshodang ldan b kun dga' 'omanyan yod nas bsod snyoms las sar 'khor nas/
zin zos te zas phyi ma sbyangs nas/ lhung bzed dang/ chos gos bzhag ste/ rkang pa bkrus nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la/
mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'du gnas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to btsun pa 'di na bdag
snga sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te/ lhung bzed thogasanas mnyan yod du bsod snyomasalamachis te/ btsun pa bdag mnyan yod du bsod snyomasal mchis lan/ khang pa rdzogs pa
chen po slad nang byugs shing/ byi dor bgyis pa/ sgo stan legs par stsal pa/ skar khung bkum ba bzhig mthong lags so// mthong ginas kyang bdag nyid 'di snyam du sems te/
gang zhig gis khong pa rtsegs pa 'di lta bu zhig bgyis te )phyogs bzhi pa'i dag slong gi dag 'dun la 'bul bar bgyid pa dang/ gang zhag gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan
zhu// las 'dus pa'i rang srel yungs 'bru tsam mchod rten gyi bum paskya ru ra tsam gyi nang du stsal te/ srog shing 'khab tsam btsugs nas/ gdugs rgya shug gi lo matsam
'dog par bgyid pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs tshon btang pa tsam zhig bgyid na/ de gnyis las gang gis bsod nams ches mang du 'phel snyam bgyid lags bcom
sgyu ldan 'das la bdag don 'di yongs su zhu lags sa de skad ces gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshadang ldan pa kun dga' bol 'di skad ces bka' stsalato// kun dga' b.lags/
legs so// kun dga' b khyod ga zhig gis khang pa brtsigs pa lta bu zhig byas te/ phyogs bzhi pa'i dag slong gi dag 'dun la 'bul bar byedal/ gang zhig gis de bzhin gshog
za pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang srel yungs 'bru tsams mchod rten gyi bum pa skya ru ra tsam gyi nang du bcug ste/ srog shing khab tsam btsugs nas gdung sa rgya shug ga lematsam 'deg
bar byed pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs tshon gang ba tsam zhig byedanA/ de gnyis las gang bsod nams chasamang du 'phel zhes bya ba na/ khyod gyi zhu kha bzang la slebs
legs te sod khangaga'o// kun dga' bo do'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang/ sa bshad do/ kun dga' bo gang zhig khang pa brtsigs pa de lta bu zhog
[/ ]byas nas/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'bul bar byed la/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bsrel lungs 'bru tsam mchod rten bum pa/
skyarur tsam gyi nang du bcug te/ srog shing khatsam btsugs nas/ gdugs rgya shug gi lo matsam 'dog par byed pa 'cha/ de bzhin gshegs ba'i sku gzugs tshon gang tsam zhig byed na/
nad 'bo bsod nams 'dal/ bsod nams snga ma desabargya'i char yang nye bar mi gro/ stong gi cha dang/ 'bum gyi cha dang/ grangs dang/ chud/ dpe dang/ rgyur yang nye bar
mi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir na na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus rnams ni/ dpag tu med pa'i chos 'di lta bu dug dang ldan te/ tshul khrims
dpag tu med pa dang/ ting ri'adzin dpag tu med pa dang/ shes rab dpag tu med pa dang/ rnam par grol ba da khag tu med pa dang/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa dpag tu med pa
dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' kho 'dzam bu'i gling chu zheng dang/ rgyur dpag tshad bdun stong yod pa 'di/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang// phyir mi 'ong
ba rnams dang ) dgra bcom pa rnams dang ) rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'di lta ste/ 'bras sA lus zhing ngam/ til gyis zhing ngam/ smyug ma' 'tshal lam ) 'dam bu'i 'tshal lam/
bur ram da ga tshal bzhin du gang b.ragyur pa de dag la/ ma la la zhig gas ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du chos gos dung/ bsod snyoms dang/ mal cha dang
nad kyi gso sman dang/ yo byad rnams gyis re 'dod bstabs te/ de dag thams cad yongs sumyang n las 'das nas kyang mchod rten byas te/ gdugs dang/ sal snyan dang// kha
dan dang/ sridang/ bdug pa dang/ 'breng ba dang/ phyom dang/ byug pa de dag gras mchod pa byed la/ gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs ba yongs sumya ngan las 'das pa'i rang
bsrel yungs 'bru tsam mchod rten rgya bum pa skyu ru ra tsam gyi nang du bcug ste/ srog shing khab tsam gtsug nas ) gdugs rgya shug ga lem tsam 'dogapar byed pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs
pa'i sku gzugs tshon gang tsam zhig byedun/ kun dga' bsod ms 'dal/ bsod nams snga ma des )brgya' char yang nye b.ram 'gro/ stong gi chu dang/ 'bumachu cha dang/ grangs dang/
cha dang/ dpe dang/ rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// draca'akhyer zhan/ dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangasargyus rnams ni dpag tumed pa'i chos 'di lta bu dang dag
ldan te/ tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa dang/ shes rab dpag tu med pa dang/ rnam par grol ba dpag tu med pa dang/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dpag
tumed bra dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo shar gyi lus 'phags glang chu zheng dang/ rgyar dpag tshad brgyad stong yod pa/ rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyis gang bar gyur ces bya ba nas ) rnam bar
grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa zhes bya bakhar durgya cher sngam bzhin du brjod par bya'o// kun dga' bo nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling chuzhing dang/ rgyar dpag tshad dgu stong yodapa/ rgyun du zhugs pa

rnams kyis gang bar gyur ces bya ba nas/ snga ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro// kun dga' bo byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling chu zhing du dpag tshad khri yod pa/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis gang bar gyur ces

bya ba nas )sngam bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro// kun dga' bo khargya khyenagyi khang bzas rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba/ kakha khargyad khri bzhi stong rab tu brtan po dag yod do/ ka ba de dag thams cad kyang
lha'i kha ru sngon po yin te/ kun dga' bo khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba gsar gyi bye ma bdal bal/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab la/gser gyi dra bas g.yogs shing/ gser gyi dril bu/
g.yer kas khaskor ba ste/ kun dga' kho gang zhig stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams khang bzangs de lta bu sha stag gis bkang ste/ phyogs bzhi'i dag slong gi dag 'dul 'bul bar
byedal/ gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung yungs 'bru tsam zhes bya banas/ rgya cher sngam bzhin du sbyar ro// kun dga' bo lus 'phags mo'abum/
ga d+ha'i rgyal sa kha skyes dgras ) brgyun du zhugs pa bsad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa sku gdung la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ sku gdung gi brgyad cha la bkur sti bya ba dang//
bla mar bya ba dang/ rA mo'i bya ba dang/ mchod bar bya ba dang/ rjed par bya ba da/ gsol bar bya ba la brtson par 'gyur ro zhes sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa'i dge ba'i de des byas pas/ sems
can dmyal bar lan cig song nas/ las de nyid dang/ dgaba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang/ sngon legs par spyad khade nyid kyis/ de nas thar nas bskal pa nyi shur 'thog pasalhung bar 'gyur la/ sgra dang la

skya bregs nas/ gos ngur smrig bgos te/ yang dag par khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/ rang byang chub mngon du byed par 'gyur te/ rang sangs rgyas rnam par rgyal ba'i sde nas bya bar 'gyur 'od
datsa'i phyir nAn ) de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus rnams ni dpag tu med pa'i chos 'di lta bu dag dang ldan ste/ tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang/ ting nge
'dzin dpag tu med pa dang/ shes rab dpag tu med pa dang/ rnam par grol ba da bag tu med pa dang ) rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa dpag tu med drung ldan pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo 'di
ltar de bzhin kha/shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dpag tu med pa'i chos rnams dang ldan pa de'i phyir/ de la mchod pa'i rnam par sman pa yang de ltar dbagatu
[&]/ mdo bar shes par bya'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mgon/ shar phyogs dma'//
lho phyogs mthon kyang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mthon/ lhaphyogs dma' )dbus mtho na ma ba dma'/ mgrwa'aman/ dbusadama'akhar gyur to// dranas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
kun dga' bos 'daskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming calags/ bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i
phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdud rtsi'i rnga zhes bya bar zungashag/ sgra chen po zhes bya bar yang zungashig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pakun daga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon bstod de/
rjes su yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshalate/ bcom ldan 'das la lan sum bskor bcas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyispyan snganas song ngo// 'phags pasgrachen
po zhes bya ba theg pa chen pe'amado rdzogasaso/// rgya gar gyi mkhan po bshung sang ha dang/ la tsab ban ng+hadag kha dpal gyi bsgyur ! rgya gar gyi mkhan po bde rgyu ka rasangahadang/
zhuchen gyi lo tsab banang+ge de ba tsan tras zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AraprakAt+yAsamud pA danAm ma hA yAn sU tra/ bod skad
'phags pa rten mi 'phel bar 'byung ba zhes bya baTheg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalago/ 'di skad bdag gis
ka thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i nang na/ ar mo lig lta bu'i rdo leb la rta thul la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams dang/ 'phags pa byams pa dang/ 'phags
ts+tshA ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ lag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin po che dpag tu med khas brgyan pa rnams dang ) mi mjed kyi bdag po tshang
pa chen po dang ) sred med kyi budang/ dbang phyug chen po lasogs pa lha rnams dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byinangang/ dri za'i rgyal po gtsug phud lnga pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa'atshon po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan lasal sati/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu b.ranas ) pus mo las pa'i lcang ra rab kyi rtsomo la btsugs te/ bam
ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su tholamo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha 'di dag ni/mchod rten bgyid par 'tshol ba sha stag ste/ 'khor
gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir mchis nas/ canas tshangs pa'i bsod nams 'phel ba dang/ lhadang bcas pa bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ dag sbyong dang//
bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu las dag slong dang/ dge slong ma dang// dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma dag bsod nams shin tumang du 'phel bar 'gyur bde lta de ltar/ bcom ldan 'das de//
dag la chos bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsalapa) la d+hamahetubra bA he tun te bun ta thA ga to bya ba data/ te'anatsa
yon ro d+ha eTaM dA dI mahAtha ma Na// chos gang rgyus byung de dag gi/ rgyu dang de 'gogo gang yin pa'ang// de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal te// dge sbyong chenapo de skad gsung// spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug 'di lta ste/ rten cing 'brel b.ro'abyung ba 'ad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku yin te/ sus rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mkhreng ba des/ de bzhanagasheg
pa mthong ngo// spyan ras gza'i sa da bang phyugs rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can gang la la zhig gisaM/ ma gas pa'i phyogs su chod rtenan skya ru ra'i 'bru tsam/ srog shing ni/
khab tsam/ gdugasanA ba ku la'i mi tog tsam zhig byas la/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung bachos kyi dbyangs kyi tshigs su bcad pa nang du bcug na/ de tshongs pa'i bsod nams bskyed par
'gyur te/ 'di nas shi 'phos shing 'chi ba'i dus byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas shi 'phos te 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnamA
dang khasal po mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skadaces bka' stsal nas nyan thos dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ thams
ka cad dang ldan pa'i 'a khor de dag dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la man par bstod do//
sgyu 'bags ba rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya batheg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ 1 1 rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bo d+hi sad tAtsAranar
deshan nAm mahAyAn sU ta (bod skad du/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i sad pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams
cad la phyag 'tshal la/ 'ad skad bdag gi shes ba'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yangs pa canan/ tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsigs pa'i gnas na/ dge slong stong tham pa'i
dag slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba ) shes rab shin tu
rnam bar grol ba ) cang shis pa/ glang po chen po// bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byed pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yong sa su zad pa/ gang dag
ba pa'ishes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol duson pa) spyod lam ni bdang/ dul ba dang/ rnam par zol kha dang/ ma brtags pa dang )
ldan pa sha stag la 'dalta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gang zug gciganam gtogs te/ de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyams su lenapar bka' stsal to/ tsho 'di nyidal lung
bstan pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' skyo khag thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa/ thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa) thams cad kyang mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa dang ldan pa/ thams cad kyang
ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa'i sa thob pa/ mkhas pa drang po dad pa dang ldan pa ) rtog pa mang ba/ dang ba/ gtso bor byed pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa/ khro gnyer med pa ) g.yo med pa da
grub pa dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad kyirang bzhin rjes su rtogs pa/ chos bstan pas yongs su ma skyob/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yang dag par skyes pa/ yongs su smin b.rakhyad pa/
ldem po ngag laphyin ci ma log pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa/ yul thams cad phyin ci ma log kha'is dang ldan pa/ dus shes pa ) tshod shes pa/ skabs shes pa ) ran pa shes pa/ rgod
kha med pa/ khengs pa med pa/ dalamatha mal pa/ phun sum tshogs pa/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mkhas pa 'byung ba dang/ 'jig pa yongs su sbyangs pasmon pa med pa'i ting
gange 'dzin dang ldan pa/ 'khor ba la yun ring du spyod pa la bzhugs pa/ mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa/ sprin pa'i rnam pa thams cad kyi mtshan ma legs/
par bzung kha/ sems na yongs su smin par bya ba la mkhas pa/ 'du shes thams cad dang 'bral ba/ nyan thos kyi theg pa rnam par gzhag pa la mkhas pa/ chos bstan pa yang dag
bar dbye bar 'jug par byed pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ston pa nye bar zhi ba'i bsngags pa brjod par/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par slong ba/ spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhes 'gas
bamed bar ston pa sha wa lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba dang/ sobs pa rtsegs pa dngo lag na rin chen ldan dang/
sa 'od dang/ mtha' las snang blo gros dang/ ngan song skyong dang// don grub sems dpa' dang/ yon tan rgyal po snang dang ) mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad sel ba'i blo gros dang/ mi mnyam pa
thams cad ston kha ruba'arang bzhin du ma gnas pa dang ) blo mtha' yas dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ rtsal brtan porasams pa dang/ rin chen 'byung gnas dang/ bkod pa'i rgyal kho dang/
rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po dang/ 'khrul pa med pa'i mthu rtsal dad )khyad par khro gres dang/ kun nas mdzesadang/ sgrib med ston dang/ rnam par rtso dang/ gsar mchog 'od dpaladang//
chos thams cad la rtag tu lta ba'i blo ldan dang/ sos dra rgyar sbyin me tog kun tu rgyas dang/ gtso bo rtsigs dang/ tshunamed pa'i dpal dang/ lhun po'i lta dang/ spyan ras gzigs dbang
ga dang/ sngos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang/ mchog dga' ba'i rgyaladang/ blo mtha' yog bsgrub pa dang/ dam pa'i chos thams cad mi brjod bar gnas pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'
somasadapa' chen posang ga ltar sgra mngon par bsgrags pa dang/ de dag dang byang chub sems dpe stong phrag mang po gzhan dag dang yang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas
bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas ) dge slong nyis stong gas bskor cing mdun du bdar te yangs pa'i grong khyer chen por bsod
somal gshigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs sgo'i them pa la zhag ma thag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams grong khyer du gshegs pa na ) ngomatshar rmad dubyung ba'i chos rnams
'byung bar 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag byung ste/ long ba rnamasan mthong bar gyur/ 'on pa rnams na thos par gyur/ skyon pa rnams ni dran pa red par gyur to// lha'o me tog gi char yang
bab bo// snang ba chen po yang byung nga/ srang yang dri med par gyur to// lha'i sal snyan yid du 'ong ba dag kyang mkhajungs par grag go/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal kha laphrug pa
ba/ @#/ nas 'og min gyi gnas man chad kyi sems can thams cad kyang gcig tu nges par bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// de'i tshe yangs pa'i grong khyer chen pon litsaphyi/
seng ga 'i bu rin chen byin zhes bya ba skyes nas lo sum lenal ma ma'i bang kha na 'dug pa/ khang bzang sa rgyan kyisabargyan pa'i khang bzangs kyi steng na 'dug ste/ khye'u rag chen byin gyis rmad
du 'byung ba'i mtshan ma dag mthong ngo// danas khye'u mi chen byin gyis rang gam ma la tshigs su bcad de smras ba ma ma ba/nga ga mthu stobs kyis// shin tu ya mtshan byung bsnang// nyimabye b rnams
kyi 'do// zil gnon snang 'di su zhig yin// stong gsums gsal khyab gyur nas// ngan gri skams par byed pa yi/rdzu 'phrul snang ba gang yin 'di// mam bdag la myu dusmras// dus min me
tog char ba yin// sangs rgyas zhing mtshams med par mdzes// phyogs rnams bya yi tshogs rnams kyis// skad snyan pasani khyab par gyur// sung yang me tog rnams kyis khebs// me tog
gdugs kyang rnam par bres// skyes pa bud med dga' rnamasakyis// kun nas rab tu mdzes par 'dug/ long ba rnams kyis mig kyang thob// 'on pa rnams kyi sgra yang thos// byad nganakhyad
gzugs phun sum tshogs// mdog na kha dog phun sum tshogs// g.yeng ba rnams kyang dran par/ lcamed tshagan rnam par dag/ sems can byams pa'isems med pa// byams pa'i
[d/]sems dang ldan par gyur/ ma ma sems can khyad par can// rdzu 'phrul sgrub pa mthu ldan b// 'jig rten drag na rgyu ba 'di// su lan drug la kun myur smos// de nas khye'u na chen khyen gyi
mams khye'u rin chen byin la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// rnam par dag pa spyod mchog ldan// rgyal ba dri med blo mi dman// bsam yas ma lus yongs su dag/ dbang ldan yon tan ni tshan
'phags// 'jig rten mgon po 'khrus sa mgo/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtsa lag 'di// blo ldan bsod snyoms don du gshegs// 'jig rten chos la rten pa med// 'di la sdug dang ma
sdug sogs// 'jig rten kha la rtogami mnga'/ pad+ma chu las skyes par ltar/ mnga' bdag mi gos spyod par mdzad// blo gros ldan pa dri tsom gcod// ban mdzad thugasarjer ldan bde//
'griba'i sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir// rnam par 'dren pa 'dir gshegs so// bstod kyang dgyes par ma 'gyur la// smad kyang 'khrugakhar ma 'gyur te// khong khro rjesasuchags pasad/
chags med sgrub rlung dang 'dra// 'di ni chos rgyal dag pa ste// ye shes zab mo phun sum tshogs// don dmadon lamakhas pa po/ 'grokha'i slob dpon gshegs pa yin// de ni dbu
ma ston pa ste// yod med 'dzan las rnam par grol// tshos lam ldan zhing zhi ba ste// rtan pa thams cad yongs su skangs// ye shes phung po bdag med bdag/ bsod nams tshog
0can// rnams bsags kha yi// bde gshegs 'jig rten 'dren bko/ mtha' yas gzugs can ded gshegs so// dbu skra g.yas su 'khyil bar gnas// 'jam zhing
mag snam lcang lo can// gnag cid 'dzangs pa med rnams kyis// de yi dbu na rnam par mdzes// gtsug tor g.yasasu 'khyil bste// dbu skra 'khyil mi legs par gnas// ring
rtse mo gro bar ni// de la smin mtshams mdzod spu mdzes// 'jam nyung g.yas su 'khyil ba ste// 'od ni shel dang zla ba yi// 'od zeradra ba mang bas lhag/ de yi zhal nas spyan mdzes
ra ba 3me tog up+pal sngon po 'dra// ba yarje mo yog sudag/ medumar ma 'dzings zhi bar gzigs// dpal ldan seng ga 'gram pa 'dra// den rtag tu zhal yang 'dzum// sgros ni
bam la bzhin du dmAr/ gzhal mas lus can kun 'dren ga mthu stobs chen po phun sum tshogs/ bsod nams brgya pa'i stobs mnga' ba// tshems kyi 'phrad kha sa ba'i
'od// snyoms shing thags bzang yongs su dag/ de yi tshams ni shin tu dkar// rdzogs na shin tu ring zhing srab// bdag nyid kyi na zhal gyi ngos/ de las kun tu khyab par
gnas// dpal ldan dbu na gdugs dang 'dra/ de bzhin de ni shangs kyang mgo/ mdog ni khetsoma'i gser dang 'dra// de yi zhal gyi 'bral ba tshes// de yi zhal gyi smin tshugs na// kha
00/ dog mthon mthing shin tu sdug/ zhi ba'i spyan na mdzes pa ste// snyan gyi drung du thug bar gnas// snyan shal rang la rab tu 'phyang// zhal mdzes ston gyi zla bas lhag/ zhal ras pad+ma rnam

dag 'dra// zhal mdangs dkar la dngasaang gsa' brtan po tshos ba'i sgra skad ldan//de gsung ka la ping ka'i 'dra de la gsung bzang yid du 'ong// 'jam zhing sems can tshim par byed// rma bya ngang pa ma 'kha si/
na ri skyegs khu byug dang// 'brug sgra khrung khrung kun la// shang shang te'u dang gling bu dang/ rdza rnga'i sgra dang gzhan dag kyang// sa skad snyanapa ci yang rung// dad de bzhin gshegs pa yi//
gsung gabacu drug char ma yod// skulamad de bzhinamanyen paste// denasan cing 'jamapa dang// yid 'ong dga' byed gsal bto// skyonadang bral zhing 'jigs pa med// ri rnams latshar rgyun ltar/
sems rgyun tshim par byed la zhi// ma nyamasam 'khrul rab tu zhi// de bzhin dag cing brdaphradasu/ skul dang ldan zhing snyanapar ldan)/ don dang yon na thamasacad tshogs// gsung gi rgyan rnams
phun sum tshogs// de la gsung na dag skyed pa// sems can mos pa b+ha dad dang// dbazhin dus tshegs khyadad rnams / de yi gsung la nges par dad// med kyang rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ des
na phyogasab 'a'ajag rtenakhams/ gnas pa'i sems can gsung gsakhyab// mgon po de yagasungs tshigan// sems can rnams la don yod 'jug/ thub paskyemchog de yin/
glu/ mgur mang dung 'dradapud go zlug/ da la thal gong rgyas pa ste// dan 'dun bo mthob mnga'// de 'khyag kyang 'gaturi// khrags pa gser mchog 'dra ba ste//
ka gser gyi sdong po bzhin du mgo/ rgya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng kob// thugs ka dpal gyi be'us khargyanato// 'khor lo'i mtshan canakhad+ma'i phyag shang bal 'dabaltar rig na 'jam// de la phyag gi sor
kho rang// snga rnams re rer skye zhing yang phyogs stug la 'jam// brang gi phel ka chelarab lta bzag/ phrul dbyibs gzhu 'dra glang chen bzhan du sbubs su nub// rdzangar in la 'dra gdangs
@# dkar 'dam bu'i sbubs// long bu mig nad ya nga b.legs par grug/ de bzhin drang srong ser molang zhing sen mo dmar// khad bar gshags kyi zhabs kyi long bu mi mngon te// 'khor lo
lcags kyu bkra shis ldan dang dung gis smras// mgon po de la zhabs gnyis mnyam zhing legs gnas dang// shang bal bzhin du reg na 'jam zhing bzang ba dang// me tog utul bar ngo log
bar skyes pa yi// kha dag 'dra bas sa gzhi bdag la gshegs par mdzad// dbazhan gshegs pa seng ga'i sgra sgrogs bde sbyin pa// 'gro b rnams kyi gtso bodan 'der gshegs te// ga yod
gis 'jigs pa med par seng ge'i skad kyis// gnyis sumed cing sa bamed pa'i chos kyang ston// denas khye'u rin chenabyin gyi bdag bsams la 'di skad ces smras so/ mam bdag skar khung
[s]'dir zhig shig dang// de bzhin gshegs pa la blta'o// de nasal mdes khye'u zhe chen byin skab khung du bzhag go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u rin chen byin gyis sems kyi yongasu rtog kha
thugs kyisam khyenanas// srang de kho nar gshegasaso// khye'u rin chen gyis kyang// bcom ldan 'dasagashegs pa mthong/ mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te// gang dag dbazhin
gshegs pa yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa 'di lta bu mthong na// byang chub kyi sems skyed par ma byed pa de dag ni rnyed pas par rnyed pa 'o snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'dus khye'u rin chen/
byon gyis sgo'i drung du gshegs so// de nas khye 'u nachenangun 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can khyad par can 'di lta bu n khasal kha byib khrig 'bum du yang rnyed par dkas/ khang bzangs
'dalasakhadagag gas mchod bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas de'i tshe khye'u rin chen byin gyis ril gyis gsar las byas pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma 'bum dang ldan pa rdzun pa lag matIl du khyer dro/ denas
khye'u rin chen byin gyis khang khazas de las bdag nyid kyis mchongs so// dusangs rgyas kyi mthus nam ma pa 'khar snang la 'dug go/ de nas khyu'unachen byin gyis ral gyis gser las
byas pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma 'bum dang ldan pade bcom ldan 'das la phul lo// de khye'u rin chenabyin gyi lag nas btang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i drang thad kyis ma kha 'bar snang ga
ba00 glud/ pad+ma'i gdugs su byas te rin po che'i dra ba lang bres so// de nas de 'i tshe khye'u 'an chen shun gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas pad+ma 'di phulag/
bdag nici yang mi 'tshal te// don rnams blams cad grub slad du// bdag ni byang chub mchog 'tshol lo// ji ltar byang chub ma skyesAlag/ thob pamamachis gshegs ma mchis// blang
du ma mchis don mtshams// de ltar bdag gas me toga'abul// byas pa rnams kyi don gang brtags// rtogs pade naNonam mchis// rtog pa zlums cad slad du// gang zag mchog
ra 'khadag mchod bgyid// dephyir me tog phul ba 'di// bdag la rnamasnyan 'brasam gyur// dngos po thams cad gacad slad du// pad+ma bdun bdagags phul// bdag gis sangs rgyas zhing
dun rgyal mchog theg pas 'gro mgatogs// nyan thos kyin ming yang rung// rang rgyalamang 'byum 'gyur// donas tshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos khye'u rin chen 'gasasu
bcad de smras pa// khyed ni ston pa 'di 'dal// dad pas mchod pa byed mos kyis// blo gros phyin ci log gyur na// sangs rgyas sun ji ltar 'gyur// de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyis tshe
dang ldan pa mo'u 'galagyi bu chen po la tshigs su bcad de smas pa// 'di dag thams cad ma skyes te// 'dus byas dgan bgasob dang gsog/ de 'dra ba la chos rnams la// dngos/
[m khor 'gyur ba ga la yod// khyod kyis chos gos ngur smrig bgos// dgra bcom nyid du 'dzin par byed// rnam shes 'di dang spyod yul yang// stong pa kho na ma yin nam// dmigs pa la/
niganas bcas pas// sangs rgyas bye bamamanyis kyis// byakha de yang zhibar mthong// su yang ma mnyes byas pa med// mo'u 'gal gyi bu la da dung yang// dmigasapa 'jug pa
yod dam ci// khyod kyi semasazhigang zhig gis// yon yang yongs su sbyong bar byed// denas tshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos khye'u rin chen byin la 'di skad ces smras so// khye'u
cade banAn gshegs pas blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas sam/ chos kyang ma bstan tam/ khye'u rin chen byin gyis skyes pa// mo'u
'gal gyi bu mkhas pas ni byang chub smos par mi bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa yang rlom sems su mi bya'o// chos ma skye'o snyam du skyag par bya'o// sa khams cad 'dus byas so snyam
du smug khar mi bya'o/chos mas cad 'dus ma byas so snyam du skrag par ma bya'o// de bzhin sbyar te// chos thams cad skye ba dang/ ma skye ba dang/ dngos po dang/ dngos pomed pa
zhes bya ba dang/ 'dzan pa dang/ gtong ba zhis khya khadang/ phrad pa dad bral ba zhes bya bdag 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dang/ gnas pa dang/ phob dang/ 'dod chags kyis chos dang/
@#/ zhe sdang gi chos dang/ gtamug gi chesadang/ chos dang/ chos ma yin zhes brtag par mi bya'o// ma rig pa lasogs banas/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams dang
nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang deng sang sargyas kyi chos rnams dung/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos rnams dang/ rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams
dang/ gzugasAn dang ) gzugs can ma yin pa dang de 'du shes dang/ 'du shes med pa dang/ mtshan nyid dang/ mtshan nyid med pa dang/ spyod pa yongasudag padang/ mnyam
pa nyidadang/ mamanyamakhanyid dang/ lus dang/ sems dang/ chos thams cad tshul bzhin dang/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar du skyes bar 'gyur zhes skug par mi bya'o
mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgyu 'am ) smras pa/ de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ ci ru
khazhin gshegs pa dri bzhin nyer la ma gtogs pa dang/ byang chub de bzhin nyid la ma gtogs pa dang/ soso'i skye bodabazhin nyid la ma gtogs par 'dod dam ) mo'u 'gal gyi bus
smas pa/ de na ma yin no// khye'us smras pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyed spros pa med pal spros bar byed dum ) mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa ) kha bon 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyi sgo nas
tsal ston to/khye 'us smras pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'jig rten ni brdzun pa spu ba sgyu ma'i rnam pa byis pa 'dis par byed pa'o// mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ gal te 'jig rten 'di brdzun
bslapa'i chos can yanan/ bstan pa 'dra yang brdzun pa mu kho'i chesaM runo yan na// khyod ci'i phyir ston par byed/ smas pa ) mo'u 'gal gyi bu chos thams cad ni bstan du
med pa ste/ da dug na bstan par bya ba ma yin/ sleb par bya ba ma yin ) mngon sum du bya ba ma yin/ sdung bar bya ba ma yin/ yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin/ bsgom par
bya bam yin no// mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ 'o na khyod kyis gang gas don du de bzhin gshegs pamachod/ khye'us smras pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod de bshAn gshegs pa 'am/ sbyan pa
bo 'am/ sbyin par dmigs sam/ donas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu cang mi smra bar gyur to// khye'u rin chen byin gyis smras pa ) mo'u 'gal gyi bu bdag gis de lasakhasams nas/ de
bzhin gshegs par 'gyur bayongs su spangs te/ nyan shes kyi theg pa lasems skyed par byed pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ red ba nyes par rad pa'o zhes de skad kyi tshigasmras s// mo'u 'gal
gyi bu smas pa// khyod ni na tshod shin tu gzhon// shes rab kyis rgya mtsho bzhin// khyod kyis ji srid tsam zhig nas// chos 'di dag la bslabs par gyur// khye'u rin chen byin gyis smras pa/bslab pa
thams cad rnam 'jig pa// bslab pa gang yin de bsub min// gang la bslab ba medu bde// mkhas pa rnams kyi bslab pa yin// don gang khyod kyis bdag dris pa//
sems can 'du shes gnas pa ste// 'dir ni chos rnams thams cad lag/ gang la'ang skye khamarnyed do// byis pa rnams ni byang chub dang// 'khor ba nyid du rtog par byed// 'dir ni da dung btsun
pakhyed// byas pa'i chos la 'brang ngam// rang po 'am yang na nyung du zhes// mkhas pa dag ni rtog mkhyad// chos kun snying po med par ni// de bzhin dodag khong du chud// byas pa bam byas
pa'i chos rnams sam// sangs rgyas chos dam rgyal ba'ang rung// blo ldan tha dad ma 'byed kyis// stong pa nyid la de ltar ltos// drang srong chen posabyang chub thob// de ni ma rigs brtags pa
yan/ 3chos 'di la ni skye medan// mya ngan las 'das pa ji ltar thob// chos rnams mtha' yas rab tu gsungs// sems can 'greba'ang dngos po med// mya ngan 'das drang 'khor ba la//
bla dad dbyer medu gzung byar gyis// 'di la rnam pa thams cad du// bstan dang dbri ba ci yang med// tha dad med pa'i chos rnams la// mkhas ba rnamasan rmongs mi 'gyur// byis ba rnams
kyis thob cing snyed// byis pas myang g 'das pa thob// 'khorab la kun chags// rlom sems bdud kyi 'ching ba yin// gang gis blo la ngas thob snyam// dosan ci yang thob pa
[med// de la yang srid 'gro ba yi// ma rig pa la'ang 'jug par 'gyur// byang chub sAng bor 'dug nas ni// mthong ba med cing sbyangs pa'ang med// sang sa rgyas rnams kyi byang chub
'ang thasnyad yin te don du min// byang chub dang ni mya ngan 'das// b+basnyad dag gis brjod mi nus// gang dag de lta yang drag mthong// de dag chos nyid rnam par shes// de nas bcom
ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das khye'u rin chen khyen gyis yun ji srid gcuganas chos 'di laspyod lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa// gang gatshad bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis nga ma skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ba lung bstan pa de 'tsho/ 'demar med mdzad du gsung rab la stong pa nyid la gnas pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to// gang gi tshangs blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dang po sems bskyed pa de 'tsho/ 'dis khazod paklobanus bskal pa kun
