'bum lon no// shAri'akhus gsolapa// bcom ldan 'das khye'u rin chen khyen/ blanamadral yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa'i rgyun gang lags/ rkyen
na gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis khye'u rin chen byin 'di nyid pa sashig dang/ 'di nyid kyis khyod la ston par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bus/
khye'u rin chen byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ci'i phyir khyod bu na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas/ rin chen byin gyis
smras pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyang chub m dmigs pasan/ de'i phyir bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o// shAra'i bus slas pa ) 'o na ci deba'an gshags pa
'deman pa'aDo gsaparasangs rgyas pa lasan dmigs pa la spyod dam/ rin chen byin gyisaslas pa/ gal dbazhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus par 'dzin nan dadamig
par 'gyur ba zhig na/ chos gsung ba ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yang mi mdzadal/ song bar yang mamadzad do// shA ri'i bus slas pa ) khyod chos bzhi sgrub pa dang/ yongs
su smin ba mnyam pas/ bzod ba gang la gnas ) khyedun chen byin gyis sa pa/ bdag gisan chos cig kyang yongs su grub par yang dag par ma mthongan/ bzhi ltatsasmos/ 'di la rang
rgyudag par grub pa gang zhig med de )chos rnam par rig pa zhes bya ba 'den dmigs ba'o// byang chub ces bya ba 'dan dgags pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba 'di 'dzan pa'o// grol
ba zhes bya ba 'di ni sgrog pa'o// shA ri'i bus smras ba/ rigs kyi bu khyod 'di lta bu'i chos rnams la spyod la/ rdzus te skye bas sangs rgyas rnams mngon sum du gyur bar skye zhing/ rtag tu rab tu

ba[â]byung ba 'di ni ngo mtshar to// de nas de 'i tshul 'dzin chen byin gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// skye dang de bzhin skye med gnyis ni sbyos pa te/ kun tu rtogapa'i sa dang bdud kyi spyod yul
yon lus la sogs pa'i chos 'dzin rlom sems 'dod pa yi// lha dang lhaman 'gro ba rnams ni 'dor brlag go/ rgyal bas bdud rtsi 'dus ma byas pa'ares snyam du// de ltar gang
dag khasam ba rab tu 'jug byedakhag/ de dag sangs rgyas la nasku ngas gsal bar byed// b.res kyang 'di la 'dren pa rnams kyi brnyed pa med// 'di na skye bo mang po dag/ rab tu byung
nas rang byung rlom// sems kyi dmags las rnams 'khrul nas// bstan pa la ni sun 'byin rnams // bdud rtsi bdag gis thob bo zhes// sleb pa'i nga rgyal can dag sa// skyobs pa
shAkya seng ga yi// bstanal lan spros pa med// sems kyi rnam pazums cad du// sems kyis ngo bo nyid mi rtogs// de bzhin rnam 'dren gsungs pa la/ lta ba don rang bzhin
med// spyan dag rgyal bas gsungs pa yi// lta ba lan ltab med// de phyir shes rab ldan pa// bdag nyid grol snyams 'dzin pa med// mtshan mar 'dzan pasgom pa rnams // bdag tu
dmigs pas rmongs par gyur// mkhas pa ma lan kha cig ni// yang dag ma yin stong pa sogs// dngos po rmi lam sgyu ma 'dra// rang gi byas na btag nas kyang// ma mkhas de dag dngos
po rnams // gzhig phyir mya ngan 'das pa smra// lus la yang ni rten bcas nas// tshul khrims 'du shes rnam par 'jig/ sems kyi dmigs pa dag la yang// bsam
gtun 'du shes rnam par 'jig/ de bzhan bshes rab damigs nas kyang// sa bon 'du shes rnam par rmongs// 'jig rten 'jig rten mkhas rnams gyis// de dag chos kyi rkun por brjod/
'ad badra ba la chos rnams la// chos rnams 'od gsal nyon mongs med// kho na rab tu byung ba'i don// khyod kyis bdag la ji skad brjod// chos rnams thams cad tha dad med// 'di dag
brag cha 'dra ba yin// mkhas pa de dag nam du yang/ 'phags pa'i spyod yul rtog mi byed// gzhan min mtshan nyid de bzhan nyid/ gzhan dgatun long mi 'gyur// chos rnams
'gyur pa med pa la// rang 'byung brtags pas ci zhig bya// donas 'jamadapal gzhon nur gyur pas/ khye'u nachen byin la 'di skad ces skyasaso// khye'u byang chub ces bya ba de gang gi tshig
bla dgas yin/ rin chen byin gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub n tshig gi khu dgas med pa// 'jam dpal gyis smas kha/ khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ nachenabyin gyis
smas pa/ 'jam dpalatshes nyidanakhasam du med pa yinan/ dedag gas rjeskad bsams te bstan par bya/ 'jamadapalagyis sbasal/ 'di la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la
tsha ja ltar gdams ngag bstan par khya ja ltar rjes su bstan par bya// ran chen byan gyis smras pa/ 'ad skad du 'dod chags ma spangs shig/ zhe sdang ma gzhil cig/ gti mug ma gsal cig//
rang gi lus las gyal du maskyod cig/ midagabasngodacig/ lta ba tshar mgacad cig/ kun tu sbyor ba rnamasam bton cig/ khung po rnams yongs su zungashig/ khams rnams ril 'o
gyis shig/ skyemached rnams la spyod cig/ byas pa'is sa 'da' bar ma byed cig/ mi dag pa la rtogs shig/ dag kha skongs shig/ sangs rgyas yod lam byed cig/ chos ma sems
shig/ dag 'dun la mchod pam byed cig/ bslab pa yang dag par ma len cig/ srid pa nye bar zhi ba don du ma gnyer cig/ chu bo las margal cig ces gdams ngag 'dra lta bu 'dis//
las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la gdams par bya'o// rjes su bstan par bya'o// de'i phyir nAn/ chos rnams kyi chos gnas pa 'di ni/ gnas pa khon yin pa'i phyir go/
byis ba de dag ni skye ba'i chos su lung ston par byed do// 'gag pa'i chos su lung ston par byed do// chos kyi dbyings 'di ni rnam par mi rtog pas rab byig yin te/ chos 'di rnams kyi rang
bzhan de ltar rjes su rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub bo zhes de ltar gdams na ) gal te mi skrag mi dang da bar mi 'gyuran/ kyi ma byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa ste/
phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i skal ba can yin no snyamadu shes par bya ste/ gdams ngag 'dis yang dang yang du yang dag par dga' ba skyed par bya'o// de'i tshe dmigs pa
can gyi dge slong brgyad kyis/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma bsten par ngs nas/ 'khor du nas song ste ) kha nas khrag dron po byung nas shi'o// shinas sems can dmyal ba chen po
du 'bod du skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'am da pal gzhon nur gyur bas 'di skad ces gsal te/ bcom ldan 'das dag slong de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis thos
rgyu bas gnod pa chen po ji tsam du gyur la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod de skad ma zer cig/ gal te dge slong 'di dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs/
'dim mthos su zin na/ bskal pa sa la'i bar du nams kyang bzang 'gror skye bar yang ma 'gyur na/ sangs rgyas dang phrad cing mnyes par byed pa lta ci smos/ da na dudag gis chos kyis
rnam grangs 'di som nyi dang bcas pas thos nas/ da bzod kho nar sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod nasashi 'phos te/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skye'o// de dag bskal pa
drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa khrag khrig phrag bcumanyes par byed par 'gyur/ thams cad du rdzus te skye zhing ) 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal posha stag tu 'gyur
ba la khaskal pa gcig la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba dag tu 'gyur )dunas lha'i bu de dag gas bdag cag/
lung bstan pa/ lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis nges nas/ de dag lha'i bu brgyad dang lhan cig tu ) bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas lha'ame togags yangs pa'i grong khyer thams
cadu gtor to chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang rjes su yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rjes su yi rang lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub kyi tshul 'phel bar mdzad du gsol

zhes kyang gsal te// de dag rjes su la rang ba'amado la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ikhyang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po'i srig chags brgyad khri bzhi stong

yang// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// srog chags khri nyis stongan chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bralakha rnam par dag go de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsalal/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang gis bskal ba 'bum gyi bar du thabs la mkhas pa med par pha rol tu phyin
ba drug la spyod pas/ gang lags chos kyi rnam grangs 'di som u0f7ada dang bcas pazos nas/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed na/ gang gis som nyid med par thos pa lta catshes gang
[f]@#// yi gar 'du ba dang/ lung nod pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ gzhan bdag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa lta ci smos/ 'jam dpal de lta bas nadagra bcom pa nyid thob par
'dod pas kyang/ chos 'ad la bslab par bya'o// rang byang chub thob par 'dod pas kyang chos 'di la bslab par byakhaM/ blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon khar rdzog
bar mtshang rgya bar 'dod pas kyang/ chos 'di la bslab par bya'o// de nas khye'u rin chen gyis rang gi ma ma la 'di skad ces smras so// ma ma kho bo la khazas byin cig dang/ bcol
ldan 'das la zhal zas 'bul bar bya'o// de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyi ma mas 'khar ba'i snod zas ro brgya dang ldan pas bkang ste/ khye'u rin chen la byin no// de nas khye'u rin chen byin
gyis ! bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad m zad pa'ibaden pa gang/ lagapa'i badren pa san dag slong gi dge 'dun thams cad tshom
bar ma gyur gyis bar du/ khar ba'i snod 'di yongs su 'grib par ma gyur cig/ de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed bkang nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun la
smras pa/ btsun pa rnams bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ gang gis bdag la 'bras bu chen por 'gyur ba'i bsod nams 'di bzhes te/ gang lus kyis yon sbyong bar ma byed pa dang/
sams kyis sbyong bar ma byed pa dang/ gang la phul na bsod nams su mi 'gyur ba dang/ rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ba dang/ gang lus kyi las dang/ ngag gi las dang/ yad kyi las
dang ma ldan padang ) gang 'dus byas la ma gnas pa dang/ gang 'dus ma byas la mi gnas pa dang/ gang so so'i skya bo'i chos rnamasakyi ma gos pa dang/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams la mi rtanang
dang 3 sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la nges khar mi 'byung ba dang/ nges par 'byud par mi 'dod pa des bzhes shig/ de nas dge slong gi dag 'dun de dag gi nang nas sus kyang/ snod de ma blungs
so/ khye'u rin chen byin gyis smras pa ) btsun pa dag bdag kyang sbyin par M 'dod pa lags/ khyed kyang gsal par bzhed pa lags ti/ bdagakhatsun ba rnams las ci yang 'i bam mchis
kyis bzhes shig/ 'jam dpal gyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa'aphye ba phrag 'bumagyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de bas kyang bya bye ba phrag 'bum las lhag pa'is sa
zhing gi yon tan bkod pa/ bdag bsang sa rgyas kyi zhing du/ 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang/ bden kha'i tshig gang yin pa'i bden pa dang/ bden pa'i tshig des na/ 'khar ba'i snod 'di las
khyed khoms cad kyi lhung bzed rnams gang bar gyur cig/ 'khar ba'i snod 'di yang yongs su zad khar mgyur cig ces byas so// de nas dge slong ga dge 'dun thams cad kyi lhung bzed de
dag gang bar gyur to// de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyis yangs pa'i grong khyer gyi skye bo'i tshogs ji snyed yod pa skrums cad la zas ro brgya dang ldan pa des tsham par byas so/
bsod snyoms de yang zad par ma gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u rinAchen byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rin chen byin lnga po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon
yongs su sbyong ba telnga gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ lus midamigs pa dang/ sems mi dmigs pa dang/ sbyin pa lamangon par zhan pa med pa dang/ rnam par smin pa'i 'dod pa dang/ len pa po
rnams la rnam par smin pa med pa'o// rin chen byin bzhi bo 'di dag ni byung chub sems dpa' rtag tu man du bya ba ste/ bzhi gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzan dang/ sangs rgyu
rjes su dran pa'i dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ bdag gi las kyi rnam par smin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam
dpal khye'u rin chen byin 'di bskal pa grasum cun ) bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs po ) 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ ban med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi
Tha ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stobs dang/ grags pa don yod pa zhes byakhar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de'i 'khor du 'dus pa yang mtha' las par 'gyur te//
thams cad kyang khyer mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stagago/ de dag kyang 'od mtha' yas ba dang/ tshid pag tu med par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpalagazho
nur gyur bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ched ce lags/ 'di ji snyam du gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'acul ba/ byang chub seka/
dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ chos nyid kyi skye bo zhes bya bar yang gzung shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bsod snyoms bzhes nas gsheg
so bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen na dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang/ lha dang mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri za'i
bcas pa 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg
ba chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang/ pradzA bar mdang/ zhu chen gyi latsab ban ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan
la phab pa// @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsan taprab+has nir shon ma d+harma pa r+ya ya/bod skad du/ 'phags pa sna
ba bsam gyi mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs )sangs rgyus dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thamasacad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/
bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod nargya 'bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ban/ dge slong stong nyis rgya lnga bcu'i dgeslong gi dge 'dun chen podang/ byang chub sems dpa'alnga
brgya tsam dang thabs cig tu bzhugs// de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por gnas nasaM bzhugs te/ rgyal po chen po dang ) blon po chen po dang/ bram ze dang/ khyim
dag dang/ grong rdal gyi mi dang/ nang mi rnams kyis bste stang du byas/ btsun par byas/ ra ma byas/ mchod pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khaza' bdang ) bca'akha dang/ byog pa dang/
[$ ]myang ba bzang po mang po brnyes so// 'dultar bcom ldan 'dasade bzhin gshegs pa dgrwa bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasarig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/
'jig rten mkhyen kha/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa )lha dang ma rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rags phun sum tshogasal) gdung phun sum tshogs pa/
mo rigs phun sum tshogs pa/ tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa/ tang de 'dzin phun sumatshogs pa/ shes rab phun sum tshogs pa/ rnam par grol ba phun sum tshogs pa/ rnam par grol/
pa'i ye shes gzigs pa phun sum tshogs pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa'i sgra dang snyan pa 'jig rten du rgya cher mngon du byung bar gyur to// bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig
rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba/ blan med pa/ lhadang ma rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyang ston te/ tshangs par spyod ba/ thog ma ra dge ba/
bar du dge kha/ tha mar dag pa/ don bzang po// tshig 'bru bzang po// ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba yang dag par rab tu ston to// spyan
lnga dang yang ldan te/ sha' na dang/ lha'i spyan dang/ chos kyi spyan dang/ shes rab kyi spyan dang/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang ldan no/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan mu stegs can spyod
pa pa dang/ kun tu rgyu dang/ gcar bu gnyen gyi bu rnams ni tshar bcad do// bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa na lha dang mi rnams kyis yang ga par bzung zhang 'bar ro// de nas bcomaM
ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ chos gos dang/ sham thabs mnabs te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas ) dge slong ga tshogs dge slong gi dag 'dun dang/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing ) bdun du bdar te/ mdun du gzabs pa dang/ g.yas g.yon du gzigs pa mdzes pa dang/ skum
ba dang/ brkyang pa mdzes pa dang/ chos gos snam sbyar dang/ bsil zan dang/ na bza'i tshogs dang/ lhung bzed bsnams pa mdzes pa dang/ sku mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang/

smyu 'od 'dom gang bsamtshanamemun pa mun nag gi nang na me'i phung po lta bu dang/ tshes bcolnga'i zla ba nya ba lta bu dang/ nyi ma shar ba lta bu r phyogs su snang zhing/ skyes bu chen po'i tshanasum
cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan te/ grong khyer chen po mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'dus kyi sgo'i them pa la zhabs bzhugs ma thag tu/ de nas mnyan yod kyi
grong khyer chen por grong khyer du gshegs pa na/ tsho 'phrul ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnam pa 'di lta bu dag byung ste skyes bu dam pa 'dren pa de gshegs pa de'i tshe/ dor cho 'phrularmad
rgyu du byung ba chen po gang dag byung ba de dag kharjod par byas/ shin tu dang ba'asems kyis nyon cig/ long pa rnams kyisanamathong ngo// 'onapa rnams kyisazhi'athosaso// gcer bu rnams
kyis ni gos red do/ smon pa rnams kyi nadran ba thob bo// grong khyer gyi skye bo thams cad thal mo sbyar te bde bar gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rdzab cha dang/ rdza rnga dang/ 'khar rnga
dung sgra brnyanu dag ni ma brdungs par sgra byung ngo/ ngang pa dang/ ngur pa dang/ khrung khrung dang/ rma bya dang/ na tshodang/ khu byug dag kyang yid du 'ong kha'i sgra 'byin to// grang dag gter
sbyor bde dag gisan gter rnams bsnyad por 'gyur ro gser dang dngul las byas pa'i snod rnams kyang ma bkrolabar lang sgra byung ngo// sa yang rnam ba drug tug yos shing 'gul te/
sems can rnams skyabs med par yang 'gyur cing/ yid dang ba rab tu thob go/ slaba'i mchog dam pa sangs rgyas kyis gang dngegang du zhabs kyis gom ba bor ba de dang der bad+ma dri ma medu
ci legs par gnas pa rnams byung/ dudagro'i skye gnas suseng pa'i sems can gang dag gas maklong bde dgatsams cad kyang bad babanadanas/ mablo'is su skye bar 'gyur ro// bud med
gang dag sbyam pa de dag kyang mi bde mod kha nyid du gzugs bzang zhing khaldan sdug pa dag kyang btsasas// sems can rnams la yang 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gtimug rnams kyi gnod
par gyur pa med do/ rab tu sdang ba'i semasamed par phan tshun 'dus te/ legan pha 'amam zhig bu gcig pa la skya ba khazhanano// srang gi g.yas g.yon rnams kyang legs brgyan par gyur/
to nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lhatshogs thams cad gyis kyang/ me tog sil ma dag mngon par gtor te/ sems can sdug bsngal bar gyur pa gang yang med go/ sems can gang dgan bor
'gyur ba de dag kyang nad med par gyurd bde bar gshegs pa gshegs panasems canaso so nas de bzhin gshegs ba ci bdag khon la gzigs so snyam du sems so//
so so nas bdag nyid bsod snyoms 'bul nang ma'i 'dren pa la'artenanas bdag kho na bsod sogs kyi 'bras bu la sbyor ro snyam dusems te/ de'i gshegs pa tsam yang gzhal ba su la
yanano// de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du mthar chags subasod snyoms bzhes shing gshigasanas/ bcom ldan 'das gleng bar gyi dbus zhig tu gshegs pa
nga de'i khang steng na nu khye'u gzugs bzang kha/ mas pa ) bltan sdug pa zhig bor bar gyur te/lab pa ga lasapa'imadzub mkhar gtsug nas 'jib cing 'dug la/ khyi 'am cesbyang gang

dag badra stong der lhags pa de dag kyang khye 'delalca'i dbang bos bldags shing 'dong ste/ 'di ltar sngon byas ba'i dag pa rtsa ba/khye'u de 'tsho ba mi byed do// khang stong der skye bo phal bo che dag kyang
'jug cing 'byung ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal khon 'jug cing 'byung ba gzagisanas/ mkhyen bzhin du tshodang ldan pa la kun dga' gol bka' stsal ba/ kun dag 'kho gang du skye
gophal bo cha 'di dag 'jug cing 'byung ba'i khang stod ngan ci yod ltos/ de skad ces bka' stsalanas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang/ khang stong
[o ]gal ba der song nas phyin pa dang/ khye'u gzugs bzang ba ) mdzes te// blta na sdug pa lag ba ga las pa'i 'dzub mkhar bcug ste/ 'jib cing 'dug la mig gnyis mi 'dzums khar skye/
bo'i tshogs thams cad la lta ba mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la skabasade gsal pa//
bcom ldan 'das kyang bstod bden/ khye'u bor ba gzugakhazad pa/ masapa bldan sdug pa/ rin po che'i gzugs ltar mchis pa mag gsam 'dzugs par skye bo'i tshogs thams
cad la lta ba zhig mchis so/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyi ma khye'u 'di ni sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa ste/ nga'i legasapar bshad pa'i don shes par nus shing skal ba canano snyam
nas/ khyi'u la shugs brtse ba dang skye bo phal po chadag ba la gzupa'i phyir/ khang stong ga la ba der gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das der gshegs nas phyogs cig tu bzhugs te/
phyogs cig tu bzhug nas/ khye'u de la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal/ stsaladang gnod sbyin rgyu ba yi// dur khrod 'jig pa che 'di na// byis pa ji ltar ma 'jigs shing// khyod dag cig khu
'di na 'dug/ de nas khye'u des/ sangs rgyas kyi mad+hu dang rang gi sngon gyi dgaba'ortsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das la sbyar tshigs su bcad de gsal bad bdag mtshams pa'i tshogs rnams la//
[p1/ :]kuny+tsa// grub pa'i dbang phyugs su zhig 'jigs// thams cad mkhyen pa smra ba'i mchog/ ji ltar 'di 'ches las gang lags// bdag cig khadag gigang ma mchis// bdag kyang/
gang ga'ang ma lags te// bdagan su lags de ma mthong// bdag gi su lags de ma mthong// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngon chad sdig pa byas pa'i las// de yi rnam smani 'di
'dra ste// khang kha stong ba 'dir khor nas// sdug bsngal tshor ba myong ba yanI/ khye'us gsol ba/ go'u tam khang stong snyam pa yi// 'dushes da dung mang 'ab lta// byang chub snying bor khyod/
y+Yo bzhugs nas// 'du shes yongs sum mkhyen tam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas ni 'du shes yongs shes te//nga la 'du shes yod ma yin// khyod nyid lan snying brtse bas
khang kha stong pa 'dir 'ongs so// khyo bus gsol pa/ sems can bdag ni bar 'ga' yang// gang tsho natu mi dmags ba// de tshe/u0f74gas rjes gang du 'byung// khyod su la thugasA btsa
T+ThitaM mdzad// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdag med zhi ba stong ba nyid// sems can 'di dag mi shes te/ de dag nyid la snyadi rje'i phyir// bsod snyoms spyad pa spyod pa yin//
khye'us gsol kha/stong pa na bar thugs chud nas// zhi ba stong ba nyid mkhyen na// de bzhin gshegs pa da dung du// phyin ci log kyang ma sbyangs sam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal kha/ zhi ba stong pa nyid rtogasanas// sems can yongasasu smin bya'i phyir// 'dren pa chos ston mdzad pa 'di// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs rjes yin// khye'us gsol pa/ de
bzhin gshegs pa da dung du// khyed kyis phyin ci log khasangs// sems can 'du shes ma mchisan// thugs rje gang du skye bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
byang chub sems ni rab bzung nas/ yod man sems can rnams la yang// mi mchog rnams ni go gyen pa// rang byung rnams kyis byin brlabs// khye'us gsol pa// dngos po
gang na'ang mi dmigs pas// go cha thamasacad brdzunapa lags// dngos pom mchis chos rnams la// go chadamigs pa mamachis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
chos rnams dngos po yod min yang// srog chags rnams la chos ston 'di// 'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyi// thugs rjes rnam par lab yin// khye'us gsol pa/ chosan ya
gar ma mchisan/ bshad pa gud nag la mas// 'jig rten rnams la su mdzad dam// chos ma lags pa chos bshad dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ nga'ajig
rten mu ma yin// chos ma yin pa'ang nga mi smra// phyin ci log gyur semasacan gyi// nyon mongs sa la bar nga khyed do// khye'us gsal pa/ nyon mengs rtsa ba ma mchis te// nang ma phyi
la rnams na yang// de dag rnams kyi gnas ma mchis// nyon mongs ji ltar rnam par byang// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul kha/ phyin ci log las byung ba
rnams // yongs su brtag las skyes pa ste// stob khathams cad spangs pa'i phyir// srog chags rnams la chos ston to// khye'us gsol la/ rnamakhartagamang po 'tshal te/ imA
nirang bzhin 'od gsal zhing// dal nyon mongs mi 'byung ste// rnams kyang nyon mongs de mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ jishad sas pa de bzhin te// semasazhi
rtag tu 'od gsal kyang// blo bur nye ba'i nyon mongs kyis// sa so'i skyekhoton mongs 'gyur// khye'us gsol pa/ nyon mongs dmigs sumamachis te// de dag phyogs nam gnas
na/ blo bur dun ji ltar 'gyur// de zhus bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalam/ dper na sprin rnalag ra snang la// snang yang de dag de bzhin chen//
nyon mongs 'byung ba'ang de 'dra te// snang yang de dag de bzhin min// khye'us gso'ab/ ma nor de bzhin gang lags la// sogs nyid de chos nyid do/ mnor de khazhan nyid tshes lag/
nor ba'id bzhin nyid mi dmigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byas pa 'du shes ldan rnams kyis/ dalog khar mkhar gong brtagasab// blo'i rtogs bar bya ba'i phyir/
0 de bzhin gshegs rnams 'byung ba yin// khyes gsol la/ skye ba mchis pas rab phye ba// rdzogs pa'asangs rgyas gang zhig 'byung// skye ba ma mchis chos rnams la// sangasargya
'byud kha 'thad ma lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skye ba med par skye ban// sangs rgyas 'byung khar rab tu bstan/ kun rdzob bla snyad btags pa ste// dam pa'i don du
yod ma yin// khye'us gsol pa/ da dung khyed la don dam dang// kun rdzob 'du shes gnyis mang 'aste// theg po gcig 'am 'gal 'gyur ba// go'u la khyod kyis bka' stsal to//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngan lam dang 'gal mi byed/ 'gal ba med par ng kha nas te/ ma mthun sems can sdums kyang khyad// khye'u khyod de ltar shes par gyis//
khyi'us gsalal/ sems can danam dmigs na// go'u tam khyadan na snyams mdu// tshes rnams sngon gyi na gla'il gzigs// gang gi kun s nyon mongs skye// bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngon gyi mtha' dang phyimathu'adang// de bzhin du ltar byung ba dang// byang chub dam pa rtogs gyur nas// srog chags rnams la chesaston ste// khye'us
gsol pa ) rdzogs sangs rgyas shes sgrogs mdzad cing// nyid kyi mkhyen pa sgrogasamadzad de// 'di lta bdag tu sgo 'dagos pas// khyod ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal che// bcom ldan 'das
bag ku@#// kyis bka' stsal pa// nga ni bdag la mi bstod de// de bzhin gzhan lakhad mi byed// de bzhin nyin ni rab tu ston// den de bzhin gshegs shes bya// khye'us
gsol ba/ brjod du ma mchis de bzhin nyid// don de nyid ma mtshesan// sgra skad ma mchis sgras bshad pa// mkhyen bzhin log khar bka2mastsal// bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka'
stsal pa/ chos de thams cad log pa ste/ de bzhin nyid las byung ba yin// de bzhin nyid ni rtogs pa na// nga la skyon med yon tan med// khye'us gsol pa/ de bzhin gsheg
pa'i mthu yin na// bdag gi spobs pa 'daskyes te// 'di 'dra'i[à¥° ]lan dag gang gsol pa// rdzogs sangs rgyus la bzod par gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag
g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can chos gos kyi nang nas phyung ste/ khye'u de logs su brkyangs pa dang/ de nas khye'u des bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gi sorame la bzung ste langasAso/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi khye'u de khang stong nasakhams te/ srad du bzhag bdang )de na skye bo phal bo chadag 'di ltar khye'u 'di/ 'di khon ltar/ nyon mongs bar gyur kyang/ bdag nyid chen
bo'i chos 'di lta bu'i lan 'debs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ngo mtshar to snyamanas/ ngo mtshar du gyur te/ com ldan 'das la rab tu phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'dA

ba[:]kyis khye'u de la bde skadaces bka'astsal to// khye'u khyod kyi las kyi sgrib pa zad kyis/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa badran par gyis la/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po la yang shes par gyisate/ rdzu 'phrul gyi/
tsho 'phrul chen po ston cig/ de nas khye'u nges las mi bdun srid tsam du 'phags nas/ ) lus las 'od phyung ste/ 'od de mnyan yod thams cad dang/ 'dzam bu glang thams cad snang/
chen pos rgyas par gyur to// 'od des brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ dom yin pa lha brgyad stong mang po gzhan dag la yang/ yang dag par bskul bar gyur
nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song sa ) lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te) lha'i me tog dag gas/
bcom ldan 'das la tor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ma byung chub sems dpa' 'dzin snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 'od kyis snang bar bgyis nas ) sems can
dbag tu ma mchis pa dag gdon bgyis so zhes ched du rjod pa duskad ched du brjod de de ltar khye'u de 'phreng snang ba bsam gyi ma khyab pa/ snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya bar brtag
so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang/ khye'u 'di snang ba bsam gyi ma khyakha)zhes bya bar gyur cig ces ) khye'u de'i mang la rjes su yid rang ba rjod do// de nas khye'usnang ba bsam gyi mi khyab pa/
03 @#// bar snang de las babs te/ sal 'dug ba dang/ des ngas rgyas kyisAmathudang/ rang ga sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa khos 'di lta ste dperan/ rogs pa le khargyud len pa'i lus
gzugs yongs su grub par gyukhade 'dra bar 'dug go/ de nas lha'i dbang po'argya byin gyis khye'u de la lha'i sa khacos bu zung cig byin to/ kyi khye'u nga la snying rtse ba'i phyir/ ras bcos
bu'i zung 'di gyon la gcer bur ma 'dug shig/ de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis ma khyab pas/ lha'i dbang po rgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shikakhyang chub sems dpa' rnams
na gos kyi rgyan bgos pas mdzes pa ma yin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa'a rnams ni chos kyi rgyan thogs nas mdzes so// ko'u shi kA da lta med kyi 'on kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dba' chen po rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan gang dag yin pa de dag nyon cig/ byang chub semasani byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ byang chub snying por rgyan par 'gyurago/ ngo ]
padang khrel yod pa'i rgyanani byang chub semasadapa' rnams kyis gos kyi rgyan te/ sems can chos cad don du'an par 'gyur ro// dam bcas pa bstan pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams
kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ shes rab yongs su rdzogs bar 'gyur ro/ bsam pan byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ sgyu dang g.yo sel bar 'gyur ro// sbyor ba ni byang chub semA
mas/dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ dag pa'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// lhag pa'i bsam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ grams canA las khyad
par du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ nga rgyal med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ yo shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos don du gnyer bdang/ chos 'dod pa ni byang chub
sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ shes rab yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ chags pa med
pa'i ye shes modas su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// nor thams cad khongs su gtong ba na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po longs su rdzogs
par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims yongs su dag pan byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyis rgyan te ) smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bzod padang des pa ni byang chub semA
dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi nga ro dang/ sgra skad lta bu'i tshig tu 'gyur ro// dam bcas pa brtan zhing sems ma zhum pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnamA
kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ bya ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa thob pan) byang chub
thun pacu wArAru tham pa// sems dpa' rnams gyi gos kyi rgyan te// man par shes ba chen po'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs bar 'gyur ro// tshigs su rab tu dbye ba shes pa'i shes rab ni
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ bag la nyal ba dang/ lta bar smra bdang ) kun nas ldang ba dngams cad rnam par srims bar 'gyur go/ snyadarjechen pon byang chub
zla sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la zhes 'gres pa med pa'i sems na byang chub du pa'a rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/
bdag ba zhan gyi don la skyo ba med par 'gyur ro// zang zing med par chos ston pa ni/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ shes rab kyi kha dgadang gzhan sgrolabar 'gyur ro//
chos sgrub pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyun te/ nyon mongs pa thams cad sbyong bar 'gyur ro// ko 'ushika rnam grangs des 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rgyan
'di lta bu dug dang ldan pa denam yang gcer bum yin par rig par bya'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ khye'u de la shin tu dga' bdang/ da labaskyedanas/ bcom ldan 'das la
'di skad ces gsol to// bdag lazugasab rtsa ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bcos bu'i zung 'di len tubartsal khar gsol/ des bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u snang ba bas
gyi ma khyab pa la 'di skad ces bka'asal to// khye'us ras bcos khug zung 'di leb la rkyen cig/ de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyi mi khyab pa/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste//
busache ga las pa'i lhang sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ras bcos bu'i zung blang nas khagos so/
de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la gshegs so// de na skyes pa dang/ bud med dang ) khye'u dang/ bu mo dang/ tshong dpon dang/ bram ze dang//
khyamadag dang/ rgyal po dang/ blon po chen po dag ngo mtshar du gyur te/ khye'u snang ba bsam gyi mi khyab pa la blta ba dang bcom ldan 'das la yang blta ba dang/ phyag bya ba dang/ mchod/
pa'i phyir 'dus par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'dus mthar gyis bsod snyoms shes ste/ khye'u snang ba bsamagyis mi khyab pa'i ma'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs so// gshegs nas kyang
cang mi gsung bar phyogs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mang nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir sgor mabyung/ de nas khye ba snang ba bsam
nga gi khyim du song nas/ ma la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// bdag gis sngon gyi nongs pa yi// khyod kyi mang la na bdag mchis te// yum gyis nongs pa ma lags kyis/
[p]// ltarasnongs ba mamadzad cig/ thugs brtse ldan te bskyed bsan// bdag gi sbyin pa khyod lags so// zhal tsham mdzad ma 'dzam ba// de bzhin gshegs kyi
ka drung du bzhud// de ltar khyodam la bdag mas khag/ khyod kyis brnyes pa leg par bdas// lus kyi dge ba'i las rnams kyang// rnam par 'drenal zhu bamadzod// de nas khye'u snang ba
khasam gyis ma khyab bas// lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras s// ko'u shika lha'ami tog chan d+har kha dag dang/ lha'i skyes dag dang/ lha'i gos dag bdag la stsol cig/
de dag bdag gis bskyed pa'i ma 'ad la stsal to// 'dis de drag gsebcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyis nas/ blon med ba yang dag khar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par
'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang bo brgya byin gyis/ khye'u de la lha'i me tog man d+ha ra ba drag dang/ lha'i skyes dag dang/ lta'i gos dag phyin no/ de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas/
ma la tshigs su bcad de smasakha/ lum cig lha yi me tog man d+ha ra dbalta sdug mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba dang// sosadang na khaza' 'di dag blang mdzod la// mamchog sangs rgyas de la
! dbu lab mdzod// 'jig rten dag na pha ma zas skom dang/ nor dang gos kyis mchod pa mchod ma lags// gzhan du gang dag chos la sbyor bgyid pa// desand dag chod pa
[/ ]bgyidapar 'gyur// nang gnyis dam pa de la mchod mdzod la// byang chub mchog tu smon lam bstan par mdzod// bdag ni dus dus khyod kyi drung mchis te// yun ring dusan bskul
ba bgyid pa lags// gnong zhing zhum pa'isems sum mdzad par// rangs pa'i sems dang dga' thob mdzod la// rang byang rgyal ba bzhugs pa dor bzhud de// skyes bu mchog gi zhathA/
la phyag 'tshalamadzod// mgon pod lame tog sos rnams dang// de bzhin na bza' rnams kyang gtor nas su// rgyal ba de las dge ba'i rtsa bskyed de// byang chub mchog tu sems kyang bskyed pa
mdzod// byang chub mchog tu sems brtan gyur nas// gang dag dad pas rgyal la gus bgyid bras// de dag rnam smin 'jig mgon bka' stsol bces/ rang byung rgyal ba de la zhub mdzod/
de nas bud med des/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pabyas nas/ zhu ba dzis
bstan pa bzhin du gus pa dang bcas par yongs su zhus so// zhub zhus pa dang/ bcomaldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dgaba'i rtsakhabasgrubs pa 'das/ zhu 'gro 'amam khom grom
'gyur// sang sa rgyas te mang mnyes byas nas/ ma yi dam sangs rgyas 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du bsod snyoms gzhes nas/ khye'u snang ba
[e/3]@#// bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ skye bo phal po che gzhan dag dang yang thabs gcig tu grong khyer nas byung ste/ rgyal brgyal byed tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dag 'a ra kha
ga la ba der gshegs so// de nasAbcom ldan 'das kyi khrus kyi bya khamadzad de/ nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ chos nyan dug zhugs pa'i phyir bzhugs so// de nas yul ko
zla sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyaladapung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu rgyal bu rgyal byed kyin tshal ga la 'dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyinanas/ bcom ldan 'das
klu kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'duganas/ yul ko sa la rgyal bo gsal rgyal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso pa
to// bcom ldan 'das gang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnam pa de lta bu dag dang ldan pa'akhye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab bde ga la mchis/ de nasakhacom ldan 'das kyis khye 'u snang kha
rgyu bsam gyis mi khyab ba bstan nas mthong ste ) rgyal pobasal rgyal gyis/ khye'u de'i lus gzugs yongs su grub pa/ lha las 'das pa'amadog dang/ mi 'jig pa dang/ tshul khrim
dang ting nge 'dzin dang/ shes rab kyis rgyan pamathed nas ) 'di snyam dusems te/ sngon las byas shing bsags pa ji lta bu zhig gis 'di ltar lus longs su dag khar gyur snyamamo// denas
00 khye'u snang ba bsam gyisame khyab pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang/ rang gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi sems kyi longs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ tshigs su
bcad de smras pa/ gang dag rtag tu byams sems dag sems ldan/ gang dag ma rlung mnyenang dran ldan pa// legs par bstams shing drang la tshangs spyod pa// de dag lus n rnam par
dag par 'gyur// gang dag sdig pa sbyong nang ma spyod la// rtag tu dag bam chung rnamasel zhing// gnod par sems dang khro ba nam skyongakha// de dag lus n rnam par dag par 'gyur// gang dag
sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la gdug dang bcos par rtag tu mchod byed cing// gzhan la rdeg 'dod sdigs mo byed// de dag lus narnam par dag par 'gyur// gang dag gzhan la phrag
dog ser sna dang// de bzhin nga rgyal dag kyang ma byed la// gzhan gyi nyes pa byung ba ma brjod pa// de dag lus ni rnam par dag par 'gyur// gzhan la co khri bangang smod pa dang/ ga shung ba dgatsam
yang ma khyed cing// gzhan la 'khrul pa'i glags lta mkhyad ga de dag lus narnam nga ra dag par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
ldan 'das khye 'u snang ba bsam gyis khyab pa 'di chos chen podang ldan pa lags n/ bcom ldan 'das las kyi sgrib pa gang zhig gis/ khye'u 'di bud med khyim thab la mchis pa'i mal du skyes
[s/ 2]@#/ la der yang khang stong du bor bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal bo chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ 'di nas bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig
'das ba de 'tsho de'i dusan/ de bzhin gshags bradagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bdakhar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu
'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ blan med pa/ lha dang mi rnams gyi ston kha/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo// rgyal po chen po de'i tshede'i dus na/
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de'i gsungs rab la byang chub sems dpa' gnyis shig byung ste/ lha bzang zhes bya ba dang/ sa zhes bya ba'o// de la byang chu
sems dpa' lha bzang zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa ngan phyir ma ldog par gyur cing/ don nyung ba/ bya ba chung kha ) dben pa la dga' ba/ bsam gtan dang/ mngon par shes pasarnam
khar khartse bar gyur to// de la byang chub semasadapa' sa zhes byakhar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos rgya chen po dang ldan par ma gyur te/ lha bzang gi g.yog byed do// du tu rung grong dang
grong rdal dang yul 'khor dang/ pho brang dag tu 'jug te/ ub sanas kyang bya ba mang zhing/ byed pa mang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' lhabazang des/ de la khyed ci'i phyir rnal 'byor
[s) ]dang 3 stong ba la brtson par mi byed bar/ ha cang bya ba mang zhing/ ha cang byed pa mang zhes bsgo zhape bston to// des de la yang dang yang du bskul bas// khros shing 'khrugs te/ yid m
rangs nas/ gnod sems sugyur pa des lus drang sems ma rung bar byas te ngan du bsam nas tshig rtsub po smas pa/ nal bu sbyar ma'i bu/ skyes pa gzhan las grub pa khyod kyi kha
ma yang med na/ khyod la shes rab 'am/ tshul khrims lta ga la yod ces des ngan du bsams te/ tshig rtsub po smras nas/ ma 'brel ma 'chags/ ma 'dar kyi/ na la 'dzan te/ dbyang
chub sems dpa' lha bzang de la rtag tu ngan sems dang ldan zhing/ byams pa'i sems med par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang gis kyang de smod ma yin no snyam nas/ bkod pa dang
du dbas kyang byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang la ngan du semasashing bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod do ) stan pa ma yin pa dang/ grags pam yin pa dang ) tshigs su bcad pa ma yin pa brjod do/
de las gsags shing tshogs su byas pa des/ lus zhig ste shuba'i 'og tu budamedakhyim thab med pa'i mang la du skyes la/ byang chub kyi sems bsrungs pas/ das nas sems can dmyalabar
nam skyes so// de btsas ma thag tu bud med des lam srang chen por bor te/ der khyi dang spyang gi dang lekyang rnams kyis zos so// rgyal po chen po tshul 'di 'dra bar 'di bskal pa dgu bcur/
sdug bsngal 'di lta bu dang nyam thag pa 'di lta bu s 'chi ba'i dus byas shing/ btsas pa btsas pa na yang bor bar gyur te/ yang skye bo phal po che 'di skad du/ nal gyi bu
sbyar ma'i bu 'di la khyi dang spang gi drung/ ce sbyang rnamasaza'o zhes 'dzar to/ rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan gzhig yin pa
snyam du khyod somanyid 'am/ yid nyid za bar gyur na/ rgyal po chen po khyed kyis de da ltaram blta'o// de ci'i phyir na nakhye'u snang ba bsam gyis ma khyab pa 'di/ de'i tshe de'i dusan/
byang chub sems dba' sa nas bya bar gyur to// rgyal po chen po 'di'i las kyi sgrub pa ni zad/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i semasun rnam par sbyangs/ de bzhin gshegs panamanyes par
byas/ ngan 'gro thams cad n bcad nas/ khye'u snang ba bsam gyis ma khyab pa 'dis/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhimanyes par byas shing bsta stang du byas/ ra mor byas/
rtswa mchod par byas na// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ga drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad do// chos yongs su btsal bo yang brtson par gyur to// rgyal po chen po de ston gyi dge kha 'di
bdag nyid chen po 'di thob po// rgyal po chen po de ltar na las nag pe dang/ dkar po dag chud za bar 'gyur ba med do// rgyal po chen po de lta bas na mkhas pas lus kyi las dang/ ngag gi
[8//]las dang/ yid kyi las bsdams par bya ste/ srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i las mi bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'di skad ces gso' do/
bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang zhes bgyid par gyur ba des// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob lags sam// 'on te da dung yang byang chub sem
pa'i spyad paspyod par bgyod/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyalapo chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha bzang de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'khrugs
pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen podapal 'byung ba zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po gsalargyal
gyis 'di skad ces gasrol to// bcom ldan 'dus rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos gus par gyis te dug ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen par bya'o// bstan par bgyi 'o//
bsnyen bskur bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen tshang bsten te/ bsnyen bkur bgyis na/ dge ba'i chos klobapar 'gyur ro// dag ba'i
chos thob pas bsam pa dag par 'gyur ro// bsam pa dag bas sbyor ba dge bar 'gyuraro/ sbyorab dag bas dag pa'i las bgyid par 'gyur ro// las dge bas 'gro ba dag bar mtshab
zhi// 'gyur ro// 'gro ba dge bas dag pa'i grogs po mgu bar bgyid do// grogs po dag bas sbags pa'i las che bgyid do// bgyi bar mi 'gyur ro// sdig pam bgyis/
shang dag ba'i las bgyis pas/ bdag la gdung par mu 'gyur/ gzhan la gdung bar mi 'gyur ro// bdag dang gzhan rjes su gzungs bas/ byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par gyur//
sgyu byang chub lam la gnas pas/ laman par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don bgyid nus pa dang/ skal pa mches pa dang/ mthu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsalal/ rgyal po chen po legs so legs so// khyed kyis tshig 'di legs par smras so// rgyal po chen po dag ba'i tAshesabasnyen lakhasten te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achan nges
yon tan gyi chos nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
dpa'achos du dang ldan n/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang/ zab mo'i chos rnams la yang bzod pa thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa khye'u byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang/ zab mo'i chog
rnams la yang bzod pa thob bar gyur te/ bzhi gang zhen/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes bal 'jugs padang/ chad pa dang rtag pa rnam par slong bdang/ sems can med pa
dang 3 srog med pa dang/ gang zagamed par 'jug pa dang/ stong pa nyid la mos shong stong ba nyid la spyod yul ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan n/ myur du
ban med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ikhyang chub mngon par rdzogasapar 'tshang rgya ba dang ) brab mo'i chosarnamos la yang bzod pathob par 'gyur ro// khye'u gzhan yang byang chubladapa'achos
bzhi dang ldan n/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyas/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sngon gyi mtha' ban pa dang/ phyi ma'i mgra'ami 'pho ba dang/
da ltar byang ba 'jig par shes pa dang/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid de/ bzhi po de dag go/ gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhib dang zhen/ lus dben kha dang/ sems dben padang/ chos dben pa dang/
las dben pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ gzhan yang bzhi ste ) bzhi gang zhen ) sangs rgyas la chos nyid dumathong gi/ gzugs ma yin pa dang/ chos la 'dod chags dang bral bar mthong ga
yag dang nges pa'atshag tu ma yin pa dang/ dag 'dun la 'dusamabyas su mthong ga/ tshogs su ma lan pa dang/ shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag par 'gyur bste/ bzhapod dag go/ gzhan
'gyu/ la la nga bzhiste/ bzhi gang zhen/ bsdu ba'i dngas kho mgatong bas/ b.rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang/ thabs dang shes rab la mkhas pa dang/ sems/
named par rnam par dpyod pa dang/ snying rje chen poste/ khye'u byang chub sems dpa'achos bzhi po dang gdang ldan n)myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogasaba'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par

wA'atshang rgyal dang/ zab mo'i chos rnams la yang bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa bsgrub pa bstan pa 'di bshad bzha/khye 'u snang ba bsam gyis khyab pacheskye ba'i chos la bzod
pa thob par gyur te/ dga' ba dang/ mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis)ta la bdun sridatsam du steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags par gyur to// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis de ni tsho'adzumakha
mdzad do/ 'di nasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pamadzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhalegyi sgo nas 'od 'phro ba la dog sna tshogs khag dum
byung ba 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang/ ser bodrang/ mar po dang/ dkar po dang/ 'bargan dang/ dngul gyi kha dog lta bu ste/ kha dog du ma de dag gis/ 'jig rten gyi khamasam//'a yas mumed pa
snang ba rabyas to/ tshangs ba'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par byung nas/ zla ba dang nyim rnams kyi 'od chog mog por byas te/ sa 'ganas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'igatsugadu nub bo// de nas tshe
dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs ta bla gos phrag pa cig tu bzar nas// pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thalamo sbyar btud/
nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigasasu bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis don de zhus pa/ bltar sdugakhaltar 'os gzugs dang mtshan rnams la// dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis rab mdzes/shing/ 'od
kyidakyil 'khor 'od kyis dman pa/ 'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol// tshul khrims 'thags shing spyad pa legs byang pa// ting 'dzin shes rab bsags pa'i ye
shes 'od// rnam grol snying po stobs ldan yang dug gzigs// 'dzum pamadzad de bdag la bstan dugasal// bzod pa stobs ldan stobs bcu'i shugs mnga' ba// brtson 'grus
mngon par 'phags tem skyod pa/ mig du sdug cing bdon nga pakhru gzigs pa// 'dzum pa mdzad de bdag labastan du gsol// rdo rje'i sku mnga' sra brtan mi shigs pa)sred med bu
mkhrusred med bu khas mchog/ tshangs dbyangs sgrasnyan 'jam pa'i dbyang san ba// 'dzum pa mdzad de bdag labastan du gsol// bzhugs kyang tshangs dang de bzhin lhatshogs kyis//
de bzhin bshegs pa'i spyi gtsug mi mthong la// gus dang bcas pa kun nas lta bgyid pa// 'dzum pa mad de bdag la bstan du gsol// khyod kyis chos kyi 'khor la dam pa bskor//
mi rtag sgras lha dang lhalen dang// de bzhin klu dang gnod sbyin rab skyed pa// 'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la ston du gsol// snang ba bses shing mun pa rnam bral ba//
ka/ kun nas sanama' mnyam pa nyid bzhugs pa/ yon tan mchog mnga' yon tan snying po bstan// 'dzum pa mdzad de bdagal bstan du gsol// de skad rjes gsol pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis tsho dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyi'u snang ba bsam gyi ma khyab pa shing ta la'adun srid kyi steng gi bar la 'dug pa mthong dram/
gsel kha/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba bsam gyi mi khyab pa 'di bskal
pa grangs med pa brgya'i 'og tu bskal pa kun tu snang med ces bya ba la ) 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par spyod pa zhes bya bar ) de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyurakha3 blan med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das snang ba bsam gyis khyab pa zhes bya ba nyid du 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par sbyong bden/ 'di ltar longs su
kab dag par 'gyur te/ dper nagazhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang/ yongs su spyod pa lta bu r 'gyur go/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni b.ragyi bskal pa nyi shur gnas/
par 'gyura'o// de la nyan thos brgyad khri'i dge 'dun 'dod par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong gi dge 'dun yod pa 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo tsa'i phyir 'jig rten
gyi khams de rnam bar spyod pa zhes bya zhing// bskal pa yang kun tu snang med ces bya bar 'gyur zhe na/ kun dga' bo bar gyi bskal ba brgya stong mang bor sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sngonam
yang de bzhin gshegs pa ma byung ste/ der de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba bsam gyi khyab pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ba de na/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams 'di skad du bskal pa 'di
ni kun tu snang ba medal/ kun tu snang ba med ba ste/ de la de bzhin gshigs pa byung ngo zhes ched du brjod par 'gyur ba'i phyur ro// byang chub sems da pa'i snang ba bsam gyi mi khyab pa lung/
bstan pa brjod pa 'di bshad pa dang/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pan/ lha dang mi'i srog chags sum khri nyis stong ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
bskyod do// byang chub sems dpa' drug cun ma skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// nyan thos lnga brgya na len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//
a// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsalapa kun dga' bo khyod kyisang 'dam pa 'a ches yongs su gzung ba dang ) draltar dngam 'ong
pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan gadrags pa'iphyir/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/ kun dga' bos gsol pa ) bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
gzung lags n/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad 'gang calags ) 'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pA ) 'di las kyi sgrib pa rnam par sbyong pa zhes bya ba dang/
sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba dang/ snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan zhes bya bar zung shig/kun dga' bo gang la la zhig gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs ba 'khaste/
stang byed/ bla mar byed/ rimor byed/ mchod par byed cing me tog gi phur ma ri rab tsam gtor ba dang ) sbyos dang ) phye ma dang/ byug pa da gos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang//
bdunarung/ lhadang/ mi'amachod pa rnam pa mang po gzhan dag gsamachod pa bas )rags kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig snang ba bsam gyis ma khyab pa bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
'di 'dzin cing klog la/ kun chub par byed cing ) gzhan dag la rang rgya cher yang dag par ston la/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed na/ 'di ni bsod nams kyi phung po de bas ches mang du bskyed/
do/ kun daga' bo de bas na ) de bzhin gshegs pa la ches mchod pas mchod par 'dod pa dang/ shes rab kyi snang ba chen po byed par 'dod pas )chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung
bar bya/ slog pa dang/ nan tan gyis sgrub par bya/ gzhan dag la yang rgyu cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang
ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ byang chub soms dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba bsam gyi ma khyab pa dang/ yul ko sa la'argyal po gsal rgyal 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ lha'adabang bo brgya
byan dang rnam brjod kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang lha dang ma dang/ lham yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten la
rang sa ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa lamanapar bstod do ka 'phags pasnang ba bsam gyi mi khyab pakhastan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so//
zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ kyasha/ rgya gar skad du Ar+ya
ba dz+ha bkAnar de shonAmam hAyAn sUtra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byang chub kyi phyogs bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khaban bya rgod kyi phung po'i la/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi da ga 'an
chen podang/ byams pa dang/ 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' semasadapa' chen po rnams dang/ thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dbralaM
gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal phyin ci log bzhi po dag gis sems phyin ci 'bog tu 'gyur sems can rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag yang dag pa ji lta
ba bzhin du'o mthong ba'i phyir/ 'di ltar yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'khor ba las mi 'da'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar dmags na/ sems can rnams 'khor ba las ma 'da' bar bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal la ) 'jam dpal sems can rnams
bdag dang/ bdag khas lenapa'aphyir 'khor ba las ma 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhan/ 'jamadapal su bag dang gzhan du yang dag par rjes su mthong ba de las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur
ba'i phyir// 'jam dpalabyis pa so so'i skye bo khresapa dang mi ldan pa ni chos thams cad shin tu yongs sumya ngan las 'das bar rab tum shes te/ bdag dang gzhan du dmig/sa so// dmigs
nas lus dang ngag dang ra dkyi lan rnam pa gsum mngon par 'du byed do// de med pa la sgro btags nas bdag chogs so// bdag zhe sdang ngo// bdag gti mug go zhes rnam par rtog go/ gal te de
de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byungan/ de 'di snyamadu sems te) bdagani tshul khrims dang ldan pa// bgan tshangs par song pa ste// bdag 'khor ba las 'da' bar bya'o// bdag yob
su mya ngan las 'das pa rjes su thob par bya'o// bdag sdugabasngal rnams thar par bya'o snyam mo// da chos 'di dgan dag bdag go/ chos 'di dag ni mi dge ba dag go snyam du rtog go/ de chos 'ad/
dgon spang bar bya ba dag go/ chos 'di dag nimangon du bya ba dgago/ sdug bsngal ni yongs su shes par bya'o// kun 'byung ba ni spang bar bya ba'o// 'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba'o// lamanab+hAsgom
par bya'o snyam du rtog go/ de 'du byed rnams ni ma rtag pa ) 'du byed rnamos na sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed rnams ni kun 'bar ba ste )'du byad rnams las bdag 'bros par bya'o snyam du rtog go// sa
daltar brtags pas/ mtshanamasngon du 'gro ba'i yid 'byung ba dang ldan pa/ mtshanam sngon du 'gro ba'i 'du shes yod labyed pa dag skye'o// de 'ad snyam du sems te/ gang chos 'di dag yongs su
shes padan sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa'o//snyam/de 'ad snyams du sems te/ bdag gis kun 'byung ba snang b.rakhya'osnyam nas/ de chos thams cad kyis nyen te ma rtogs so// skrag go/ dngang ngo//
dang par 'gyur ro// de 'di snyam du sems te/ chos de dag mngon du byed pa gang yin pa dang chos de dag gis nyen pa gang yin pad ni kun 'byung song ba'o snyam pa'o// de
'di snyam du sems te/bdag gi 'gog pa mngon sum du bya'o snyam nas des chos de dag stags te 'gog pa yin pa snyams du shes so// de 'di snyam du sems te/'di ni 'gog pa'i
mngon sum du byed pa'o snyam mo// de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis lam bsgom par bya'o snyam nas/ de gcig pu dben par 'dug ste/ chos de dag yid la byang pasazhiganas thob
bo de yid 'byung ba ri dalabyed pa de dang/ zhi gnas thob pa des chos thams cad sems 'gras so// 'phral la// ldog go/ log nas mngon par mi dga' ba'i sems skyed do/
de 'di snyam du sems te ) bdag ni sdug bsngal thams cad las thar te/ bdag gis yang gang du bya ba ci zhig yod kyis/ bdag ni dgra bcom pa'osUmadu bdag nyid kyis shes pa las de
'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe skye ba yang dag par rjes su mthong nas/ ngas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la dogs pa dang/ yid gnyis dang the tshom za'o// de ShAtsam du lhung ba'i sems kyis 'chi ba'i dus
byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ de chos thams cad ma skyes pa la rnam par brtags pa'i phyir ro// danas botsam ldan 'das 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ bka' stsal pa[ï¼ ]'jam dpal kun 'du byed thams
cad skye ba med par mthong byed ni sdug bsngal yongs su shes so// sus chos thams cad 'byung bamed par mthong ba dus kun 'byung ba sangs so// sus chos thams cad shin tu yod/
su mya ngan las 'das par mthong ba des 'gog pa mngon sum du byas so// mus chos kAms cud dngos po med par mtho bas lam bsgomasas// 'jam dpal sus
'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ba drag 'di lta bu r mthong ba dechos 'dag ni dge 'dag go 1chos 'di dag nu mi dge ba drug go )chos 'di dag ni sangs par bya ba dag ga chos 'du namangon sum
du bya ba dag go/ sdug bsngal ni yod sasu shes par bya'o// kun 'byung ba ni spang par bya'o// 'gog pan man sum du bya ba'o// laman bsgoms par bya'o snyam dumi rtog/ rnam
par ma rtog go/ de ci'i phyar zhin/ gang la byas pasoso'i skye bo dag chags pa dang/ zhe sdang ba dang ) gti mug pa'i chos de ma skyes 'ar demathong nang lang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa
dang/ rnam par bsgrubs par mthong ba'i phyir ste/ chos de gang yang mi len to// mi 'dor ro// da khams gsum pa la sems mi 'chags ti/ khams gsumapa thams cad ma skyes pa dang/
@#/ sbyam lta bu dang/ lam lta bu dang/ brag cha lta bu dang/ mig yor lta bu r cha thong ngo/ des chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin de ltar mthong bas/ sems can thams
cad la rjes su chags po dang/ khong khro ba dang bral bar 'gyur/ de ci'i phyir nan/ des ga la rjes su chags pa dang/ khong khro bar 'gyur ba'i chos de ma dmigs te/des namakha' dang mtshungs pa'i se/
kyis sangs rgyas kyang yang dag par rjesu ma mthong/ chos dang dge 'dun yang yang dag par rjes mi mthongang/ des chos thams cad stong par yang dag par rjesu ma mthong ste/ chos gang dag la yang
lca the tsom mi'a'o// b+be tsom mi za bas nye bar len par 'gyur// nye bar mi len pas len kha med par longasu mya ngan 'da'o// 'jam dpal dge slong rab 'byor kyis chos thams cad rnam pad lta bu r shes/

de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal du mi 'ong ngo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/padag nyid kyang me dmagasan/de bzhin gshegs padamigs pagyurapa lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas ma yin pa'iphyir// denas bcom
ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhas/ pa bzhi po dag ji ltar bltakhar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/'jamad lam

'ongs pa'i dus na/dge slong dag masngag pa'i rnam par lus la lus kyi rdzasu lta pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhug pa ston par 'gyur/ skye ba dang 'gog bar tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjesu ltaba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag

ka77 paston par 'gyur sems la skye ba'i chos dang/ 'gag pa'i chos su lta'o sAmadu/de ltar sems la sems kyi rjesu lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhug pa ston par 'gyur[ã]gang la la por 'dushes par mi 'gyur ba de//
ltar chos rnams la chos rjesu lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhug pa stonapar 'gyur ba de dag 'byung// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skadartse
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi pa dag ji ltar bltakhar bgyi/bcomaldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i ldem po ngag shes par dkas mthobashig
'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'dasadran pa nye bar zhag pa khasgom la bshad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jamadapal sus lus namakha' dang mtshung par mthong ba 'di

na lus la lus kyi rjes sultaba'idran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// 'dramadapal susatshor khanang na 'ang ma yin/ phyi rolan yang ma yin zhang gnyig med pa la'ang mi dmigapa 'don/tshor b rnams la tshor ba'irdzasu
lta ba'idran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// 'jam dpal sus sems lamed tsam du zad par shes pa 'di nasems la sems kyi rjes su ltakha'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// 'jam dang la susadagab dang/ midage///
bdang/ lung dum bstan pa'i chos mdamagasapa bden chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ste/ 'jam dpal dran pa nye bar gzhug pa
bzhi po dgan de ltar blta bar bya'o// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'ad
kyi bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sus chos thams cad mi mnyam pa med la gnyis sumed cing gnyis su dbyar med par mthong ba'adi na yang dag pa'i lta ba'o// 'jam dpal sus ma mthong/
ba'i tshul gyis chos thams cad mi rtogarnam par u rtogs kun tu mi rtog par ma thong ba 'din ) yang dag pa'i rtog pa'o// 'jamadu pal sus brjod pa mnyam pa nyid du+in tu bsgoms pa'i phyir
chos thams cad brjod du med par mthong ba 'di ni rang dag pa'i ngag go/ 'jam da bal sus byed pa po mdamigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad bya bamed pa du ) byed du mid par ma byung ba
'di ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha'o/ 'jam dpal gus tshob mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad 'phel bar rang mi byed/ 'grib khar yang ma byed pa 'di rang dag pa'i 'tsho
pa'o// 'jam dpal sus rtsom pa med par rdul ba'i tshul gyis/ chos thams cad kun nas ma slong ba 'di na yang drag pa'i rtsol ba'o// 'jam dpal dran pa'i las dben pa'i phyir/ sus
chos thams cad dran par mi byed pa'adi na yang dag pa'i dran pa'o// 'jam dpal sus dmigs pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyisamanyam par bzhag cing ma 'khrug par
mthong ba 'dan/ yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ 'jam dpal 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni da ltar blta bar bya'o// 'jam dpal gyi gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dbang po/
lnga po dag ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sus rang bzhin gyis ma skyed ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad ma skyes par mthong bar yod ces pa 'di
ni dad pa'i dbang po'o/ 'jam dpal su nyakha'i 'du shes dang ring ba'i 'du shes dang bral ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad la sems mi gtong ba 'dren brtson 'grus kyi dbang po go/ 'jamadapal
sus dmigs pa len pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad yid la ma byed cing dran kha ma 'dod pa 'di ni/ dran pa'i dbang po'o// 'jam dpal sus gnyis mi dmigs pa'i phyir ) chos thams cad
gnyis su med par 'gyur ba 'din ting nge 'dzan gyi dbang po'o// 'jam dang la sus skye khad du bral ba dang/ ma shes pa dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad rang bzhin gyi steng par ma 'ong pa 'din/shes
rab kyi dbang bo ste/ 'jam dpal dbang po lnga po dganyid ltar blta bar bya'o// 'jam dpal gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po dag ji ltar blta bar gyi bcomA
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ 'jam dpal sus dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad dngos po med par mthong ba 'di ni/ dran pa yang dge ba byang chub kyi
yan lag go/ 'jam dpal gus dge ba dang/ mi dge ba dang/ lung du ma bstan pa yong gsum 'grub pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad dban zhing dramags pa 'don/
chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/ 'jam dpalasus khams kyi 'du shesatu bshig pa'i phyir/ khams gsum pa ma len mi 'dor ba de ni/ brtson 'grus
yang dag byang chub kyi yan lagago/ 'jam dpal sus dka' ba dang )mi dga' ba rnam par bshig pa'i phyir/ 'du byed thams cad la dga' ba ma skyed pa 'di na/ dga' ba yang dag
pa byang chub kyi yan lag go/ 'jam dpal sus dmigs pa'i dngos po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad la semasushen tu sbyangs par gyur ba 'di ni shin du sbyangs pa yang dag/
khyab chub kyi yan lag go/ 'dzamadapal sus chos thams cad rnam par gzhag pa rjes su rtog pa'i phyir/ sems medalags pa 'od n ting nge 'dzan yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag
spu 'jamadapal sus chos thamasacad la gnas par m byed/ rtan par ma byed/ chags par ma byed/ 'ching bar mibyed cing/ de chos thams cad yang dag par rjes su mimathong ba'i btang snyomA
can du gyur te/ dga' kha thob pa 'din gtang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ 'jamadapal byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po dgan de ltar blta bar bya'o/ 'jam dpal gang lA
'bab/sa pa'i bden pa bzhi bo dag dang/ dran pa nye khar gzhag pa bzhi po dag dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lagra brgyud pa dang/ dbang po lnga po dag dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po dag
de lta bu r mthong ba 'dag la'o zhes nga skya ste/ pha rol tu son pa'o// khang la gnas pa'o// bde gzob pa'o// mi 'jigs pa klob pa'o// khur bor ba 'o// rdul dang bral ba'o/ lang
med khago/ nyon mongs khamed pa'o/ len pa med pa'o// dgra bcom pa'o// dag skyong// bram ze'o// bkrus pa'o// rig pa'o// pha rol tu song ba'o// gtsang ma'o// sangs rgyas
kyisras so// shAkya'i sras so// tshor ma dkrugs pa'o// 'obs las rgal ba'o// shin tu brtan pa'o// rams nad med pa'o// dge slong ngo// 'phags pa'o// rgyal mtshan rdzogs kha'o/
zhes sma'o// 'jam dpal bzad pa de lta bu dang ldan pa ni/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas yin te/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i 'os lang yin no// 'jam da pal de lta bas na/ dge/
slong lul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms don yod par yongs su bza' bar 'dod pa dang/ bdud 'dul bar 'dod padang/ 'khor ba las yang dag par 'da' 'dod pa dang/ byang n las 'das pa
thob par 'dod pa dang/ sdug bsngal rnams lAgrol bar 'dod pas chos bad la brtson par bya'o// chos kyis rnam grangs 'di bstan khan lha'i busum wa astong gi chos mngon par rtog par gyur
nas de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la man da ra ba'i me tog bdag gis gtor te/ tshigs 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das chos bstan kha 'dasu dag gi rna lam
du grag par 'gyur de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la legs par ragatu byung/ legs par 'gyuran gang dag thongonas mos pa drang/ dad pa dang/ de bzhin nyid du 'dzin par 'gyur
bdag lta smos kyang ci'atshal/ bcom ldan 'das chos bstan pa 'di dag gang gi rna lam du grag par 'gyur ba de dag ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal ma mchis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de
skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ nyan thos chen po de dag dang/ lha dang/ ma dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bas pa'a'ajig rten yid rangs ste/
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ 'phags pa byang chub kyi phyogs bstan ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogasase/ rgyagaragyi mkhan/
po dzan metra dang/ dzAnas da d+hading ) zhuchen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ye shes sdes 'gyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o//
rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya na a kA ra ka rad da be ro tsa na gaN+NanA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yi ge med pa'i za ma tog rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes
bya ba theg pa chen po mdo// sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal
po 'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung por la/ dag slong gi dag 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrig khrag brgya stong du ma thams cad kyang/ rgya chen po
shes pa/ thabs la khas pa/ gsalabalalamid pa yag sgrub pa la mkhas pa/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa khong du chud par byed pa rnam par grol ba phun sumatshogs pa 'dul ba'i myu
gudang ldan pa/ ngo tsha shes pa yan lag dang ldan pa/ snying rje'i bdog can/ sems can lamanyes gshin pa/ tang de 'dzin mang po dang ldan pa ) shes rab kyis lag pa dang ldan pa/ blo
mal sri zhu chab/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dakha' chen po rin po cha'i sgang dang mtshungasapa/ dge ba dang mi dgab shesal ) g.yo khong du chud par byed pa/ nges pa'i tshig dang/ srobs
ba zad mi shes pa dang/ zung khong du chud pa byed pa/ rnam par rgyal bkob pa/ sems can thams cad la khong du chud par byed pa yang dag pa'i mkhu' las byung zhing bstan pa/ shin tu
dpa' ba/ gnas pa med pa/ chos bla ma'i rang bzhin la nges kha/ rang bzhin med pa'i khyad par sems dpa'/ snying po la dpa' ba) skye ba la smod pa'i skyosakhu/ chos khong du chud
par byed pa/ mtshan gyi gzhi shes pa/ yul 'khor srung ba/ yul 'khor skyong ba/ sgra grags pa rgyal ba'i sgra dang ldan pa ) rnam par rgyal ba'i mdzod dang ldan pa/
yig med pa'i snying po dang ldan pa/ shin tu gnyid kyis ma log pa/ ye shes kyi phung po lagazholakha/ rang gi las la mngon par dga' b.rang gi rigs sten pa/ kun tu bzang ba mnyam
zlob nyid la dga' ba/ rnam par dag pa/ rang gi rgyud dang/ pha rolakyi rgyud rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/ rnam par rgyal ba thob pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal ba'i dbyangs dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos sgrogs pa dang/ byang chub sems dba'asams dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i gnas
dang byang chub sems dpa' semasadapa' chen po chos gral dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po steng ga 'byung gnas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po smon lam btsugs dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen khyad par sems dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen pos 'dzin dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po sa'i sgra dbyangs dang ) byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slebs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu brtsegs dang/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i mig dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i gdong dang/ byang chub semasadapa' sems dpa' chen po gtsugan nur bu
dang thabs cig go/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa ga chen po bgrangs ba las 'das pa thams cad kyang gzhon
gyur pa sha stag dang lhan cig/ spyan ras gzigs na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen poShAms cad kyang rgyal tshab tu gyur pa gang+gA'i bye ma snyed dag dang lhan cig/ byang chub sems dpa'/
sams dpa' chen po khyad par soms na/ brgya byin du ma dang lhan cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po deng 1 byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
nam mkha'i snying po dang ) rgyalapochan po bzhi ni/ 'khor los sgyur ba dum drag dag dang lhan cig byang chub sems dpa' semasadapa'achen po mthu chen thob dang/ byang chub sems dpa'/
sems dpa'achin bo spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugan tshangs pa dumodrang lhan cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achan po mthong ba don yod na/ 'khor rnams thos kyi bu dumangagadang
lhan cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen po skar ma'i rgyal po na 'jig rten skyong kha lhag ma rnams dang lhan cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid gnyis 'aA
@#// dang ! byang chub semasadapa'asems da pa'achen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i cha byad 'dzin pa du ma dang lhan
cig ngashur dwa ti'i budang/ mo'u 'galagyi bu dang/ 'od srungs chen po la sogs pa dgra bcom pa thams cad dang yang lhan cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mang
dang byang chub sems dpa' semasadapa' chen po khyad par sems ni lha'i bu mo stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyargyal po dang/ byang chub
sems da pa' sems dpa' chen po sman yang dug byung dang/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gtum snyedan/ zla ba dang nyi ma rang ga gzi brjid sAms pa ji snyedapa de dag thams cad

bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod ba de'i tsho 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gsemadun du snag tsha'i yug bzhag pa de bzhin du/ zla ba dang nyi ma de dag bcom

ldan 'das kyi spyan sngan phyir zhing ma mdzes/ phyir zhing me 'bar ) phyir zhing lcam me ma yin/ phyir zhang lhan n ma la/ phyir zhing lhang de ma yin no// sred med kyi bu la sogs pa lha'i tshogasaji sengapa
dang/ klu'i rgyalapochu lhadang ) 'jog po dang/ ma dros pa la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang/ drawa'i bdag po shan tu yid du 'ong ni/ dri za byekhaphrag du ma dang lhan/
cig namamakha' lding gi rgyal po dram med pa chen po ni/ nam mkha' lding bye ba phrag bdun dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la bden drang ngo// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtenagyi khams gang+gA'i
klung gi bye ma snyed na/ byang chub sems dpa'aji snyed 'khod pa de dag rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa las gnang ba mnos te/ 'khor bzhi dag dang lhan cig dong nas ) bcom ldan 'das deng
byang chub sems dpa'ade dag la yang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchod pa byas nasarang rang gipad+ma'i stan la 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'dasalabyang chub semasadapa' sems
dpa' chen pokhyad par sems kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te bdag com ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bcom ldan 'das la yig gnyis shig zhu lags so// bcom ldan 'dras
kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas gnang ga sa khyad par sems khyod tshabasams pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can gcig gi don gyi phyir 'dir byung ba yin
gyis nga ni khyod kyi don gyi phyir 'dir 'byung// de nasAkhacom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyad par sems kyis 'di skad ces gsolato// bcom ldan 'das
byang chub sems dpa' gang sbyang par bgyi ba'i chos gcig po de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas gang bsrungs na) bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad yongs su bzung ra
'gyur ba'i chos gcig pod gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pasagang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos khag cig po de gang lags/ de skad/
ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' khyad par sems la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ tshangs pade skad ces smab ni legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu dakhazhi/
gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis ) sobs pa 'di lta bu byung ngo// rigasakyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas byinagyikharlabs mamadzadan/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zhub 'di lta bu zhu ba ma 'gyur go/
khyad par sems de'i phyir khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid labazung shig dang ngas khyod labashad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas ) byang chub sems dpa' khyad par
sems kyi khacom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skabaslu bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byung chub sems dpas chos gcig grang sbyang bar bya ba'i chos gcig tu
gang zhen/ 'di lta ste 'dod chags kyi chos te rigasakyi bu 'du na spang bar byakha'i chosagacig go/ yang yang par byaba'i chos gcig te ) 'di ltar zhesangag chos te )'di ni spang khar bya ba'i
chos gcig go/ yang sbyang ba byaba'i chos gcig te/ 'di ltar gti mug gi chos te/ 'di'i spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig go/ yang spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig ste/ 'di ltar bdag du 'dzan pa
ste/ 'di ni spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig go/ yang sang bar bya ba'i chos gcig ste// 'di ltar le le// 'di nasang bar bya ba'i chos gcig go/ yang spang bar byakha'i chos gcig ste/ 'di lta
rmugs pa dang/ gnyid de 'di na snang bar bya ba'i chos gcig go/ yang yang khar byakha'i chos gcig ste/ 'di ltar srid pa ste/ 'di ni spang bar bya ba'i tshes gcig go/ rigs kyi bu yang byang/
chub sems dpas sbyang bar bya ba'i chos gcig ste/ 'di ltar ma rig pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpas sang bar bya ba'i chos gcig go/ rigs kyi bu gang byung chub sems
dpa' rtag par rgyun tu mngon par bsrung bar bya ba'i chos gcig po de gang na nA) rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang bdag mi 'dod pa de gzhan dag la mi bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sen
dpa' gang la la zhig chos gcigapo de bsungasan/ des de bzhin gshegs pa'i slab pa'i khazhi thams cad bsrungs bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe nA ) rigs kyi bu gang dag gi srog langs
par 'dzin pa de srog mi gcod do// gang dag gnor padas par 'dzin pa de mabyinam len to// gang dag gi chung maphongs par 'dzin pa de gzhan gyi chung ma'i gan du ma 'gro 'o// rigs kyi bud la
sogs te/ gang la la zhiga'adi snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa'ibaka' khazhan du bya'o snyams du sems pa des/ chos gcig po 'di bsrungs bar bya'o zhes bshad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
da rigs kyi bu gang la la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba de brams cad rang gi bde ba'i rgyur don du nyer gyi/ su yang bdag sdug bsngal ba
mi 'dod// 'gro ba ni bde ba 'dod ces bya ba'i tha tshigasago/ gang khyed cag mi 'dod pa de gzhan dag la ma byed cig ces nga skya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ni gang byung chub semasadapaso rtag par rgyun
tumangon par bsrungasabar bya ba'i chos gcig go// rigs kyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos gcig bo de gang yin zhes de skad zer ba ni/ rigs kyi
bu gang de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sas rgyus pa'i chos gcig po gang yang med do// rigs kyi bu gang la chos gang yang rtogs pa med pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pasamazho
par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o// rigs kyis khu lang de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad ma skyes par thugs su chud do// de bzhin gshagasapas chos thams cad 'gag pamed par
thugs su chudago/ rigs kyi bu yang de bzhin gshegs pas chos klams cad mtha' gnyis las grolabar thugs su chud do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos kums cad ma byung bar
thugasuchud do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas las bdagag bya bar thugs su chud do// de bzhan gshegs pas chosaThams cad rgyu dang rkyen la rag las bar shugs chudado/ rogis7/
bu de bzhin gshegs pasargyu dang rkyen ni glog dang 'drakhar thugs su chud do// de bzhin kha gshags pas rgyu dang rkyen med par las skyeb med par thugs su chud do// de ltar de bzhin gshegs
pas rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i chos nyid thugs su chud do// ci'i phyir yongs su rtogs pa padago rnam par snang mdzad kyi sAng po zhes bya zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig
rten las 'das pa'i la shas lasogs pa gang dag ci 'byung ba'i mang la de yin pa'i phyir ro// gang gi tshe ye shus de'i rang bzhin la yongs su rtog pa de'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa ni mang ladu chud pa yin te/ de'i tshe rnam par snang modzadakya sAng po zhes bya ba'i ming slob bo// rigs kyi bu yang de bzhin gshegs pas chos thums cad sgyu ma dang/ smig rgyu
dang 'dra bar thugs su chud do// de bzhin gshegs pas rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba'i rang gi chos nyid thugs su chud do// rnam par grol ba gang yin pa de rnam par snang mdzad kyi
snyid po'i chos nyid do// rigs kyi bu lang de bzhagashegs pas chos thams cad kyi sgo gcig thugs su chud do// rigs kyi bu gang la 'gro bamed pa dang/ 'ong ba med padang/ rgyu med
pa dang/ rkyen med pa dang/ 'chi 'pho med pa dang/ skye ba med pa dang/ slong ba med pa dang/ dor ba med padang )'grib pa med pa dang/ 'phel bamed pa dang/ rags kyi bu gang rang khaMzhan
med/ gang la me bu bar ma nag pa dang/ gang yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig gis brjod par mi nus pa'i chos kyi sgo gcig po de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su
ka chud do// bkod pa'irgyal po bstan pa yi ge med pa'i za ma tog rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pan/ sakhacu la gnas pa'i byung chub sems dpa'i
( mig la rdul phra rab ji snyed snang bar 'gyur ba de snyed kyi sems can rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'abyang chub tu sems bskyed do// dasnyed cig gis dgra bcom pa nyid
zla mngon du byas so// dbas ches mang ba'i sems can ngag sems can myal ba nas shi 'phos nas lha dung cher skyes so// byang chub sems dpa' duman sa thob par gyur to// byang chub
sems dpa'aduman tang nga'adzani brgya stong mngon du gyur to// mang du tsadagos te/ gtam 'don su la yang don med par ma gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshadang
ldan pa sgra gcan zin la bka' stsal pa/ sgra gcan zin khyod ngu'i chos kyi tshul 'di gzung bar spros bar gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ma rlag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor
de nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di bdag cag gis
gzung bar bgyi'o// slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na )byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod du 'tshal bar bgyis la/ 'jig rten gyi khams mimajed du yang dag par bshad par bgyi'o// rgyal ba
po bzhi bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis gang dag 'di lta bu'i chos chos kyi snod gyur par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de
dag gi bsam pa brams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la gzigs nas bka' stsal pa 1 grugs po dag shin tu rgyas pa/

bsdus pa/ yi ga med pa'i za ma tog rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying bo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung du dang ldan par ma 'gyuro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga la skyes bu
dam pa de dag gis/ bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ rabor bya/ btsun bar byas pa'i phyir go/ rigs kyi bu de dag ni/ nga'abyang chub phrag pa la thogs par gyur ro// de dag gi skyobs pa na
