sum tshogs pa rgyun ma 'chad par 'gyur ro// de dag ga sangs rgyas kyi gshin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe na yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med tun khres/
kyi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas nas/ mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur te// mthong bar 'gyur ro// yang byang chub sems
dpa' 'di dag nyid dang thabs cig tu ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po la gnas par mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de dag gi chos kyi mdzod ma zad par 'gyur ro// de dag tshe
rabs dran par 'gyur ro// na song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyurago/ rigs kyi khung ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mumathun pa'i tshig 'di smaste/ rags kyi bu dag gal te mtshams med pa lnga khyad par
gyural/ chos kyi rnalagrangs 'du lus la btags sam/ yi ger 'dri'am/ klog gam/ kun chub par byedan/den ngan song ngan 'gro leg par ltung bar 'gro ba ngas ma mthongago dbyung chub semA
dpa' de sangs rgyas Thams cad kyis dbang bskur zhing bag ldathob par 'gyur ro// dbang po nyams par mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ngo// byang chub sems dpa'
thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ngo// de'i las tshad med pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu tshig 'din khamar smaste/ de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ngas mthong ngo/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' lanas/ khyad par sems la sogs kha byang chub sems dpa' rnams dung/ brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ lha dang/
mi dang/ lha ma yan dang/ drizar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa yi gemed pa'i za ma tog rnam par
snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzashrab ku Ti pa re brtanAm mahAyAn sU tra/bod skad du/
'phags pa 'jam dpal rnam par 'khrul pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'amado/ sangs rgyus drang 1 byang chub somasadapa'athamasacad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
bdag ga gsathos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' r ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'adag slong ga dag
'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang/ 'dod pan spyod pa dang/ gzugs na spyod padang/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dum dag dad
yang thabs gcig go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs subaskor cing/ mdunagyis bltas nas chos ston to// de 'tsho lha'i bu 'od mang po zhes khyab 'khor de nyid du 'dus/
bar gyur te 'dug go/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ de nas lha'i bu 'od mang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces skyasaso//
'dzamadapal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bdud bar chad byed na ) 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi dkyilas bad yi/de skad
ces smras pa dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ lha'i bu 'od mang po la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu ji tsam du las rnams 'byung ba de tsam du bdud kyi las//
jitsamadu smon pa dang/ ji tsamadu log par bzhi pa dang/ ji tsam du mchog tu 'dzin pa de tsam du bdud kyi las sa// thatsam du 'dod pa dang/ jitsam du 'du shes la dang/ ji tsam du rlom sems
ba dang/ ja tsam du yongs su rtog pa de tsam du bdud kyi las so// lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub kyi semasalamangon par zhen pa yang bdud kyis so// sbyin pa'i sems la mngon par
zhen pa lang bdud kyi las so// tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab kyi sems la mngon par zhen pa yang bdud kyi las so// sbyin pa
rlom sems subyed pa dang/ tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzan ba dang/ bzod ba 'dzin padang/ brtson 'grus len pa dang/ bsam gtan la mtshan ma dang/ shes rab rgyu ba yang bdud kyi
las so// dgon pa la dga' zhing mos pa'i sems dang/ btang snyoms su lhung ba yang bdud kyilasas// 'dod pa chud bdang ) chog shes pa dang/ sbyangs pa' yon tan dang/ yokhyad
bsrung pa rlom semasasu byed pa yang bdud kyi las so// bdag ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa/ ! bdagan mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa/ bdag ni smon pa med pa la gnas pa ) bad ni sros/
med pa la gnas pa/ bdag ni de bzhin ga shegs pa'i bka' sgrub cing gnas pa'o snyam du blom sems su byed cing )rnam par rtog pa yang bdud kyi las so// lha'i bu rtog pa dang )rnam
par rtog pa dang/ yongs su rtog pa dang// mthong ba dang/ byis pa dang/ byephrag phye ba dang/ rnam par shes pa'i gnasatsam pa datsam du bdud kyi las so// lha'abus smras pa/
'jamadapal bdud kyi las gang las byung/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa )lha'i bu bdud kyi las ni brtson pa las byung ngo// de ci'i phyir zhen/ lha'i bu brtson pa la bdud glags tshol gyi/ mi brtson
pa la bdud kyis ci zhig byu bar 'gyur to/ de nyid bdud kyi las yin no// lha'us smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar brtson pa yin/ ji ltar na ma brtson pa yin/ 'ag
dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bujitsam du gnyis la sbyor bde tsamadu brtson pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gnas pan gnyis la sbyor ba dang ldan no/ lha'i bu brtson pa zhesabya ba 'di
ni sbyor ba yang dag pa'i tshig bla dgas so// sbyor ba yang dag pa zhes bya ba 'di ni sbyor bamed pa'atshig bla dgas so// sbyor ba med ba zhes bya ba 'di ni spros pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas so// sal
med pa zhes bya ba 'den sbyor ba yang dag pa'i tshig bla dgas so// lha'i bu gangano/ mig la mi sbyor ba dang/ gzugs lam sbyor ba'ani byang chub sems dpa' sbyor ba yang dag pazhes khya'o/
07 'a@#// gang na rna ba la mi sbyor ba dang/ sgra la mi sbyor ba dang/ snalami sbyor ba dang// dri la mi sbyor ba dang/ lce la mi sbyor ba dang/ ro la mi sbyor ba dang/ lus la mi sbyor ba dang/ reg
ka bya la mi sbyor ba dang/ yid la mi sbyor ba dang/ chos la ma sbyor ba bdeni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba yang dag pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu gzhan yang nyon mongs pa thams cad la yang mi sbyol
sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa cangs ba'aphyir rang khartson pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba yang dag pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang khams gsum pa thams cad
par la yang ma sbyor la/ khams gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyang 'byung bar sbyor ba 'dra ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba yang dag pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang sbyin pa 'brem
sems med par yang sbyor la/ sems can ser sna can sdud par lang sbyor ba dang )tshul khrims la rlom sems med par yang sbyor ba la/ sems can tshul khrims 'chal ba sdud
par yang sbyor ba dang/ bzod pa la rlom sems med par yang sbyor la/ sems can gnod sems can sdud par yang sbyor ba dang/ brtson 'grus la rlom sems med par yang spyi lo
sems can le lo can sdud par yang sbyor ba dad/ bsam gtan la rlom sems med par sbyor la ) sems canasems rnams par g.yengs pa sdud pa rang sbyor ba dang/ shes
rab la rlom sems med par yang sbyor la/ semasacan shes rab 'chal pa can sngad par yang sbyor ba 'di yang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba mang drag pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang
stong pa nyid larlom sems med par yang sbyor la/ ltabar song ba thams cado dang yang 'brel zhing lta bar song ba las rnam par grol ba ma yin nan/ stong pa nyid la sbyor ba ste/
stong pa nyid gang gas stong pa nyid stong pa'i stong pa nyid des/ lta bar gyur ba rnams stod pa dang/ stong ba nyid gang gis lta bar gyur ba rnams stong pa'i stong pa nyid des ) chos thams cad
stong par 'du shesashang/ shes pa la ltag pa'i nga rgyal yang med pa gang yin pa 'di yang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba yang dag pa'o// lha'i bu gzhan yang mtshan ma med pa la
rlom sems med par yang sbyor la ) rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral zhing rnam par rtog pa las grol ba yang m yin pan mtshanum med pa la sbyor ba ste/ rnam par rtog ba gang
gas/ mtshan ma med pa la rnam par rtog pa'il par rtog pa de yang mtshan ma med pa dang mnyagazhing rnam par rtog pa dang/ mtshan ma med ba yang mtshan ma med par rnam par rtog pas
mnyam par shes te/ 'deshes shing shis bal lhag pa'ang rgyal yang med pa gang yin pa 'darang byang chub sems dpa' sbyor ba yang dag pa'o/ )gzhan yang smon pa med pa la rlom sems
'a@#// med par yang sbyor la bsams bzhin du skye ba yongs su 'dzin par yang 'gyur te/ de smon lam 'debs kyang/ sems kyis bag la nyal bar mi byed cing//
smon lam 'de bas kyang/ smon lam gyis rgyu ba yod med la/ su yang skye zhing ma 'u gnyi gar lta ba dang bral ba 'di lta ste/ ngar 'dzin pa dang/ nga par 'dzin pa 'a lta ba dang bral bar gyur
cing/ skye ba yang skye la )'chi 'pho ba dang/ skye ba dang/ yang brol ba yin te/ 'a shas shingashis pa la lhag pa'i nga rgyal yang med pa gang yin pa 'ad yang/ byang chub sems dpa'i
sbyor ba la dang dag pa'o// lha'i bu gzhan la khyad chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyorapa yang dag pa yang dag phulani/gang shes rab kyi shes pas brtson pa yang medal ) thabs kyashes pas dag pa'i/
chos thams cad sdud par yang sbyor bdang/ shes rab kyi shes pas bdag med pa dang ) sems can med pa dang ) srog med pa dang/ gso ba med pa dang/ gang zag med par yang sbyor
la/ thabs kyi shes pas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed par yang sbyor ba dang/ shes ropa kyi shes pas chos thams cad blang ba med pa dang/ dor ba med par yang sbyogal
thabs kyi shes pas chos thams cad yongs su 'dzan par yang sbyor ba dang ) shes rab kyashes pas sangs rgyusams cad dang/ chos kyadabyangs dbyer med khar lang sbyoral/
thabs kyi shes pas sangs rgyas thams cad la/ bla mar bya ba dang/ gus par byab drang/ mchod pa dang/ rim gro byed par yang sbyor ba dang/ shes rab kyi shes bas/ sugargyas
kyi zhing thams cad nam mkha'i zhing du yang sbyoral/ thabs kyi shes pas sangs rgyus kyi nang gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su sbyor ba'i khargyanal yang sbyor ba dang/ shes rab kyi shes pas
'phags pa brams cad 'dusam byas kyesarab tu phye khar yang sbyoral/ thabs kyi shes pas 'phags pa thams cad la bla ma dang/ gus ba dang/ rim gro byed par yang sbyor ba dang//
shes rab kyishesapas// sangs rgyas kyi sku zag pa med par so sor rtog par yang sbyoral ) blabs kyi shes pas mtshan dang ka dpe byad bzang po dang/ rgyan la yang sbyor ba dang/ shes
rab kyi shes pas/ 'du byed thams cad m skyes pa dang/ mabyung khoras sor rtog par yang sbyoral/ thabs kyi shes pas ) bsams bzhin du srid par skye ba yongasasu 'dzin pa yang
sbyor ba dang/ shes rab kyi shes pas/ stong pa nyid dang ) mtshonamamed pa dang/ smon pamed par yang sbyor la/ blabs kyi shes pas lta ba dang/ rnam par rtog pa dang/ smon lam sang
bston par yang sbyor ba dang/ shes rab kyi shesakhas ) mngon par shes pa skye bamed par yang sbyoral/ thabasakyi shes pas/ mngon par shes pa thams cad rnam par 'phrul par
[r (22 ]/yang sbyor ba dang/ shes rab kyi shes pas/ phung po dang/ khams dang/ skyemached ma skyes pa dang/ mi sogs par yang sbyor la/ thabs kyi shes pas/ phung po
dang khams dang/ skye mched yongs su 'dor ba yang sbyor ba dang/ shes rab kyi shes pas/ srid pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs par byed par yang sbyor la/ shubs kyi shes
pas/ 'khor ban sems can yongs su smin par byed par yang sbyor ba dang/ shes rab kyi shes pas/ shes rab kyi mig la yang sbyoral/ glabs kyi shes pas/ lhamag mngon par
bsgrub pa la rang sbyor ba dang/ shis rab kyi shes pas ) chos brjod du med khar khong du chud par byed par yang sbyor la/ bas kyi shes pas/ yi gdang nges pa'i tshig gisatshig ston par
yang sbyor pa dang/ shes rab kyi shes pas/ don dang chos sa solang dag par rig pa la yang sbyor la/ thabs kyi shes bas/ nges pa'i tshig dang/ sebs paso so yang dag par rig pa la
yang sbyor ba dang/ shes rab kyi shis pas// sems can gyi dbang bo mchog dang mchog ma yin pa thams cad shes pa la yang sbyor la/ skabs kyi shes pas/ so so ci rigs par chos
ston par yang sbyor ba dang/ shes rab kyi shes pas// sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhistong khong du chud par byed khar yang sbyor la/ thabs kyi shes pas )chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi
stong lang dgo khar ston par yang sbyor ba 'ad ni/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba yang dag pa yang dag phul lo// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ sbyor ba yang dag kha
'ad bstan khan/ 'khor de las lha'i bu rgyad stong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes do// byang chub semasadapa' lnga stong nami skyaba'i chos la bzod pa skyes/
bcom ldan 'das kyi kyang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pal ) 'jam dpal khyod kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba yang dag pa 'di/ legs par bshad pa ) legs
so legs so zhes/ legs se zhes bya ba byin no// donas lha'i bu 'od mang pos/ 'jam dang la gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod la de bzhan gshegs pas
gang gi phyir/ legs so zhesabya ba byin pas/ cikhyod dga' bar 'gyur ram/ 'jam dpal gyi slas la/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems ) gang sal pas sbal pa la legs so zhes
bya ba 'ugan sbrul pa de la ci dga' bar 'gyur ltayod dam/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal sprul pa la rjes su chags pa yang med/ khong khro ba yong mdane/ de la dga' bar 'gyur
ba zhig yod/ 'jam dpal gya smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin du chos kloms cad kyang sbal ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang de 'i mtshan nyidi la ) 'am dpal
yang de'i mtshan nyid yin na/ de la legs so zhes bya bas// kho bo dga' bar 'gyur du ci zhig yod/ lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ brag cha ni sa stag pa dang/
masnyan pa rnams la rjes su chags par yang ma 'gyur/ khong khro bar yang ma 'gyur ro// lha'i bu de bzhin du chos thams cad na brag cha'i ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'ang
de'i rang bzhin/ 'jam dpal yang de'i rang bzhin yin na/ de la legs so zhes bya bas ) kho bo dga' bor 'gyur du ci yod lha'i bus sbas pa/ 'jam dpal dekhazhin gshegs pas
su la legs so zhes bya ba gnang/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu rnam bar shes pa mi gnas pa ston pa dang/ bstan pa thams cad la su'i blo thogs pa'am 'gyur ba dang/ susemA
can thams cad la sems can du 'du shes mi 'jug pa dang/ su chos thams cad la chos su 'du shes ma 'jug pa dang/ subasam pa mya ngan 'das pa la yang gnas la/ sbyor ba 'khor ban
yang gnas pa dang/ su bdud kyilas khong du chud nas/ bdud kyi las kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las su shos shing/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin lasamangon bar zhen/sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las
kyang bdud kyi las su shes pa de lta bu'i chos dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' la// lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'am dpal
'pha/ khyod ci de lu'i chos dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pas/ khyod la legs so zhes bya ba gnad dug 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu 'di rjesAm du sems// gang mnyam kha
nyid de la/ mi mnyam pa gang yang yod dam/ lha'i bus smras pa ) 'jam dpalatshanyam pa nyid la// mnyam pa nyid la ) ma mnyamapagang yang med do// 'jam dpal rgya mas ga
lha'i bu mnyam pa nyid gang dang mnyam pa de dang/ mtshams med pamanyam mo// mtshams med pa gang dang ma nyam pa de dang kho bo mnyamamo// mnyam pa nyid gang dang mnyam pa de dang/
ltabar gyur ba rnamasamanyam pa'o// ltabar gyur pa rnams gang dang mnyam pa de dang kho ba mnyam mo// mnyam pa nyid gang dang mnyam pad dang phyin ci log rnams mnyamamo// spyan tsaleg
rnams gang dang mnyam pa de dung kho bo mnyam mo// mnyam pa nyid gang dang mnyam pade dang dmag pa mnyam mo// dmigs pa gang dang mnyamapa dedang kho bomanyam mo// mnyam pa nyid gang
dang mnyam pa de dang 'khor ba'i mnyam me// 'khor ba'i mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dngamya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' mnyam mo// mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang
bdag gi mtha' mnyamam// bdag ga mtha'akhabadang mnyamapa de dang yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam me// yang dag pa'i mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang/ ma rigs padang/ srid pa dang//
ku/ srid pa'i mtha' mnyam mo// ma rigs pa dang/ srid pa dang/ srid pa'i mtha' gang rung mnyam ba de dang )ma rigs pa dang/ rnam par grol ba'i mtha'amanyamam//
ma rigs pa dang/ rnam par grol ba'i mtha'agang dang mnyam pa de dang/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug ga many+dza' mnyam ma// 'dod chags dang ) zhe sdang dang ) gti mug gi
ts+tshA mtha'agang dang mnyam pa de dang/ stong ba nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ ston pamed pa'i ma 'amanyam me// stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i mgrwa'agang
sgyu dang mnyam pa de dang/ 'dus byas kyi mtha' mnyam mo// 'dus byas mi 'a gang dang mnyam pa de dang/ 'dus ma byas kyi maT+Ta' mnyam mo// 'dus ma byas kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pade dang
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mnyam ste/ lha'i bu mnyam pa nyid des chos thams cad mnyam mo// de lasu 'chad pa dang/ gang bshad pa dang/ su la 'khegasaso zhes bya ba byin ba'i chos de
dug thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam ste/ nam mkha' yang 'dus ma byas yin pas/ nam mkha' lan mnyam pa yang med ) ma mnyam pa yang med do// su
rjes su mi 'gro ba'i tshul gyi mnyam pa nyid 'di dag gi rjes su song ba de la ) de bzhin gshegs pas legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal khyod legs
so zhes bya ba dang/ legs so zhes bya ba ma yin pa las brtsams te/ chos bstan pa la slobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu lhag pa'i bsam pas
byang chub kyi phyir 'jug pan legs pa'o// ga yodang sbyas nye bar spyod pa ni legs pas phan pa'o// snying rje chen posasems can thams cad m ke tong ba na lags pa'o// sems can
rnams la rnam par 'tshab legs pa ma yin pa'o// chos can thams cad la zhe 'grasapa med pa'i semasanalegs pa'o// gnod sems kyi bsam pa legs pa ma yin pa'o/
nyisapa byung ba'i 'chab ci 'chags te rnam par 'byed la kun nasakhaskor bamed par gnas pa legs pa'o// nyes pa byung pa'achab pa ni legs pa malanapa'o// bdag gi
'khrug pa las ser rtog panalegs pa'o// gzhan gyi 'khrug pa'i skyon tsholabani legs bam yin pa'o// byas pa gzo ba dang/ byas shis pa dang/ byas pa chud mgazin padang// byas pa
la lan du phan 'dogs ban legs pa'o// byas pa ma gzo ba dang ) byas pa ma shes pa dang/ byas pa chud bzod pa dang ) byas pahalan du nam 'dogs pan legs pa ma ldan pa'o//
thos pa yang dag par sgrub panagasapa'o// thos pa legapar sgrub pan legs pa ma yin pa'o// bslab pa yang dag par blangs nas ma nyams pani legs pa'o// bslab pa yang dag par
blangs pa las 'da' ba'i legs ba ma yin pa'o// dben pa la sems gzhol zhing/ dben pa la dga' ba'i legs pa'o// 'du 'dzi la dga' ba ni legs pa ma len
ka pa'o// dgon pa la gnas par lus dang srog 'don ban legs pa'o// lus dang srog la ltakha na legs pa ma yin pa'o// 'phags pa'i rigs la lang dag par dga' ba dang/ rung ba rnam
la tshod rag pa ni legs pa'o// chog mi shes shing 'dod pa che la/ sdig pa 'dod pa na legs pa ma yin pa'o// nyam chung ba rnams la gzod cing dang du len ban legs pa'o// sems
na rnams la sma 'bebasakhani legs bam yin pa'o// 'tshob dag ban leg sa pa'o// snyoms las can legs pa ma yin pa'o// skyabs su song ba rnams mi gtong ba ni legs
pa'o skyabs su songakha rnams la 'khu ba na legs pa ma yin pa'o// dam bcas pa las mi nyams pa na tshigs bden pa dang/ ji skad smras pa de bzhun byed pa'i legs pa'o// 'jig
rten thams cad la gu panalegs bam yin pa'o// dam pa'achos yongasasu 'dzin pa ni legs pa'o// dam pa'i chos yongasasu song ba na legs pa ma yin pa'o// shes pa la ser sna med
cing chos laslob dpon gyi dpe' mkhyud med de/ zang zang med par chos ston pa ni legs kha'o// chos laser snakhyed cing chos la slobadapon gyid pe'amakhyud byed de/ zang zing dang 'brelapa'i
sems kyis chos ston pas legs bam yin pa'o// sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i thabs dang ldan pa'i bsdu ba legs pa'o// sems can la mi lta zhang khrab sadang gi ldan/
par khasdu ba'i dngos bstan lan legs pa ma yin pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa drug tshol lan legs pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi mi mthun pa'i tshogs legs bam yin pa'o// shes
bas byas M pa'i las rnams na legs ngago/ nga rgyal gyis byas pa lasarnamasAni legs lam yin pa'o/ mdza'i kha rten b.lags pa'o// na kha dang khashes parnalags l 'dzin
ba'o dge ba bcu'i las kyi lamal sten ban legs pa'o// ma dag ba bcu'i las kyi lam du zhugs pa'i legs bam yin pa'o// sdig pa'i las khams cad ma spyod pa ni legs pa'o// sdig
ba 'a 'as thamasacad la zhugs ban lags bam yin pa'o// lha'i bu dmag sa pa can gyi ra ba du byung ba na legs bam yinakhago/ stong pa nyid smra ba'i mngon par 'byung ba legs pa/
'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa'i gtam smra ba'i seng ge'i khri ni legs lam yin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod rab tu thob pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi gtam smrakha'is ga'i khrin legs pa'o/
tshul khrims 'chalapas dad pasabyin pa sbyad pan legs bam yin pa'o// tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i thob padang bkur sti dang/ tshigasasukhacad pa thamesacad n legs pa'o/ lhag pa'i
'aglu/ nga rgyal can gyi byang chub na legs pa ma yin pa'o// lhag pa'i nga rgyal med par shes pa brda spyod pa legs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gnod par sems/
ka pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams laston patsamadu/ phangs par 'dzin pa ni legs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i ming gis redapa 'tsho ba ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/
( byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba yang dag par bsgrub pa la gnas pa'i red bani legs pa'o// lha'i bu de ltar na ji tsum du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka'adang 'gal ba de tsam du thams cad leg
pa ma yin pa'o// ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang mthun pa de tsam du thams cad legs pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyi legasas zhes bya ba'i chos la brtson nam/
'on te legs pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i chos la 'don/ 'jam dpal gyis+sas pa )lha'i bu kho bon legasaso zhes bya ba'i chos labartson pa yang ma yin/ legs pam yin pa zhes bya ba'i chos la
brtson pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu kho bon chos thams cad la brtson pam yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ni/ dge ba'i chos la mi brtson nam/ 'jam
dpal gyisasmras pa/ lha'i bu kho bon dag pa'i chos la brtson pa yang ma yin ) ma dag pa'i chos la brtson pa yang maleno// de ci'i phyir zhe na ) lha'i bu dag ba zhesabya kha 'de yang 'dus byas so//
mi dge ba zhes bya ba 'di dang 'dus byas so// mi g.yo khazhes bya ba 'di yang 'dus byas so// lha'i sa skyas kho ) 'jam dpal khyod ci/ 'dus ma byas pa 'am/ 'jam dpal gyis
smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te 'dus byas gyis skrag par lta na ni khro bo 'dus ma byas su 'gyur ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod tsa/ 'dus byas kyis mi skrag gam/ 'jam
dpal gyi smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te yang dag par 'dus byas kyis yongs su grub pa zhig mthongan ni/ kho bo 'dus byas kyis skyag par 'gyur ro// lta'i bus smras pa ) 'jamadapal
gyi khyod kyis// yang dag par 'dus byas kyis yongs su grub pa ma mthong go/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo'i yang dag par 'dus byas kyis yongs su grub pa
ma mthong ste/ 'dus byas kyis yang ma yin no// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal khyod ci 'dus byas su gtog sam/ 'on te 'dus byas su ma gtogs/ 'jam dpal gyi
smras pa/ lha'i bu khe beni 'dus byas su gtogs pa yang ma yin/ 'dus ma byas su gtogs pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhin/ gal te 'dus byas su gtogs par gyuranan/
byis pa so so'i skyekho thams cad dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'dus ma byas su gtogs par gyur nan )nyanab+bos dang/ da sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'dra bar 'gyurano// lha'i bus ]
sbas pa/ 'jam dpal gal te khyod 'dus byas su gtogs pa yang ma yin ) 'dus ma byas su gtogs pa yang ma yin na/ khyod je ltar shes par bya/ 'jam
dpal gyi smasapa/ lha'i bu 'ad ji snyam du sems ) gang de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa 'dus byas su ga togs sAm/ 'on te 'dus ma byas gtogs/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
ts+tso dpal de bzhin gshegs pasasprul pa ni 'dus byas su gtogs pa yang ma yin/ 'dus ma byas sugatogs pa yang ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa ) lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa sa
stsal pa'i chos kyi de bzhin nyid ji 'dra ba de 'dra bar kho bo shes par gyis shig/ lha'i bu 'di rje snyam du sems// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par shes pa gang la gnas/ gzugs la gnas/
sam slas pa ma yin no// smras pa de 'i ri tshor ba dang : 'du shes dang ) 'du byed rnams la gnas sam 3 smras pa ma yin no// smras pade ru 'du byas la gnas sam/ snapa ma yin no//
smras pad ma 'dus ma byas la gnas sam// smras pa ma yin no// smras pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par shes pa gang la gnas/ smas pa 'jamadapal de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par
shes pa ni gang la yang mi gnas so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par shes pa gang la gnas pa de la kho bo gnas par shes par bya'o/ lha'i bus pasob/
'jam dpal khyod mi de bzhin gshegs pa yinanam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu de bzhin nyid kyi 'ong ba med pa dang/ 'gro kha med pa gang yin pa de nyid kho bo 'gro ba byed de bzhin
gshegs pa'i 'gro ba ste/ des na kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de bzhin nyid ji lta bar kho bo yang du ltar 'ongs pas/ des na kho bad bzhin gshegs pago/ de bzhin nyid ji lta bar kho bo
yang de ltar gnas te/ desan kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'o// lha'i bu 'jam dpal zhes bya ba 'di ni de bzhin nyid ci 'dra bde 'dra ste/ des na kho bo de bzhin gshags pa'o// de bzhi
nyid sems med cing zhu ba'i phyir/ 'jam dpal yang sems med cing zhi ba ste/ des na kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin nyid gang du btsal bar/
bya/ 'jamadapal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin 'di ni lta bar song ba drug cu rtsa gnyis rnams su btsal bar bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ) lta bar song ba drug cu rtsa gnyis po rnams gang
du btsal bar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa ) lha'i bu lta bar song ba drug cu rtsa gnyis po de ngag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can gyis rnam par grol ba las btsal bar bya'o//
'khus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba gang du btsal bar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'abu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ban sems can
[2]@#// thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang/ bsam pa rnams su btsal bar bya'o// lha'i bus sas pa 'jam dpal sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang/
pha bsam pa gang du btsal bar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi yul du'o// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi yul gang du btsal bar bya/
'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sems can gyi dpang po mchog dang/ mchog ma yin pa thams cad shes pa las btsal bar bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa ) 'jam dpal khyod ji
ltar 'dar shes pa nyung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu r ston tam ) 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni sus kyang/ kun shes pa 'ame de rnam par shes par mi nus
so/ du ni'i phyir zhi na/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni chags pa med pa/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ brjod du med pa/ bsnyad du med pa/ sbyor bamed pa ) tshig med pa/ sems
dang yadu dang/ rnam 'dra shis pa dang bral ba ste/ de sus kyang kun shes par ram/ rnam par shes par mi nus pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa ) 'jam dpal gal ta) sangs
rgyus kyi ye shes kun shes par bya ba ma yAnan/ nyan Tos 'dad ga gas kun shes par ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang/ phying mi ldog pa la gnas par ga la 'gyur/
[o/ ]'jam dpal gyis smras pa lha'i bu gang la ga rnams kyis ye shes de khastan pa 'di ni) de bzhin gshegs po rnams kyi thabs te/ ye shesadan yig med pa'o/ lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper
na/ me gtsubs pa les me ma 'byung gi/ gtsub shing gtsubs pa las me 'byung ba de bzhin du lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas gal te thog ma khonan/ sangs rgyus kyi yi shes rgya cher 'dra
dag par rab tu bstan na/ sems can gang gas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de[ã ]kun shes bar la 'gyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pas gtsubashing gi gtamagyis/ ye shes de
bstan te/ yateshes de na mi la ched kha'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gtsub shing gtam gang/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang ci yang rung ste/ sdom pa dang/ yo byad
bsnyungs ba'i gtam dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba'i gtam drang 1 byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la 'jug pa'i gtam 'di ni gtsub shing gi gdugazhis khya'o// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jamadupal
gtsub shing ga gtam ma yin pa'i gtam gang/ 'dzamadapal gyis smras pa[ï¼]lta'ibugatam gang skye ba dang/ 'jig padang/ gnas pa'agatam ma yin pa dang/ 'dren pa dang 2 sel ba'i
gtam ma yin pa dang ) gtamagong kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su brjod pa'i gtam ma yin pa dang/ rnam par byang ba'i phan yon gyi gtam ma yan pa dang/ gtam gang 'khor ba la yad 'byung
ga/ bar bya ba'i gtam ma yan pa dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par drag 'o b.rapya ba ma yin pa'i gtam dang/ gtam gang yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir ma lan/
sbyang bar bya ba'i phyiram yin/ bsgom par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa nga gtam gang thob par byaba'i phyuramA lan mngon par rtogs par bya ba'i
phyir ma 5nang 'ad ni lha'abu dag pa/ sAng po yod pa'i gtam mo// lha'ibus sman ra/ 'jam dpal gtam 'dA lta bu rjod pa'atshe/ mag gisam rtsol bar bya ba'i phyir ) bdud
sngagacan 'dar mi 'ong bango mtshar ro// tshig de sbas nas rang por ma len pa de'i mod la bdud sdig to can/ steng gi bar snang la sngon chen po 'khrugs par mngonapar smranas/ sgra
chen por nga ro phyung ba dang ) des thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor de dngangs skrag nas ) sgra skad kyi nga ro 'di lta bu 'di su zhag gis snyam mo// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzim dpal
[ã ]gzhon nur gyur pa la bka'astsalal )'dzamadapal khyod kyis bdud sdig can gyi 'gyur ba mthong ngam ) 'jam dpal gyisagasol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar
gshegs pa mthong lags so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pas/ de'i tshe bdud sdig to can bcing bam pos bcings te/ sa' steng du ltung bdaltabu'ibasam pa bsam pa dang/

[: ]bdag ni ba cing brtam pos bcingaso//bdag ni bcing pa dam pos bcingaso zhes sgra 'anyin to//'jam dpal gyis smasal/sdig can bcing ba 'di bas ches dam po'i 'ching ba gzhan yod de/reg khyod rtag tu bcings kyang khyod
kyis khong du ma chud do// de yang gang zhen ) 'di lta ste[ã ]nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyi 'ching ba dang/ phyin ci log gi 'ching ba dang/ sred pa dang/ lta ba'i bcings pa ste/ stag can 'di ni
'ching ba 'di bas ches dam pa'i 'ching ba dam po gzhan yin te/ des khyod rtag tu bcings kyang/ khong du ma chud do// bdud kyis slas pa kA 'jam dpal thong shig dang/ bdag gi gnas
su 'gro'o// yang 'dudakyi las mi bya'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa sdig can/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa khyod kyis bya dgosan/ khyod ci'i phyir btang/ bdud kyis smas pa/ 'jam
dang labadud bdag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bar chad bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa lanan/ bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ji ltar bya/ 'jamadapal gyis smras pa/ sdig can gangs
rgyas kyimadzad pa 'dud byed du gzhugs pa 'dan/ byang chub sems dpa'a rnams kyibs dang/ shes rab kyi shes pa rnam par sa la pa'o/ gangasangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyamadzad
pa mdzad pa 'di ni/ rab tu ngo mtshar ma yin te/ gang bdud sangs rgyasakyi mdzad pa dang/ byed pa 'di ni/ rab tu ngo mtshar to// de nas 'jam dpala gzhon nur gyur pas/ de'i tshe
@#// gang stag can sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang ldan pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi seng ga'akhril 'dug pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi sobs padang ldan par 'gyur ba'akhyen gyi rlabs
ka de lta bu byin rlabs so// de nas bdud sdig can gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ci 'dod pa kho bo la dris shig dang/ kho bos dris pa lung bstan pas/ khyod kyi sems rangs bar bya'o zhes tshig
de skad smras so// denas gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces sma/so// sdig can dag slong rnal 'byor spyod pa'i 'chid khagang yin/ bdud kyis smras
pa btsun pa 'od srungs chen po// bsam gtan gyi ro myang bar byed pan dag slong rnal 'byor spyod pa'i 'ching ba'o// zhi gnas de lachagos padang/ 'du shes med 'du shisamed min
skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ stong pa nyid lasnying por 'du shes pa drang ) lta bar song ba rnams la bsal bar 'du shes pa dang/ mtshanam med palasAng por 'du shes pa
dang mtshan ma rnams la bsal bar 'du shes pa dang/ smon pa med pa la snying por 'du shes pa dang/ smon lam labasal bar 'du shes pa dang/ myang nalas 'das pa la snying por
'du shes pa dang/ 'khor ba khasal bar 'du shes pa 'di dag na ) btsun pa 'od srungs chen po dag slong rnal 'byor spyod pa'i 'ched ba'o// da pa'i phyir zhen ) btsun pa 'od sru
chen po lta bar song ba bsal nas/ stong pa nyid bsgom par bya ba ma yin gyi/ lta bar song ba nyid stong pa nyidAto// mtshan ma bsalanas/ mtshan ma med pa bsgom par byakham yin gyi//
mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid mtshan ma madra pa'o// smon lamakhasal nas/ smon pa med pa khasgom par bya ba ma yin gyi/ smon lamakyi ngo bo nyid smon pamed pa'o// 'khor ba bsal nas/ myang n
las 'das pabasgom par bya ba ma yin gyis/ 'khor bar dmigs pa nyid mya ngan 'dasapa 'o// btsun pa 'od srungs chen po myang n las 'das pa zhesabya bani/ 'dushes dang/ rlom sems
dang/ mtshan ma la dmigs pa thams cad lam spyod pa ste/ mya ngan las 'dasal na skye khadang/ 'jig pa dang/ rtsod pa las ma yin gyi/ rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa nyid mya ngan las 'ad
pa'o bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dag slong lnga brgya nye bar len pa med par zagapa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad
ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag sus btul/ dge slong dag gis smras pa) gang thob la yang medal/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yang med pas so// rab 'byor gyis smras
ba btul ba ji lta bu / smras pa/ ji ltar gnas pa nyid kyi phyir/ chung zad kyang khrid pa yang med/ mkhrid pa yang med de/ ltar gnas pa bzhin du shes pa dang/ bskyed kha yang med/bkag
kha yang med de/ mnyam pa nyid du shes pa de ltar bdag cag btul te// dge slong de dag gis khastan pa 'di bshad pa na ) lha'i bu stong nyisakhargyanosa rnams la chos kyi mag
rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis/ gzhan yang bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can rje ltar na da ge sbyong sbyin gnas yin/ bdud//
smras pa ) btsun pa rab 'byor nam dag slong len pa yang med de nod pa yang med la/ dad cing dang ba thams cad las kyang yongs su spyod pa'o// btsun pa rab 'byor gang dag slong gang la byan
pang la sgyu ma'i blodang/ gang len pade lamig yor gyi blo dang nye bar len pa'i sems dang// nye bar len pamed pa'i sems kyis kyang/ yongs su ma spyod pa'i dge slong de lta bu n sbyin gnas
yin no// ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ sdig can bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin 'khrugs pa med par gsungs pa gang yin/ bdud kyis smas pa/ byang chub semasadapa' ting nge 'dzin
gang la rtan nas/ shin tu zad pa'i phyir/ zad pa yang zad par ma byed/ rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir/ ma skyes pa yang mi skyod/ myong ba med pa yang myong bar mi byed de/ chos thams cad
kyang rang bzhin gyis snyoms par zhugs par shes la ) nyes nas kyang tshor ba thams cad 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug cing/ mnyam par yang mthongal/ chung zad
00 kyang mathong ba yang med/ ma mthong ba yang med pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzani 'khrugs pa med bar gsungs pa'o// mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ sdig can ji ltar na/
ngag slong sems thams cad la dbang thob pa yin/ bdud kyis sbas pa btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po// rnam dag slong chos thams cad la sems rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid dus
la rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid la mngon zhen pa yang med cing/ sems gzod ma nas rnam par grol ba shesal ) 'ching khar yang mi byed/ grol bar yang ma byed) sems gzug
med pas/ chos thams cad gzugasamed par shes/ sems gnas pa med pas/ chos thams cad gnas pa med par mthong/ sems 'dzin pa med par chos thams cad 'dzin med
par shes kyang/ sems kyis sems shes pa yang medu la ) sems kyi ngo bo nyid rang bzhan gyis/ chos thams cad kyi chos dbyings kyi nge de nyid kyarang bzhin yang shesAng
chos kyi dbyangs kyi ngo bo nyid gyi rang bzhinakyus/ gzhan gyi nga la mi 'jog byar dbang blab pan mos pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa yin te/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen bo dag slong de
lta bu na sems thams cad la dbang thob pa yin no// gang pos smras pa ) sdig can ji ltar na dgeslong yongasaMsu dag par tshes stonapalan/ bdud kyisasmras pa/ btsun ba gang po//
nam dag slong gi gzhan las chos thams shes kyang// gzhand da gzhan ma yin pa'i sems laman par zhen pa yang med/ chos thams cad kyang sgro btags par yab

ston/ ya ga dang skad dang dbyangs dang/ tshig gi lam thams cad brag cha lta bu r shes/ chos nyan bawams cad kyang sgyu ma'i skyes bu lta bu r mthong) gang gi lus kyi rnam par rig byed kyang chuzla dang
'dra bar mthong/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang yongs su rtogs pa las byung khar shes/ chos 'ga' zhig gzung ba'i sbyor lam dor pa'i phyir ram ) shen khubazlas pa'ikhyer ram/
klob par bya ba'i phyir yang chos ma ston/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi po rnams la yang dbang thob cing legag go zhes bya ba la yang re ba medal/ zung zang med par chos ston cing ) rang gi
sems rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa// sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rang bzhan gyi lengs su dag par shes te/ semasakyi rang bzhan yongs su dag par shesanas/ phung
po' bdud la dben par mthong ba dang/ nyon mongs pa'ibadud la bcos mar 'du shes pa dang/ 'chab dagag bdud la ma skyes pa dang/ ma skye bar gnas pa dang/ lha'i bu bdud lagayo
ba dang/ ma sems thams cad dang bral bar gyur pa yin te/ dge slong de lta bu ni yongs su dag par chos ston pa yin no// nyebar 'khor gyis smras pa/ sdig can ji ltar na dge slong 'dus/
ba 'dzin pa yin/ bdud kyis smras pa/ btsun pa nye bar bakhor/ dge slong gis nam chos thams cad shin tu dul bar shes te/ nyes pa rnams kyi thog ma'i sngon gyi mtha' yang dben pa'i
mthar shesate/ nyes pa byang ba rnams kyi 'gyod pa yang selacing/ dam por mkhyad de/ de dag la gang gis mtshams med pa rnams kyang rnam par gnonan/ cho ga dang tshul khrims la log bar
zhugs pa phran tshegs lcasmos kyang ci dgos kha/ nga lta bu'i chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa yang nye bar bslab/ nyon mongs pa 'dul ba la yang mkhas ) blo bur gyi nyon mongs pa la yang kun nas na
mongs par gyur pa ma yin pa drang 'byung bar 'du shes/ nyon mongs par nang du yang ma ston/ phyi rol du yang ma yin/ gnyis ka med khar yang ma yin te// nyon mongs pa khong du chud pa nyin
nyon mongs pa med pa'ashes shing/ nyon mongs pa yang misal/ nyon mongs pa yang med pa yang mi bsgrub nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang spyan dang/ char sprin 'dra bar shes te/ legs
dang lhag mthong gi rlung gis gtor nas/ phyogs dang yul du 'gro ba yang med gnas pa yang med pa dang [â]nyon mongs pa rnams chu zla dang 'dra ste/ yongs su rtogs pa'i gzugasakhan gyi//
bzhin nye bar ston pa dang/ nyon mongs pa rnamasan mun pa'i spyod yul te/ shes rab kyi sgron masaa snang ba snang bar byed pa dang/ nyon mongs pa rnams ni chom rkun ng
0shad @#// gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang 'dra ste/ tshul khazhan yid la byed las khartagan gnas lam yin pa dang// nyon mongs pa rnamasan glags tshol ba ste/ tshul bzhin ma yin la yid
la byed pas 'thalakha dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i shes pas yid la 'jug par ma byedapas/ sus kyang nyon mongs pa rnams 'di 'dra bar shes te/
sems can nyon mongs pas kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa rnams la snying rje zhing bdag med pa dang/ sems can med pa mngon sum du gyur pa na 'dul ba 'dzin pa yang dag pa zhes bya'o//
da ltaranyan klosachenapo de ga thams cad kyis/ rang rang gi 'dod pa bdud sdig can de la kun s nas/ bdud sdig can gyis kyang de dag thams cad kyi don gtan la bab pa bstan pasasems rangs
par gyur to// de nas lha'i bumatshams bzangs/ 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bdud sdig can de la 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
pasan byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bdud kyi las bshad zin gyis/ khyed kyang spobs par gyis shig/ sngagan byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las gang yin/
de skad ces smras pa dang/ bdud sdig can gyis lha'i bu mtshams bzangs la 'ad skad ces smras so// nyishu po 'dadagan/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las radang dag phul
) yin no// nyi shugang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor spyod pa/ rnam par grol ba 'dod cing/ 'khor bas skyag pa rnams la snyan pa dang/ sten pa dang/ bsnyen bkur byed pa ni bdud kyi
las so// stong pa nyidalaso sor rtog cing/ sems can yal bar 'dor ba yang bdud gyi las so// 'dusam byas la so sor rtog cing/ 'dus byas kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su skyo/
ba rang bdud gyi las so// bsam gtan skyed cing/ bsam gtan las rnam par ldog pa tshol ba yang bdud kyi las so// chos ston kyang chos nyan pa rnams la snying rje chen po mi skyed pa yang
bdud kyi las so// yon tanadang ldan pa dang/ sbyin gnas tshol zhing/ tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la khro ba yang 'dud gyi las so// nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam ston cing/
theg pa chen po'i gtam 'chab pa yang bdud kyi las sa/zab mo'i gtam 'chab cing gtam sna tshogs ston pa yang bdud kyi las so// byang chub sems dpa'i lam shes kyang/ phal
tuphyin pa'i lam longs su mi tshol bayang bdud kyi las so// rab tu rtson pa'i bsngags pa brjod kyang/ sems can brtson pa rnams mngon par mi sbyor pa yang bdud kyi las so// dge
ba'i rtsa ba srog kyang byang chub kyi sems mngon du mi byed pa yang bdudakyilas so// lhag mthong gi rnal 'byor dang ldan par gnas kyang/ sems can rnams lhag mthong yang dag par 'dzin dum
'jug ba yang bdud kyi las so// nyon mongs pa ma lus par zad par tshol zhing/ 'khor ba'i rgyun gyis nyon mongs pa rnams la smon pa'ang 'dud kyi las so// shes
rab kyis rnam par dpyod cing/ snying rje chen po la dmigs pa 'dzin pa yang bdud kyi las so// khabs dang mi ldan por dag par spyod pa thams cad kyang bdud kyi lasaso// byang chub
sems dpa'i sde snod ma tshol gyi 'jig rten sgyu 'phen pa'i gsang tshig 'dzan pa yang bdud kyi lasaso// mang du thos kyang gzhan gyis shes kyis dog te/ chos la slobadapon dpe'i mkhyud
byed pa yang bdud kyi las so// 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa'i zhal tabyed cing mang du thos pa'i ma tshol ba rang khadud kyi las so// byang chub sems dpa'achos smakha speg pa chen po la yang dag par
zhugs pakhaskal banyam pa rnams lam rten ) mi snyan) bsnyen bkur ma byed kyi/ nyanas dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyitheg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ skal khami mnyam pal dga'/
ba yang bdud kyi las so// gang gi tshe brgya byinanam/ tshangs pa 'am) 'jig rten skyong ba 'am ) rgyal po 'am/ tshong dponanam/ khyim bdag gi lados spyod dang/ nor dang )rin po che
dang/ dbang phyugag che ba nyid dugyur pa de'i tsha/ chos kyi chab nyid dang ldan pa rnams la mi sten/ mi snyen ) bsnyen bkur mi byed pa 'di dag ni/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
la/ bdud kyi las yang dag lul nyi shu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la sdig can khyod kyis// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las 'di dag legs par bshad pa ni legrwa
so legasas nas/ legs so zhes bya ba bya no// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bdud kyi las 'di rnams thos shang/ thos nas kyang rnam par song pa de dag/ byang chub yongs
su smin par byed pa'i chos nyi shu thob par 'gyur ro// nyishugang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa chen podang/ snying rje chen po dang ) 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo ba dang ) dgo ba'i
bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byadapa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams nyan pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bskal ba mnyam
padang/ gzungs rab tu thob pa dang/ skyobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang/ mngon par shes pa shes pa dang/ chos ma thos pa nyan/ tshe rabs tshe rabs su byang chub kyi sems
mngon du 'gyur ba dang ) rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu 'byung babarnyed pa dang/ dal ba phun sum tshogs pa dang ) ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams sgrub pa dang thabs dang shes rab
kyi shes pas sems can bsdusashang/ yongs su'adzin pa dang/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzan pa dang/ g.yo med cing skya ma med pa dang/ phangos pa'i dngos po thams cad yodA
su gtong ba dang// sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa ste/ byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos nyi shu po 'di dag thob par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i bu/
mtshams bzangs kyi bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can khyod la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis legasaso zhes bya ba gnang ba ni/ sdigacan khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par red do//
bdud kyis smras pa/ lha 'bu 'ad la kho bo snyedapasnyadaci zhig legs par rnyed do// de ci'i phyir na/ lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na )mi gang 'byung po babs pas bstan pa de ni/ mi de'i
'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ dan 'byung ba de'i 'gyur bar blta'o// lha'i bu de bzhin du kho bo ya'ajam dpal gyis byinagyis brlabs nas ston kyi/ 'di kha ba'i skyes bus stsal du ma blta'o//
lha'i bus smras pa/ sdig can khyed/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi mtshan dang ldan zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi seng ga'i khri la 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas kyi skyobs pa dang ldan zhing/ chos ston pas
dga' bar gyur tum ) bdud kyis smras pa/ khyod kyi na kho bo brgyan par mthong ba ldan kho bon cing ba dam pos bdagabacing par shesas// lha'i bus smras pa/ sdig can/ 'aA

dpal gzhon nur gyur pal ) bzod pagasalacag dad donas gtong par 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam dpalagyi banagyi rlabasagyis bdud kyi lho'i mtshams bzangs la 'di bub/'dis/ rgyu ni 'byung bar 'i 'gyur ba sgrol zhig lags pa ra nyid de// de phyir salegasasdug khyab gnang ba/
skad ces smras so// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la bzod par gasolami dgos so// daci'i phyir zhen/
de bdag la 'khrug pamed ) khro ba med pa'i phyir ro// gang dag 'khrug cing khropa de dag la na bzod pa gsoladagos so// lha'i bus smras pa/ sdig can byang chub semasadapa' rnams kyi brjod
bca'adra/ bdud kyi smas pa/ lca'i bu byang chub sems dang 'a rnams kyi brjod pani/ rnam pa bcu gnyis te/ rnam pa bcu gnyisu gang zhen )'di lta ste/ bcos ma ma ldan pas bsam pa'i
bzod pa dang/ khong khro ba med pa'isim sa kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa'i bgrod pa dang/ sems can thams cad la masla bas/ g.yo ba med pa'i bzod pa dang/ dbul zhing phongs pa yongs
su skyob pas gang brtse zhing snying rjeba'i brjod pa dang/ ldog pa med pas// ji skad smras pade bzhin du byed pa'i bzod pa dang/ lta bar song ba dang bral bas/ stong pa nyid kya bzod pa dang/ chos
gnyis la rton pas chos nges par sems pa'i bzod pa dang/ bdag med pas zab mo'i bzod pa dang/ 'phags skye po'i rjes su 'jug pas 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba
dang 'thun pas yang dag pa'i bzod pa dang/ sems can thams cad rjes subasrung bas ngobyed pa yang med la ma mthun pa'ang med pa'i bzod ba dang/ ma skye ba'achos labazed pa rab tu thob
pa'i phyir/ skye bamed cing 'byung ba med cing bzod pa ste/ lha'i bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis so// lha'i bus smras pa//
sdug can khyod gal te bkrol na/ dga' bar 'gyur maM/ bdud kyis smras pa lha 'bu bo bdag 'a ste/ mchog tu dga'o// de nas lha'i bu mtshams bzangasakyis/ 'dzamadapal
gzhon nur gyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal bdud sdigacan bong shag/ rang gi gnas su 'gro'o// de nas 'jam dbal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bdud sdig can la 'di skad/
cas pasaso// stag canakhyedasu zhag gas bcings/ gang las dgrol ) bdud kyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag na sus bcings ma shosas// 'dramadapalagyi snus pa/ sdug
can khyod ji ltar bcas pa med pa bcad par 'du shes pa de bzhin du/ byis ba so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes/ sdug bsngal ba labad khar 'dushes/ bdag med
ba la bdag tu 'du shes ) mi sdug pa bsdug par 'dushes/ gzugs med pa la gzugs su 'du shos/ tshor ba med pa dang/ 'du shes med pa dang/ 'dubyed rnams med ba dang/ rnam par
shes pa med pa la tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes par 'du shes so// sngagacan khyod dgo lan gang nas dgrol ) bdud kyis smras m/ bdagan gong las
kyang me dgrol lo// smras pa/ sdig can de bzhin dugang dag rnam khan dgrol ba yang// yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes yongs su shes pa ma lag rtogs par/ gang las kyang rnam par grol/
bar 'gyur ba med de/ dadag yongs su shes pas rnam par grol ba zhes bya'o// danas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas// byen kyis kharabs de bsdus pa dang/ sdig na de'ang rang gi gzu
ngang ldan bar bdag gshes so// de nas gnas brtan 'od srungs chenapo bdud sdig can la 'di skad smras so// sdig can khyod kyis ) sangasargyus kyi mdzad pa byas pa legs so legs so// bdun
kyi smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po 'dan kho bon yul ma yin gyis/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i yul du blta'o// de nas lha'i bumatshams bzangasagyis/ 'jamadakhala gzhonan
gyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gang du btsal bar bya/ 'jamadapal gyis smras pa/ lha'i busang sa rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon
mongs pa rnam pa su latsal bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ gal te sems can rnams nyon mongs pas gzer ba med na/ sangs rgyas kyang mdzad par ma 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bu 'di lta ste
dper na/ gal te sems can rnams nakhar ma gyur na/ sman pas kyang ma 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ lha'i bu sems can rnams nyon mongs pas gzir bar ma gyuran ) sangs rgyas kyis kyang mdzad
par ma gyur ro// lha'i bus smras pa ) 'jam dbal gang byung na sangs rgyas 'byung ) 'jamadapal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu skye ba dang rga btang nab dang/ 'chi ba byung na//
sas rgyas 'byung ngo/ daci'i phyir zhen/ chos de dag spang ba'i don dusangs rgyas rnams byung ba'iphyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub
b.res nas/ chos spyod pa de gang chos bkag bde gang/ 'jamadapal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub b.res nas/ chos gang yang bskyed ba yang med/ bkagal
yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ lha'i bu chos thams cad ni skye ba ma yin/ 'gag pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bu sangs rgyas 'byung ba sangs rgyas 'byung ba zhes bya bzhes bya ba 'di nird/
gzhan gyi ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa'i tshigabla dgas so// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jamadapal ji ltaran/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogasakhayin/ 'jam dpalagyis
snyas pa/ gang dmigs pa'i lta bas chos gang la yang kun du mi sod pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa )
gang nad dang phyi'i chos rnams la chags pa med pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smas pa/ gang nyon
mongs pa thams cad kyang 'dor la/ sems can thams cad kyang yongs sumagatong ba'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims phun sum tshogasApa yin//
'jam dpal gyis sbas pa ji ltar ston pas bstan pa bzhin du sgrub cing/ sems can thams cad kyang tshul khrims la 'god la lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub kyi sems kyang mi 'dor ba'o//
lha'abus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smas pa/ gang chos thams cad shin tu zad pa'i mtshan nyid du shes nas//
sems can thams cad kyi gnod sems dang/ khro ba dang thabaspang ba'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogamo 'dor ba'o// lha'abus smras pa/ jiltar na byang chub sems dpa' brtson
'grus phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis slas pa/ namakhyang chub sems dpa' chos gang gi phyir/ brtson 'grus rtson pa'i chosangan) 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
ba'i byang chub// de nyid shan tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong la/ sems can thams cad kyis le lesang ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus gces pa yang mi 'dor ba na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/
ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis snyoms par zhugs par shes kyang/ sems can
bya@#// thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa 'dul ba'i phyir yang bsam gtan byed pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yin/
'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ nam rgyu ba med pa thob par gyur te/ spros pa thams cad dang bral zhing ) sems canathams cad kyi ltakhaskang ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyis rnam par byed pa/
naste de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'abyams pa la gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras
panam chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs sumyang n las 'das par mthong ba na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rjel gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpel
gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad la las kyi rnam par smin pa med par shes pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba la gnas pa yin ) 'jam dpal gyis
smas pa/ nam chos thams cad la dga' khayang mi skyesal/ mi dga' ba yang ma yinaban bo// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i btang snyoms la gnas pa yin/ 'dzam
dpalagyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad la gnyis dang bral bar gyur pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar 'byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa zhes bya/ 'jam
dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu r byung ba med par shes pa na'o// lha'i bus sbas pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin/ 'ag
dpal gyis smas pa/ nam byang chub semasadapa'achos thams cad bdag med par mthong ba'o// lha'i dus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi mchog
yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad gzung ba med pa dang/ bzhi med par shis par na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' go cha
chen pa dgos pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smas pa/ nam byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par thos nas// ma dang nga/ mi skag/ sag par
mi 'gyur zhing/ go chu chen po ma 'dor ba na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ jaltar na byang chub sems dpa' das pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa ) nam snying chen pos sems
can thams cad ring du sra ba ma yin la/ srid pa'i bgal nyal gyi rtsa bar bstan pa yang ma yin pa na'o// lha'i dus sas pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'grogs na bde ba can/
'jam dpal gyis smras pa ) nam bdag dang gzhan mi dmigs pas lus dang ngag dang yid kyis gzhan la gnod pa ma byed pana'o/ lha'i bus smras pa/ nga ltar na byang chub sems
dpa' bka' blo bde ba yin/ 'jam dpalagyis smras pa/ nam ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams sgrub cing/ tshig ji skad smras pa bzhinabyed pa na'o/ wa'i bus smras
pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'thun par 'dzin pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras l/ namarang gisems dong 'oskrun pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi bsgo khra las mi 'gyur
zhing sems can Thamasacad dang 'thun par gnas pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ngo tshashes shing khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jamadapal
gyis smras pa de nam sems can thams cad yongs su sman par bya ba'i phyir/ nang du yang nye bar zhi la phyi rol du rgyu ba la yang rgyub na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems
dpab dad pa dang ldan pa yin ) 'jam dropal gyis smras pa nam chags pa thams cad la yang spyod la/ chags pa thams cad la zhon pa yang med pa na'o/ lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang
chub sems dpa' mdza' ba bstan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nAm sangs rgyas kyarags ma gcod pa'o// lta'abus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byas pa grwazo
ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam ji ltar byas pa'i dag pa'i kha chud mi gson pana'o/ lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byas ba shes ba yin )'jam dpalakyis
smras pa nam theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa mi byed pa na 'o// lha'i bus smras pa// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa nyung pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ namarang gi nyon mongs pa/
kyang mi 'dod la )sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams sbyang par yang 'dod pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ dzaltar na byang chub sems dpa' cho ga shes pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras
pa/ nam 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi shes bas/ chos gang yang mi len pa na'o// lha'i 'us smras pa/ ngaltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis slas pa )nam 'gi
rten las 'das pa'i shes rab la yang gnas la/ 'jig rten pa'i rgyu bas kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed bana'o// lha'i bus smras kha/ ji ltar mkhyadachub sems dpa' rab tudaben la
yin/'jam dpal gyis slas pa/ nam nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis kyang/ kun nas nyon mongs par ma 'gyur la/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir/ brtson par yang
snang ba na'o// lhab bus smras pa/ ja ltar na byang chub semasam dang 'a rang duga' rang dbang can yin/ 'jam dpalagyis smas pa/ nam zagal med pa'i lus kyis sangs rgyas kyis
zhing thams cad du snang ste/ leshes kyi dbang byed kyi/ nyon mongs pas dbang byed pa ma yin pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'amang du thos payin)'jam dpal gyis smras
[d/ ]/ pa/nam bdag nyid kyang ma thos pa'i chos nyan cing/ gzhan la yang ma khros pa'i chos thos par byed pan 'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhinal
brtson pa yin/'jam dpal gyis smras kha/ nam dmigs pa thams cad las 'byung ba rab tu shes kyang/ chos thams cad 'phrosapar yang makhyid/ma'aphros par yang mi byed pa na'o// lha'i bus smras
pa/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pasnyade por byed pa yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/nam gzhan dang 'brel ba'i rnam par rig pa ma skyed cing/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod

padaban par yang rtog la/rang gi sems kyi spyod pa la yang mi lta zhing/ bdag dang gzhan du 'du shes pas sgrub pa snying por byed pa ma yin pana'o// lha'abus smras pa/'dra'adaba' ji ltar byang chub sem
dang 'gazungs dang spobs ba phun sum tshogs pa yin/'jam dpal gyis slas pa lha'i bunam byang chub soms dba'athos bskyoms cad kyang 'dzal/sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rnams la
ltayang mtshungs par rab tu 'byed cing dosgra skad brag chadang/ mtshungs par sheganas/mngon par zhan pamed pan// ltar na byang chub semasadapa' gzungs dang sobasal phun sumatshogs pa yin no/ de
nas lha'i bu 'od mang pos 'dzamadapal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skadaces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis bshad pa'i don 'di sus kun shes par 'gyur/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag

wa/ dge ba'i bshes banyen gyis yongs su zin par gyur pa/ sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dmigs pa med bar spyod pa de dag gis/ kho bos bshad pa'i don 'di kun shes par/
'gyur ro// lha'i bus smras pa/de dag ci la mos par 'gyur/ bsam pa ni gang/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/de dag ni zabamo la mos par 'gyur te/lhag pa'i nga rgyalamedaman bsam pa'o// lha'i bus
smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na dag song lhag pa'ang rgyalamed pa yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bunam da ga slong 'jig tshogs la ltapango be nyid kyis/ bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam du sgom ste//
gnyis su med pas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de bgrod pa gcig bu'i lam gyi ngo bonyid du mnyam par shes shing/ ma rig pa dang/ srid pa dang/ sred pa las 'byung pa yang tshol/

ma rig pa dang/ srid pa dang/ srid pa las 'byung ba lasesor rtog panam rig pa dang/ srid pa dang/ sred pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang/ rig pa dang/ rnam par grol bar shes pa na ste/de ltar na dag slong lhag pa'i nga
rgyalamed pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang nam dge slong 'dod chags kyi mtha' la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthur shes shing/ 'dod tshal dang bal ba'imaTha'i rang bzhin yang 'dod chags su shis pa dang/

zhesdang gi mtha' la zhe sdang dang bral ba'i maThar shes shang/ zhe sdang dang bral ba'amaTha'irang bzhan yang zhe sdang du shes pa dang/ gtilug ga ma' la gti mug dang khral ba'i mthar shes shing )gtamug
dad bral kha'i mtha'i rang bzhin yang gtilug tu 'dushes ban ste/de ltar na dag skyong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan lang nam dge slong sdug bsngal yongs su shes
sngaram byed/ kun 'byung ba snying khar ma byed/'gog pa lamangon sum dumakhyad/lamakhasgom par yang mi byed sdug bsngalami skye bar shes pas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rdzasu rtogs te sdug khas

ma skyeb shes pa gang yin pade la kun 'byung ba gang yang med/ sdug bsngal mi skye ba shes pa gang lan pa de la/'gog pa gang yang yod/ sdug bsngalam skye ba shes pa gang yin pa de la/ lam gang yang med

de ltar dge slod tshul bzhin yid la brten pa ni chos gang la yang skyed par ma byed 'gag par rang mi byed de gnas par yang mi byed do// gang la skye bamed pa dang/ 'gag pamed pa dang/ gnas pa med pa de 'dus

ma byas pa'o// 'dus ma byas kyi rang bzhin yang 'phags pa rnams kyi bden par bsgom pa ste )lha'ibud ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no// de nas bdud sdig can sdug bsngal na ya dam bdaste/

gdong mchims gang zhing mchi mas brnangs bzhin du tshig 'di skad ces smras so// gang na chos kyi rnamagrong sa 'di spyod pad na/ bdud rnams kyi ska sa med do// gang dag chos kyi rnamagrangs 'di 'dzan bar gyur
bdag gis bdud kyi las thams cad bkag par 'gyur ro nas de skad smos nas/ bdud sdig canasdug bsngal zhing yid ma bdaste yid la bcagasakhazhin du de nyid dum snang bar gyur to// danas lha'i bu 'od
mang pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras// 'jam dpal khyod kyis bshad pa'i don ji ltar bdag gis shes pa ltan/ de nas lhag pa'i nga rgyal medu ba'i tshul khrib tshogs 'dithob nas/

ba'i dge slong de dag gi rab tu byung ba med do// bsnyen par rdzogs pa med do// lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul mchog tu zabapa 'dis skyag par 'gyur ba'i khyim pa de dag gi ston bde bzhin gshags pas
yanano// dge slong ngam/dag slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/ dag bstan pa gang dug lhagaba'i nga rgyalamed pa'i tshulamchog tu zab pa 'di blosanas/ me/gam dngar la dang bar mi 'gyur zhing/ chos

bar 'gyur bde dag rnam par grol ba nyid du rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu 'od mang bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras ba bzhan te/ dge slong ma

dge slong ma 'am dag bsnyen nam/dag pasnyenam gang dag lhag pa'ang rgyalamed pa'i tshul mchog tu zab pa 'di thos nam skag mid nga la dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing/ mos par 'gyur ba de dag rnam par grol ba/

nyid du rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhan )brjod pa 'dis byang chub semasadapa' rnamasan med pa [â]dang dag par rdzogs pa'abyang chub tu lung ston pa dang/ brjod pa 'dis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
thams cad nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bu bod mang pos gsol pa ) bcom ldan 'das kyi rnam grangs 'di 'aming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzungs bar gyi)bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsal ba/
Â© ]lha'ibude'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u zhes bya bar zubashig/ bdud 'dulakha'ile'u bya bar yang zur shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
la de skad ces khastsal nas/'drachadapal gzhon nur gyur bdang/ lha'i bu'od mang po dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang/ lhan ng/ mi dang lha ma yin dang/ drizar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang
te 3bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
rgya gar gyi mkhan bo shI lenadra bo d+hi dang/ 'dzin mi dang/ zhu chen gyi 'gotsA balhan d+ho ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyi khacosazhas gtan la phab pa/
@#// rgya gar skad du: Aany+dzashAbihAranAmamahA yAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'ophags pa 'jam dpal gnas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/

dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dag slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dag slong gi
ka dag 'dun chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/de nas bcom ldan 'das phye 'phred kyi dus kyi tshe/ nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas//
'khor mang pos yongs su bskor cing/ mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa chag cing/ dge slong lnga brgya lo thams cad gyi gnas khang nas gnas khang du byung
ste gnas brtan shAri'i bu'i gnas khang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas/ gnas brtan shari'i bu gcig budaben par 'dug ste/ nang du yang dag bzhag nas//
gnas brtan byed par mthong// mthong nas gnas brtan shAri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA ra'i bu khyod bsam gtan byed dam/smas ba/ 'jam dpal de bzhin no)/ 'jam
dpal gyis smras pa/ ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod nyon mongs pa sbyangs ba rnams sa ba'i phyir bsamag tan byed dum/ 'on ti ings ba rnams su'o phyir bsam gtan byed/ cib nubashAri'i
bu khyod 'das po la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te ma 'ongs pa la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on ted ltar byung ba la gnas te bsam gtan byed/ cibatsun pa shA ra'i bu khyod/
gzugs la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la gnas te bsam gtan byed/cibatsug pa re'i bu khyod mig la gnas
te bsam ga na khyed dam/bog te na ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid la gnas te bsam gtan byed/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod gzugs la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te sgra
dang dudang/ ro dang/ reg bya dang/ chos rnams la gnas te bsam gtan byed ce btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod 'dod pa'i khams la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'o gzug
kyi khams dang/ gzugs med pa'i khams la gnas tobasam gtan byed/ ru btsun pa kari'i bu khyod gang la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te phyi rol la gnas te bsam gtan byed/ 'on te/
phyi nang la gnas te bsam la/tan byed/ci btsun pa shAra'i bu khyod lus la gnas te/ bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te sems la gnas te bsam gtanakhyed/shA ra'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ltar

ra tsho 'di la bde bar gnas bya ba dang/ brjod pa med par gnas par bya ba'iphyir te/ de lta bu'i byed bsam gtan byed do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/btsun pa ri'i bu chos gang dag tshe 'di la bde bar gnas
pa'am 'di ma yin pa la bde bar gnas pa 'am/ brjod pa med pa'i chos de dag dang gas sam/ ra'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal bdag gis chos gang dag tshe 'di la bde bar gnas kha 'am/ tsho
'dem yin pa la bde bar gnas pa'i chos de dag yang dag par rjes su ma mthong zhing ma dmigs mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'jam dbalade bzhin gshegs pas/ nyan blos rnams la rab tu dben pa'i
chos su gsungs pa gang yin pa de la bdag rten cing gnas so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra'i bu gang de bzhin gshegs pas/ nyan thos rnams la rab tu dben pa'i chos su gsungs
pa gang mnan)btsun pa shA ra'i bu gang la rten cing gnas/ shAra'i bus byas pa 'jam dpal 'di la dge slong ni 'das pa la rten cing gnas so// ma 'ongs pa la rten cing gnas so// da lta khyung

b.lakharten cing gnas so// de bzhin du sbyar ti sems kyi bar la ston cing gnas par khong du chung bar bya ste/ 'jamadapal chos de dag ni de bzhin gags khas nyan thos rnams la rab tu dben par gsungs laM
yan te/ bdagachos de dag la rten cing gnas so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa btsun pa shA ri'i bu dang ga phyir 'ad skad ces 'das pa la rten cing gnas/ ma 'ongs pa la rten cing gnas/ da ltar byung ba la
rtenacing rab tu dpon ba la gnas panas/ de bzhin du sbyar tesems kyakhor la gnas shing/ rab tu ban pa lagunas zhes smra/ btsun pa shAr khu/ 'di lta ste/gang 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid de yang yongakha

ma yin) gang ma 'ongs pa de bzhin nyid de yang yod pam yin/gang da ltar byung ba'adi bzhananyid de yang yod pa ma yin te/ de ltar chos de dugan yod pa ma yin na/ ji ltar gnas brtan kA ri'i bu du 'di skad ces

'dus pa la rten cing gnas/ ma 'ongs pa la rkyen cing gnas/ dulta'abyung ba la rten cing gnas shes smras/ yod pa ma yin pa 'chos la ni gnas pa med do/ yang btsan pa shAri'i bu 'das pa 'di bzhin nyid dang
ma 'ongasapa dang ) da ltar khyung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin bde nici yong ma yin/ gang gis kyang ma yin/ gang gi yang ma yin/ gang la yang mi gnas de ga ngami gnas pa de'i gnasatamags sumed
do yang btsunabashAri'i khu gang 'das ba dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid cesakharjod cing kun tu gnas nas smra ba de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skur
ba 'dings pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhen 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni g.yol med pa/ rlom semasamed ba/ 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ninyams pa med pa'o// 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni stong pa'o// mtshan ma med
pa'o smon pa med pa'o// yang btsun khag ra'i bu gang 'dus pa'i de bzhin nyid de yang dmigs su med/ gang ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid de lung dmags su med/ gang da ltar byung ba'i de bzha
nyid de yang dmigs su med pa nas ) de bzhin du sbyar te/ sems kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid de yang dmigs su med do// 'on kyang btsun pa shA ra'i bu de bzhin nyid ma ga rtogs par gangakhastan pa 'am/
rab tu bshadapar nus pa'i chos gzhan gang yang ma dmigs so// shA ra'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la bzhugs nas chos ston tam/ 'jamadapal gyis smras pa/
btsunAyashAri'i bu do khazhan nyid yod pa ma yin na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la bzhugs te chos ston/ btsun pa shA'i bu chos kyang yod pa ma yinan ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
de bzhin de la bzhugs te chos ston ) de bzhin gshegs pa yang yodapa ma yinan/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la bzhugs te chos ston) chos thams cad kyang yod pa ma yinate/
ngamagagasumed/ de bzhin gshags pa yang yod pa ma yinate dmigs su med do// de'i chos bstan pa ni 'di 'dra ste/ 'di la dmigs pa 'am/ mi dmigs pa gnyis kyis rang tu phye ba/
med do// dbazhin gshegs pa ni brjod pa 'am/ mi brjod pas/ rab tu phye bam yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni brjod pa yang dag par chad pa/
btags pa med pa/ gdags par bya ba ma yin pa'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal su zhig chos bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di'i snod du 'gyur// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa
shAri'i bu gang 'dus byas kyi khams rnamA 'khrugs par ma 'gyur zhing yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod par yang mi 'gyur pa de chos bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di'i snod du 'gyur ro/ gang 'das
pa'i chos rnamasam na migs shing 'das pa'i chos rnams kun shes par mi 'gyur ba dang ) gang 'das pa dang )ma byon po dang/ da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams ma dmigs shing )'das ba
dang ma 'ongs pa dang ) da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kun shes par mi 'gyur ba de chos bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di'i snod du 'gyur ro// gang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang ) rnamakhar byang bam
mtheng zhing )de nye bar len par ladang ma 'gyur pa de chos bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di'i snod du 'gyur ro// gang bdag dang/ bang med par yang spyod par mi 'gyur ba dang/ gang len pa dang/
'dod par yang spyod par mi 'gyur ba de chos bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di'i snod du 'gyur te )duni bshad pa 'di'i don kun shes par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bus smras pa 'drag
dbal 'di la ci zhig kun shes par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa ) btsun pa shAri'i bubashod pa 'di'i don shes bar 'gyur ba ci zhig yod na/ 'di lasuphag kun shes par 'gyur zhes
da skad 'ad/ shAr 'bus smras kha ) 'jam dpal chos zab mostan pa 'di mngon sum du 'gyur ba nyung/ 'di ni yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba nyung// 'jam dpal dgra bcom pa dang/ slob
pa dang/ mi slobs ba rnams kyang sa phyogs 'di la sbyid lug bar gyuran/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams lta ci smos/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu dgra khacom pa rnam lan
sa med do// de ci'i phyir shin 'di ltar dgra bcom pa yang mdan/ sa gang la dgra bcom pa gnas par 'gyur/ dgra bcom pa dag ni gnas med pas rab tu phye ba'// dgra bcom pa dgan yig
su med pas rab tu phye'o// dgra bcom pa dag ni brjod pa dang mi brjod pa shan tu chad pas rab tu phye ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar dgra bcom pa dag ni brjod pa dang/ mi brjod pa yang dag/
khar chad bste/ btags pa med pa'o// dgrabcom pa dag ni sar dbye bdag dang khral kha/ 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba// bajug pa med la/ 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba ste/ dgrakhacom
bdag ni 'dus ma byas pa/ gnas pa med pa yin na/ ca zhig dgra bcom pa dag gi sar 'gyur/ dgyi kho ma pa dag ni ming dang gzugs kyis rab tu phye bam 'gano// byas pas so'i skyakho rnams ni
ming dang gzugs la rnam par rtogago/ ming dang gzugs de yang rtog pa med cing/ rnam par rtog ba med par dgra bcom pa rnams kyis shes te/ de'i phyir dgra bcom pa dag ming dang/ gzugs
kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin no// byas pa rnams kyang midamags byas pa'i chos dang/ dgra bcom pa dang dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams kyang mdamigs so// nama'adamigs kha de na mi rtog/
go/ kun tu mi spyod do// de spyod pa med spros pa med cing nye bar zhi ste yod do zhes khas mi len )med do zhes bya bar khas mi len/ yod kyang yod la med kyang med do zhes khasAmalen/ yod pa
yang ma yin med pa yang ma yonazhes de skad kyang khas ma len to// nam khas mi len pade ni dmigs pa med do// de dmigs pa thams cad dang bral bas/ semasamed cing sems dang bral
te gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis dag slong gi chos la gnas pa zhes bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ 'khor de'i dag slong lnga brgya po snyan/
las langs nas/ 'di skad ces 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mi lta 'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur kho mchi nyan to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur baphyogs gang na gnas pa'i
phyogs de yang spang bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni ston pa mngon sum du gyur pa bzhin du/ kun nas nyon
mongs pa dang/ rnam bar byad ba mtshan nyid gcig tu ston pas/ chos ma yin pa smabo nas brjod nas// de dag la 'di snyam du sems to/ bdag cag ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis legs
par gsungs pa'i chos 'dulang la tshangs par spyod bar spyad snyam nas dang// dranas gnas gartagashA ra'i bus ) 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal
khyod 'di ltar sems can rnams kyi chos kun shes par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir chos mi ston nam/'jamadapal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra'i bu de bzhin no// shAri'i bus smras pa/ dge slong
lnga brgya po de dag stan las langs te/ 'phya spyod ma sAn pa zer zhing dong ngo// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra'i bu gang gi phyir dge slong lnga brgya po 'di dag 'di skadan+te/'jam dpal
zla/ gzhon nur gyur pa ma blta'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lam mnyan to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na gnas pa'i phyogs de yang sbyang bar bya'o zhes zer ba den/ legs
so legs so// shar 'budage slong dedag ga tshag den legs par smras pa'o// de ca'akhyer zhan 'altar 'dzamadapalagazhagyurakhan yod pa ma yin te/ dmigs sumedudo// gang yod pa
ma yin te/ dmigs su med pa de la blta ba dang mnyan par mi nus so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa phyogs gang na gnas pa'i phyogs de yang spang bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'jamadabal
gzhon nur gyur pa yod pa ma yin te/ dmigs sumed pas ) gang de'i gnas kyang yodapa ma yin te dam gsasu med do// gang yod pa yang ma yin tadamigs su med bden bstan par byang a
yan no// danas dge slong lnga brgyupodi dag 'jamadapa' gzhananur gyur pas khastan pa 'di b+bes pa dang/ slar phyogs don log nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam
dpal bdag cag ni ji ltar khyad kyis bstan pa de ltar mishesaso/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa dge slong dag legs so legasaso// de lta bu ni ston pa'i nyan thos rnams kyis bya ba ste/ dag slong dang/
'dri lan kun shes par bya ba med/ rnam par shes par bya ba med do// de ca'aphyir zhu na)'di ltar chos kyi dbyengs 'dan gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa nyid do// chos kyi dbyangs gang mAn
pa de dbyingasum yin no// de yod pa ma ran te dmigs su med cing ) g.yo ba med la'ang 'pho med do// gang ga yob med cing 'chi 'pho med bde kun shes par bya ba ma yAn/ ma par shes
bar bya ba ma yin no) gang kun shes bar bya ba dang/ rnam par shes par bya ba'i rlom semasamed pa de ni ston pa'i nyan thos zhes bya/ mchog thob pa zhes bya/ gtso'o zhes bya/ sbyan gnas zhes bya'o/
bstan pa 'di khabashad ba na/dge slong lnga brgya po de dag las/ dge slong bzhi brgyan len pamed par khrag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong brgya nasems cher
'khrugs nas// lus de nyid dang/ sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod du lhung// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bus/'jam dpa la gzhananur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras s// 'jam dpal khyod semA
canarjes su bsrung ba'i chos ma ston bas/ dge slong brgya po de dag chud zos te mtshar byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan sha ra'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA'i
bu khyod de skad mazur cig/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ shA ri'i bu dge slong brgya bo de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod der rig pa zad cig reganas/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam bar ma
bar 'gyur// kA ri'i bu gal te dag slong de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'dim thos su 'gan/ de dag gdon mi za ba sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur te/ las de zad nasacher skye bar 'gyur
ba zhig gan/ de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brten pas/bskal bar sems can dmyal bamyong bar 'gyur ba'i las de yang cung zad cig myong bar byas sa// shA ri'i bu do'iphyin/ dge slong
brgya po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i nyan thos thog ma 'dus par dgra bcom pa zag pa zad par 'gyur ro// shA ra'i bu de lta bsan/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di som nyid dang bcas
pas thos pa ni dag pa yin gyi/ bsam gtan bzhi la snyomasu par zhugs pas ni de lta ma yin/tshad med kha zashisan de lta ma yin )gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sems
nga san di lta ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhun)chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu de ma thos par 'khor ba las yongs su mgrol/ skye ba dang/ rgya la dang/ nab dang/ 'chi ba dang/ myan dang/ skye sngags
'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ mdam bde ba dang/ 'khrugs pa rnams yongs su ma grol zhes bshad do// de nas tshodang ldan pa shA ra'i bus)'jam dpal gzhonanur gyur pa la 'di skad ts+tse
sbas so// 'jam dpal 'di ltar sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam gras 'di legs par bshad pa ngo mtshar to// 'jamadapal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa
shA ri'i bu de bzhin nyid na bra bam yin/ 'brel ba ma yin no//chos kyi dbyings kyang bri ba ma yin 'phral bam yin no// sems can gyi khams kyang brib ma yan 'phel bam yin no// kun nas
nyon mongs pa yin rnam par byung ba ma yin no// de phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag na yod pam yin zhing dmigs su med de tha snyad tsam du zad khas ci yang m la na/ gang gis kyang ma yin//
gang la'ang mi gnas rtaganas pa med do// btsun pa shAn+ti'i bu gang 'ad lta bu'i mi 'gal ba de ni byang chub po// byang chub gang yin pade ni thar pa'o// thar pa gang yin pa de rnams bar ma rtog
go/gang rnam par mi rtog pa de nam khyed 'gyur ba med do// gang mi byed cing 'gyur ba med pa de ni yongs sum na las 'das pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi/
gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la 'di skadaces bka'astsal/ shA ri'i bu 'amadapal gzhon nur gyur bas ji skud bstan pa de bzhin te// de bzhin nyid ni khri ba ma yin 'phel kham yin no// chos kyi dbye
kyang bri ba ma yin/ 'thel kham yin no// sems can gyi khams kyang bri ba ma yin/ 'phelab ma yin no/ kun nas nyon medus bam yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di lta
dag yod pa ma yin zhing/ dmigs su medade/ blosnyad tsam du zad pas ci yang ma yin/ gang gis kyang ma yin/gang la yang mi gnas te/ gnas pa med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de ni
tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'dus ba dag dang ma 'ongs dang// da ltar byung ba'i chos brjod pas//don gyi ma yin tha snyad tsam//gtsag dang sna tshogs mtshan nyid min//
klu/ mtshan nyid med par gang rtog pa// dodrug nyid ni mtshan nyid 'gyur// mtshan nyid med la rtog bamed// rtog pa nyid kyang mtshan nyid min// 'dus ma byas la gang rtog dad/ chu ngon 'das la gang
rtog kha// gnyis ka bdud kyi las lanazhes// danamakhas pa rnams kyis bshad// phung po skye mched khams kyi rnams // de dag mi gos brjod pa ste// ming dang skye mched gang yin pa//
mang/ de gnyis mtshan nyid gcig pa na// tshul bzhin la ni gang rtog pa// de nyid tshul bzhin ma yin no// mkhas pa cung zad mi rtog ste// stong pa ji bzhin spyod yul lo// gang dag rtog pa de dag/
g.yo/ rtog pa med pa g.yo ba med// rtog pa rnams kyis g.yo bar 'gyur// gu pamedabar mya ngan 'da'// gang gis rang bzhin 'dishes pa// den yishes ldan zhes bya/ de phyir zad pa
rjes su thob// de na rtog med yeshes so// ye shesakyis ye shes brjod// ye shes brjod b rnams kyang gsog/ ye shes 'ad ltar gang bzed pa// de na yeshes ldan zhes bya// gang gis stob/
gsum 'di dag rnams // rin chen bkang ste byin pa bas// gang gis dam chos 'ad 'dra la// bzod pa de ni bzod pa'amchog/ bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// sbyin dang tshul khrims
bzod pa dang// brtson 'grus bsam gtan bstan pas na/ mdo sde 'di dang mtshungs ma yin// chos 'di dang nak+Shig pa 'ad// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsungs// mdo sde 'di
la 'byas n// thams cad de kho gshagasakhar 'gyur// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad naslog chags 'bumanachos rnams la chos mag rdul dang bral zhing rlom med pa rnam par dag go/ dge
slong lnga brgyan lan lamed khar zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//gzugs na spyod ba'i lha'i bu brgyad khri'i bran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/de dag thams can
[/ ]@#/ bskal ba skar ma lta bu zhes bya ba la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs khar 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/dag thams cad kyang 'di ltar de bzhin gsheg/
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasame tog ces bya bar ming 'thun par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'dasakyis lung bstan to/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur padang/ tshodang ldan pa shA ra'i bu dang/ lta dang ma dang/ lho ma yinadang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yarangs tsa ma ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la man par bstod
do 'phags pa 'jam dpal gnas pa zhes bya ba theg kha chen po'i mdo rdzogasaso// zhuchen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he reshes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la
phab pa/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yakhany+tsa na rdashanAm mahAyAn sU tra/bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis bstan ba zhes bya bskrag
pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yodran/ rgyal
brgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'idag slong ba dag 'dun chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong tham pa dang thabs cig tu
kha zhugs te/ de ni tshabcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nasachos ston to// denas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa na bo che'i gdugs dbal/
tshad bcu ba khar khatsam rdzogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i btsug gi stong gi drang thad na 'dzin cing 'dug lo// de nas yongs su dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu mtshams bzang shi rgyab blon med pa
lang dag par rdzogs pa'ang chub las phyir ma ldog kha 'khor dad banas te 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa stan las langs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lag lab der song
nas na ba dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur ba la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod bcom ldan 'das la chod pa mdzad pas/ da dung thugs ma tsham lags sam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras
pa lha 'bu bde ji snyam du sems/ rgya mtsho chen po chu zad pas chog par 'dzin par 'gyur snyam 'am/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'dra'i dpalade ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i
bu de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho chen po lta bu zab cing gting dpag dka' la dpagatumed ba yongs su tshol bar 'dod pa'i byung chub sems dpa' sems da pachen pos/
de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya bar 'dod pas/ gzhan yang chog par 'dzin par mi bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal tshul dmigasanas/ de bzhin gshags pa lamachod pa
bgyi 'jamadapal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dmags pa bzhis ) de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems
la dmigs kha dang/ sems can thams cad rab du thar bar bya ba la dmigs pa dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba la dmigs pa dang sangs rgyas/
kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya b.ladamags pa ste ) lha'i bu dmags pa bzhi po de dag gas ) dbazhin gshegs pa mchod par bya'o// 'jam dpal gyis de
skad ces smras nas/ lha'i bu'i bu ma tshams bzangs dang/ dag slong de dag dang/ byang chub sems dang ba de dag dang/ bloms cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang/ lhadang/
k+Sha med/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten ya rang ste/ 'dram dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa la mngon par bstod de/
'phags pa 'jam dpal rgyas bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
